T06bsa034_u:324: dvāvimau dṛḍhaprathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya sattveṣu kalyāṇādhyāśayau pravartete /
T06bsa034_u:326: tatra hitādhyāśayo yā akuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanakāmatā
T06bsa034_u:331: pratipattiprayogaḥ pratidivasamātmanaśca buddhadharmaparipākaprayogaḥ sattvānāñca yathāśakti yathāvalamadhyāśayaprayogameva niśritya hitasukhopasaṃhāraprayogaḥ
T06bsa034_u:332: dve ime dṛḍhaprathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahatī kuśaladharmāyadvāre /
T06bsa034_u:335: yathā dve āyadvāre evaṃ dvau mahāntau kuśaladharmasannicayau dvāvaprameyau kuśaladharmaskandhau / peyālam /
T06bsa034_u:336: dve ime prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya prathamaṃ cittotpādamupādāya (Dutt 13)
T06bsa034_u:339: sa khalu bodhisattvasya kuśalaparigraho 'nuttanurāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherhetuḥ sā ca tasya phalam /
T06bsa034_u:343: sahacittotpādācca sarvasattvānāṃ dakṣiṇīyabhūto bhavati gurubhūtaḥ puṇyakṣetraṃ pitṛkalpaḥ prajānāmavyābādhyasya ca puṇyasya parigrahaṃ karoti
T06bsa034_u:346: yasminnārakṣe sadā pratyupasthite na śaknuvanti suptamattapramattasyāpi vyāḍā vā yakṣā vā amanuṣyā vā naivāsikā vā viheṭhāṃ kartum /
T06bsa034_u:348: na ca dīrgheṇa khareṇa vā ābādhena spṛśyate /
T06bsa034_u:349: sattvārtheṣu ca sattvakaraṇīyeṣvasya vyāyacchamānasya kāyena vācā dharmañca deśayataḥ nātyarthaṃ kāyaḥ krāmyati na smṛtiḥ pramuṣyate na cittamupahanyate
T06bsa034_u:351: utpādita cittastu bhūyasyā mātrayā mandatara dauṣṭhulyo bhavati yaduta kāyadauṣṭhulyena cittadauṣṭhulyena ca /
T06bsa034_u:352: asiddhānyapi ca tadanya hastagatāni sattvānāmītyupadravopasargasaṃśamakāni mantrapadāni vidyāpadāni taddhastagatāni sidhyanti /
T06bsa034_u:358: yatra ca grāmakṣetre prativasati tasmin bhayabhairavadurbhikṣadoṣā amanuṣyakṛtāścopadravā anutpannāśca notpadyante utpannāśca vyupaśāmyanti
T06bsa034_u:359: sa cetpunaḥ sa prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ ekadā (Dutt 14)
T06bsa034_u:360: narakeṣvapāyabhūmāvupapadyate sa bhūyasyā mātrayā āśutaraṃ ca mucyate narakebhyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:361: tanutarāñca duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate bhṛśatarañca saṃvegamutpādayati teṣāñca sattvānāmantike karuṇācittatāmavyābādhya puṇyaparigrahahetoḥ /
T06bsa034_u:367: samāsato bodhisattvā yatra śikṣante yathā ca śikṣante yacca śikṣante tat sarvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya bodhisattvacaryetyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:371: svārthaḥ parārthaḥ tattvārthaḥ prabhāvaḥ sattvaparipākaḥ ātmano buddhadharmaparipākaḥ anuttarā ca samyaksaṃbodhiḥ saptamaṃ sthānam /
T06bsa034_u:375: svaparārthaḥ katamaḥ samāsato daśavidhaḥ svaparārtho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:376: kevalaṃ parasambaddhaḥ hitānvayaḥ sukhānvayaḥ hetusaṃgṛhītaḥ phalasaṃgṛhītaḥ ehikaḥ āmutrikaḥ ātyantikaḥ anātyantikaśca /
T06bsa034_u:377: tatra kevalaḥ svārthaḥ parārthaśca bodhisattvena parijñāya prahātavyaḥ bodhisattvavidheḥ samatikrāntatvādananurūpatvācca /
T06bsa034_u:379: tatrāyaṃ kevalaḥ svārtho bodhisattvasya yo 'nena parijñāya prahātavyo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:381: dharmamatsariṇo vā punaḥ sato dharmāṇāṃ buddhabodhisattvabhāṣitānāṃ paryeṃṣaṇā dhāraṇā ca /
T06bsa034_u:382: svargakāmasya svargārtha śīlaṃ vīryārambhaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñāṃ samādāya vartanā /
T06bsa034_u:384: lābhakāmasya vā lābhanimittaṃ lābhanirvartakaṃ mamārthaṃ pareṣāmutplāvakaṃ vicitrābhūtaguṇākhyānam /
T06bsa034_u:385: ātmanaḥ paricaryāsvīkaraṇakāmasya paricaryāsvīkaraṇārthamadharmeṇa gaṇasaṃgraho na dharmeṇa /
T06bsa034_u:386: parato dāsabhūtān sattvān dāsabhāvāddhi pramokṣayati yāvadevātmano dāsabhāvāya /
T06bsa034_u:387: (Dutt 16) bandhanabaddhān sattvān bandhanādvimokṣya svayameva badhnāti yāvadevātmanaḥ kṛtyaniṣpattaye /
T06bsa034_u:388: daṇḍādibhayabhītāṃśca sattvān parato daṇḍādibhayādvipramokṣayati yāvadeva svayameva bhayagrahaṇārtham /
T06bsa034_u:389: dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāraśca bodhisattvasya sattvārthanidhyānavirahitaḥ kevalaḥ svārtho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:390: ityevaṃbhāgīyo bodhisattvasya kevalaḥ svārtho vedivtayo yo bodhisattvena parijñāya prahātavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:391: dānaṃ punaḥ bodhisattvasya kṣāntiśca kāruṇyapūrvakaṃ vā bodhipariṇataṃ vā svarganimittaṃ vā nityakālaṃ parasambaddha eva svārtho veditavyaḥ
T06bsa034_u:392: ityetān yathānirdiṣṭānākārān sthāpayitvā tadanya etadviparyayātsvārtho bodhisattvānāṃ sarva eva parārthasambaddho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:393: tatrāyaṃ bodhisattvasya kevalaḥ parārtho bodhisattvena parijñāya prahātavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:394: vipanna dṛṣṭerdānam anāgamadṛṣṭeraphaladarśinaḥ bhraṣṭaśīlasya pratipattivirahitasya pareṣāṃ dharmadeśanā /
T06bsa034_u:396: tathāhi sa dhyānairvihṛtya dhyānaṃ vyāvarttya praṇidhāya yatra kāmaṃ tatra kāmadhātāvupapadyate /
T06bsa034_u:397: vaśitāprāptasya ca bodhisattvasya daśasu nikṣu vicitrairnirmāṇaiḥ vicitrāṇāṃ sattvānāmarthakriyā /
T06bsa034_u:400: tatra pūrvako dvividhaḥ parārthaḥ kevalo yathā nirdiṣṭo bodhisattvena parijñāya prahātavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:401: tadanyatra ca kevale parārthe bhūyasyā mātrayā śikṣitavyam /
T06bsa034_u:402: ityetānākārān sthāpayitvā etadviparyayācca bodhisattvānāṃ sarvaḥ parārthaḥ svārthaḥ sambaddhaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:407: tatra yatkiṃcid bodhisattvaḥ ātmanā vā parīttaṃ prabhūtaṃ vā kuśalaparigrahaṃ kuśalopacayaṃ
T06bsa034_u:408: karoti paraṃ vā parītte prabhūte vā kuśalaparigrahe kuśalopacaye samādāpayati vinayati (Dutt 17)
T06bsa034_u:411: yatkiṃcidvodhisattvaḥ ātmano vā parasya vā kliṣṭa varjitaṃ sukhamupasaṃharati upakaraṇasukhaṃ
T06bsa034_u:412: vā dhyānasukhaṃ vā ayaṃ bodhisattvasyānugrāhakalakṣaṇo hitānvayaḥ svaparārtho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:417: sa punareṣa caturvidhaḥ svaparārthaḥ caturṣu dharmasamādaneṣvanupūrva yathāyogaṃ dṛṣṭavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:424: tatra nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃsaṃprāpakaśca nirvāṇapakṣyā laukikalokottarā dharmā ityeṣa
T06bsa034_u:425: samāsato bodhisattvasya hitānvaya aupaśamikaḥ svaparārthaḥ sarvaprativiśiṣṭo niruttaro veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:429: hetusukhaṃ veditasukhaṃ duḥkhaprātipakṣikaṃ sukhaṃ veditopacchedasukhamavyabādhyañca pañcam sukham /
T06bsa034_u:431: taddhetukaśca yaḥ sparśaḥ sukhavedanīyaḥ yacca kiñcidiṣṭaphalaṃ karma dṛṣṭe dharme abhisaṃparāye vā tatsarvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya hetusukhamityucyate
T06bsa034_u:433: duḥkhapraśamanāpekṣaḥ ebhireva hetusukhasaṃgṛhītaistribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ saṃbhūtaḥ kāyacittānugrahakaro 'nubhavo veditasukhamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:437: tatpunaḥ sarva traidhātukaṃ yathāyogaṃ ṣaḍvidhamāyatanabhedena cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajaṃ yāvanmanaḥsaṃsparśajam /
T06bsa034_u:442: śītoṣṇakṣutpipāsādiduḥkhapratikāreṇa praśamāt tasminneva duḥkhopaśamamātrake yā sukhabuddhirutpadyate idamucyate duḥkhaprātipakṣikaṃ sukham
T06bsa034_u:450: tatra hetusukhaṃ sukhahetutvāt sukhaṃ na svabhāvataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:451: veditasukhaṃ na hetubhāvādapi tu svabhāvata eva /
T06bsa034_u:452: duḥkha-prātipakṣikaṃ sukhaṃ na ca hetubhāvānnāpi svabhāvataḥ api tu duḥkhopaśama-mātrad duḥkhāpakarṣaṇāt sukham /
T06bsa034_u:453: veditopacchedasukhaṃ na hetubhāvānna svābhāvyānna duḥkhāpakarṣaṇādapi tu yatkiṃcidveditam /
T06bsa034_u:454: idamatra duḥkhasyeti kṛtvā pāramārthikasya duḥkhasya tāvatkālikvavihāra-vyupaśamāt sukham /
T06bsa034_u:455: avyābādhya-sukha-saṃgṛhītaṃ paścimaṃ saṃbodhisukhamāyatyāṃ ca tasyaiva pāramārthikasya
T06bsa034_u:456: duḥkhasyātyanta-vyupaśamād dṛṣṭe ca dharme sarva-kleśa-pakṣyasya dauṣṭhulyagyāśrayagatasyātyantoparamāt sukham /
T06bsa034_u:457: tadavaśiṣṭamavyābādhya-sukhaṃ tasyaiva paścimasyānukūlatvāt tatpakṣyatvāt tadāvāhakatvāt avyābādhyasukhaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:458: tatra bodhisattvo yadeva hitapakṣyaṃ sukhaṃ tadeva sattvānāmupasaṃharet natu ahitapakṣyam /
T06bsa034_u:459: ahitapakṣyaṃ punaḥ sukhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā parijñāya tasmāt sattvān vicchandayecchaktitaśca tasyāpakarṣāpahārāya vyāyaccheta /
T06bsa034_u:460: duḥkhānugatamapi yaddhitaṃ syāt tadvodhisattvena sahaiva duḥkhena sahaiva daurmanasyenākāmakānāṃ sattvānāmupasaṃhartavyamupāyakauśalya-saṃniśrayeṇa
T06bsa034_u:461: sukhānugatañcāpi yadahitaṃ syāttadapi sahaiva sukhena saha saumanasyena kāmakānāṃ sattvānāmapahartavyamapakarṣitavya mupāyakauśalya-saṃniśrayeṇa
T06bsa034_u:465: yo 'sau duḥkhena saha hitopasaṃhāraḥ sukhena ca sahāhitāpakarṣaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:466: ataeva bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu yo hitakāmaḥ arthataḥ sukhakāmo 'pi sa jñeyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:468: tathā hi hitaṃ hetusthānīyaṃ sukhaṃ phalasthānīyam /
T06bsa034_u:470: yaḥ kaściddhitānugataḥ tatra yacceṣṭaphalaṃ karma dṛṣṭe dharme abhisaṃparāye ca hetusukhasaṃgṛhītaṃ
T06bsa034_u:471: yacca duḥkhaprātipakṣikaṃ yacca vedito pacchedasukhaṃ yaccāvyābādhyasukham etadekāntena
T06bsa034_u:474: vedita sukhamindriyaviṣayasparśasaṃgṛhītañca hetusukhaṃ yatsaṃkleśāya vā kliṣṭaṃ vā sāvadyamahitamapathyaṃ tannopasaṃharet /
T06bsa034_u:475: yatpunarasaṃkleśāyāsaṃkliṣṭaṃ vā 'navadyaṃ hitaṃ pathyaṃ ca tadvodhisattvaḥ sattveṣūpasaṃhared yathāśakti yathābalam /
T06bsa034_u:476: api cātmanā tathaiva samācarecchikṣeta pratyanubhavedityayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ hitasukhānvayaḥ svaparārtho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:480: vipākahetuḥ vipākaphalaṃ puṇyahetuḥ puṇyaphalaṃ jñānahetuḥ jñānaphalam /
T06bsa034_u:483: āyuḥsaṃpat varṇasaṃpat kulasaṃpat aiśvaryasaṃpat ādeyavākyatā maheśākhyatā manuṣyatvaṃ balameva cāṣṭamam /
T06bsa034_u:488: yatpunaḥ śraddheyo bhavati pratyayitaḥ sattvānāmutpannotpanneṣvadhikaraṇeṣu prāmāṇikatvena ratheyaḥ kāṃsakūṭatūlākūṭādibhinirmāyāśāṭhyena /
T06bsa034_u:492: mahadyaśaḥ khyātiścāsya loke prathitā bhavati yaduta śauryaṃ vā vīrya vā dhairyaṃ
T06bsa034_u:493: vā vaicakṣaṇyaṃ vā naipuṇyaṃ vā sauśīlyaṃ vā vicitraśilpakarmasthānātirekataratama-kauśalyaṃ vā ārabhya /
T06bsa034_u:494: (Dutt 20) tannidānañca gururbhavati mahājanakāyasya satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:497: alpābādhatā arogajātīyatā mahotsāhatā ca prakṛtyā balasaṃpat /
T06bsa034_u:503: āyatyāmātmani vicitraguṇādhānapraṇidhānavato ratnatrayapūjā gurupūjā maheśākhyatāyā hetuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:508: vinirmokṣaṇatayā ca dharmeṇa puruṣendriyavipralopāyopāttānāmupanītānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ manuṣyatvasya hetuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:509: kāyena sattvānāṃ vaiyāvṛtya kriyā sahāyakriyā utpannotpanneṣu kṛtyeṣu yathāśakti
T06bsa034_u:513: sa punarayaṃ hetuḥ samāsatastribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ puṣṭo bhavati paripūrṇasya puṣṭasyodārasya vipākasyābhinirvṛttaye /
T06bsa034_u:516: tatra yā ca śuddhāśayatā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau teṣāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ pariṇamanād
T06bsa034_u:517: yā ca tīvrāśayatā ghanarasenodāreṇa prasādenādhyācaraṇād yā ca sahadhārmikasya darśanenābhipramodanā
T06bsa034_u:518: yā ca pratidivasaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ tadanudharmameva bahulamanuvitarkaṇānuvicāraṇā /
T06bsa034_u:520: tatra yo dīrghakālābhyāso nirantarakāritā [ca] nipuṇakāritā ca pareṣāñcāsamātte tasmin
T06bsa034_u:521: kuśale samādāpanāya varṇavāditā samātte vā punaḥ saṃharṣaṇāya varṇavāditā teṣāmeva
T06bsa034_u:524: tatra samāsataḥ prayogasya samyaksampādanāttasyaiva ca samyakprayogasya phale 'vasthāpanā tkṣetraśuddhirveditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:526: āyuḥsaṃpanno bodhisattvo dīrghakālaṃ kuśalapakṣe prayujyate prabhūtañca kuśalamūlopacayaṃ karoti svārtha parārthañcārabhya /
T06bsa034_u:530: tayā ca manojñarūpatayā sammukhībhāvopagamanāccāsya mahājanakāyo vacanaṃ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyate /
T06bsa034_u:532: kulasaṃpanno bodhisattvaḥ sammato bhavati mahājanakāyasya pūjyaśca praśasyaśca /
T06bsa034_u:533: sammatatvācca pūjyatvātpraśasyatvād yatra yatra vastuni sattvān samādāpayati te tejograstāstatra tatrāśu pratipadyante na vivadante na viceṣṭante 'kriyāyai /
T06bsa034_u:535: aiśvaryasaṃpanno bodhisattvo dānena sattvān saṃgṛhṇāti paripācayati /
T06bsa034_u:537: ādeyavacano bodhisattvaḥ priyavāditayā arthacaryayā samānārthatayā ca sattvān gṛhṇāti paripācayati /
T06bsa034_u:539: maheśākhyo bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ vicitraiḥ kṛtyakaraṇīyaiḥ sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchannupakārī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:540: yenopakāre ṇāvabaddhacittāḥ sattvā asya gauravāt kṛtajñatayā ca laghuladhvevājñāmanuvartante satkṛtyādareṇa /
T06bsa034_u:542: manuṣyabhūto bodhisattvaḥ purūṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato bhājanabhūto bhavati sarvaguṇānāṃ sarvavyavasāyānāṃ sarvajñeyapravicayānām /
T06bsa034_u:543: viśāradaśca bhavatyanāvṛtagatiḥ sarvasattvasarvakālopasaṃkramaṇasaṃbhāṣaṇasaṃvāsasaṃbhogaraho vihārāṇam idaṃ puruṣatva phalaṃ bodhisattvasya veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:544: balasaṃpanno bodhisattvaḥ akhinno bhavati kuśaladharmārjanaprayogeṇa sattvānugrahaprayogeṇa ca /
T06bsa034_u:547: itīdaṃ bodhisattvānāmaṣṭavidhasya vipākasyāṣṭavidhaṃ phalaṃ yadbhavati sattvānāṃ (Dutt 22)
T06bsa034_u:549: asmin khalu bodhisattvo vipākaphale vyavasthitaḥ svayañca śakto bhavati pratibalaḥ sattvānāṃ vicitraprabhūtārthakaraṇe /
T06bsa034_u:550: te 'pi cāsya vineyā niyojyā bhavanti yathākāmakaraṇīyāya yaduta svārthakriyāmārabhya /
T06bsa034_u:551: svayañcedayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ pratibalaḥ syādvineyāścāsya na niyojyā bhaveyuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:552: evamasya na pracurā syānna pradakṣiṇā parārthakriyā yenāyaṃ na śaknuyāt parārthaṃ kartum /
T06bsa034_u:553: svayañcedayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ aśaktaḥ syādapratibalo vineyāścāsya niyojyāḥ syuḥ svārthakriyāmārabhyaivamapi
T06bsa034_u:554: bodhisattvasya parārthakriyā na pracurā na pradakṣiṇā syād yenāyaṃ na śaknuyāt parārtha kartum /
T06bsa034_u:555: tasmādubhayasānnidhye ubhayasaṃpadiṃ satyāṃ bodhisattvasya sattvārthakriyā pracurā bhavati pradakṣiṇā yena śaknoti parārthaṃ kartum /
T06bsa034_u:556: tathābhūtaścāsau bodhisattvaḥ ātmanaśca buddhadharmān sattvāṃśca triṣu yāneṣu kṣiprameva paripācayati /
T06bsa034_u:559: tadanena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvānāṃ yasmādaṣṭavidhaṃ vipākaphalaṃ hitasukhāya sattvānāṃ saṃvartate /
T06bsa034_u:560: tasmād yaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ bandhyo nirarthaḥ saṃsāraḥ sa teṣāmavandhyaśca mahārthaśca bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:566: vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā ca puṇyapakṣyā jñānapakṣyā ca veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:567: yadvīrya niśritya dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ vā samādatte rakṣati maitryādīni cāpramāṇāni bhāvayati /
T06bsa034_u:569: yatpunarvīryaṃ niśritya śrutacintābhāvanāmayyāṃ prajñāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti skandhakauśalyaṃ
T06bsa034_u:571: duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhataḥ samudayaṃ vā samudayato nirodhaṃ vā nirodhato mārgaṃ vā mārgataḥ pratyavekṣate /
T06bsa034_u:572: kuśalākuśalāndharmān sāvadyānanavadyān hīnapraṇītān kṛṣṇaśuklasapravibhāgapratītyasamutpannān dharmān yathābhūtaṃ pravicinoti pratyavekṣate
T06bsa034_u:574: yaddhyānaṃ niśrityaṃ dānaṃ vā dadāti śīlaṃ vā samādatte rakṣati maitryādīni cāpramāṇāni bhāvayati /
T06bsa034_u:576: (Dutt 23) yatpunardhyānaṃ niśritya śrutacintābhāvanāyyāṃ prajñāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti skandhakauśalyaṃ vā pūrvavat sarvaṃ vaktavyaṃ tadyathā vīrye
T06bsa034_u:582: puṇyajñānapratilambhasthānopacayāya yacchandaḥ anukūlo 'vidhuraḥ pratyayaḥ pūrvakaśca puṇyajñānābhyāsaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:583: tatrāyamavidhuraḥ pratyayaḥ yā viparītasya ca pratyayasyāpratyupasthānamasannihitatā /
T06bsa034_u:585: tatra yā pāpamitramāgamya viparītā puṇyajñānadeśanā viparītena vā manaskāreṇa viparītagrāhitā /
T06bsa034_u:589: teṣāñca vivarjanamanutpādaḥ pratyayo 'vidhura ityucyate bodhisattvasya puṇyajñānayoḥ /
T06bsa034_u:590: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ hetūnāmanyatamavaikalyānnāpi puṇyasya nāpi jñānasya prasūtirveditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:592: puṇyamāśritya bodhisattvo 'kṣataḥ saṃsāre saṃsarati nātyarthaṃ duḥkhairbādhyamānaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:594: jñānamāśritya bodhisattvaḥ samyak puṇyaparigrahaṃ karoti na mithyā vicitrāprameyakauśalyakriyayā ca yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate
T06bsa034_u:595: itīdaṃ samāsena puṇyajñānaphalaṃ yathāyogaṃ caturvidhaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:597: tatra yaśca vipāko yaśca vipākaheturyacca vipākaphalaṃ sarvametatpuṇyāśritaṃ puṇyaprabhavam /
T06bsa034_u:599: puṇyaṃ pradhānaṃ jñānaṃ punarnirūttaram puṇyajñānaṃ tadanyataravaikalyādayaṃ bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ nādhigacchet /
T06bsa034_u:607: dhyānavyāvartanakuśalasya ca bodhisattvasya dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārthaṃ dṛṣṭa eva ca dharme tatsanniśrayo na parārthaprasādhanārthaṃ dhyānasanniśrayaḥ
T06bsa034_u:608: yacca dṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇaṃ tathāgatabhūtasya ye ca laukikalokottarā dṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇasaṃprāpakāḥ saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:612: tatra yā ca kāmadhātau bhogasaṃpatparatra yā cātmabhāvasaṃpat paratra /
T06bsa034_u:613: yā ca paratra dhyānārūpyopapattiḥ tasyāśca paratra bhogātmabhāvasaṃpado dhyānārūpyopapatteśca
T06bsa034_u:614: yā dṛṣṭe dharme sahaiva duḥkhena sahaiva daurmanasyena pratisaṃkhyāya pratisaṃkhyāya hetvāsevanā /
T06bsa034_u:615: ayaṃ sāṃparāyika eva bodhisattvasya svaparārtho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:616: yā punardṛṣṭe dharme sahaiva sukhena sahaiva saumanasyena bhogātmabhāvasaṃpado hetvāsevanā /
T06bsa034_u:621: kāmadhātau bhogātmabhāvasaṃpattiḥ sahetuphalā laukikī ca pṛthagjanānāṃ śuddhiḥ sahetuphalā anātyantikaḥ svaparārthaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:622: sarvātyantakleśaprahāṇamāryāṣṭāṅgaśca mārgaḥ tadāśrayeṇa ca ye laukikāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ pratilabdhāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:624: tatra tribhiḥ kāraṇairātyantikatā anātyantikatā ca veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:630: ityayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ daśavidhaḥ svaparārthaḥ samāsavistarataḥ yatra bodhisattvairyathāśakti yathābalaṃ śikṣitavyam nāta ūttari nāto bhūyaḥ
T06bsa034_u:631: atīte 'pyadhvanyanāgate 'pi ye svaparārthe śikṣitavantaḥ śikṣiṣyante sarve te 'sminneva daśavidhe svaparārthe /
T06bsa034_u:638: yathāvadbhāvikatāñca dharmāṇāmārabhya yā dharmāṇāṃ bhūtatā yāvadbhāvikatāñcārabhya yā dharmāṇāṃ sarvatā /
T06bsa034_u:639: iti bhūtatā sarvatā ca dharmāṇāṃ samastastattvārtho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:642: tatra laukikānāṃ sarveṣāṃ yasmin vastuni saṃketasaṃvṛtisaṃstavanāgamapraviṣṭayā buddhyā darśanatulyatā bhavati tadyathā pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivyaiveyaṃ nāgniriti /
T06bsa034_u:643: yathā pṛthivyāmevamagnāvapsu vāyau rūpeṣu śabdeṣu gandheṣu raseṣu spraṣṭavyeṣu bhojane
T06bsa034_u:644: pāne yāne vastre alaṅkāropavicāre bhāṇḍopaskare gandhamālyavilepane nṛtyagītavāditre
T06bsa034_u:645: āloke strīpuruṣaparicaryāyāṃ kṣetrāpaṇagṛhavastuni sukhaduḥkhe duḥkhamidaṃ na sukhaṃ
T06bsa034_u:648: evamidaṃ nānyatheti niścitādhimuktigocaro yadvastu sarveṣāmeva laukikānāṃ paraṃparāgatayā saṃjñayā svavikalpa-prasidvaṃ na cintayitvā tulayitvopaparīkṣyodgṛhītam
T06bsa034_u:651: satāṃ yuktārthapaṇḍitānāṃ vicakṣaṇānāṃ tārkikāṇāṃ mīmāṃsakānāṃ tarkaparyāpannāyāṃ
T06bsa034_u:652: bhūmau sthitānāṃ svayaṃ prātibhānikyāṃ pārthagjanikyāṃ mīmāṃsānucaritāyāṃ pratyakṣamanumānamāptāgamaṃ
T06bsa034_u:657: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmanāsraveṇānāsravāvāhakena cānāsravapṛṣṭalabdhena ca laukikena jñānena yo gocaraviṣayaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:670: tena jñeyāvaraṇena vimuktasya jñānasya yo gocaraviṣayastajjñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhijñānagocarastattvaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:672: bodhisattvānāṃ buddhānāñca bhagavatāṃ dharmanairātmyapraveśāya praviṣṭena suviśuddhena
T06bsa034_u:674: jñānena yo gocaraviṣayaḥ sāsau paramā tathatā niruttarā jñeyaparyantagatā yasyāḥ
T06bsa034_u:681: tadyathā rūpamiti vā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānamiti vā /
T06bsa034_u:682: cakṣuriti vā srotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mana iti vā /
T06bsa034_u:684: rūpamiti vā śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyamiti vā /
T06bsa034_u:685: kuśalamiti vā akuśalamiti vā avyākṛtamiti vā /
T06bsa034_u:686: utpāda iti vā vyaya iti vā pratītyasamutpanna iti vā /
T06bsa034_u:687: atītamiti vā anātagamiti vā pratyutpannamiti vā /
T06bsa034_u:691: yadapi dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātaṃ prāptaṃ paryeṣitaṃ manasā 'nuvitarkitamanuvicāritamiti vā /
T06bsa034_u:693: ityevaṃbhāgīyaḥ prajñaptivādanirūḍhaḥ svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ lokasya bhāva ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:695: tatrābhāvo yā asyaiva rūpamiti prajñaptivādasya yāvadantato nirvāṇamiti prajñaptivādasya
T06bsa034_u:696: nirvastukatā nirnimittatā prajñaptivādāśrayasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ nāstikatā asaṃvidyamānatā
T06bsa034_u:699: yatpunaḥ pūrvakeṇa ca bhāvenānena cābhāvena ubhābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ vinirmuktaṃ dharmalakṣaṇasaṃgṛhītaṃ vastu /
T06bsa034_u:702: tasmiṃśca tattve buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ suviśuddhaṃ jñānaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:703: bodhisattvānāṃ punaḥ śikṣāmārgaprabhāvitaṃ tatra jñānaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:704: sā ca prajñā mahānupāyo bodhisattvasyānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ prāptaye /
T06bsa034_u:706: tathā hi bodhisattvastena śūnyatādhimokṣeṇa tāsu tāsu jātiṣu prayujyamānaḥ sattveṣu buddhadharmaparipākāya saṃsāre saṃsaran tañca saṃsāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijānāti /
T06bsa034_u:709: anadhyupekṣamāṇaścasaṃkliṣṭacittaḥ saṃsāre saṃsaret saṃkliṣṭacittaḥ saṃsarannaiva buddhadharmān paripācayennāpi sattvān /
T06bsa034_u:710: sa cet punaranityādibhirākāraiḥ saṃsārānmānasamudvejayedevaṃ sati bodhisattvo laghu ladhveva parinirvāyāt /
T06bsa034_u:711: laghu ladhveva ca parinirvāyan bodhisattva evamapi naiva buddhadharmānnaiva sattvān paripācayet /
T06bsa034_u:713: tenaiva ca śūnyatādhimokṣeṇa bodhisattvaḥ prayujyamānaḥ na nirvāṇāduttrasyati nāpi nirvāṇaṃ prārthayate /
T06bsa034_u:714: sa cedvodhisattvo nirvāṇāduttrasyet paratra nirvāṇasaṃbhāro 'sya na paripūryeta yathāpi
T06bsa034_u:716: sa cetpunarbodhisattvo nirvāṇo prārthanābahulavihārī bhavedāśveva parinirvāyāt /
T06bsa034_u:717: āśu parinirvāyam naiva buddhadharmānna sattvān paripācayet /
T06bsa034_u:718: tatra yā ca saṃsāraṃ yathābhūtamaparijānataḥ saṃkliṣṭacittasya saṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:722: āśu parinirvṛtiḥ ayamanupāyo bodhisattvasya veditavyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
T06bsa034_u:723: yā punaḥ saṃsāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijānato 'saṃkliṣṭacittasya saṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:725: yā ca nirvāṇādanuttrastamānasasya tatsaṃbhāraparipūriryā ca nirvāṇe guṇānuśaṃsadarśino na cātyarthamutkaṇṭhāprāptasyāśu nirvṛtiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:728: tasmātsā paramanśūyatādhimokṣabhāvanā bodhisattvasya śikṣāmārgasaṃgṛhīto mahānupāya ityucyate yaduta tathāgatajñānādhigamāya /
T06bsa034_u:729: sa khalu bodhisattvastena dūrānupraviṣṭe na dharmanairātmyajñānena nirabhilāpyasvabhāvatāṃ
T06bsa034_u:730: sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtaṃ viditvā na kiñcidvikalpayati nānyatra vastumātraṃ gṛhṇāti tathatāmātram /
T06bsa034_u:731: na cāsyaivaṃ bhavati vastumātraṃ vā etattathatāmātraṃ caiti /
T06bsa034_u:733: arthe parame caran sarvadharmāṃstayā tathatayā samasamān yathābhūtaṃ prajñayā paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:734: sarvatra ca samadarśī samacittaḥ san paramāmupekṣāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:735: yāmāśritya sarvavidyāsthānakauśaleṣu prayujyamāno bodhisattvaḥ sarvapariśramaiḥ sarvaduḥkhopanipātaiḥ na nivartate /
T06bsa034_u:742: dṛḍhasannāhaprayogaḥ yathā yathā saṃsāre saṃsaran duḥkhaviśeṣaṃ labhate tathā tathotsāhaṃ bardhayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T06bsa034_u:743: yathā yathā samucchrayaviśeṣamadhigacchati tathā tathānirmānataro bhavati sattvānāmantike /
T06bsa034_u:744: yathā yathā jñānaviśeṣamadhigacchati tathā tathā bhūyasyā mātrayā paropārambhavivādaprakīrṇalapitākleśopakleśebhyaśca
T06bsa034_u:746: yathā yathā guṇairvi[va]rdhate tathā tathā praticchannakalyāṇo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:747: na parato jñātuṃ samanveṣate na lābha satkāram /
T06bsa034_u:748: imā (Dutt 29) evaṃbhāgīyā bahavo 'nuśaṃsā bhavanti bodhisattvasya bodhipakṣyā bodhyanukūlāstajjñānasanniśritasya /
T06bsa034_u:749: tasmād ye kecidbodhimanuprāptavanto ye ca kecitprāpsyanti ye ca prāpnuvanti sarve ta etadeva jñānaṃ niśritya nānyannyūnaṃ prativiśiṣṭaṃ vā /
T06bsa034_u:750: evaṃ niṣprapañcanayārūḍho bodhisattva evaṃ caṃ bahvanuśaṃsa ātmanaśca buddhadharmaparipākāya pareṣāñca yānatrayadharmaparipākāya samyak pratipanno bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:755: kāyena vācā sambareṇa ca śikṣate prakṛtyā pāpārucitāyai prakṛtibhadrakalyāṇatāyai ca /
T06bsa034_u:757: kṣamitvaṃ ca śikṣate mandakrodhatāyai ca a-paropatāpanatāyai ca /
T06bsa034_u:758: sarvavidyāsthāneṣu cābhiyukto bhavati kuśalaśca sattvānāṃ vicikitsāprahāṇāyānugrahopasaṃhārāya ca ātmanaśca sarvajñatvahetuparigrahāya /
T06bsa034_u:760: cittasthitaye ca śikṣate caturbrāhmavihārapariśodhanatāyai pañcābhijñāvikrīḍanatāyai ca sattvakṛtyānuṣṭhānatāyai sarvakauśalyābhiyogajakleśa-vinodanatāyai ca /
T06bsa034_u:762: paramatattvajñatāyai ca śikṣate mahāyāne cāyatyāmātmanaḥ parinirvāṇāya /
T06bsa034_u:763: sa khalu bodhisattva evaṃ samyakprayukto guṇavatsu sattveṣu pūjālābhasatkāreṇa pratyupasthito bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:764: doṣavatsu sattveṣu parameṇa kāruṇyacittenānukampācittena pratyupasthito bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:767: yathāśaktyā ca yathābalam aśaṭho bhūtvā amāyāvī teṣāṃ hitasukhamupasaṃharati /
T06bsa034_u:768: teṣāmapakāriṇāṃ svenāśayaprayogadoṣeṇa vairacittatāyāḥ prahāṇārthamupakāriṣu sattveṣu kṛtajñatayā tulyādhikena pratyupakāreṇa pratyupasthito bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:770: apratibalo 'pi ca yācitaḥ san teṣu teṣu kṛtyakaraṇīyeṣvādaraṃ vyāyāmamupadarśayati na sakṛdeva nirākaroti /
T06bsa034_u:772: ityayamevaṃbhāgīyo bodhisattvasya niṣprapañcanayārūḍhasya paramatattvajñāna-sanniśritasya samyakprayogo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:774: tatra kayā yuktyā nirabhilāpyasvabhāvatā sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratyavagantavyā /
T06bsa034_u:775: yeyaṃ svalakṣaṇaprajñaptirdharmāṇāṃ yaduta rūpamiti vā vedaneti vā pūrvavadantato yāvannirvāṇamiti vā prajñaptimātrameva tadveditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:776: na svabhāvo nāpi ca tadvinirmuktastadanyo vāggocaro vāgaviṣayaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:777: evaṃ sati na svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ tathā vidyate yathābhilapyate /
T06bsa034_u:778: na ca punaḥ sarveṃṇa sarvaṃ na vidyate /
T06bsa034_u:779: sa punarevamavidyamāno na ca sarveṇa sarvamavidyamānaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:782: sa punaḥ pāramārthikaḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirvikalpasyaiva jñānasya gocaro veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:783: sa cetpunaryathaivābhilāpo yeṣu dharmeṣu yasminvastuni pravartate tadātmakāste dharmā vā tadvastu syāt /
T06bsa034_u:784: evaṃ sati bahuvidhā bahavaḥ svabhāvā ekasya dharmasyaikasya vastuno bhaveyuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:786: tathā hyekasmindharme ekasminvastuni bahuvidhā bahavo bahubhirabhilāpaiḥ prajñaptaya upacārāḥ kriyante /
T06bsa034_u:787: na ca bahuvidhānāñca bahūnāṃ prajñaptivādānāṃ niyamaḥ kaścidupalabhyate /
T06bsa034_u:788: yadanyatamena prajñaptivādenaikena tasya dharmasya tasya vastunaḥ tādātmyaṃ tanmayatā tatsvabhāvatā syānnānyairavaśiṣṭaiḥ prajñaptivādaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:789: tasmātsakalavikalaiḥ sarvaprajñaptivādaiḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvavastūnāṃ nāsti tādātmyaṃ nāsti tanmayatā nāsti tatsvabhāvatā /
T06bsa034_u:790: api ca sa cedrūpādayo dharmā yathāpūrvanirdiṣṭāḥ prajñaptivādasvabhāvā bhaveyuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:791: evaṃ sati pūrva tāvadvastu paścāttatra chandataḥ prajñaptivādopacāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:792: prākprajñaptivādopacārādakṛte prajñaptivādopacāre sa dharmastadvastu niḥsvabhāva eva syāt /
T06bsa034_u:793: sati niḥsvabhāvatve nirvastukaḥ prajñaptivādo na yujyate /
T06bsa034_u:794: prajñaptivādopacāre cāsati prajñaptivādasvabhāvatā dharmasya vastuno na yujyeta /
T06bsa034_u:795: sa cetpunaḥ pūrvameva prajñaptivādopacārādakṛte prajñaptivādopacāre sa dharmastadvastu tadātmakaṃ syāt /
T06bsa034_u:796: evaṃ sati vinā tena rūpamiti prajñaptivādopacāreṇa rūpasaṃjñake dharme rūpasaṃjñake vastuni rūpabuddhiḥ pravarteta /
T06bsa034_u:798: tadanena kāraṇonānayā yuktyā nirabhilāpyaḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratyavagantavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:799: yathārūpamevaṃ vedanādayo yathānirdiṣṭā dharmā antato yāvannirvāṇaparyantā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:801: yaśca rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ rūpādikasya vastunaḥ prajñaptivādasvabhāvaṃ svalakṣaṇamasadbhūtasamāropato 'bhiniviśate /
T06bsa034_u:803: nirabhilāpyātmakatayā paramārthasadbhūtaṃ vastvapadamāno nāśayati sarveṇa sarvaṃ nāstīti /
T06bsa034_u:804: asadbhūtasamārope tāvadye doṣāste pūrvameva nirūpitā uttānā viśaditāḥ prakāśitāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:806: yathā punā rūpādikeṣu dharmeṣuvastumātramapyapavadamānaḥ sarvavaināśikaḥ pranaṣṭo
T06bsa034_u:807: bhavatyasmāddharmavinayāt tathā vakṣyāmi rūpādīnāṃ dharmānāṃ vastumātramapavadato
T06bsa034_u:812: evaṃ sati rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vastumātre [sa] rūpādidharmaprajñaptivādopacāro yujyate /
T06bsa034_u:815: tatra prajñaptervastu nāstīti niradhiṣṭhānā prajñaptirapi nāsti /
T06bsa034_u:816: ato ya ekatyā durvijñeyān sūtrāntānmahāyānapratisaṃyuktān gambhīrān śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktānābhiprāyikārthanirūpitān
T06bsa034_u:821: teṣāṃ prajñaptyadhiṣṭhānasya vastumātrasyābhāvātsaiva prajñaptiḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:823: tadanena paryāyeṇa taistattvamapi prajñaptirapi tadubhayamapyapavāditaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:825: sa evaṃ nāṣṭikaḥ sannakathyo bhavatyasaṃvāsyo bhavati vijñānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇām /
T06bsa034_u:828: idañca sandhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā- varamihaikatyasya pudgaladṛṣṭirna tvevaikatyasya durgṛhītā śūnyateti /
T06bsa034_u:830: pudgaladṛṣṭiko janturjñeye kevalaṃ muhyennatu sarva jñeyamapavadeta /
T06bsa034_u:832: nāpi dharmārthikaṃ duḥkhavimokṣārthikañca paraṃ visaṃvādayenna vipralambhayet /
T06bsa034_u:835: durgṛhītayā punaḥ śūnyatayā jñeye vastuni muhyet /
T06bsa034_u:840: evaṃbhūtaṃ vastu apavadamānaḥ praṇaṣṭo bhavatyasmād dharmavinayāt /
T06bsa034_u:842: yaḥ kaści] cchramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā tacca necchati yena śūnyam /
T06bsa034_u:848: sarvābhāvācca kutra kiṃ kena śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T06bsa034_u:849: na ca tena tasyaiva śūnyatā yujyate /
T06bsa034_u:852: yataśca yad yatra na bhavati tat tena śūnyamiti samanupaśyati /
T06bsa034_u:855: tadyathā rūpādisaṃjñake yathā nirdiṣṭe vastuni rūpamityevamādiprajñaptivādātmako dharmo nāsti /
T06bsa034_u:859: taccobhayaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yaduta vastamātrañca vidyamānaṃ vastamātre ca prajñaptimātraṃ ca cāsadbhūtaṃ samāropayati /
T06bsa034_u:860: na bhūtamapavadate nādhikaṃ karoti na nyūnīkaroti notkṣipati na pratikṣipati /
T06bsa034_u:862: iyamucyate sugṛhītā śūnyatā samyak prajñayā supratividdheti /
T06bsa034_u:863: iyaṃ tāvadupapattisādhanayuktirānulomikī yayā nirabhilāpyasvabhāvatā sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratyavagantavyā /
T06bsa034_u:865: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā evamevārthaṃ gāthābhigītena paridīpayatā bhavasaṃkrāntisūtre /
T06bsa034_u:867: yena yena hi nāmnā vai yo yo dharmo 'bhilapyate /
T06bsa034_u:868: na sa saṃvidyate tatra dharmāṇāṃ sā hi dharmatā // iti /
T06bsa034_u:871: yena rūpamityevamādinā nāmnā te rūpādisaṃjñakā dharmā abhilapyante 'nuvyavahriyante rūpamiti vā vedaneti vā vistareṇa yāvannirvāṇamiti vā /
T06bsa034_u:872: tatra na ca rūpādisaṃjñakā dharmāḥ svayaṃ rūpādyātmakāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:873: na ca teṣu tadanyo rūpādyātmako dharmo vidyate /
T06bsa034_u:874: yā punasteṣāṃ rūpādisaṃjñakānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirabhilāpyenārthena vidyamānatā saiṣā paramārthataḥ svabhāvadharmatā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:876: yāḥ kāñcana saṃvṛtayo hi loke sarvā hi tā munirno upaiti /
T06bsa034_u:877: anupago hyasau kena upādadīta dṛṣṭaśrute kāntimasaṃprakurvan /
T06bsa034_u:881: tābhiḥ prajñaptibhistasya vastunastādātmyamityevaṃ nopaiti tāḥ saṃvṛtīḥ /
T06bsa034_u:886: tayā dṛṣṭyā vinā tadvastusamāropato vāpavādato vā anupādadānaḥ samyagdarśī bhavati jñeye tadasya dṛṣṭam /
T06bsa034_u:888: tasmin dṛṣṭaśrute tṛṣṇāṃ notpādayati na vivardhayati /
T06bsa034_u:891: panaścoktaṃ bhagavatā saṃthakātyāyanamārabhya-iha saṃtha bhikṣurna pṛthivīṃ niśritya dhyāyati /
T06bsa034_u:896: nobhau sūryācandramasau na dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātaṃ prāptaṃ paryeṣitaṃ manasānuvitarkitamanuvicāritam /
T06bsa034_u:899: pṛthivīṃ na niśritya dhyāyati vistareṇa yāvat sarvaṃ na niśritya dhyāyati /
T06bsa034_u:900: iha saṃtha bhikṣoryā pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīsaṃjñā sā vibhūtā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:901: apsu apsaṃjñā vistareṇa yāvat sarvatra yā saṃjñā sā vibhūtā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:902: evaṃdhyāyī bhikṣurna pṛthivīṃ niśritya dhyāyati vistareṇa yāvanna sarvaṃ sarvamiti niśritya dhyāyati /
T06bsa034_u:903: evaṃ dhyāyinaṃ bhikṣuṃ sendrā devāḥ seśānāḥ saprajāpataya ārānnamaṣyanti /
T06bsa034_u:905: yasya te nābhijānīmaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ niśritya dhyāyasi // iti /
T06bsa034_u:906: kathañca punaretatsūtrapadametamevārthaṃ paridīpayati pṛthivyādisaṃjñake vastuni yā pṛthivītyevamādikā nāmasaṃketaprajñaptiḥ sā pṛthivyādisaṃjñetyucyate
T06bsa034_u:907: sā punaḥ saṃjñā pṛthivyādisaṃjñake vastuni samāropikā cāpavādikā ca /
T06bsa034_u:912: tasmādāgamato 'pi tathāgatāt paramāptāgamādveditavyaṃ nirabhilāpyasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti /
T06bsa034_u:913: evaṃ nirabhilāpyasvabhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu kasmādabhilāpaḥ prayujyate tathā hi vinābhilāpena sā nirabhilāpyadharmatā pareṣāṃ vakta mapi na śakyate śrotumapi /
T06bsa034_u:914: vacane śravaṇe cāsati sā nirabhilāpyasvabhāvatā jñātumapi na śakyate /
T06bsa034_u:916: tasyā eva tathatāyā evamaparijñātatvādvālānāṃ tannidāno 'ṣṭavidho vikalpaḥ pravartate trivastujanakaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:918: tadyathā svabhāva vikalpo viśeṣavikalpaḥ piṇḍagrāhavikalpaḥ ahamiti vikalpaḥ mameti vikalpaḥ priyavikalpaḥ apriyavikalpaḥ tadubhayaviparītaśca vikalpaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:919: sa punarayamaṣṭavidho vikalpaḥ katameṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vastūnāṃ janako bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:920: yaśca (Dutt 35) svabhāvavikalpo yaśca viśeṣavikalpo yaśca piṇḍagrāhavikalpa itīme trayo vikalpā vikalpaprapañcādhiṣṭhānaṃ vikalpaprapañcālambanaṃ vastu janayanti rūpādisaṃjñakam /
T06bsa034_u:921: yadvastvadhiṣṭhāya sa nāmasaṃjñābhilāpaparigṛhīto nāmasaṃjñābhilāpaparibhāvito vikalpaḥ prapañcayan tasminneva vastuni vicaratyanekavidho bahunānāprakāraḥ
T06bsa034_u:922: tatra yañcāhamiti vikalpo yaśca mameti vikalpaḥ itīmau dvau vikalpau satkāyadṛṣṭiśca tadanyasarvadṛṣṭi[-mūlaṃ māna-]mūlamasmimānañca tadanyasarvamānamūlaṃ janayataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:923: tatra priyavikalpo 'priyavikalpastadubhayaviparītaśca vikalpo yathāyogaṃ rāgadveṣamohān janayanti /
T06bsa034_u:924: evamayamaṣṭavidho vikalpaḥ asya trividhasya vastunaḥ prādurbhāvāya saṃvartate yaduta vikalpādhiṣṭhānasya prapañcavastunaḥ dṛṣṭyasmimānasya rāgadveṣamohānāñca
T06bsa034_u:927: ebhiśca tribhirvastubhiḥ sarvalokānāṃ pravṛttipakṣo niravaśeṣaḥ paridīpito bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:932: tasminneva rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni ayaṃ rūpī ayamarūpī ayaṃ sanidarśano 'yamanidarśana evaṃ sapratigho 'pratighaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:939: piṇḍiteṣu bahuṣu dharmeṣu piṇḍagrāhahetukaḥ pravartate gṛhasenāvanādiṣu bhojanapānayānavastrādiṣu
T06bsa034_u:943: yadvastu sāsravaṃ sopādānīyaṃ dīrghakālamātmato vā ātmīyato vā saṃstutamabhiniviṣṭaṃ
T06bsa034_u:944: paricitaṃ tasmādasaṃgrāha-saṃstavāt svaṃ dṛṣṭisthānīyaṃ vastu pratītyotpadyate vitatho viakalpaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:953: taccaitad dvayaṃ bhavati samāsataḥ vikalpaśca vikalpādhiṣṭhānaṃ vikalpālambanañca vastu /
T06bsa034_u:955: pūrvako vikalpaḥ pratyutpannasya vikalpālambanasya vastunaḥ prādurbhāvāya pratyutpannaṃ
T06bsa034_u:959: tatsaṃbhāvācca punarniyataṃ tadadhiṣṭhānasyāpi tadāśritasya vikalpasya prādurbhāvo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:967: tatra nāmaparyeṣaṇā yadvodhisattvo nāmni nāmamātraṃ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:974: nāmaiṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastveṣaṇāgataṃ svabhāvaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgataṃ viśeṣaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgatañca yathābhūtaparijñānam /
T06bsa034_u:976: sa khalu bodhisattvo nāmni nāmamātratāṃ paryeṣya tannāmaivaṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijānāti itīdaṃ nāma ityarthaṃ vastuni vyavasthāpyate yāvadeva saṃjñārtha dṛṣṭyarthamupacārārtham /
T06bsa034_u:977: yadi rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni rūpamiti nāma na vyavasthāpyeta na kañcittadvastu rūpamitmevaṃ saṃjānīyāt /
T06bsa034_u:983: yataśca bodhisattvo [vastuni] vastumātratāṃ paryeṣya sarvābhilāpaviśliṣṭaṃ nirabhilāpyaṃ tadrūpādisaṃjñakaṃ vastu paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:985: svabhāvaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ katamat yataśca bodhisattvaḥ rūpādisaṃjñake
T06bsa034_u:986: vastuni svabhāvaprajñaptau prajñaptimātratāṃ paryeṣya tathā svabhāvaprajñaptyā atatsvabhāvasya
T06bsa034_u:988: tasya nirmāṇapratibimbapratiśrutkā-pratibhāsodakacandrasvapnamāyopamaṃ tatsvabhāvaṃ paśyataḥ tadābhāsamatanmayam idṃ tṛtīyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijñānaṃ sugambhīrārthagocaram /
T06bsa034_u:990: yataśca bodhisattvo viśeṣaprajñaptau prajñaptimātratāṃ paryeṣya tasmin rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni viśeṣaprajñaptimadvayārthena paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:997: tathā sanidarśanānidarśanādayo viśeṣaprajñaptiparyāyāḥ sarve 'nena nayenaivaṃ veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1000: tatra yo 'sāvaṣṭavidho mithyāvikalpo bālānāṃ trivastujanako lokanirvartakaḥ so 'sya caturvidhasya yathābhūtaparijñānasya vaikalyādasamavadhānātpravartate
T06bsa034_u:1002: saṃkleśātsaṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ saṃsārasaṃsṛteḥ saṃsārānugataṃ jātijarāvyādhimaraṇādikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:1003: yadā ca bodhisattvena caturvidhaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ niśritya so 'ṣṭavidho vikalpaḥ
T06bsa034_u:1004: parijñāto bhavati dṛṣṭe dharme tasya samyak parijñānādāyatyāṃ tadadhiṣṭhānasya tadālambanasya
T06bsa034_u:1008: evaṃ tasya savastukasya vikalpasya nirodho yaḥ sa sarvaprapañcanirodho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1010: dṛṣṭe ca dharme tasya śreṣṭhatattvārtha gocarajñānasya viśuddhatvāt sarvatra vaśitāprāpti labhate sa bodhisattvaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1015: sa evaṃ vaśitāprāptaḥ sarvasattvaśreṣṭho bhavati niruttaraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1016: evañca sarvatra vaśinastasya bodhisattvasya uttamāḥ pañcānuśaṃsā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1017: paramāṃ cittaśāntimanuprāpto bhavati vihārapraśāntatayā na kleśapraśāntatayā /
T06bsa034_u:1018: sarvavidyāsthāneṣu cāsyāvyāhataṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:1022: asya khalu pañcavidhasyānuśaṃsasya pañcavidhameva karma veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:1023: paramo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāro bodhisattvasya bodhāya prayoganiryātasya kāyikacaitasikasya vyāyāmaklamasya nāśāya cittaśānteranuśaṃsasyaitatkarma veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:1024: sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ paripāko bodhisattvasya sarvavidyāsthāneṣvavyāhatajñānatāyā anuśaṃsasyai tatkarma veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:1026: vineyānāmut pannotpannānāṃ saṃśayānāṃ prativinodanaṃ dharmanetryāśca dīrghakālaṃ
T06bsa034_u:1029: sarvaparapravādinigraho dṛḍhavīryatā ca prāṇidhānāccācyutiḥ asaṃhāryatā 'parapratyayatvānuśaṃsasyaitatkarma veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:1030: evaṃ hi bodhisattvasya yāvat kiñcidbodhisattvakaraṇīyaṃ tatsarvamebhiḥ pañcabhiranuśaṃsakarmabhiḥ parigṛhītaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1032: asaṃkliṣṭañca ātmasukhaṃ buddhadharmaparipākaḥ sattvaparipākaḥ saddharmasya dhāraṇam acalapraṇidhānasyottaptavīryasya paravādavinigrahaśca /
T06bsa034_u:1034: tatra caturṇā tattvārthānāṃ prathamau dvau hīnau /
T06bsa034_u:1041: samāsataḥ samādhivaśitāprāptasya samādhivaśitāsanniśrayeṇocchāmātrāt sarvārthasamṛddhiḥ karmaṇyacittasya suparibhāvitacittasyāryaḥ prabhāva ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1042: dharmāṇāñca yā mahāphalatā mahānuśaṃsatā sā teṣāṃ prabhāva ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1043: pūrvaṃ mahāpuṇyasaṃbhāropacayād buddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca sahajā āścaryādbhutadharmatā /
T06bsa034_u:1045: sa khalveṣa prakārabhedena buddhabodhisattvānāṃ pañcavidho bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1046: abhijñāprabhāvo dharmaprabhāvaḥ sahajaśca prabhāvaḥ sādhāraṇaśca śrāvaka pratyekabudvairasādhāraṇaśca taiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1047: tatra ṣaḍbhijñāḥ - ṛddhiviṣayo divyaṃ śrotraṃcetasaḥ paryāyaḥ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtiścyutyupapādadarśanamāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyā ca abhijñāprabhāva ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1048: tatra ṣaṭpāramitāḥ-dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntirvīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā ca dharmā ityucyante /
T06bsa034_u:1049: teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yo 'nubhāvaḥ sa dharmaprabhāva ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1055: tadyathā kampanaṃ jvalanaṃ spharaṇaṃ vidarśanamanyathībhāvakaraṇaṃ gamanāgamanaṃ
T06bsa034_u:1058: smṛtidānaṃ sukhadānaṃ raśmipramokṣaśca ityevaṃbhāgīyā ṛddhi pāriṇāmikītyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1060: iha tathāgataḥ samādhivaśitāprāpto vā karmaṇyacitto vā bodhisattvo vihāramapi kampayati /
T06bsa034_u:1061: gṛhamapi grāmanagarakṣetramapi narakalokamapi tiryaglokamapi pretalokamapi manuṣyalokamapi
T06bsa034_u:1062: devalokamapi cāturdvīpakamapi sāhasrikamapi lokadhātuṃ dvisāhasrikamapi trisāhasramahāsāhasramapi
T06bsa034_u:1072: sarvakāyena prajvalitasya vividhā arciṣaḥ kāyānnirgacchanti nīlapītalohitāvadātamāñjiṣṭhāḥ sphaṭikavarṇāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1074: yathāpi tadgṛhamapyābhayā spharati vihāramapi pūrvavadyāvadaprameyānasaṃkhyām lokadhātūnābhayā spharati pūrvavattadyathā kampane /
T06bsa034_u:1077: pariṣadaḥ tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā apāyānapi vidarśayatyadhaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1081: yena nāmnā saṃśabditaṃ bhavati buddhakṣetraṃ tatra ca buddhakṣetre yannāmako bhavati
T06bsa034_u:1082: tathāgataḥ tacca buddhakṣetraṃ darśayati tañca tathāgatam /
T06bsa034_u:1083: tacca nāma vyapadiśati tasya buddhakṣetrasya tathāgatasya ca /
T06bsa034_u:1084: tato 'pyarvāgvidarśaṃyati vyapadiśati tato 'pi pareṇa yatkāmaṃ yāvatkāmam /
T06bsa034_u:1087: sa cet pṛthivīmapo 'dhimucyate tattathaiva bhavati nānyathā /
T06bsa034_u:1088: tejo vāyumadhimucyate tadapi tathaiva bhavati nānyathā /
T06bsa034_u:1095: yathā mahābhūteṣvanyonyapariṇāme nānyathībhāvakriyā evaṃ rūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyeṣu veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:1098: himavantaṃ vā parvatarājamādiṃ kṛtvā sarvaparvatān suvarṇaṃmadhimucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1102: tadubhayavivarjitānāṃ suvarṇatāṃ vā durvarṇatāṃ vā tadubhayaṃ vā /
T06bsa034_u:1103: yathā suvarṇadurvarṇatāmevaṃ vyaṅgāvyaṅgatāṃ kṛśa sthūlatāmityevamādi yatkiñcidanyathā satsvalakṣaṇataḥ śakyarūpañcā [nyathā] 'dhimucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1106: tiraḥ kuḍyaṃ tiraḥ śailaṃ tiraḥ prākāramasajyamānena kāyena gacchati vistareṇa yāvadbrahmalokamupasaṃkrāmati
T06bsa034_u:1108: lokadhātūn gacchati āgacchati ca kāyena vā audārikeṇa cāturmahābhautikena /
T06bsa034_u:1109: dūraṃ cāsannamadhimucya manaḥsadṛśena vā javena gacchati cāgacchati ca /
T06bsa034_u:1115: mahatyā vicitrāyāḥ pariṣadaḥ purastāt sa grāmanigamatṛṇavana[-bhūmi-]parvataṃ rūpakāyamātmakāye praveśayati /
T06bsa034_u:1116: sā ca sarvā pariṣattasminneva kāye praviṣṭamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte /
T06bsa034_u:1119: upasaṃkrāntasya yādṛśī teṣāṃ varṇapuṣkalatā bhavati tādṛśī tasya /
T06bsa034_u:1123: yamapi te 'rthaṃ na mantrayante tamapi so 'rthaṃ na mantrayate /
T06bsa034_u:1124: uttaraṃ caitānānudhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśayitvā samādāpayitvā samuttejayitvā saṃpraharṣayitvā 'ntarddhīyate /
T06bsa034_u:1125: antarhitañcainaṃ na prajānanti ko 'nveṣo 'ntarhito devo vā manuṣyo veti /
T06bsa034_u:1129: śubhakṛssnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalānasaṃjñisattvān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān
T06bsa034_u:1132: mahatyā pariṣadaḥ purastācchatakṛtvaḥ sahasrakṛtvaḥ ato vā pareṇāntardhīyate /
T06bsa034_u:1135: yāvān kaścit sattvadhātuḥ taṃ sarva gamanāgamanasthānādyāsu kriyāsu saṃvartayati /
T06bsa034_u:1136: sa cedasyai vaṃ bhavati gacchatu gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:1142: niṣṭhāgato bodhisattva ekajātipratibaddhaśca caramabhaviko vā tathāgataṃ sthāpayitvā tulyajātīyañca bodhisattvaṃ tadanyeṣāṃ (Dutt 44)
T06bsa034_u:1144: tadanye bodhisattvā utkṛṣṭatarabhūmipraviṣṭāṃstulyajātīyāṃśca bodhisattvān sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣāṃ sarvarddhimatāmṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhibhavanti
T06bsa034_u:1150: ye 'sya bhāṣamāṇasya dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti teṣāṃ tādṛśaṃ kāyikaṃ caitasikamanugrahamupasaṃharati pratiprasrabdhi sukham /
T06bsa034_u:1153: tatra raśmipramokṣaḥ bodhisattvo vā tathāgato vā ṛddhyātadrūpān raśmīn kāyatpramuñcati
T06bsa034_u:1154: ya ekatyā daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā nārakāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ nārakāṇi
T06bsa034_u:1156: ekatyā devalokasthānudārān devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragān svabhavanasthān gatvā ihāgamanāya saṃcodayati /
T06bsa034_u:1157: tathā tadanyalokadhātusthitān bodhisattvānihāgamanāya saṃcodayati daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu /
T06bsa034_u:1158: samāsatasthāgataḥ aprameyairasaṃkhyeyairnānāprakārai raśmibhirapramāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ vicitramaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamarthaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:1159: te punarete sarve pāriṇāmikyā ṛddhyāḥ prakārā ekaikaśaḥ prabhidyamānā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1160: anyathā prakṛtyā vidyamānasya vastunastadanyathāvikārāpādanatā pariṇāma ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1167: tatpunaḥ kāyanirmāṇamātmano vā sadṛśaṃ visadṛśaṃ vā parasya vā sadṛśaṃ visadṛśaṃ vā nirmimīte /
T06bsa034_u:1171: tadyathā bhojanapānādi maṇimuktāvaidūryādi ca yatkiñcidrūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyasaṃgṛhītaṃ bāhyamupakaraṇaṃ tatsadṛśaṃ tadvinirmuktaṃ sarvaṃ yathākāmaṃ nirmimīte /
T06bsa034_u:1173: manuṣyavarṇa tiryakpretanārakavarṇaṃ śrāvakavarṇaṃ pratyekabuddhavarṇaṃ bodhisattvavarṇaṃ tathāgatavarṇam /
T06bsa034_u:1174: sa yadi tādṛśa eva bodhisattvo bhavati tādṛśameva nirmimīte /
T06bsa034_u:1177: sa cetparaṃ devabhūtaṃ tatsādṛśyena nirmimīte parasadṛśamasya tannirmāṇaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1181: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sakṛdaprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām arthaṃ karoti tairvicitravarṇanirmitaiḥ
T06bsa034_u:1182: kiñcicca nirmāṇamadhitiṣṭhati yaduparate 'pi bodhisattve tathāgete vā 'nuvartata eva /
T06bsa034_u:1183: kiñcinnirmāṇaṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ kevalaṃ sattvānāṃ vidarśanāya māyopamaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1189: asti viśadasvarānvitaṃ svasambaddhaṃ parasambaddhamasambaddhaṃ dharmadeśanāsaṃgṛhītaṃ pramattasaṃcodanā-saṃgṛhītañca /
T06bsa034_u:1191: buddhabodhisattvānāṃ nirmito vāgvyāhāro gambhīro bhavati megharavaḥ kalaviṅkamanojñasvarasadṛśo hṛdayaṃgamaḥ gremaṇīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1192: paurī ca sā vāṅnirmitā bhavati valguvispaṣṭā vijñeyā śravaṇīyā apratikūlā aniśritā aparyantā /
T06bsa034_u:1194: ākāṃkṣamāṇaḥ tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā vicitrāṃ devanāgayakṣāsura garuḍakinnaramahoragaśrāvakabodhisattvapariṣadaṃ (Dutt 46)
T06bsa034_u:1195: sanniṣaṇṇāṃ sannipatitāṃ yāvadyojanaśatapariṣanmaṇḍalaparyantāṃ sarvāṃ svareṇa suparipūrṇena vijñāpayati ye 'pi dūre ya 'pyantike niṣaṇṇāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1197: dvisāhasraṃ vā trisāhasraṃ vā yāvaddaśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn svareṇa vijñāpayati /
T06bsa034_u:1200: tatra svasambaddhaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ yatsvayameva nirmitayā vācā dharmaṃ vā deśayati pramattaṃ vā saṃcodayati /
T06bsa034_u:1201: parasaṃbaddhaṃ punaryat paranirmitayā vācā dharmaṃ vā deśayati pramattaṃ vā saṃcodayati /
T06bsa034_u:1202: tatrāsambaddhaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ yadākāśāt vāṅniścarati nirmitādvā na sattvasantānāt /
T06bsa034_u:1203: tatra dharmadeśanānirmāṇaṃ yat tatra tatra sammūḍhānāṃ yuktisaṃdarśanārtham /
T06bsa034_u:1204: tatra codanānirmāṇaṃ yadasammūḍhānāṃ pratilabdhaprasādānāṃ pramattānāṃ pramāde hrīsaṃjananāya apramāde ca samādāpanāya /
T06bsa034_u:1206: samāsataḥ kāyanirmāṇaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ viṣaya nirmāṇañca veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:1209: sā punareṣā dvividhāpi ṛddhirbuddhabodhisattvānāṃ samāsato dve kārye niṣpādayati /
T06bsa034_u:1210: āvarjayitvā vā ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa sattvān buddhaśāsane 'vatārayati anugrahaṃ vā anekavidhaṃ bahu nānāprakāraṃ duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāmupasaṃharati
T06bsa034_u:1212: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā ātmanaivātmanastāvatpūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmarati amukā
T06bsa034_u:1213: nāma te sattvā yatrāhamabhūvamevannāmeti vistareṇa yathāsūtraṃ sattvakāyadikaṃ sarvamanusmarati /
T06bsa034_u:1214: yathā cātmanātmanaḥ samanusmarati tathā pareṣāmapi anusmārayati /
T06bsa034_u:1217: smarati pareṣāṃ smārayati amukā nāma te sattvā yatrāhamabhūvamevaṃnāmeti vistareṇa /
T06bsa034_u:1218: teṣāmapi sattvānāṃ tathaiva sarvaṃ pūrvenivāsamanusmarati yathaivātmano dṛṣṭadharme /
T06bsa034_u:1219: sūkṣmamapi samanusmarati yatkiñcidalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā pūrvaceṣṭitaṃ pūrvameva cetayitvā apramuṣitam /
T06bsa034_u:1222: yasya kalpagaṇanāyogena śakyā saṃkhyāṃ kartum aprameyāsaṃkhyeyamapyanusmarati /
T06bsa034_u:1223: yasya kalpagaṇanāyogenāśakyā saṃkhyāṃ kartum avyāhatamasya samāsataḥ pūrvenivāsajñānaṃ pravartate yatreṣṭaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ yāvadiṣṭam /
T06bsa034_u:1224: evaṃrūpo bodhisattvasya tathāgatasya ca pūrvenivāsasaṃgṛhītaḥ prabhāvaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1225: sa tena pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānena jātakān pūrvān bodhisattvacaryāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhe
T06bsa034_u:1226: bhagavati prasādajananārthaṃ gauravotpādanārthaṃ ca vicitrānanekaprakārān prakāśayati
T06bsa034_u:1228: śāśvatadṛṣṭikānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ śāśvatadṛṣṭiṃ nāśayati tadyathā pūrvāntakalpakānāṃ śāśvatavādināmekatya-śāśvatikānāṃ vā /
T06bsa034_u:1230: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā divyena śrotreṇa divyān mānuṣyakān śabdānāryānapyanāryānapi ghanānapyaṇukānapi vyaktānapyavktānapi nirmitānapyanirmitānapi dūrāntikasthān śṛṇoti /
T06bsa034_u:1231: tatra divyāḥ śabdāḥ ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanopapannānāṃ sattvānām /
T06bsa034_u:1232: sa cetpareṇābhogaṃ na karoti atha karoti tato 'pi pareṇānyeṣūrdhvaṃ lokadhātuṣu śṛṇoti /
T06bsa034_u:1236: ye buddhānāṃ buddhaśrāvakānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāñca /
T06bsa034_u:1238: tadyathā saṃdarśayatāṃ samādāpayatāṃ vā samuttejayatāṃ saṃpraharṣayatāṃ kuśalasamādānamārabhyākuśalatyāgañca /
T06bsa034_u:1239: (Dutt 48) tathā 'saṃkliṣṭacittānāmuddeśaḥ svādhyāyo viniścayaḥ samyak codanā smāraṇāvavādānuśāsanī iti yadvā punaranyadapi kiñcit subhāṣitaṃ sulapitamarthopasaṃhitam /
T06bsa034_u:1242: ye sattvānāṃ mṛṣāvādapaiśunyapārūṣyasaṃbhinnapralāpaśabdā adho vā 'pāyopapannānāmūrdhvaṃ vā devopapannānāṃ tiryagvā manuṣyeṣūpapannānām /
T06bsa034_u:1244: ye mahāsattvasaṃghaśabdā vā vividhairvā kāraṇaiḥ kāryamāṇānāmārttasvaraṃ kandamānānāṃ vikrośatāṃ vā meghastanitaśabdā vā śaṃkhabherīpaṭahaśabdā vā /
T06bsa034_u:1255: yatra grāme kṣetre vihāre vā tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā viharati tatra ye śabdā niścaranti tān sthāpayitvā tadanyatra yāvadaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu /
T06bsa034_u:1257: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyutikāle 'pi cyutānapi suvarṇadurvarṇān hīnapraṇītānaparānte ca jātān /
T06bsa034_u:1260: yadrūpaṃ nirmitaṃ yacca divyamacchaṃ rūpamadho yāvadavīcimūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanam /
T06bsa034_u:1261: sa cedadha ūrdhvaṃ vānyeṣu lokadhātuṣu rūpadarśanamārabhyābhogaṃ karoti tiryagyāvadaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvaṃ rūpagataṃ paśyati
T06bsa034_u:1263: tāṃstāṃstathāgatān vicitreṣu mahatsu parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu niṣaṇṇān dharma deśayataḥ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:1264: tatra divyena cakṣuṣā tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā daśasu dikṣu kāyaceṣṭitaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ dṛṣṭvā yathāyogaṃ yathārha teṣu sattveṣu pratipadyate
T06bsa034_u:1265: divyena ca śrotreṇa vākceṣṭitaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ śrutvā teṣu sattveṣu yathāyogaṃ yathārhaṃ pratipadyate /
T06bsa034_u:1266: evaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā divyena śrotreṇa bodhisattvastathāgato vā samāsena karma karoti /
T06bsa034_u:1268: iha bodhisattvo vā tathāgato vā pareṣāṃ daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ kleśaparyavasthitamapi cittaṃ jānāti /
T06bsa034_u:1269: vigatakleśaparyavasthānamapi kleśasānubandhaṃ sānuśayamapi kleśaniranubandhaṃ niranuśayamapi mithyāpraṇihitamapi cittaṃ jānāti /
T06bsa034_u:1270: tadyathā tīrthikacittaṃ sāmiṣābhiprāyasya kliṣṭamapi cittaṃ samyak praṇihitamapi cittaṃ jānāti /
T06bsa034_u:1273: madhyamacittaṃ jānāti tadyathā sarveṣāṃ rūpadhātūpapannānāṃ sattvānām /
T06bsa034_u:1274: praṇītamapi cittaṃ jānāti tadyathā sarveṣāmārūpyopapannāṃ sattvānām /
T06bsa034_u:1276: ekena paracittajñānenaikasya sattvasya yasya yadyathā yādṛśaṃ yāvaccitaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati tatsakṛdyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:1277: ekenaiva paracittajñānena prabhūtānāmapi sattvānāṃ yeṣāṃ yadyathā yādṛśaṃ yāvaccittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati tadapi sakṛdyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T06bsa034_u:1278: sā punariyamabhijñā buddhasya bodhisattvānāmindriyaparāparajñānāya sattvānāṃ nānādhimuktijñānāya
T06bsa034_u:1279: nānādhātucaritajñānāya yathāyogañca pratipatsu citrāsu nirvāṇapuraḥsarīṣu samyaksanniyogāya /
T06bsa034_u:1282: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā kleśānāṃ kṣayaprāptiṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:1283: prāpto mayā parairvā āsravakṣayo na veti /
T06bsa034_u:1288: bodhisattvaḥ punaḥ sarvaṃ caitat prajānātyāsravakṣayañca svayaṃ na sākṣātkaroti /
T06bsa034_u:1290: ataḥ sāsravāñca vastu bodhisattvaḥ sahasravairna vijahāti /
T06bsa034_u:1292: na ca saṃkliśyata iti so 'sya sarvaprabhāvāṇāṃ mahattamaḥ prabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1293: tena khalvāsravakṣayajñānena buddhabodhisattvāḥ svayaṃ na kliśyante /
T06bsa034_u:1298: sa punareṣa dānādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prabhāvaḥ samāsataścaturbhirākārairveditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1300: dānaṃ dadad bodhisattvo dānavipakṣaṃ mātsaryaṃ prajahāti /
T06bsa034_u:1307: paratra ca yatra yatra pratyājāyate āḍhyo bhavati mahābhogo mahāpakṣo mahāparivāra ityeṣa caturākāro dānasya prabhāvo nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ
T06bsa034_u:1308: kāyavāksaṃvaraśīlaṃ samādadāno bodhisattvaḥ śīlavipakṣaṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ prajahāti /
T06bsa034_u:1311: dauḥśīlyapratyayaṃ bhayamavadyaṃ vairaṃ prajahadātmānamanugṛhaṇāti sukhaṃ svapan sukhaṃ pratibudhyamānaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1322: ātmānañca parañca mahato bhayātparitrāyamāṇastayā kṣyāntyā ātmānañca paraṃścānugṛhṇāti /
T06bsa034_u:1326: ityayañcaturākāraḥ kṣānteḥ prabhāvo nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1327: ārabdhavīryo bodhisattvo viharan vīryavipakṣaṃ kausīdyaṃ prajahāti /
T06bsa034_u:1330: ārabdhavīryaśca sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharannavyavakīrṇaḥ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaḥ pūrveṇāparaṃ viśeṣādhigamaṃ paśyan prītiprāmodyenātmānamanugṛhṇāti
T06bsa034_u:1331: kuśalapakṣābhiyuktaśca paraṃ na kāyena vācā vā viheṭhayati /
T06bsa034_u:1337: dhyānaṃ samāpadyamāno bodhisattvo dhyānavipakṣaṃ kleśaṃ kāma vitarkaprītisukharūpasaṃjñādīṃścopakleśān prajahāti /
T06bsa034_u:1338: bodheśca saṃbhārabhūtaṃ sanniśrayabhūtaṃ bhavati tadasya dhyānam /
T06bsa034_u:1343: ityeṣa caturākāro dhyānaprabhāvo nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1349: sarvatra nyāyopadeśena dṛṣṭe dharme saṃparāye ca hitasukhābhyāṃ sattvānapyanugṛhṇāti /
T06bsa034_u:1360: tribhiśca sthānaistuṣitopapannānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ deva putrāṇāmabhibhavaḥ divyenāyuṣā divyena varṇena divyena yaśasā /
T06bsa034_u:1361: upapadyamānasya ca mātuḥ kukṣāvudāreṇāvabhāsena lokadhātuspharaṇaṃ saṃprajānataśca mātuḥ kukṣipraveśaḥ sthānaṃ nirgamo janma ca /
T06bsa034_u:1365: carame ca bhave paścime janmani sarvapratyarthikairmārānīkairapi sarvopakramaiścābādhyatā /
T06bsa034_u:1370: svayañcānācārya kamekākina eva ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre mahābodherabhisaṃbodhaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1371: brahmaṇā ca sahāṃpatinā svayamupasaṃkramya loke saddharmadeśanāyai adhyeṣaṇā /
T06bsa034_u:1374: bodhisattve ca mṛgapakṣiṇāmapyantataḥ kṣudramṛgāṇāmapi paramā viśvāsyatā /
T06bsa034_u:1376: (Dutt 53) tiraścāmantikāttathāgatasya pūjā tadyathā markaṭo madhvaneḍakaṃ tathāgatāyānupradattavān /
T06bsa034_u:1377: pratigṛhīte ca tasmin bhagavatā sa markaṭo hṛṣṭamānasaḥ pratyavasṛṣṭaḥ sa nṛtyamānaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1378: bhagavantamevoddiśya tathāgataḥ snāsyati taṃ snāpayiṣyāmīti meghapratīkṣaṇā /
T06bsa034_u:1379: vṛkṣamūle ca bodhisattvasya tathāgatasya vā santiṣṭhatastasya sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ prācīnanimnāsu chāyāsu tasya vṛkṣasya chāyayā kāyāvijahanatā /
T06bsa034_u:1382: smṛtasya ca pratisaṃviditānāṃ vedanānāṃ saṃjñānāṃ vitarkāṇāmutpādaḥ sthānaṃ nirodhaśca /
T06bsa034_u:1385: tadyathā unmattāḥ kṣiptacittāḥ tathāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā svacittaṃ pratilabhante /
T06bsa034_u:1388: raktānāṃ rāgaparyavasthānāṃ vigacchati dviṣṭānāṃ dveṣaparyavasthānaṃ mūḍhānāṃ mohaparyavasthānam /
T06bsa034_u:1409: parinirvāṇasamaye ca mahāpṛthivīcāla ulkāpātā diśo dāhā antarikṣe devadundubhīnāmabhinadanam /
T06bsa034_u:1410: so 'pi sahaja eva tathāgatānāṃ prabhāvo nābhijñāsaṃskṛtaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1416: iha tathāgato bodhisattvo vā 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmaprameyāsaṃkhyena prabhāvopāyena yathā 'rthakriyā bhavati tadyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T06bsa034_u:1418: sarvaprakāreṇa cābhijñāprabhāveṇa dharmaprabhāveṇa sahajena prabhāveṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1422: śrāvakasya tu saha sattvadhātunā dvisāhasro lokadhāturabhijñāviṣayaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1425: tathā hi te ekasyaivātmano damāya pratipannāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1428: etānākārān sthāpayitvā buddhabodhisattvānāṃ tadanyaḥ prabhāvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ sādhāraṇo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1429: tadevaṃ sati śrāvakapratyekabuddhā eva tāvadbuddhabodhisattvaiḥ saha na tulyābhijñā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:1432: 'pyabhijñāprabhāva eva yathāyogaṃ praviṣṭo veditavyaḥ ṛddhiviṣayacetasaḥ paryāyāsravakṣayajñānābhijñāprabhāveṣu /
T06bsa034_u:1438: svabhāvato 'pi paripācya pudgalato 'pi paripākaprakārabhedato 'pi paripākopāyato 'pi paripācakapudgalato 'pi paripakvapudgala-lakṣaṇato 'pi ca /
T06bsa034_u:1440: kuśaladharmavīje sati kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmāsevanānvayād yā kleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇaviśuddhyanukūlā
T06bsa034_u:1441: kāyacittakarmaṇyatā kalyatā samyak prayoganiṣṭhā yatra sthitāḥ śāstāraṃ vā āgamyānāgamya
T06bsa034_u:1442: vā śāstāraṃ bhavyo bhavati pratibalo 'nantaraṃ kleśāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ vā sākṣātkartuṃ
T06bsa034_u:1444: tadyathā vraṇo yadā paripāṭanāya niṣṭhāgato bhavatyanantaraṃ pāṭanārhaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1446: ghaṭaghaṭīśarāvādi ca mṛnmayaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ yadā paribhogāya niṣṭhāgataṃ bhavati anantaraṃ paribhogārha tadā parikvamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1447: phalāni vā āmrapanasādīni yadā paribhogāya niṣṭhāgatāni bhavantyanantaraṃ paribhogārhāṇi tadā paripakvānītyucyante /
T06bsa034_u:1448: evameva kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmāsevanānvayād asau samyak prayoganiṣṭhā anantaraṃ viśuddhye saṃvartate /
T06bsa034_u:1455: bodhisattvānāṃ buddhānāñca bhagavatām ityete catvāraḥ pudgalāḥ eṣu caturṣu vastuṣu paripācayitavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1464: yā prakṛtyā mandarajaskatāyāmāgamya prakṛtyaivāsya pāpakeṣvakuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /
T06bsa034_u:1465: cittaṃ na krāmati mandanivaraṇaśca bhavati mandavitarka ṛjupradakṣiṇagrāhī /
T06bsa034_u:1467: smṛtimān bhavati meghāvī pratibalaśca bhavati subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāṃ dharmāṇāmarthasya ājñānāyodgrahaṇāya dhāraṇāya prativedhāya /
T06bsa034_u:1468: sahajayā prajñayā samanvāgato bhavati yāṃ prajñāmāgamya bhavyo bhavati pratibalaḥ sarvato 'tyantaṃ sarvakleśāccittaṃ vimocayitum /
T06bsa034_u:1480: anādiprasthānataḥ śuddhidūrataḥ śuddhyāsannataḥ prayogataḥ āśayataḥ āmiṣopasaṃhārataḥ
T06bsa034_u:1482: mṛduprayogato madhyaprayogataḥ adhimātraprayogataḥ śravaṇataḥ cintanato bhāvanataḥ
T06bsa034_u:1485: yā prakṛtyā kuśaladharmabījasaṃpadaṃ niśritya pūrvakuśaladharmābhyāsāduttarottarāṇāṃ kuśaladharmabījānāṃ paripuṣṭatarā paripuṣṭatamā utpattiḥ sthitiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1492: tatra dhātupuṣṭeḥ pūrvakeṇa hetunā vartamānaḥ paripāko nivartate /
T06bsa034_u:1493: vartamānapratyayopasaṃhārato vartamāna evaṃ heturvartamānaḥ paripāko veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1498: yā sarvaduḥkha-nairyāṇikīñca pratipadaṃ kāmasukhātmaklamathānta-vivarjitāñca sukhāṃ pratipadamāgamya svākhyāte dharmavinaye śāsanābhiratiḥ
T06bsa034_u:1500: ya eva tatprathamataḥ saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃvegamāgamya nyāyārthapratipādane cānuśaṃsāṃ viditvā 'vatāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1503: yā avatīrṇasya pudgalasya paripācyamānatāyāṃ vartamānasya bodhisattvebhyo buddhebhyaścānadhyupekṣāmāgamya
T06bsa034_u:1504: vivṛtānāñca sthānānāṃ bhūyo bhūyaḥ uttānakriyāmāgamya uttarottaraparipākagamanatā /
T06bsa034_u:1506: yat kausīdyaṃ vā āgamya pratyayavaidhuryaṃ vā mahatā dīrgheṇa kālena prabhūtairjanmāntarāparivartaiḥ kalpaparivartairvā bhavyo bhavati viśuddhaye
T06bsa034_u:1509: yā svārthaprāptau tīvracchandatāmāgamya vinipātabhayaṃ vā 'mutra dṛṣṭe vā dharme parato 'yaśobhayamāgamya śikṣāpadeṣvanupālanā sātatyakāritā satkṛtyakāritā ca /
T06bsa034_u:1512: 'bhisaṃpratyaya guṇasaṃbhāvanāmāgamya yā triṣu ratneṣu svārthaprāptau cāvicalā śraddhadhānatā /
T06bsa034_u:1515: yaḥ sarveṇa ca sarvaṃ bhojanapānādivikalānāṃ bhojanapānādyupasaṃhāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1520: yā ṛddhimata ṛddhiprātihāryavidarśanā sattvānukampayā sattvānāmāśayaviśuddhiṃ vādhipatiṃ
T06bsa034_u:1521: kṛtvā prayogaviśuddhiṃ vā ete sattvāḥ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā vā āśayaśuddhiṃ vā
T06bsa034_u:1523: te ca tena prātihāryeṇāvarjitamānasā āśayaśuddhiṃ vā pratilabhante prayujyante vā samyak /
T06bsa034_u:1551: ātmagatāṃ saṃkleśārakṣāṃ saṃvidhāya skhalitacodanā mṛdau vyatikrame /
T06bsa034_u:1554: tatra yā ca codanā yā cāvasādanā sā teṣāmeva hitasukhārthaṃ tadanyeṣāñca /
T06bsa034_u:1555: yā punaḥ pravāsanā punaḥ pratisaṃharaṇāya sāpi teṣāṃ cānyeṣāṃ ca hitasukhāya /
T06bsa034_u:1556: yā punarapratisaṃhāryā pravāsanā sā pareṣāmeva hitasukhāya /
T06bsa034_u:1560: ānulomikañca dharmaṃ deśayati akuśalāt sthānādyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya /
T06bsa034_u:1564: tvameva tāvat svayaṃ nākuśalātsthānādyutthitaḥ kuśale ca sthāne pratiṣṭhitaḥ kasmāttvaṃ tatra paraṃ samādāpayitavyaṃ codayitavyaṃ smārayitavyaṃ manyase /
T06bsa034_u:1571: ityanena saptaviṃśatividhena paripākopāyena sā ṣaḍvidhā paripākaprabheda saṃpadveditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:1572: indriyaparipākasya kuśalamūlaparipākasya jñānaparipākasya mṛdumadhyādhimātrasya ca paripākasya /
T06bsa034_u:1574: samāsataḥ ṣaṭ bodhisattvāḥ ṣaṭasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu vyavasthitāḥ sattvān paripācayanti /
T06bsa034_u:1582: tatrāgotrasthānāṃ pudgalānāṃ sugatigamanāya paripākaḥ punaḥ punaḥ pratyāvartyo bhavati punaḥ punaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1583: gotrasthānāṃ punaḥ paripāko na pratyāvartyo bhavati na punaḥ punaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1585: śrāvakaḥ pūrvakuśalābhyāsād yadāmṛdupākavyavasthito bhavati sa mṛducchando bhavati
T06bsa034_u:1586: mṛduprayogaścāpāyānapi gacchati na ca dṛṣṭe dharme śrāmaṇyaphalamadhigacchati na
T06bsa034_u:1588: yadā tu madhyapākavyavasthito bhavati sa madhyacchandaśca bhavati madhyaprayogo na cāpāyān gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:1591: adhimātre paripāke sthitaḥ adhimātracchando bhavati adhimātraprayogaśca na cāpāyān gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:1598: paścime bhave paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe 'nācāyakaṃ pūrvābhyāsavaśāt saptatriṃśadvodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayitvā sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkaroti /
T06bsa034_u:1603: tatra mṛdupākavyavasthito bodhisattvo mṛducchando bhavati mṛduprayogaḥ apāyāṃśca gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:1605: uttaptairacalaiḥ suviśuddhaiśca bodhipakṣyaiḥ kuśalaidharmaiḥ sarvaireva visaṃyukto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1618: tatra yaścāmiṣakṛtaḥ paripāko yaśca ṛddhyāvarjanajo yaśca guhyadharmākhyānajo yaśca
T06bsa034_u:1619: mṛduprāyogiko yaśca śrutamātrakṛtaḥ paripāka ityeṣa pañcavidhaḥ paripākaḥ dīrghakālābhyāsādapyeṣāṃ
T06bsa034_u:1621: tadanyaistu sarvaiḥ paripākasya kāraṇaiḥ paripākasya triprakāranayo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1622: mṛdukenābhyāsena mṛduko madhyena madhyaḥ adhimātreṇādhimātraḥ paripāko veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1623: tasya ca mṛdumadhyādhimātrasya paripākasyaikaikasya triprakāranayo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1627: ityevaṃ bhāgīyottarottaraprabhedanayenāpramāṇaḥ paripākaprabhedaḥ sattvānāṃ buddhabodhisattvakṛto veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1635: samāsato dvividhañca prahāṇaṃ dvividhañca jñānaṃ bodhirityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1637: dvividhaṃ punarjñānaṃ yat kleśāvaraṇaprahāṇācca nirmalaṃ sarvakleśaniranubandhajñānam /
T06bsa034_u:1642: tatra savāsanānāṃ sarvakleśānāṃ sarvataścātyantañca prahāṇādyad jñānaṃ tacchuddhamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1643: sarvadhātuṣu sarvavastuṣu sarvaprakāreṣu sarvakāleṣu yadjñānamavyāhataṃ pravartate tatsarvajñānamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1648: tasyaiva ca saṃkṛtāsaṃskṛtasya vastuno 'pramāṇaḥ prakārabhedaḥ svalakṣaṇottarajātiprabhedena sāmānyalakṣaṇaprabhedena hetuphalaprabhedena dhātugatikuśalākuśalāvyākṛtādiprabhedena
T06bsa034_u:1651: ityetatsarvadhātukaṃ sarvavastukaṃ sarvaprakāraṃ sarvakālaṃ jñānaṃ sarvajñānamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1652: tatrāsaṅgajñānaṃ yadābhogamātrādeva sarvatrādhiṣṭhitaṃ tvaritamasaktaṃ jñānaṃ pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:1653: na punaḥ punarābhogaṃ kurvato nānyatraikābhogapratibaddhameva tajjñānaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1655: catvāriṃśaduttaramāveṇikaṃ buddhadharmaśataṃ yā ca tathāgatasyāraṇā praṇidhijñānaṃ pratisaṃvidaśca /
T06bsa034_u:1659: daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni trīṃṇi smṛtyupasthānāni trīṇyarakṣyāṇi mahākaruṇā
T06bsa034_u:1663: tatreyaṃ paramā bodhiḥ saptabhiḥ paramatābhiryuktā yeneyaṃ sarvabodhīnāṃ parametyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1664: sapta paramatāḥ katamāḥ āśrayaparamatā pratipattiparamatā sampattiparamatā jñānaparamatā prabhāvaparamatā prahāṇaparamatā vihāraparamatā ca
T06bsa034_u:1667: yattathāgata ātmahitāya parahitāya bahujanahitāya [bahujanasukhāya] lokānukampāyai arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ pratipannaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1669: yattathāgato niruttarābhirapratisamābhiścatasṛbhiḥ saṃpattibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ śīlasaṃpattyā dṛṣṭisaṃpattyā ācārasaṃpattyā ājīvasaṃpattyā [pratipannaḥ]
T06bsa034_u:1671: yattathāgato niruttarābhirapratisamābhiścatasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ samanvāgataḥ dharmapratisaṃvidā 'rthapratisaṃvidā niruktipratisaṃvidapratibhānapratisaṃvidā ca /
T06bsa034_u:1673: yattathāgato niruttarābhirapratisamābhiḥ ṣaḍbhirabhijñābhiḥ samanvāgataḥ yathā pūrvanirdiṣṭābhiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1675: yattathāgataḥ savāsanasarvakleśaprahāṇena niruttareṇāpratisamena jñeyāvaraṇa prahāṇena ca samanvāgataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1685: brāhmādvihārātkaruṇāvihāro yena tathāgatastriskṛto rātrau triskṛtvo divase ṣaṭkṛtvo rātriṃdivena buddhacakṣaṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati ko hīyate (Dutt 64)
T06bsa034_u:1686: ko vardhate kasyānutpannāni kuśalamūlānyavaropayāmi kvaṃ yāvadvistareṇāgraphale 'rhattve pratiṣṭhāpayāmīti /
T06bsa034_u:1694: teṣāñca punastathāgatānāṃ daśabhirākārairguṇābhidhānañca bhavati guṇānusmaraṇatā ca /
T06bsa034_u:1696: ityapi sa bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhansamyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavāniti /
T06bsa034_u:1703: paramacittadamopāyajñatayā ekasyaiva loke puruṣabhūtasya ca prādurbhāvāt anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1705: vyutpādakatvā dutpannasya saṃśayasyocchedakatvāt gambhīrāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ vivaraṇāt
T06bsa034_u:1709: arthopasaṃhitasya dharmarāśeranarthopasaṃhitasya dharmarāśernnaivārthopasaṃhitasya nānārthopasaṃhitasya dharmarāśeḥ sakalasarvākārābhisaṃbodhād buddha ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1712: tatra prabhūtairapi kalpairekasyāpi buddhasya prādurbhāvo na bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1713: ekasminneva ca kalpe prabhūtānāṃ buddhānāmutpādo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1714: teṣu teṣu ca daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣvaprameyāṇāmeva buddhānāmutpādo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1717: yasminneva divase pakṣe māse saṃvatsare ekena bodhisattvena bodhau cittaṃ praṇihitaṃ tasminneva divase pakṣe māse saṃvatsare sarvaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1718: yathā caika utsahito ghaṭito vyāyacchitaśca tathā sarve /
T06bsa034_u:1719: tathāhi dṛśyante 'sminneva lokadhātāvanekāni bodhisattvaśatāni yāni tulyakālapraṇidhānāni tulyatyāgāni tulyakṣāntikāni tulyavīryāṇi tulyadhyānāni tulyaprajñānāni /
T06bsa034_u:1722: na ca tulyasaṃbhārasamudāgatayordvayostāvadbodhisattvayorekasmin lokadhātau buddhakṣetre yugapadutpattyavakāśo 'sti prāgevāprameyāsaṃkhyeyānām
T06bsa034_u:1725: tasmāddaśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu yathā pariśodhiteṣu tathāgataśūnyeṣu te tulyasaṃbhārā bodhisattvā anyonyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣūtpadyanta iti veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:1726: tadanena paryāyeṇa bahuṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhabāhulyameva yujyate /
T06bsa034_u:1730: yathāhameko 'pariṇāyake loke pariṇāyakaḥ syāṃ sattvānāṃ vinetā sarvaduḥkhebhyo vimocayitā parinirvāpayiteti /
T06bsa034_u:1731: yasyaivaṃ dīrgharātraṃ praṇidhānamanubṛṃhayataḥ samyak pratipattiparigṛhītamṛdhyatyeva tat /
T06bsa034_u:1732: punaśca śakta ekastathāgatastrisāhasramahāsāhasre ekasmin buddhakṣetre sarvabuddhakārya kartum /
T06bsa034_u:1733: ato dvitīyasya tathāgatasya vyartha evotpādaḥ syāt /
T06bsa034_u:1734: bhūyaścaikasya tathāgatasya loke utpādātsattvānām evārthakaraṇaprasiddhiḥ pracuratarā bhavati pradakṣiṇatarā /
T06bsa034_u:1736: teṣāmevaṃ bhavatyayameva kṛtsne jagatyekastathāgato na dvitīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1737: asmiñjanapadacārikāṃ vā viprakānte parinirvṛte vā nāsti sa kaścid dvitīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1738: (Dutt 66) yasyāsmābhirantike brahmacaryaṃ caritavyaṃ syāt dharmo vā śrotavya iti viditvā 'titvarante ghanatareṇa chandavyāyāmena brahmacaryavāsāya saddharmaśravaṇāya ca /
T06bsa034_u:1740: evameṣāmekasya buddhasyotpādātsvārthe karaṇaprasiddhiḥ pracuratarā ca bhavati pradakṣiṇatarā ca /
T06bsa034_u:1741: tatra sarvabuddhānāṃ sarvaṃ samasamaṃ bhavati nirviśiṣṭaṃ sthāpayitvā catvāri sthānāni-āyurnāma kulaṃ kāyañca /
T06bsa034_u:1749: prakṛtyā ca bahukleśo duṣprajñaśca bhavati sarvo mātṛgrāmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1750: na ca prakṛtyā bahukleśasantānena duṣprajñasantānena ca śakyamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
T06bsa034_u:1751: evamiyamanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ svabhāvato 'pi yathānirdiṣṭā yathābhūtaṃ veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:1752: paramato 'pi guṇanirdeśānusmaraṇato 'pi saṃbhavato 'pi viśeṣato 'pi yathānirdiṣṭā yathābhūtaṃ veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:1753: api tvacintyaiva sarvatarkamārgasamatikrāntatvādaprameyāsaṃkhyeyaguṇasamuditatvādanuttaraiva ca samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvaśrāvaka-pratyekabuddhatathāgatānābhi nirvṛttaye bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1764: ihādita eva bodhisattvena bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣitukāmenādhimuktibahulena bhavitavyaṃ
T06bsa034_u:1768: iha bodhisattvo 'ṣṭavidhe 'dhimuktyadhiṣṭhāne śraddhāprasādapūrvaṃkeṇa niścayena rucyā samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:1769: triṣu ratneṣu buddhadharmaṃsaṃghaguṇeṣu buddhabodhisattvaprabhāve ca yathānirdiṣṭe
T06bsa034_u:1770: tattvārthe ca yathānirdiṣṭe hetau ca phale ca vicitre yathāyogapatite aviparīte prāptavye
T06bsa034_u:1772: yathā prāptavye arthe evaṃ prāptyupāye astyayaṃ prāptyupāyaḥ prāptavyasyārthasyeti /
T06bsa034_u:1775: tathā subhāṣite sulapite supravyāhṛte 'dhimuktistadyathā sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇādiṣu dharmeṣu /
T06bsa034_u:1778: tatra dharmaṃ bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣamāṇaḥ kiṃ paryeṣate /
T06bsa034_u:1782: vāhyakāni ca śāstrāṇi laukikāni ca śilpakarmapasthānāni paryeṣate /
T06bsa034_u:1790: adhyātmavidyā hetuvidyā śabdavidyā vyādhicikitsāvidyā śilpakarmasthānavidyā ca /
T06bsa034_u:1791: itīmāni pañca vidyāsthānāni yāni bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣate /
T06bsa034_u:1810: daśeme hetavaḥ aviparītaṃ hetuvyavasthānaṃ sarvahetusaṃgrahe veditavyāḥ saṃkleśāya vā vyavadānāya vā laukināmapi ca teṣāṃ sasyādīnāmavyākṛtānāṃ pravṛttaye /
T06bsa034_u:1820: tatra sarvadharmāṇāṃ yannāma nāmapūrvikā ca saṃjñā saṃjñāpūrvakaścābhilāpaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1822: tatra yadapekṣaṃ yaddhetukaṃ yasmin vastunyarthitvamupādānañca bhavatyayamasyocyate 'pekṣāhetuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1831: tatpunarbījanirvṛttaṃ phalamuttarasya bījākṣiptasya phalasyāvāhakahetuḥ nānāvijātīya-vibhinnakāraṇatvaṃ pratiniyamahetuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1832: yaścāpekṣāhetuḥ yaścākṣepahetuḥ yaśca parigrahaheturyaśca nirvṛttiheturyaścāvāhakaheturyaśca pratiniyamaheturityetān sarvān hetūn ekadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya sahakāriheturityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:1837: tadyathā śāsrāṇi pūrvāparaviruddhāni bhavanti tadekatyānāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānām yuktivirodhaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:1849: punaḥ sarveṣāmeṣāṃ hetūnāṃ dvābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ saṃgrahaḥ /

T06bsa034_u:2174: iha bodhisattvaḥ parotpīḍanāya [paravadhāya] paravañcanāya cāyogavihitena copanimantritamātmānaṃ paravaśyaṃ paravidheyaṃ na dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2175: apyeva nāma bodhisattvaḥ śatakṛtvaḥ sahasrakṛtvaḥ svajīvitaparityāgamapi pareṣāmantikādabhyupagacchet /
T06bsa034_u:2176: natveva rājñayā parārādhanārthaṃ parotpīḍanāṃ paravadhaṃ paravañcanāṃ vā kuryāt /
T06bsa034_u:2177: yadi ca bodhisattvaḥ śuddhāśayo bhavati dānamārabhya so 'pi sattvakārye prabhūte
T06bsa034_u:2178: karaṇīye pratyupasthite svadehāṅgapratyaṅgayācanake ca pratyupasthite na svadehāṅgapratyaṅgānyanuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2180: na hyasya bodhisattvasya dānamārabhya śuddhāśayasya punaḥ kenacitparyāyeṇedaṃ dātavyamasmai dātanyamiti bhavati cetasaḥ saṃkocaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2181: tasmādasau bodhisattvo yadāśayaśuddhyarthaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ sattvakāryamadhyupekṣya dadyāt so 'syāśayaḥ śuddha iti na (Dutt 82)
T06bsa034_u:2183: na ca mārakāyikeṣu deveṣu yācanakeṣu viheṭhābhiprāyeṣu pratyupasthiteṣu svadehamaṅgavibhāgaśo dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2184: mā haiva teṣāmadhimātrā kṣatiścopahatiśca bhaviṣyatīti yathā mārakāyikeṣu deveṣu /
T06bsa034_u:2191: etānākārān sthāpayitvā etadviparyayāt svadehaṃ tāvadbodhisattvaḥ paravidheyatayā vā 'ṅgapratyaṅgavibhāgaśo vārthibhyaḥ parityajati /
T06bsa034_u:2193: bāhyātpunarvastuno bodhisattvo yāni viṣāgniśastramadyāni sattvānāmupaghātāya tāni nānuprayacchatyarthibhyaḥ ātmopaghātāya vā yācitānyarthināṃ paropaghātāya [vā] /
T06bsa034_u:2194: yāni punarviṣāgniśasramadyānyanugrahāya sattvānāṃ tāni bodhisattvo dadātyarthibhya ātmano vā 'nugrahāya yācitānyarthināṃ parānugrahāya vā /
T06bsa034_u:2195: punarna ca bodhisattvaḥ parakīyaṃ draviṇamaviśvāsyaṃ parebhyo 'nuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2196: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sāñcaritreṇa paradāramupasaṃhṛtya pareṣāmanuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2198: yadapi [rati]krīḍopasaṃhitamanarthopasaṃhitaṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvasya deyaṃ vastu tadapi bodhisattvo 'rthibhyo na dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2201: apitu vipulataramasya taddānamanarthaṃ kuryādyaddhetorasau madaṃ pramādaṃ duścaritamadhyāpadyamānaḥ kāyasya bhedādapāyeṣūpapadyate /
T06bsa034_u:2202: sa cetpunastadratikrīḍādikaṃ va tu nāpāyagamanāya bhavennāpi cākuśalamūlopacayāya
T06bsa034_u:2205: kīdṛśaṃ punā ratikrīḍāvastu bodhisattvo na dadātyarthibhyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2208: kṣudrayajñeṣu ca mahārambheṣu yeṣu bahavaḥ prāṇinaḥ saṃghātamāpadya jīvitādvyaparopyante /
T06bsa034_u:2209: tadrūpān yajñānna svayaṃ yajati na parairyājayati /
T06bsa034_u:2211: na ca prabhūtaprāṇyāśritān [deśān] jalajairvā [sthalajairvā] prāṇibhiradhyuṣitāṃsteṣāṃ prāṇināmuparodhāya yācito 'nuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2212: (Dutt 83) na jālāni na yantrāṇi na jālayantraśikṣāṃ prāṇināmuparodhāya yācito 'nuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2213: nāpyākrośāya vadhāya bandhāya daṇḍanāya kāraṇāya śatrūṇāṃ śatrumanuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2214: samāsato bodhisattvo yatkiñcit parasattvotpīḍayā parasattvabādhāya sattvānāṃ ratikrīḍāvastu tatsarvaṃbodhisattvo na dadātyarthibhyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2215: yāni punarimāni vicitrāṇi hastyaśvarathayānavāhanāni vastrālaṅkārāṇi praṇītāni ca
T06bsa034_u:2217: vicitraśca bhāṇḍopaskara udyānāni ca gṛhāṇi striyaśca paricaryāyai vividheṣu ca śilpakarmasthāneṣu
T06bsa034_u:2219: na ca bodhisattvaḥ amātrayā 'pathyaṃ vā glānāyārthine 'pi pānabhojanamanuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2220: na tṛpteṣu lolupajātīyeṣu sattveṣu praṇītaṃ pānabhojanamanuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2221: nāpi ca śokārtānāṃ sattvānāmātmodbandhanāya vā tāḍnāya vā viṣabhakṣaṇāya vā prapātapatanāya vā kāmakāraṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2222: na ca bodhisattvo mātāpitaraṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃmarthibhyo 'nuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2223: tathāhi bodhisattvasya mātāpitaraṃ paramaguru-sthānīyamāpāyakaṃ poṣakaṃ saṃvardhakaṃ tadbodhisattvena dīrgharātraṃ śirasodvahatā na khedamāpattavyam
T06bsa034_u:2224: tayoścādhamanabandhaka sthāpanavikraye ātmā vaśyo vidheyo dātavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2225: tatkathaṃ bodhisattvaḥ parebhyo 'nupradātumutsaheta kutaḥ punaḥ pradadyāt /
T06bsa034_u:2226: nāpi bodhisattvo rājā mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ prabhuḥ sve pṛthivīmaṇḍale sattvānāṃ saparigrahāṇāṃ parakīyaṃ putradāraṃ pareṣāmantikādācchidya pareṣāmanuprayacchati
T06bsa034_u:2227: nānyatra kṛtsnaṃ grāmaṃ vā grāmapradeśaṃ vā janapadapradeśaṃ vā bhogamanuprayacchet /
T06bsa034_u:2229: na ca bodhisattvaḥ svaṃ putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaparigrahaṃ samyagasaṃjñaptamakāmakaṃ vimanaskaṃ pareṣāmarthināmanuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2230: samyak saṃjñaptamapi ca sumanaskaṃ chandajātaṃ nāmitreṣu na yakṣarākṣaseṣu na raudrakarmasu pratipādayati /
T06bsa034_u:2231: nāpi ca dāsabhāvāya pratipādayati putradāraṃ sukumāraṃ kulaputraṃ janam /
T06bsa034_u:2232: na ca bodhisattvo 'dhimātraparapīḍāpravṛtteṣu raudrakarmasu yācanakeṣu rājyapradānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2233: rājyādapi ca tāṃstathāvidhān pudgalāṃścyāvayati sa cet pratibalo bhavati cyāvayitum /
T06bsa034_u:2234: na ca bodhisattvo mātāpitrorantikādbhogānācchidya yācanakebhyaḥ prayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2236: nāpi ca (Dutt 84) mātāpitaraṃ bādhitvā vistareṇa yāvatkarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ bādhitvā parebhyo yācanakebhyo deyavastu parityajati /
T06bsa034_u:2237: dharmaṇa cāsāhasena bodhisattvo bhogān saṃhṛtya dānaṃ dadāti nādharmeṇa sāhasena /
T06bsa034_u:2238: na paramutpīḍyopahatya na ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsane bodhisattvo vyavasthitaḥ śikṣāṃ vyatikramya kathañcit dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2239: dānañca dadad bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu samacitto dadāti dakṣiṇīyabuddhimupasthāpya mitrāmitrodāsīneṣu guṇavatsu doṣasatsu hīneṣu tulyeṣu viśiṣṭeṣu sukhiteṣu duḥkhiteṣu ca /
T06bsa034_u:2240: na ca bodhisattvo yathoktādyathāpratijñātādyācanakāya nyūnaṃ dāna dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2242: na ca bodhisattvaḥ praṇītaṃ vastu pratijñāya lūhaṃ pratyavaraṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2243: nānyatralūhaṃ pratyavaraṃ pratijñāya praṇītaṃ dadāti saṃvidyamāne praṇīte /
T06bsa034_u:2244: na ca bodhisattvo vimanasko na kruddhaḥ kṣubhitamānaso dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2245: nāpi ca dānaṃ dattvā nindayati punaḥ punaḥ parikīrtanatayā evaṃ caivañca tvaṃ mayā dānenānugṛhītaḥ savardhito 'bhyuddhṛto veti /
T06bsa034_u:2246: na ca bodhisattvo nihīnapuruṣasyāpi dānaṃ dadadapaviddhamasatkṛtyānuprayacchati prāgeva guṇavataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2248: yācanakānāmākrośakānāṃ roṣakāṇāṃ paribhāṣakāṇāṃ vipratipattyā khinnamānaso dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2249: nānyatra teṣāmevāntike bodhisattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā kleśāveśaprakṛtitāmavagamyānukampācittamupasthāpya dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2251: tadyathā mahāraudrayajñeṣu na hiṃsādānena dharmaṃ pratyeti /
T06bsa034_u:2253: nāpi suviśuddhenāpi sarvākāreṇa dānamātrakeṇa laukikalokottarāṃ vairāgyaviśuddhiṃ pratyeti nānyatra /
T06bsa034_u:2257: sarvaprakārasya dānasya sarvaṃ prakāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ phalaṃ vipāke 'bhisaṃpratyayajāto bodhisattvo 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyo dānaṃ dadāti tadyathā 'nnado balavān bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2258: vastrado varṇavān yānadaḥ sukhitaḥ cakṣuṣmān pradīpada ityevamādi vistareṇa veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2259: na ca bodhisattvo dāridryabhayabhīto dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2261: na ca bodhisattvo yācanakānāmapratirūpaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2268: tathā 'pratirūpe karmaṇi viniyojya bodhisattvo na pareṣāṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2270: na ca punarbodhisattvo yācanakaṃ punaḥ punaryācanatayā gatapratyāgatikatayā sevāvṛttasaṃvidhānena parikliśya dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2272: na ca bodhisattvaḥ kīrtiśabdaślokamiśritaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2274: na ca pareṣāṃ kuhanārthaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2275: kaccinmāṃ pare rājāno vā rājamahāmātyā vā naigamajanapadā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ sārthavāhā dātāraṃ dānapatiṃ viditvā satkuryurgurūkuryurmānayeyuḥ pūjayeyuriti /
T06bsa034_u:2278: na ca pareṣāṃ vipralambhāya dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2279: anena dānena vilobhya viśrambhayitvā paścādenaṃ vipravādayiṣyāmīti /
T06bsa034_u:2280: na ca vibhedāya parataḥ pareṣāṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2281: tadyathā dānena grāmaṃ vā grāmapradeśaṃ vā janapadaṃ vā janapadapradeśaṃ vā vibhedya svāmināmantikādācchetsyāmyākramiṣyāmīti /
T06bsa034_u:2282: dakṣaśca bodhisattvo bhavatyanalasaśca utthānasampannaḥ svayaṃ ca sannaddhaḥ parikare
T06bsa034_u:2283: pūrvaṅgamo deyavastu parityāge svayañca dadāti paraiśca dāpayati na svayaṃ kausīdyaṃ
T06bsa034_u:2285: mahāntamapi gaṇasannipātamarthināṃ śīlavadduḥśīlānāṃ sanniṣaṇṇaṃ saṃnipatitaṃ viditvā
T06bsa034_u:2286: vṛddhāntamupādāya yāvannavakāntaṃ tatsarvaṃ deyavastu gatapratyāgatikatayā punaḥ
T06bsa034_u:2287: punaranukrameṇa pratipādayati na ca bodhisattvaḥ prabhūteṣu vipuleṣu vistīrṇeṣu bhogeṣu
T06bsa034_u:2289: na ca paraviheṭhanāya pareṣāṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2291: pūrvameva ca dānād bodhisattvaḥ sumanā bhavati dadaccittaṃ prasādayati /
T06bsa034_u:2293: na ca śāṭhyāddānaṃ dadāti maṇimuktāśaṅkhaśilāvaidūryapravāḍādipratirūpakāṇi tadāśāvatāṃ sattvānām /
T06bsa034_u:2294: na ca bodhisattvena kiñcidalpaṃ [vā prabhūtaṃ vā] deyavastu yanna prāgeva cetasā sarvasattvānāṃ (Dutt 86)
T06bsa034_u:2297: kālena ca bodhisattvo dānaṃ dadāti nākālena /
T06bsa034_u:2305: na ca vilambitaṃ tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2306: ayācito 'pi bodhisattvaḥ svayaṃ pravārayitvā parān yo yenārthī bhavati tasya taddadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2311: iha bodhisattvaḥ satsu saṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu pūrvameva yācanakābhyāgamanādevaṃ cittamabhisaṃskaroti /
T06bsa034_u:2312: sa cenme dvau yācanakāvāgacchetāṃ sukhitaścākṛpaṇo 'varākaḥ sanāthaḥ sapratisaraṇaḥ duḥkhitaśca kṛpaṇo varākaḥ anāthaḥ apratisaraṇaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2313: tena mayā sacenme bhogānāṃ dvayorapi santarpaṇāyecchāparipūraye tadā saṃbhavo 'sti ubhau santarpayitavyau /
T06bsa034_u:2315: sa cenna tāvadbhogasaṃbhavaḥ syādahaṃ dvayoḥ santarpayeyaṃ yadicchāparipūriñca kuryāṃ sukhitamapahāya duḥkhitāya dānaṃ deyam /
T06bsa034_u:2316: akṛpaṇamavarākaṃ sanāthaṃ sapratisaraṇamapahāya kṛpaṇāya varākāya anāthāyāpratisaraṇāya dānaṃ deyamiti /
T06bsa034_u:2317: sa evaṃ cittamabhisaṃskṛtya yathābhisaṃskārameva karmaṇā saṃpādayati /
T06bsa034_u:2318: sa cetpunaḥ sukhitasya yācanakasyecchāṃ na śaknoti paripūrayituṃ sa tameva pūrvakaṃ svacittābhisaṃskārakalpamupādāya taṃ yācakamevaṃ saṃjñapya preṣayati /
T06bsa034_u:2319: asya mayā duḥkhitasya pūrvanisṛṣṭaṃ pūrvapratijñātametaddeyavastu ato mayā 'syaiva pratipāditam /
T06bsa034_u:2322: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ satsu saṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu yāni tāni matsarikulāni
T06bsa034_u:2323: bhavanti paramamatsarikulānyāgṛhītapariṣkārāṇi kuṭakuñcakāni yeṣu na jātu śramaṇabrāhmaṇeṣu
T06bsa034_u:2324: deyadharme prajāyate tāni bodhisattvaḥ kulānyupasaṃkramya pratisaṃmodya praṇayañca saṃvidhāyaivamāha /
T06bsa034_u:2325: aṅga tāvatte bhavantaḥ akośakṣayeṇa mahatā upakāreṇa pratyavasthitā bhavantu /
T06bsa034_u:2326: mama gṛhe vipulā bhogā vipulā deyadharmāḥ (Dutt 87)
T06bsa034_u:2329: sa cedyūyaṃ yācanakamārāgayatha mā nirākṛtya visarjayiṣyatha madīyaṃ dhanaṃ deyadharmamādāya tebhyo vā visṛjata yathāsukhameva /
T06bsa034_u:2330: athavā taṃ yācanakamasmākamupasaṃharatha dīyamānañca mayā dānamanumodatha /
T06bsa034_u:2331: te ca tasya pratiśrutyākośakṣayeṇa priyeṇāyaṃ kulaputro 'smākamārādhitacitto bhavatīti tathā kurvanti /
T06bsa034_u:2332: evaṃ hi tena bodhisattvena yeṣāmāyatyāṃ mātsaryamalavinayāya bījamavaropitaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2333: krameṇa ca tenābhyāsena tena prajñāpūrvakeṇopāyakauśalyena svakamapi parīttaṃ parebhyo dhanamanuprayacchanti /
T06bsa034_u:2336: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo ye 'sya bhavantyācāryopādhyāyāḥ sārdhavihāryantevāsinaḥ sabrahmacāriṇaśca
T06bsa034_u:2337: lobhaprakṛtayo lubdhajātīyā ye ca na lubdhajātīyā api tu deyadharmavaikalyādicchāvighātavantastatra
T06bsa034_u:2338: bodhisattvo buddhāvaropitaṃ vā dharmā[varopitaṃ vā] saṃghāvaropitaṃ vā dānamayaṃ
