T06bsa034_u:2340: tān deya dharmāṃstaiḥ kārayati na svayaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:2341: evaṃ tena bodhisattvena svayañca bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2345: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ satsu saṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu yācanakamākūṭananimittamātrakeṇaiva jñātvā yathākāmaṃ deyadharmaiḥ pratipādayati
T06bsa034_u:2347: tasyāpi bhāvamājñāya tadduścaritamanyeṣāmapi tāvacchādayati prāgeva tasyaiva /
T06bsa034_u:2348: icchāñcāsya paripūrayati yenāsāvamaṅkurudagro viśāradaḥ saumanasyajāto viprakrāmati /
T06bsa034_u:2349: yenāpi ca bodhisattvaḥ kūṭa-kapaṭena vañcito bhavati na cānena sā vañcanā pūrvaṃ pratividdhā bhavati paścācca pratividhyati /
T06bsa034_u:2350: pratividhya na ca tena vastunā punastaṃ vyaṃsakaṃ pudgalañcodayati smārayati /
T06bsa034_u:2352: ityevaṃbhāgīyaṃ tāvadbodhisattvasya satsu saṃvidyamāneṣu prājñadānaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2353: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ asatsu asaṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu kṛtāvī bodhisattvasteṣu teṣu śilpakarmasthāneṣu sa tadrūpaṃ śilpakarmasthānamāmukhīkaroti
T06bsa034_u:2355: pareṣāñcitrakatho madhurakathaḥ kalyāṇapratibhāno bodhisattvāstathā dharmadeśanāṃ pravartayati yathā daridrāṇāmapi sattvānāṃ dātukāmatā santiṣṭhate prāgevāḍhyānām /
T06bsa034_u:2357: yāni vā punastāni śrāddhakulāni yeṣvaharahaḥ pravṛtā eva deyadharmā vistīrṇabhogatayā teṣu kuleṣu āgatāgatān yācanakānupasaṃharati /
T06bsa034_u:2358: svayameva vā gatvā dāneṣu dīyamāneṣu puṇyeṣu kriyamāṇeṣu dakṣo 'nalasa utthānasampannaścittamabhiprasādya kāyena vācā yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ vyāpāraṃ gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2361: yadupasthāpaka-vaiguṇyād duṣpratipāditaṃ syāt pakṣapatitaṃ vā anādarato vā smṛtisaṃpramoṣato vā tanna bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2362: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ asatsvasaṃvidyamāneṣu bhogeṣu prājñadānasya dātā bhavati yāvadāśayaśuddhi nādhigacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2363: śuddhāśayastu bodhisattvo yathaivāpāsamatikramaṃ pratilabhate tathaivākṣayabhogatāṃ janmani pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:2364: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo na tīrthikāya randhraprekṣiṇe dharmaṃ mukhoddeśato vā pustakagataṃ vā dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2365: nāpi lobhaprakṛtaye pustakaṃ vikretukāmāya sannidhiṃ vā kartukāmāya /
T06bsa034_u:2367: punaḥ sa cetkṛtārthaḥ pustakena bhavati svayaṃ dadātyasmai yathāsukhameva /
T06bsa034_u:2368: sa cedakṛtārtho bhavati yasyārthe tena tatpustakamanvāvartitam /
T06bsa034_u:2369: evamasau bodhisattvaḥ ādarśamanyaṃ dṛṣṭvā lekhayitvā vānyaddadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2370: sa cennaivādarśaṃ paśyati nāpi lekhayituṃ śaknoti tenādita evaṃ svacittaṃ pratyavekṣitavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2372: mā haivāhamāśayata eva na dātukāmo 'bhilikhitaṃ dharmam /
T06bsa034_u:2373: sa cetsa evaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo jānīyādasti me dharmamātsaryamalasamudācāro 'pi tena bodhisattvenaivaṃ cittamabhisaṃskṛtya dātavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2375: yadyahamanena dharmadānena mūka evaṃ syāṃ dṛṣṭe dharme tathāpi mayā 'nadhivāsya kleśaṃ dātavyameva syāddharmadānam /
T06bsa034_u:2377: sa cetpunaḥ pratyavekṣamāṇo jānīyānnāsti me [dharma] mātsaryamalasamudācāro 'pi tena bodhisattvenaivaṃ pratisaṃśikṣitavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2378: aham [ātmanaḥ] kleśanirghātanārthaṃ vā etaddharmadānaṃ dadyāṃ jñānasaṃbhāraparipūraṇārthaṃ vā sattva (Dutt 89)
T06bsa034_u:2384: ananuprayacchaṃścāhaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ hitasukhāya jñānaṃ samudānaya tasya ca sattvasya tadanyeṣāñca sarvasattvānāṃ priyakārī bhavāmi /
T06bsa034_u:2385: anupracchannasyaivaikasya sattvasya priyakārī iti viditvā yathābhūtaṃ sa cedbodhisattvo na dadātyanavadyo bhavatyavipratisārī /
T06bsa034_u:2388: na khalu punarbodhisattvaḥ utsahate yācanakaṃ niṣṭhurayā vācā pratikṣeptum /
T06bsa034_u:2391: prāgeva bodhisattvena sarvapariṣkārāḥ sarvadeyadharmā daśasu dikṣu viśaddhenāśayena
T06bsa034_u:2392: buddhabodhisattvānāṃ visṛṣṭā bhavanti vikalpitāstadyathāpi nāma bhikṣurācāryāya vā
T06bsa034_u:2398: yadi yācanakaṃ paśyati yuktarūpaścāsmin yathepsitaṃ deyadharmapratipādanaṃ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:2399: sa nāsti tat kiñcid buddhabodhisattvānāṃ yatsattveṣu aparityaktamiti viditvā yācanakasyecchāṃ paripūrayati /
T06bsa034_u:2400: no cedyuktarūpaṃ samanupaśyati sa tameva kalpamupādāya parakīyametad bhadramukha na caitadyuṣmākamanujñātaṃ dātumiti ślakṣnena vacasā saṃjñapyainaṃ preṣayati /
T06bsa034_u:2401: anyadvā tad dviguṇaṃ triguṇaṃ dānamānasatkāraṃ kṛtvānupreṣayati /
T06bsa034_u:2402: yenāsau jānīte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo lobhātmakatayā 'smākaṃ na dātukāmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2403: api tu nūnamasvatantra evaṃ tasmin pustakadharmadāne yena na dadātīti /
T06bsa034_u:2405: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ sarvadānāni dharmāmiṣābhaya[dānā]ni praryāyato 'pi lakṣaṇato 'pi nirvacanato 'pi hetuphalaprabhedato 'pi yathābhūtaṃ prajānannanuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2407: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu maitryāśayo dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2412: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo dānavibandhanamapi dānavibandhapratipakṣamapi yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:2416: agre manorame ca vastuni gṛddhiḥ āyatyāñca bhogasampatti phaladarśanābhinandanatā /
T06bsa034_u:2417: yataśca bodhisattvasya deyadharmeṣu saṃvidyamāneṣu yācanake ca samyagupasthite dāne cittaṃ na krāmati /
T06bsa034_u:2418: so 'nabhyāsakṛto me 'yaṃ doṣa iti laghu ladhveva prajñayā pratisidhyati /
T06bsa034_u:2420: nūnaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ dānaṃ na dattaṃ yena me etarhi samyak saṃvidyamāneṣu bhogeṣu samyak pratyupasthite ca yācanake dāne cittaṃ na krāmati /
T06bsa034_u:2421: sa cedetarhina pratisaṃkhyāya dāsyāmi punarapi me āyatyāṃ dānavidveṣo bhaviṣyati /
T06bsa034_u:2422: sa eva pratibidhya dānapratibandhapratipakṣa niśṛtya pratisaṃkhyāya dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2424: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvasya sa cedyad yācanake samyak pratyupasthite parīttabhogatayā
T06bsa034_u:2425: dāne cittaṃ na krāmati sa ta vighātakṛta dānavipratibandhahetuṃ laghu-laghveva prajñayā
T06bsa034_u:2426: pratividhya tadvighātakṛtaṃ duḥkhamadhivāsayan pratisaṃkhyāya kāruṇyāddānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2428: pūrvakarmadoṣeṇa vā paravineyatayā vā mayā bahūni pragāḍhāni kṣut pipāsādikāni duḥkhānyanubhūtāni bhave vinā parānugraham /
T06bsa034_u:2429: yadi ca me maraṇāya kālakriyāyai savarteta etaddānakṛta parānugrahahetuka dṛṣṭe dharme duḥkha tathāpi me dānameva śreyo na tu yācanakanirākaraṇam
T06bsa034_u:2430: prāgeva yaḥ kaścidyena kenacicchākapatreṇa jīvati ityevaṃ bodhisattvastadvighātakṛtaṃ dukhamadhivāsya dāna dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2431: panarapara bodhisattvasya samyag yācake pratyupasthite sa cedadhimātramanāpatvādagryatvāddeyavastuno
T06bsa034_u:2432: dāne citta na krāmati ta bodhisattvo gardhakṛt doṣa laghu-laghveva pratijñayā pratividhya
T06bsa034_u:2433: duḥkhe me eṣa sukhasaṃjñāviparyāsaḥ āyatyāṃ duḥkhajanaka iti viparyāsaparijñānāttañca
T06bsa034_u:2435: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvasya sa ceddānaṃ dattvā dānaphale (Dutt 91)
T06bsa034_u:2437: mithyāphaladṛṣṭikṛtaṃ doṣaṃ laghu-laghveva prajñayā pratividhya sarvasaṃskārāṇāmasāratāṃ
T06bsa034_u:2440: sa evaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ phaladarśanaṃ prahāya yatkiñciddānaṃ dadāti sarvaṃ tanmahābodhi-pariṇāmitameva dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2441: tadidaṃ bodhisattvasya caturvidhasya dānavibandhasya caturvidhaṃ dānaprativandhapratipakṣajñānaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2443: tatra trividhena bodhisattvaḥ pratipakṣajñānena pūrvakeṇa niyataṃ samyak ca dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2444: ekena paścimena pratipakṣajñānena samyak puṇyaphalaparigrahaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:2446: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvaḥ adhyātmyaṃ rahogataḥ śuddhenāśayena ghanarasena prasādena
T06bsa034_u:2451: evaṃ samāsataḥ saṃvidyamāneṣvasaṃvimādeṣu cāmiṣadānasaṃgṛhīteṣu deyadharmeṣu tathā
T06bsa034_u:2455: ata ūrdhvamasmādeva sarvadānaprabhedāttadanyaḥ sarvo duṣkarādidānaprabhedo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2457: yadbodhisattvaḥ parīttaṃ deyavastu saṃvidyamānamātmānaṃ bādhitvā duḥkhamadhivāsya pareṣāmanuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2459: yadbodhisattvaḥ iṣṭañca vastu prakṛtisnehādvā dīrghakāla saṃstavādvā 'dhimātropakārādvā 'gryañca pravaraṃ deyavastugardhaṃ prativinodya parebhyo 'nuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2460: (Dutt 92) idaṃ bodhisattvasya dvitīyaṃ duṣkaradānaṃ yadbodhisattvaḥ kṛcchatārjitān deyadharmān parebhyo 'nuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2463: yadbodhisattvaḥ svakaṃ vā paraṃ vā samādāpya deyavastu svabhṛtyeṣu vā mātāpitṛputradāradāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyamitrāmātyajñātisālohiteṣvanuprayacchati
T06bsa034_u:2468: yadbodhisattvaḥ śraddhayā dānaṃ dadāti satkṛtya svahastena kālena parānanupahatya idaṃ bodhisattvasya satpuruṣasya satpuruṣadānamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:2483: iha bodhisattvo bhojanena pānena vighātiṣvarthikeṣu bhojanapānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2484: yānārthikeṣu yānaṃ vastrārthikeṣu vastramalaṅkārārthikeṣu alaṃkāraṃ vicitrabhāṇḍopaskārārthikeṣu vicitrabhāṇḍopaskāraṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2490: āmiṣadānaṃ dharmadānamabhayadānañca samāsataḥ ihāmutrasukhaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dānaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2496: tadetatsarvamabhisamasya navākāraṃ bodhisattvasya dānaṃ sattvānābhihāmutrasukhaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2502: iha bodhisattvo yācanake samyak pratyupasthite tvaritamavilambitaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2503: na yācanakasya tathā lābhamāramya tvarā bhavati yathā bodhisattvasya dānamārabhya /
T06bsa034_u:2505: na hi bodhisattvo dṛṣṭyā evaṃ dānaṃ parāmṛśati /
T06bsa034_u:2510: na khalu bodhisattvaḥ saṃbhṛtya dīrghakālikaṃ deyadharmasannicarya kṛtvā paścāt sakṛddānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2512: na hi bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu samyak pratyupasthitasya yācanakasya nirākaraṇamutsahate nāpi pratirūpaṃ paśyati yena tannirākaroti
T06bsa034_u:2514: na ca saṃbhṛtadānena bodhisattvaḥ puṇyasyāyadvāramadhikaṃ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:2515: samaṃ deyavastu tulyeṣu vyastasamasteṣu yācanakeṣu krameṇa vā sakṛdvā dīyamānaṃ kena
T06bsa034_u:2516: kāraṇena puṇyaviśeṣatāṃ parigṛhṇīyāditi sampaśyannapi ca bodhisattvaḥ sāvadyameva
T06bsa034_u:2520: tathāhi saṃbhṛtadātā 'rthito yācanakairyācanakaśatāni pūrvaṃ nirākṛtya teṣāmāghātamakṣamapratyayaṃ janayitvā paścādanarthito 'pi tadekatyānāṃ saṃbhṛtadānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2526: na ca dānaṃ dattvā tena dānena manyate ahamasmi dātā dānapatiranye ca na tatheti /
T06bsa034_u:2528: na hi bodhisattvaḥ kīrtiśabdaghoṣaślokaṃ niśritya dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2531: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvameva dānāt sumanā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2534: vipulāni ca paramodārāṇi bodhisattvānāṃ dānāni śrutvā nātmānaṃ paribhavan saṃkocamāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:2536: vicintya vicintya bodhisattvo yatnena deyadharmebhyo yānyagrāṇi pravarāṇi bhojanapānayānavastrādīni tānyanuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2538: samacitto bodhisattvaḥ apakṣapatito mitrāmitrodāsīneṣu samakāruṇyo dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2540: kāruṇyacitto 'nukampācitto bodhisattvo dānaṃ dadanna parataḥ pratyupakāraṃ pratyāśaṃsate /
T06bsa034_u:2541: sukhakāmāṃ tṛṣṇādāhena dahyamānāmapratibalāṃ prakṛtiduḥkhitāṃ janatāṃ saṃpaśyan /
T06bsa034_u:2543: na bodhisattvo dānaṃ dattvā dānasyāyatyāṃ bhogasampadaṃ vā ātmabhāvasampadaṃ vā phalavipākaṃ pratyāśaṃsate /
T06bsa034_u:2546: evaṃ hi bodhisattva etannavākāraṃ dānaṃ niśritya dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayitvā 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
T06bsa034_u:2557: svabhāva śīlaṃ sarvaśīlaṃ duṣkaraśīlaṃ sarvatomukhaṃ śīlaṃ satpuruṣaśīlaṃ sarvākāraśīlaṃ vighātārthikaśīlaṃ ihāmutrasukhaṃ śīlaṃ viśuddhaśīlañca
T06bsa034_u:2561: parataḥ samyaksamādānataḥ suviśuddhāśayatayā vyatikrāntaiḥ pratyāpattyā 'vyatikramāya cādarajātasyopasthitasmṛtitayā /
T06bsa034_u:2562: tatra parataḥ śīlasamādānādbodhisattvasya paramupanidhāya śikṣāvyatikrame vyapatrāpyamutpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:2564: śikṣāpadānāṃ vyatikrama-pratyāpattyā ādarajātasya cādita evāvyatikramādbodhisattvo dvābhyāmākārābhyāṃ niṣkaukṛtyo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2568: tatra yacca parataḥ samādānaṃ yaśca viśuddho 'dhyāśayaḥ itīmau dvau dhamauṃ yā ca vyatikramapratyāpattiryaścādaraḥ avyatikrame 'nayordvayordharmayorāvāhakau
T06bsa034_u:2569: tatra yacca parataḥ samādānaṃ yaśca suviśuddho 'dhyāśayaḥ yaścāvyatikramāyādarajāta ityebhistribhirdharmairavipattirbodhisattvaśīlasya veditavyā
T06bsa034_u:2572: kalyāṇaṃ veditavyamātmahitāya parahitāya bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai cārthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ samādānato 'nuśikṣaṇataśca
T06bsa034_u:2577: samāsato bodhisattvasya gṛhipakṣagataṃ pravrajitapakṣagatañca śīlaṃ sarvaśīlamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:2584: mahābodhāya kuśalamācinoti kāyena vācā manasā sarvaṃ tatsamāsataḥ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:2586: iha bodhisattvaḥ śīlaṃ niśritya śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya śrute yogaṃ karoti cintāyāṃ śamathavipaśyanābhāvanāyāmekārāmatāyām /
T06bsa034_u:2587: tathā gurūṇāmabhivādana-vandana pratyutthānāñjalikarmaṇaḥ kālena kālaṃ kartā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2588: tathā kālena kālaṃ teṣāmeva gurūṇāṃ gauraveṇopasthānasya kartā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2589: glānānāṃ satkṛtya kāruṇyena glānopasthānasya kartā bhavati tathā subhāṣite sādhukārasya dātā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2591: tathā sarvasattvānāṃ daśasu dikṣu sarvapuṇyasyāśayena prasannacittamutpādya vācaṃ bhāṣāmāṇo 'numoditā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2592: tathā sarvaṃ vyatikramaṃ pratisaṃkhyāya pareṣāṃ kṣamitā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2593: tathā sarvaṃ kāyena vācā manasā kṛtaṃ kuśalamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2594: kālena ca kālaṃ vicitrāṇāṃ samyak praṇidhānānāṃ triratnapūjāyāśca sarvākārāyā udārāyāḥ kartā (Dutt 97) bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2598: indriyaiśca guptadvāro bhojane mātrajñaḥ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikānuyuktaḥ satpuruṣasevī kalyāṇamitrasanniśritaḥ ātmaskhalitānāñca parijñātā bhavati doṣadarśī /
T06bsa034_u:2599: parijñāya ca doṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā pratisaṃhartā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2601: evaṃbhāgīyānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmarjanarakṣaṇavivardhanāya yacchīlaṃ [tad] bodhisattvasya kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:2617: snigdhena hitādhyāśayānugatenāntargatamānasena nigrahakriyā avasādanā vā daṇḍakarmānupradānaṃ va pravāsanā vā yāvadevākuśalāsthānāt vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne sanniyojanārtham /
T06bsa034_u:2618: ṛddhibalena ca narakādigatipratyakṣaṃ sandarśanatayā 'kuśalādudvejanā buddhaśāsanāvatārāya cāvarjanā toṣaṇā vismāpanā /
T06bsa034_u:2619: kathañca bodhisattvaḥ saṃvaraśīle sthitaḥ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhake śīle sthitaḥ sattvārthakriyāśīle ca sthitaḥ susaṃvṛtaśīlī ca bhavati susaṃgṛhītakuśalaśīlī ca (Dutt 98)
T06bsa034_u:2621: iha bodhisattvaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaravyavasthitaḥ sa ceccakravartirājyamapyutsṛjya pravrajito bhavati sa tasmiṃścakravartirājye evaṃ nirapekṣo bhavati tadyathā tṛṇe vā 'medhye vā /
T06bsa034_u:2622: nihīnapuruṣasya jīvikābhiprāyasya pravrajitasya pratyavarān kāmānapahāya na tathā
T06bsa034_u:2623: teṣu pratyavareṣu kāmeṣu nirapekṣatā bhavati yathā bodhisattvasyāśayaviśuddhatāmupādāya
T06bsa034_u:2625: anāgateṣvapi mārabhavanaparyāpanneṣvapi kāmeṣu bodhisattvo nābhinandī bhavati nāpi
T06bsa034_u:2626: ca teṣāmarthāya praṇidhāya brahmacaryaṃ carati mahāvicitrapratibhayagahanapraveśamiva
T06bsa034_u:2627: tān kāmān yathābhūtaṃ saṃpaśyan prāgeva tadanyeṣu divyeṣu /
T06bsa034_u:2628: vartamāne 'pyadhvani pravrajito bodhisattva udārebhyaḥ sattvebhya udāramapi lābhasatkāraṃ
T06bsa034_u:2629: vāntāśanamiva samyak prajñayā paśyan nāsvādayati prāgeva pratyavarebhyaḥ [sattvebhyaḥ] pratyavaram /
T06bsa034_u:2630: pravivekābhirataśca bhavati ekākī saṃvamadhye vā sarvakālaṃ cittavyapakṛṣṭavihārī /
T06bsa034_u:2632: api tu śīlaṃ niśritya śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya ye te 'prameyā bodhisattvasamādhayasteṣāmabhinirhārāya vaśitāprāptaye vyāyacchate /
T06bsa034_u:2633: saḥ saṃsargato 'pyaṇukām apyasatsaṃkathā masadvācaṃ nādhivāsayati pravivekagataścāṇukamapyasadvitarkam /
T06bsa034_u:2634: pramuṣitayā ca smṛtyā tatsamudācārahetoḥ kālena kālaṃ tīvraṃ vipratisāramādīnavadarśanamutpādayati /
T06bsa034_u:2638: pratisaṃharaṇābhyāsataśca krameṇa tadyathā pūrvaṃ tatsamudācāra-ratirabhūt tathā etaharyasamudācāra-ratiḥ santiṣṭhate samudācāraprātikūlyañca
T06bsa034_u:2639: sarvabodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni cāsya mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ śrutvā udārāṇyaprameyāṇyacintyāni
T06bsa034_u:2640: dīrghakālikāni paramaduśkarāṇi na bhavati cetasa uttāso vā layaḥ saṃkoco vā nānyatrāsyaivaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2642: vayamapi manuṣyabhūtāḥ krameṇa ca śikṣamāṇāḥ asaṃśayamanuprāpsyāmastāṃ kāyavāksaṃvarasampattimiti /
T06bsa034_u:2643: ātmadoṣāntaraskhalitagaveṣī ca bodhisattvo bhavati śīlasaṃvare vyavasthito na paradoṣāntaraskhalitagaveṣī /
T06bsa034_u:2646: dharmamahākaruṇatāmupādāyādhimātrameva teṣāmantike bodhisattvānāmanukampācittañca kartukāmatācittañca pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2647: saṃvaraśīlavyasthitaśca bodhisattvaḥ pāṇiloṣṭadaṇḍaśastrasaṃsparśairapi pareṣāmantike cittamapi na pradūṣayati /
T06bsa034_u:2648: kutaḥ punaḥ pāpikāṃ vācaṃ niścārayiṣyati pratihaniṣyati vā prāgeva punaḥ ākrośaroṣaṇaparibhāṣaṇaistanukaduḥkhasparśajairapakāraiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2650: bhavati pūrvāntasahagatenāparāntasahagatena madhyāntasahagatena pūrvakālakaraṇīyena sahānucareṇa ca /
T06bsa034_u:2651: bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaḥ atītamadhvānamupādāya yāmāpattimāpannaḥ sā 'nena yathādharmaṃ pratikṛtā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2658: kaccidahaṃ tathā tathā careyaṃ yathā yathā caran yathā yathā viharan āpattiṃ nāpadyeyam /
T06bsa034_u:2660: sa pūrvakālakaraṇīyamevāpramādaṃ niśritya tathā tathā carati tathā tathā viharati yathā yathāsya carato viharato vā āpattirnottiṣṭhate /
T06bsa034_u:2662: saṃvaraśīla-vyavasthito bodhisattvaḥ praticchannakalyāṇo bhavati vivṛtapāpaḥ alpecchaḥ
T06bsa034_u:2665: ebhirdaśabhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ saṃvaraśīlavyavasthitaḥ susaṃvṛtaśīlī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2669: punarbodhisattvaḥ kuśala[dharma]saṃgrāhakaśīle vyavasthitaḥ uttpannāṃ kāyabhogāpekṣāṃ svalpāmapi nādhivāsayati prāgeva prabhūtām /
T06bsa034_u:2677: kuśalahetuṃ kuśalahetuphale viparyāsamaviparyāsañca kuśalasaṃgrahāya cāntarāyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:2679: kuśalasaṃgrahāya viparyāsañcāviparyāsañca yathābhūtaṃ prajānan bodhisattvaḥ prāpya kuśalaphalaṃ nānitye nityadarśī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2685: bhavati sarvākāra[saṃgraha]śca yaduta dānopaniṣadāśīlopaniṣadā kṣāntyupaniṣadā vīryopaniṣadā
T06bsa034_u:2689: iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ teṣu teṣu kṛtyeṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchan kṛtyacintāyāṃ kṛtyasamarthane
T06bsa034_u:2690: sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati adhvagamanāgamane samyakkarmāntaprayoge bhogānāmārakṣaṇe vibhinnānyo
T06bsa034_u:2692: punarbodhisattvaḥ sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchan vyādhitān sattvān paricarati /
T06bsa034_u:2695: vyaṅgān śirasā vā yānena vā vahati /
T06bsa034_u:2700: kulodaya pratisaṃyuktaśca vitarko veditavyaḥ pariparibhavaparājayaduḥkhena duḥkhitānāṃ
T06bsa034_u:2704: punarbodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ nyāyaṃ vyapadiśan duścaritacāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ duścaritaprahāṇāya
T06bsa034_u:2707: upāyakauśalyaṃ vā punarvyapadiśati yathā duścaritacāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ duścaritaprahāṇāya
T06bsa034_u:2708: evaṃ matsāriṇāṃ [sattvānāṃ] mātsaryaprahāṇāya dṛṣṭe vā dharme samyagalpakṛcchreṇa
T06bsa034_u:2709: bhogānāmarjanāya rakṣaṇāya ca śāsane 'smin pratihatānāṃ śraddhāpratilambhāya darśanapratilambhāya /
T06bsa034_u:2711: punarbodhisattva upakāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtajñatāṃ prāviṣkurvan dṛṣṭvā satkṛtyālapati
T06bsa034_u:2714: tulyādhikena cāsya pratilābhasatkāreṇa pratyupasthito bhavati na nyūnena /
T06bsa034_u:2715: sa kṛtyeṣvasyāyācito 'pi sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati prāgeva yācitaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2716: yathā kṛtyeṣu evaṃ duḥkheṣu nayopadeśe bhayaparitrāṇe vyasanasthaśokaprativinodane
T06bsa034_u:2717: upakaraṇopasaṃhāre sanniśrayadāne cittānuvartane bhūtairguṇaiḥ saṃpraharṣaṇe snigdhena
T06bsa034_u:2721: kṣudramṛgabhayādapi sattvān rakṣati āvartagrāhabhayādapi rājabhayādapi corabhayādapi
T06bsa034_u:2724: punarbodhisattvo vyasanasthānāṃ sattvānāṃ śokaprativinodanaṃ jñātivyasanamārabhya mātāpitṛmaraṇe 'pi śokaṃ [prati]vinodayati /
T06bsa034_u:2726: bhoga vyasanaṃ vā punarārabhya sa cedbhogā rājñā vā pareṣāmapahṛtā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:2729: agninā vā dagdhā udakena vā apahṛtāḥ kunihitā vā nidhayaḥ pranaṣṭā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:2734: yena te bhogā anayena vyasanamāpāditā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:2735: tannidānamapi śokamutpannaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātraṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvaḥ samyak prativinodayati /
T06bsa034_u:2736: punarupakaraṇārthinām upakaraṇopasaṃhāraṃ kurvan bodhisattvo bhojanaṃ bhojanārthibhyo dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:2745: punaḥ parigrahaśīlena bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ gaṇaparikarṣaṇayogena parigrahaṃ kurvan pūrvantāvat niśrayaṃ dadāti nirāmiṣeṇa cittenānukampācittenānukampācittameva [saṃ]puraṣkṛtya /
T06bsa034_u:2747: dhārmikaiśca dharmalabdhaiḥ svaiścīvarapiṇḍapātaśayānāsanaglāna pratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sādhāraṇaparibhogī ca bhavatyapratiguptabhojī /
T06bsa034_u:2751: punarbodhisattvaścittānuvartanaśīlena sattvānāṃ cittamanuvartamānaḥ ādita evaṃ sattvānāṃ bhāvaṃ ca jānāti prakṛtiñca /
T06bsa034_u:2752: bhāvañca jñātvā prakṛtiñca yathā yaiḥ sattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvastavyaṃ bhavati tathā [taiḥ] saṃvasati /
T06bsa034_u:2753: yathā yeṣu sattveṣu pratipattavyaṃ bhavati tathā teṣu pratipadyate /
T06bsa034_u:2754: yasya ca sattvasya bodhisattvaścittamanuvartitukāmo bhavati tasya ca cetpaśyatyevaṃrūpeṇāsya vastusamudācāreṇa kāyikavācikena duḥkhadaurmasyamutpatsyete
T06bsa034_u:2755: taccaduḥkhadaurmanasyamasya nākuśalāt sthānād vyutthānāya kuśale ca sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya saṃvartiṣyate /
T06bsa034_u:2756: pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvastaṃ kāyikavācikaṃ vastasamudācāraṃ yatnataḥ pariharati na samudācarati /
T06bsa034_u:2759: pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvaḥ paracittaṃ yaduta parānukampāmevopādāya yena ca pareṣāṃ
T06bsa034_u:2761: tadanyeṣāmakuśalāt sthānād vyutthānāya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhā[pa]nāya [na] saṃvartate
T06bsa034_u:2763: sa cetpunaḥ paśyati pareṣāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ vā tadubhayorvā akuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya pratisaṃkhyāya samudācarati bodhisattvastaṃ kāyavāksamudācāram /
T06bsa034_u:2765: yena ca bodhisattva ātmano vastusamudācāreṇa kāyikavācikena pareṣāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyamutpadyamānaṃ
T06bsa034_u:2766: samanupaśyati sa ca kāyavāksamudācāro na śikṣāpadaparigṛhīto bhavati na puṇyajñānasambhārānugataḥ
T06bsa034_u:2767: tacca duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pareṣāṃ nākuśalāt sthānāditi pūrvavadveditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2770: yathā duḥkhadaurmanasyamevaṃ sukhasaumanasyaṃ yathāyogaṃ vistareṇa veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2771: na ca paracittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ parasya krodhaparyavasthānena paryavasthitasya sammukhamavigate krodhaparyavasthāne varṇamapi bhāṣate prāgevāvarṇam
T06bsa034_u:2773: punaḥ paracittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ paramanālapantamapyālapati [prati]sammodayati prāgevālapantaṃ pratisammodayantam /
T06bsa034_u:2774: [na ca] paracittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ kṣubhyati nānyatrāvasādayitukāmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2776: na ca paricittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ paramavahasati nāvaspaṇḍayati na maḍkubhāvamasyopasaṃharati nāpyasparśavihārāya kaukṛtyamupasaṃharati /
T06bsa034_u:2779: na ca paracittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāmasevī bhavati nāpyatisevī nāpyakālasevī nāpi teṣāṃ purastātpriyavigarhako bhavati nāpyapriyapraśaṃsakaḥ
T06bsa034_u:2788: punarbodhisattvaḥ nigrahaśīlena sattvānnigṛhṇan mṛdvaparādhaṃ mṛduvyatikramaṃ snigdhenāntarbhāvenāvipannena mṛdvyā 'vasādanikayā avasādayati
T06bsa034_u:2797: punarbodhisattvaḥ ṛddhibalena sattvānuttrāsāyitukāmaḥ āvarjayitukāmo vā duścaritacāriṇāṃ
T06bsa034_u:2799: paśyantu bhavanto duścaritasya [kṛtopacitasya] manuṣyabhūtairidamīdṛśaṃ raudraṃ paramakaṭukamaniṣṭaṃ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhūyamānamiti /
T06bsa034_u:2800: te ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā uttrasyanti saṃvegamāpadyante duścaritātprativiramanti /
T06bsa034_u:2801: tadekatyāṃśca sattvān bodhisattvasya mahatyāṃ pariṣadi sannisannasya praśnasaṃpādenānādeyaṃ
T06bsa034_u:2802: vacanaṃ kartukāmān bodhisattvo vajrapāṇiṃ vā 'nyatamaṃ vā udāravarṇamahākāyaṃ [mahābalaṃ]
T06bsa034_u:2805: tasya ca mahājanakāyasya tena praśnavyākaraṇena vinayanārtham /
T06bsa034_u:2806: vicitreṇa vā punaḥ ṛdvyabhisaṃskāreṇa tadyathā eko bhūtvā bahudhā bhavan bahudhā bhūtvā eko bhavan tiraḥ kuḍayaṃ tiraḥ
T06bsa034_u:2807: śailaṃ tiraḥ prākāramasajjamānena kāyena gacchanvistareṇa yāvadbrahmalokaṃ kāyena
T06bsa034_u:2808: vaśe vartayan yamakānyapi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayastejodhātumapi samāpadyamānaḥ śrāvakāsādhāraṇaṃ
T06bsa034_u:2811: duḥśīlaṃ śīlasaṃpadi alpaśrutaṃ śrutasaṃpadi matsariṇaṃ tyāgasaṃpadi duṣprajñaṃ prajñāsaṃpadi niveśayati /
T06bsa034_u:2812: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvākāreṇa sattvārthakriyāśīlena samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2813: ta ete bhavanti trayo bodhisattvasya śīlaskandhāḥ aprameyāḥ puṇyaskandhāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2815: tatra bodhisattvenāsmin trividhe 'pi śīlaskandhe bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena
T06bsa034_u:2816: gṛhiṇā vā pravrajitena vā 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānena sahadhārmikasya
T06bsa034_u:2818: ityevaṃrūpasya bodhisattvasya pūrvaṃ pādayornipatyādhyeṣaṇāṃ kṛtvā yathā tavāhaṃ
T06bsa034_u:2822: daśamu dikṣu mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāñca mahājñānaprabhāvaprāptānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ
T06bsa034_u:2823: kṛtvā guṇāṃśca teṣāṃmāmukhīkṛtya ghanarasaṃ prasādaṃ cetasaḥ sañjanayya parīttaṃ
T06bsa034_u:2825: sa vijño bodhisattvo nīcairjānu-maṇḍalanipatitena vā utkuṭu[ka]sthitena vā tathāgatapratimāṃ purataḥ sthāpayitvā saṃpūraskṛtyaivaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ
T06bsa034_u:2826: anuprayaccha me kulaputrāyuṣman bhadanteti vā bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam /
T06bsa034_u:2827: ityuktvā ekāgrāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya cittapraśādamevānupabṛṃhayatā na cirasyedānīṃ me
T06bsa034_u:2830: tena punarvijñena bodhisattvena sa tathā pratipanno bodhisattvaḥ avikṣiptena cetasā sthitena vā niṣaṇṇena vā āsane idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2831: śruṇu evaṃnāman kulaputra dharmabhrātariti vā bodhisattvo 'si bodhau ca kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2835: kulaputra mamāntikāt sarvāṇi bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni sarvañca bodhisattvaśīlaṃ saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaśīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlañca
T06bsa034_u:2838: yāni śikṣāpadāni yacchīlametarhi daśasu dikṣu pratyutpannānāṃ sarvabodhisattvānāṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2843: evaṃ dvirapi trirapi tena ca vijñena bodhisattvena vaktavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2844: tena ca mamādāyakena bodhisattvena yāvat trirapi pratijñātavyaṃ pṛṣṭena /
T06bsa034_u:2845: evaṃ hi tena vijñena bodhisattvena tasya pratigrāhakasya bodhisattvasya yāvat trirapi
T06bsa034_u:2846: bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādāna dattvā pratijñāñca pratigṛhyāvyutthita eva tasmin
T06bsa034_u:2847: pratigrāhake bodhisattve tasyā eva tathāgatapratimāyāḥ purato daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ
T06bsa034_u:2848: tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ pādayornipatya sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā evamārocayitavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2849: pratigṛhītamanena evanāmnā bodhisattvena mama evaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikādyāvat trirapi bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam /
T06bsa034_u:2855: daśasu dikṣvanantāparnyateṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatānāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāñca bodhisattvānāñca
T06bsa034_u:2862: yathā evaṃnānmā bodhisattvena amuṣmin lokadhātāvevaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikāt samyagbodhisattvaśīla saṃbarasamādānaṃ gṛhītamiti /
T06bsa034_u:2863: te cāsya sarve putrasyaiva bhrāturivakalyāṇairmanobhiḥ pratyanukampante /
T06bsa034_u:2865: bhūyasyā mātrayā vṛddhiḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ na hāniḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2868: daśasu dikṣu teṣāmanantāparyantalokadhātugatānāṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā
T06bsa034_u:2874: nopayanti sahasratamīmapi saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapyupamāmapyupaniṣadamapi nopayanti
T06bsa034_u:2877: bodhisattvasya pratirūpaṃ kartum idamapratirūpaṃ kartumiti tathaiva tata ūrdhvaṃ
T06bsa034_u:2879: bodhisattvasūtrapiṭakādvā yatnataḥ śrutvā 'smābodhisattvasūtrapiṭakamātṛkānibandhāt śrutvā tathaiva śikṣā karaṇīyā /
T06bsa034_u:2883: na lobhābhibhūtasya mahecchasyāsantuṣṭasya na śīlavipannasya śikṣāsvanādarakāriṇaḥ
T06bsa034_u:2884: śaithilikasya na krodhanasyopanāhinaḥ akṣāntibahulasya parato vyatikramāsahiṣṇoḥ
T06bsa034_u:2885: nālasasya kusīdasya yadbhūyasā rātrindivaṃ nidrāsukhaṃ pārśvasukhaṃ śayanasukhañca
T06bsa034_u:2888: na mandasya na momuhajātīyasyātyarthaṃ saṃlīnacittasya bodhisattvasūtrapiṭakaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakamātṛkāmapavadamānasya /
T06bsa034_u:2889: na ca punaretat saṃvarasamādānavidhānaṃ bodhisattvenodgṛhya paryavāpyāpi bodhisattvapiṭaka pratihatānāmaśrāddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ sahasaivārocayitavya pravedayitavyam /
T06bsa034_u:2893: yaścainamapavadate sa yāvadapramāṇena puṇyaskandhena samanvāgataḥ saṃvarasthāyī bodhisattvo
T06bsa034_u:2894: bhavati tāvadapramāṇenaiva so 'puṇyaskandhenānuṣakto bhavati yāvattāṃ pāpikāṃ vācaṃ
T06bsa034_u:2895: pāpikāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ pāpakān sakalpān sarveṇa sarva notsṛjati /
T06bsa034_u:2896: śīlasaṃvarasamādānañca kartukāmasya bodhisattvasya purato 'syāṃ bodhisattvasūtrapiṭakamātṛkāyāṃ yāni bodhisattvasya śikṣāpadānyāpattisthānāni cākhyātāni tānyanuśrāvayitavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:2898: na parasamādāpanikayā nāpi paraspardhayā [sa]dhīro bodhisattvo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2899: tena ca pratigṛhītavyaṃ tasya ca dātavyametena vidhinā etacchīlasaṃvarasamādānam /
T06bsa034_u:2900: evañca śīlasaṃvaravyavasthitasya bodhisattvasya catvāraḥ pārājayikasthānīyadharmā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:2906: yadapi bodhisattvastadrūpaṃ krodhaparyavasthānamanuvṛṃhayati yena tato na vākpāruṣyaniścāraṇamātrakeṇa nivartate /
T06bsa034_u:2907: krodhābhibhūtaḥ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā daṇḍena vā śastreṇa sattvāṃstāḍayati vihiṃsayati viheṭhayati /
T06bsa034_u:2908: krodhāśayameva ca tīvramantarākṛtvā pareṣāmantikādvyatikramasajñapti na pratigṛhaṇāti na kṣamate nāśayaṃ vimuñcati /
T06bsa034_u:2911: svayaṃ vā saddharmapratirūpakādhimuktasya pareṣāṃ cā 'nuvṛttyā bodhisattvasya pārājayikasthānīyo dharmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2913: yeṣāṃ bodhisattvo 'nyatamānyatamaṃ dharmamadhyāpadya prāgeva sarvānabhavyo bhavati dṛṣṭe dharme vipulasya bodhisattvasaṃbhārasyopacayāya parigrahāya
T06bsa034_u:2920: yataśca bodhisattvaḥ eṣāṃ caturṇāṃ pārājayikasthānīyānāṃ dharmāṇāmabhīkṣṇa-samudācārāt parīttamapi hrībyapatrāpyaṃ notpādayati /
T06bsa034_u:2925: na tu bodhisattvaḥ sakṛdeva pārājayikasthānīyadharmasamudācārāt bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ vijahāti /
T06bsa034_u:2927: parityaktasamādāno 'pi ca bodhisattvo dṛṣṭe dharme bhavyaḥ punarādānāya bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānasya
T06bsa034_u:2928: bhavati nābhavya eva tadyathā pārājayikādhyāpannaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvarastho bhikṣuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2929: samāsataśca dvābhyāmeva kāraṇābhyāṃ bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānasya tyāgo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2931: na ca parivṛttajanmāpi bodhisattvaḥ bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ vijahāti /
T06bsa034_u:2932: adha urdhvaṃ tiryaksarvatropapadyamāno yena bodhisattvena praṇidhānaṃ na tyaktaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2933: nāpi ca pārājayikasthānīyānāṃ dharmāṇāmadhimātraṃ paryavasthānaṃ samudācaritaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:2934: muṣitasmṛtistu parivṛttajanmā bodhisattvaḥ kalyāṇamitrasamparkamāgamya smṛtyudbodhanārthaṃ punaḥ punarādānaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:2938: evaṃ bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasthito bodhisattvaḥ pratidivasaṃ tathāgatasya vā tathāgatamuddiśya caitye dharmasya vā dharmamuddiśya pustakagate 'pi bodhisattvasūtrapiṭake (Dutt 110)
T06bsa034_u:2939: [bodhisattvasūtrapiṭaka]mātṛkāyāṃ vā saṃghasya vā yo 'sau daśasu dikṣu mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ
T06bsa034_u:2940: bodhisattvānāṃ saṃghaḥ kiñcidevālpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā pūjādhikārikamakṛtvā 'ntata
T06bsa034_u:2941: ekapraṇāmamapi kāyena antato guṇānārabhya buddhadharmasaṃghānāmekacatuṣpadāyā api
T06bsa034_u:2948: tathāhi śuddhāśayo bodhisattvaḥ tadyathā avetyaprasādalābhī bhikṣarnityakālameva dharmatayā śāstāraṃ paricarati paramayā ca pūjayā pūjayati dharmasaṃghañca /
T06bsa034_u:2949: bodhisattvo mahecchatāmasantuṣṭiṃ lābhasatkāragardhamutpannamadhivāsayati sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:2950: anāpattistatprahāṇāya cchandajātasya vīryamārabhata statpratipakṣaparigraheṇa tatpratibandhāvasthitasya prakṛtyā tīvrakleśatayābhibhūya punaḥ punaḥ samudācārāṇāt /
T06bsa034_u:2951: bodhisattvo vṛddhatarakaṃ guṇavantaṃ satkārārhaṃ sahadhārmikaṃ dṛṣṭvā mānābhinigrahītaḥ āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto vā utthāyāsanaṃ nānuprayacchati
T06bsa034_u:2952: paraiścālapyamānaḥ pratisammodyamānaḥ paripṛṣṭaśca na yuktarūpeṇa vāk pratyudāhāreṇa
T06bsa034_u:2953: pratyupatiṣṭhate mānābhinigṛhīta eva āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto vā sāpattiko bhavati
T06bsa034_u:2955: no cenmānābhinigṛhīto nāghātacittaḥ pratighacitto vā api tvālasyakausīdyādavyākṛtacitto vā smṛtisaṃpramoṣād [vā] sāpattika eva bhavati sātisāro no tu kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:2957: anāpattiḥ [suptaḥ] syādayañca prativibuddhasaṃjñī upaśliṣyed ālapet saṃlapet pratisammodayet paripṛcchet /
T06bsa034_u:2958: anāpattiḥ pareṣāṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ prayuktasya sāṃkathyaviniścaye vā /
T06bsa034_u:2960: anāpattiḥ pareṣāṃ dharmaṃ deśayatāmavahitaśrotrasya śṛṇvataḥ sāṃkathyaṃviniścayaṃ vā /
T06bsa034_u:2962: (Dutt 111) anāpattistenopāyena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ damayato vinayataḥ akuśalātsthānādvyutthāpya kuśale sthānepratiṣṭhāpayataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2964: bodhisattvaḥ parairupanimantryamāṇo gṛhe vā vihārāntare vā gṛhāntare vā bhojanapānavastrādibhiḥ pariṣkāraiḥ mānābhinigṛhītaḥ āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto vā na gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2970: anāpattistenopāyenāsya damayitukāmaḥ syāt vinetukāmo 'kuśalātsthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2978: prabhūtāni pravarāṇi labhamāno 'nudadhyamānaḥ āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto na pratigṛhṇāti pratikṣipati /
T06bsa034_u:2981: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāro no tu kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:2988: anāpattiḥ parāhṛtamanena saṃbhāvayataḥ yato nidānamasyotpadyeta vadho vā bandho vā daṇḍo vā jyā-nirgarhaṇā vā /
T06bsa034_u:2990: bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ dharmārthināmāghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ īrṣyāviprakṛto vā dharmaṃ nānuprayacchati /
T06bsa034_u:2992: ālasyakausīdyānna dadāti sāpattiko bhavati sātisāro na kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:2995: anāpattistenopāyena damayitukāmaḥ syādvinetukāmaḥ akuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:2998: anāpattirmṛdvindriyasyodārayā dharmadeśanayā dharmaparyāptyā uttrāsaṃ mithyādarśanaṃ mithyābhiniveśaṃ kṣatiñcopahatiñca saṃbhāvayet /
T06bsa034_u:2999: anāpattistaddhastagatasya parebhyaḥ abhājanabhūtebhyo visāraṃ dharmasya saṃbhāvayet /
T06bsa034_u:3000: bodhisattvo raudreṣu duḥśīleṣu ca sattveṣvāghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ upekṣate viceṣṭate vā raudratāṃ duḥśīlatāmeva ca pratyayaṃ kṛtvā /
T06bsa034_u:3003: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāro no tu kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:3005: na hi bodhisattvasya śīlavataḥ śānteḥ kāyavāṅmanaskarmapracāre tathānukampācittañca
T06bsa034_u:3006: kartukāmatā ca pratyupasthitā bhavati yathā raudreṣu duḥśīleṣu sattveṣu duḥkhahetau vartamāneṣu /
T06bsa034_u:3011: bodhisattvo yadbhagavatā prātimokṣe vinaye pratikṣepaṇa-sāvadyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ paracittānurakṣāmupādāyāprasannānāṃ sattvānāṃ prasādāya prasannānāñca bhūyobhāvāya /
T06bsa034_u:3012: tatra tulyāṃ śrāvakaiḥ śikṣāṃ karoti nirnirākaraṇam /
T06bsa034_u:3015: te tāvanna paraniranurakṣā aprasannānāṃ prasādāya prasannānāñca bhūyobhāvāya śikṣāsu śikṣante /
T06bsa034_u:3018: yatpunaḥ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyamalpārthatāmalpakṛtyatāmalpotsukavihāratāmārabhya śrāvakāṇāṃ bhagavatā vyavasthāpitāṃ tatra bodhisattvo na tulyāṃ śikṣāṃ śrāvakaiḥ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:3020: śobhate śrāvakaḥ svārthaparamaḥ parārthanirapekṣaḥ parārthamārabhyālpārthaḥ alpakṛtyaścālpotsukavihārī ca /
T06bsa034_u:3021: na tu bodhisattvaḥ parārthaparamaḥ śobhate parārthamārabhyālpārtho 'lpakṛtyaścālpotsukavihārī
T06bsa034_u:3022: ca tathāhi bodhisattvena pareṣāmarthe cīvaraśatāni sahastrāṇyajñātikānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāmantikātparyeṣitavyāni pravāritena /
T06bsa034_u:3023: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ balābalaṃ saṃlakṣya yāvadartha pratigṛhītavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:3029: bodhisattvo bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasthaḥ sattvārthamārabhya āghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ alpārtho bhavati alpakṛtyaḥ alpotsukavihārī /
T06bsa034_u:3033: asti kiñcitprakṛtisāvadyamapi [yad] bodhisattvastadrūpeṇopāyakauśalyena samudācarati yenānāpattikaśca bhavati bahu ca puṇyaṃ prasūyate /
T06bsa034_u:3034: yathāpi tadbodhisattvaścauraṃ taskaraṃ prabhūtānāṃ prāṇiśatānāṃ mahātmanāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ
T06bsa034_u:3037: yadyapyahamenaṃ prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopya narakeṣūpapadyeyaṃ kāmaṃ bhavatu me narakopapattiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3038: eṣa ca sattva ānantaryakarma kṛtvā mā bhūnnarakaparāyaṇa iti /
T06bsa034_u:3039: evamāśayo bodhisattvastaṃ prāṇinaṃ kuśalacitto 'vyākṛtacitto vā viditvā ṛtīyamānaḥ (Dutt 114)
T06bsa034_u:3041: anāpattiko bhavati bahu ca puṇyaṃ prasūyate /
T06bsa034_u:3042: yathāpi tad bodhisattvo ye sattvā rājāno vā bhavanti rājamahāmātrā vā adhimātraraudrāḥ sattveṣu nirdayā ekāntaparapīḍāpravṛttāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3043: tāṃ satyāṃ śaktau tasmādrājyaiśvaryādhipatyāccyāvayati yatra sthitāste tannidānaṃ bahvapuṇyaṃ prasavanti anukampācitto hitasukhāśayaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3044: ye ca paradravyāpahāriṇaścaurāstaskarāḥ sāṃdhikaṃ staupikañca prabhūtaṃ dravyaṃ hṛtvā svīkṛtyopabhoktukāmāsteṣāmantikāttad dravyaṃ bodhisattva ācchinatti /
T06bsa034_u:3045: mā haiva teṣāṃ sa dravyaparibhogo dīrgharātramanarthāyāhitāya bhaviṣyati iti /
T06bsa034_u:3046: evameva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā ācchidya sādhikaṃ saṃdhe niryātayati staipikaṃ stūpe /
T06bsa034_u:3047: ye ca vaiyāvṛtyakarā vā ārāmikā vā sāṃdhikaṃ staupikañca prabhūtaṃ dravyaṃ vipratipādayantyanayena /
T06bsa034_u:3049: tān bodhisattvaḥ pratisaṃkhyāya mā haiva tatkarma /
T06bsa034_u:3054: yathāpi tadgṛhī bodhisattvaḥ abrahmacaryeṣaṇārtaṃ tatpratibaddhacittamaparaparigṛhītaṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ maithunena dharmeṇa niṣevate /
T06bsa034_u:3056: yathepsitakuśalamūlasanniyoge ca vaśyā bhaviṣyatyakuśala[mūla]parityāge cetyanukampācittamevopasthāpya abrahmacaryaṃ maithunaṃ [dharmaṃ] pratiṣevamāno 'pyanāpattiko bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3058: pravrajitasya punarbodhisattvasya śrāvakaśāsanabhedamanurakṣamāṇasya sarvathā na kalpate 'brahmacaryaniṣevaṇam /
T06bsa034_u:3059: yathāpi tad bodhisattvo bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ jīvita-vipramokṣārthaṃ bandhanavipramokṣārthaṃ hastapādanāsākarṇaccheda-cakṣurvikalībhāva-paritrāṇārthaṃ yāṃ bodhisattva (Dutt 115)
T06bsa034_u:3062: iti samāsato yena yena bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāmarthameva paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:3065: kevala-sattvahitakāmatānidānaṃ ca vinidhāya saṃjñāṃ samprajānan anyathā-vācaṃ bhāṣate /
T06bsa034_u:3068: yathāpi tad bodhisattvo ye sattvā akalyāṇamitra parigṛhītā bhavanti teṣāṃ tebhyaḥ akalyāṇamitrebhyo yathāśakti yathābalaṃ byagrakaraṇīṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate /
T06bsa034_u:3070: anukampācittamevopādāya mā bhūdeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pāpamitrasaṃsargo dīrgharātramanarthāyāhitāyeti /
T06bsa034_u:3071: anena paryāyeṇa mitrabhedamapi kurvan bodhisattvo 'nāpattiko bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3073: yathāpi tad bodhisattvaḥ utpathacāriṇo 'nyāyacāriṇaḥ sattvān paruṣayā vācā tīkṣṇayāvasādayati yāvadeva tenopāyenākuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanārtham /
T06bsa034_u:3077: ca sattvānāṃ nṛttagītavāditena vicitrābhiśca sambhinnapralāpa-pratisaṃyuktābhiḥ saṃkathābhiranukampāśayena
T06bsa034_u:3078: toṣayitvāvarjya vaśyatāṃ vidheyatāṃ copanīyākuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kṛśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpayati /
T06bsa034_u:3081: bodhisattvaḥ utpannāṃ kuhanāṃ lapanāṃ naimittikatāṃ naiṣpeṣikatāṃ lābhena lābhaṃ niścikīrṣutāṃ mithyājīvakarāṃ dharmānadhivāsayati /
T06bsa034_u:3085: anāpattistatprativinodanāya cchandajātasya yatnamārabhamāṇasya kleśapracuratayā cittamabhibhūya samudācaraṇāt /
T06bsa034_u:3086: bodhisattvaḥ auddhatyābhinigṛhītena cetasā 'vyupaśāntaḥ avyayupaśamārāmaḥ uccaiḥ saṃñcagdhati saṃkrīḍate saṃkilikilāyate auddhatyaṃ dravaṃ prāviṣkaroti (Dutt 116)
T06bsa034_u:3088: evameva ca pratyayaṃ kṛtvā sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate smṛtisaṃpramoṣādakliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:3092: anāpattiḥ pareṣāṃ tatprakṛtikānāṃtadārāmāṇāṃ saṃgrahāya vā praṇayānusaṃrakṣaṇāya vā tadanuvartanārtham /
T06bsa034_u:3094: [yaḥ] punarbodhisattva evaṃdṛṣṭiḥ syādevaṃvādī na bodhisattvena nirvāṇārāmeṇa vihartavyam /
T06bsa034_u:3096: na ca kleśopakleśebhyo bhetavyam na caikāntena tebhyaścittaṃ vivecayitavyam /
T06bsa034_u:3097: tathā hi bodhisattvena trīṇi kalpāsaṃkhyeyāni saṃsāre saṃsaratā bodhiḥ samudānetavyeti /
T06bsa034_u:3100: yathā khalu śrāvakeṇa nirvāṇābhiratirāsevitavyā kleśopakleśebhyaśca cittamudvejayitavyaṃ
T06bsa034_u:3103: tathā hi śrāvako 'syātmano 'rthāya prayukto bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya prayuktaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3104: tena tathā cittāsaṃkleśābhyāsaḥ samudānetavyo yathāyamanarhannapi tatprativiśiṣṭenāsaṃkleśena samanvāgataḥ sāstrave vastuni anuvicaret /
T06bsa034_u:3105: bodhisattvo 'nādeyavacanakaramapaśabdamātmanaḥ ayaśo 'kīrti na rakṣati na pariharati bhūtavastukām /
T06bsa034_u:3113: bodhisattvo yena kaṭukaprayogeṇa tīkṣṇaprayogeṇa sattvānāmarthaṃ paśyati taṃ prayogaṃ daurmanasyārakṣayā na samudācarati /
T06bsa034_u:3116: anāpattiryat parīttamarthaṃ dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ paśyet prabhūtaśca tannidānaṃ daurmanasyam /
T06bsa034_u:3122: bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ vyatikramaṃ kṛtvā vyatikrameṇa vā sambhāvitaḥ āghātacitto mānābhinigṛhītaḥ saṃjñaptimanurūpāṃ nānuprayacchatyupekṣate /
T06bsa034_u:3126: anāpattistenopāyena damayitukāmaḥ syādvinetukāmaḥ akuśalāt sthānādvyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3129: anāpattiḥ sa cet prakṛtyā kalahakārakaḥ syādādhikaraṇikaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3131: anāpattiḥ paraṃ kṣamaṇaśīlamanā-ghātaśīlaṃ ca saṃbhāvayet parato vyatikramamārabhya saṃjñaptilābhenātyarthaṃ ritīyamānam /
T06bsa034_u:3132: bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ kasmiṃścidadhikaraṇe nisṛtānāṃ dharmeṇa samena saṃjñaptimanuprayacchatāmāghātacittaḥ paraviheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ saṃjñaptiṃ na pratigṛhṇāti /
T06bsa034_u:3134: no cedāghātacitaḥ api tvakṣamaṇaśīlatayā na pratigṛhṇāti /
T06bsa034_u:3136: anāpattistenopāyena paraṃ damayitukāmaḥ syāt pūrvavat sarvaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:3142: bodhisattva upasthānaparicaryāparigardhamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā sāmiṣeṇa cittena gaṇaṃ parikarṣati /
T06bsa034_u:3145: bodhisattva utpannamālasyakausīdyaṃ nidrāsukhaṃ śayanasukhaṃ pārśvasukhañcākāle amātrayā svīkaroti /
T06bsa034_u:3156: anāpattiḥ kautukajātasya paripraśnamātre pṛṣṭasya ca pratyudāhāramātre /
T06bsa034_u:3157: bodhisattvaścittasthitimārabhyaṃ citaṃ samādhātukāma āghātacitto mānabhinigṛhīto nopasaṃkramyāvavādaṃ yācate /
T06bsa034_u:3166: anāpattistatprahāṇāya cchandajātasya vyāyacchata stīvrakleśatayā cittamabhibhūya samudācaraṇāt /
T06bsa034_u:3167: yathā kāmacchanda evaṃ vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhamauddhatyaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ca veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:3173: yaḥ punarbodhisattvaḥ evaṃdṛṣṭi syādevaṃvādī na bodhisattvena śrāvakayānapratisaṃyukto dharmaḥ śrotavyo nodgrahītavyo na tatra śikṣā karaṇīyā
T06bsa034_u:3177: tathā hi bodhisattvena tīrthikaśāstreṣvapi tāvadyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ prāgeva buddhavacane /
T06bsa034_u:3179: bodhisattvo bodhisattvapiṭake sati bodhisattvapiṭake akṛtayogyaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakamadhyupekṣya śrāvakapiṭake yogyāṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:3181: bodhisattvo buddhavacane sati buddhavacane akṛtayogyastīrthikaśāstreṣu bahiḥśāstreṣu yogyāṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:3185: buddhyā samanvāgatasya taddviguṇena pratyahaṃ buddhavacane yogyāṃ kurvataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3186: evamapi ca bodhisattvo vidhimanatikramya tīrthikaśāstreṣu bahiḥśāstreṣu kauśalaṃ kurvannabhiratarūpastatra karauti tena ca ramate na tu kaṭubhaiṣajyamiva niṣevamāṇaḥkaroti /
T06bsa034_u:3188: bodhisattvo bodhisattvapiṭake gambhīrāṇi sthānāni śrutvā paramagaṃbhīrāṇi tattvārthaṃ vārabhya buddhabodhisattvaprabhāvaṃ vā 'nadhimucyamāno 'pavadate /
T06bsa034_u:3189: naite arthopasaṃhitā na dharmopasaṃhitā na tathāgatabhāṣitā na hitasukhāya sattvānāmiti /
T06bsa034_u:3192: bhavati khalu bodhisattvasya gambhīrāṇi paramagaṃbhīrāṇi sthānāni śrutvā cetaso 'nadhimokṣaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3199: bodhisattvaḥ sāmiṣacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ pareṣāmantike ātmānamutkarṣayati parān paṃsayati /
T06bsa034_u:3202: anāpattistenopāyena tameva pudgalaṃ damayitukāmasya vistareṇa pūrvavat /
T06bsa034_u:3204: bodhisattvo dharmaśravaṇa-dharmasāṃkathyaviniścayaṃ vā mānābhinigṛhītaḥ āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto nopasaṃkrāmati /
T06bsa034_u:3210: anāpattirdhārmakathikacitattānurakṣiṇaḥ anāpattiḥ punaḥ punaḥ [anu]śrutāmavadhṛtāṃ vijñātārthāṃ kathāṃ saṃjānataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3213: anāpattiradhimātradhandhaprajñasya dhandhaṃ dharmamudgṛhṇataḥ dhandhaṃ dhārayataḥ dhandhamālambane cittaṃ samādadhataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3214: bodhisattvo dharmabhāṇakaṃ pudgalaṃ saṃcintyāvamānayatyasatkarotyavahasatyavaspaṇṅyati vyañjanapratisaraṇaśca bhavati nārthapratisaraṇaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3216: saṃvarastho bodhisattvaḥ sattvakutyeṣvāghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ sahāyībhāvaṃ na
T06bsa034_u:3217: gacchati yacca tatkutyasamarthe vā adhvagamanāgamane vā samyakkarmānta prayoge vā
T06bsa034_u:3218: bhogarakṣaṇe vā bhinnapratisandhāne vā utsave vā puṇyakriyāyāṃ vā /
T06bsa034_u:3224: anāpattiḥ svayaṃ kartumasamarthaḥ syāt sapratisaraṇaśca yācakaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3229: anāpattiḥ kuśalapakṣe nairantaryeṇa samyak prayuktaḥ syāt /
T06bsa034_u:3233: bodhisattvo glānaṃ vyādhitaṃ sattvamāsādya nopasthānaparicaryāṃ karoti āghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3242: anāpattiradhimātradhandhaprajñasya dhandhaṃ dharmamuddiśato dhandhaṃ dhārayato dhandhamālambane cittaṃ samādadhataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3246: bodhisattvo dṛṣṭadhārmike sāṃparāyike cārthe anayaprayuktān [sattvān] dṛṣṭvā āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto nyāyaṃ nayaṃ na vyapadiśati /
T06bsa034_u:3252: anāpattiḥ sa eva svayaṃ pratibalaḥ syāt /
T06bsa034_u:3255: anāpattiryasya nyāyopadeśaḥ karaṇīyaḥ sa āghātacittaḥsyāddurvaco viparītagrāhī vigatapremagauravaḥ khaṭuṅkajātīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3257: bodhisattva upakāriṇāṃ sattvānāmakṛtajño bhavatyakṛtavedī āghātacitto na pratyupakāreṇānurūpeṇa pratyupatiṣṭhate /
T06bsa034_u:3264: bodhisattvo jñātibhogavyasanasthānāṃ sattvānāmāghātacittaḥ utpannaṃśokaṃ na vinodayati /
T06bsa034_u:3269: bodhisattvo bhojanapānādinyupakaraṇajātāni bhojanapānādikārthibhyaḥ samyagyācito na prayacchatyāghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3277: bodhisattvaḥ pariṣadamupasthāpya na kālena kālaṃ sabhyagavavadati samyaksamanuśāsti /
T06bsa034_u:3278: na ca teṣāmarthavighātināṃ śrāddhānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāmantikāddharmeṇa cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsana[glāna]pratyayamaiṣajyapariṣkārān paryeṣate āghātacittaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3280: [ālasyakausīdyāt pramādādvā nāvavadati na samanuśāsti na paryeṣate akliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:3297: anāpattistasyābhipretaṃ pathyañca syāt pareṣāṃ prabhūtatarakāṇāmanabhipretamapathyañca syāt /
T06bsa034_u:3300: bodhisattvaḥ āghātacittaḥ pareṣāṃ bhūtān guṇān nodbhāvayati bhūtaṃ varṇaṃ na bhāṣate subhāṣite sādhukāraṃ na dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:3303: ālasyāt kausīdyāt pramādādvā na bhāṣate akliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:3308: anāpattistato nidānaṃ saṃkleśaṃ madamunnatimanarthāya saṃbhāvayataḥ tasya ca parihārārtham /
T06bsa034_u:3314: avasādayati vā na ca daṇḍakarmaṇā samanuśāsti /
T06bsa034_u:3318: ālasyakausīdyāt pramādādvā nāvasādāyati yāvanna pravāsayati akliṣṭāmāttimāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:3323: anāpattiste sattvā aśaṭhā bhaveyustrīvreṇa hrīvyapatrāpyena samanvāgatā laghu laghveva pratyāpadyeran /
T06bsa034_u:3324: bodhisattvo vicitrarddhivikurvitaprabhāvasamanvāgataḥ uttrāsanārhāṇāṃ sattvānāmuttrāsanāya āvarjanārhāṇāñca sattvānāmāvarjanāya śraddhādeyaparihārāya [ṛddhyā] (Dutt 124)
T06bsa034_u:3327: anāpattiryatra sattvā yadbhūyasā pratiniviṣṭā bhaveyustīrthikā āryāpavādikayā mithyādṛṣṭ samanvāgatāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3329: itīmānyutpannavastukāni bodhisattvānāṃ śikṣāpadāni teṣu teṣu sūtrānteṣu vyagrāṇi bhagavatā ākhyātāni saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśalasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlañcārabhya
T06bsa034_u:3330: tānyasyāṃ bodhisattvapiṭakamātṛkāyāṃ samagrāṇyākhyātāni yeṣu bodhisattvenāradajātena paramagauravamupasthāpya śikṣā karaṇīyā /
T06bsa034_u:3331: parataḥ saṃvarasamādanaṃ kṛtvā suviśuddhena śikṣitukāmāśayena bodhyāśayena sattvārthāśayena ādita eva cāvyatikramāyādarajātena bhavitavyam /
T06bsa034_u:3334: yasya kasyacicchrāvakayānīyasya vā mahāyānīyasya vā 'ntike deśayitavyā yastāṃ vāgvijñaptiṃ pratibalaḥ syādavaboddhaṃ pratigrahītum /
T06bsa034_u:3335: sa cedbodhisattvaḥ pārājayikasthānīyaṃ dharmamadhyāpanno bhavatyadhimātreṇa paryavasthānena tena tyaktaḥ saṃvaraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3337: sa cenmadhyena paryavasthānenāpanno bhavati tena trayāṇāṃ pudgalānāmantike tato vā uttari duṣkṛtā deśayitavyā /
T06bsa034_u:3338: pūrva vastu parikīrtayitvā parato niṣadyedaṃ syādvacanīyam /
T06bsa034_u:3339: samanvāharatvāyupmannahamevaṃnāmā bodhisattva-vinayātisāriṇīṃ yathā parikīrtite vastuni dṛṣkṛtāmāpattimāpannaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3341: pārājayikasthānīyasya ca dharmasya mṛdunā paryavasthānena tadanyāsāñcāpattīnāmekasyaiva purato deśanā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:3342: asati cānukūle pudgale yasya purato deśyetāśayato bodhisattvena punaranadhyācārāya cittamutpādayitavyam /
T06bsa034_u:3346: yadi tairguṇairyuṃktaḥ puṅgalo na sannihitaḥsyāttato bodhisattvena tathāgatapratimāyāḥ purataḥ svayameva bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ karaṇīyam
T06bsa034_u:3349: dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya purato vā utkuṭukasthitena idaṃ syādvacanīyam /
T06bsa034_u:3350: ahamevaṃnāmā daśasu dikṣu sarvāstathāgatān mahābhūmipraviṣṭāṃśca bodhisattvān vijñāpayāmi /
T06bsa034_u:3351: teṣāñca purataḥ sarvāṇi bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni sarvaṃ bodhisattvaśīlaṃ samādade saṃvaraśīlaṃ
T06bsa034_u:3353: anāgatāḥ sarvabodhisattvāḥ śikṣiṣyante pratyutpannā daśasu dikṣu sarvabodhisattvā etarhi śikṣante /
T06bsa034_u:3358: yadapi coktaṃ bhagavatā yadbhūyasā bodhisattvasya dveṣasamutthitā āpattirjñātavyā na rāgasamutthiteti tatrāyamabhiprāyo draṣṭavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3359: bodhisattvaḥ sattvānunayaṃ sattvapremādhipatiṃ kṛtvā yatkiñcicceṣṭate sarvaṃ tadbodhisattvakṛtyam /
T06bsa034_u:3360: nākṛtyaṃ na ca kṛtyaṃ kurvataḥ āpattiryujyate /
T06bsa034_u:3361: sattveṣu tu dviṣṭo bodhisattvo nātmano na pareṣāṃ hitamācarati /
T06bsa034_u:3366: evañca punaḥ svavinaye śikṣāprayukto bodhisattvastisṛbhiḥ saṃpattibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharati prayogasampattyā āśayasampattyā pūrvahetusampattyā ca /
T06bsa034_u:3368: yathāpi tadbodhisattvaḥ śīleṣvakhaṇḍacārī bhavati pariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥsamudācāro nābhīkṣṇāpattiko vivṛtapāpaśca bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3374: sa evamarthī na kusīdo viharati [na] hīnavīryo [nāvīryo] na vyavakīrṇa pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ sāṃkleśikaiḥ paunarbhavikaiḥ sajvarairduḥkhavipākairāyatyāṃ jātijarāmaraṇīyaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3378: yathāpi tadbodhisattvaḥ pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu kṛtapuṇyo bhavati kṛtakuśalamūlo yenaitarhi svayañca na vihanyate covarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ
T06bsa034_u:3381: ābhistisṛbhiḥ saṃpattibhiḥ samanvāgato vinaye śikṣāprayukto bodhisattvaḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharati /
T06bsa034_u:3382: etadviparyayāttisṛbhirvipattibhiḥ samanvāgato duḥkhaṃ saṃsparśaṃ viharatīti veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:3383: idaṃ tāvadbodhisattvasya samāsavyāsataḥ sarvaśīlamityucyate gṛhipakṣagataṃ pravrajitapakṣagatañca /
T06bsa034_u:3384: asyaiva ca sarvaśīlasya pravibhāgastadanyānyapi duṣkaraśīlādīni veditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:3387: mahābhogasya bodhisattvasya mahatyaiśvaryādhipatye vartamānasya prahāya bhogān prahāya mahadaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ śīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ bodhisattvasya duṣkaraśīlamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:3388: kṛcchrāpanno 'pi ca bodhisattvaḥ samāttaśīlaḥ āprāṇairvipadyamānastacchīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ na chidrīkaroti /
T06bsa034_u:3392: yathā yāvajjīvena [api] pratanukāmapyāpatiṃ nāpadyate na śīle ca skhalati kutaḥ punargurvīm /
T06bsa034_u:3397: tatra samāttaṃ śīlaṃ yena trividhamapi bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati saṃvaraśīlasya kuśalasaṃgrāhaka[śīlasya] sattvārthakriyāśīlasya ca /
T06bsa034_u:3398: tatra prakṛtiśīlaṃ yadgotrasthasyaiva bodhisattvasya prakṛtibhadratayaiva santānasya pariśuddhaṃ kāyavākkarma pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:3400: tatrābhyastaṃ śīlaṃ yena bodhisattvena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu trividhamapi yathānirdiṣṭaṃ śīlamabhyastaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3401: sa tena pūrvahetubalādhānena [na] sarveṇa sarvaṃ pāpasamacāreṇa ramate /
T06bsa034_u:3405: tatredamupāyayuktaṃ śīlaṃ yaccatvāri saṃgrahavastūni niśritya bodhisattvasya sattveṣu kuśalaṃ kāyavakkarma pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:3415: tat ṣaḍvidhaṃ saptavidhaṃ caikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya trayodaśavidhaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:3434: adattamādadyāt kāmeṣu mithyācaret mṛṣāvācaṃ bhāṣeta paiśunyaṃ pāruṣyaṃ sabhinnapralāpaṃ kuryāt pāṇiloṣṭatāḍana saṃsparśaiścāniṣṭairvihiṃsāsaṃsparśaiḥ samudācarediti /
T06bsa034_u:3435: tasya me evamarthinaḥ sa cet pare viparyayeṇa samudācareyuḥ tena me syādvidhātastanme syādamanāpam /
T06bsa034_u:3436: paro 'pyarthino yathā 'smākaṃ pare na jīvitadvyaparopayeyurvistareṇa yāvanna vihiṃsāsasparśai samudācareyuriti /
T06bsa034_u:3437: (Dutt 128) teṣāmapyevamarthināṃ sa cedahaṃ viparyayeṇa samudācareyaṃ tena te syurvighātinastatteṣāṃ syādamanāpam /
T06bsa034_u:3438: iti yanmama pareṣāñcāmanāpaṃ so 'haṃ kiṃ tena parān samudācariṣyāmi /
T06bsa034_u:3439: iti pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvo jīvitahetorapi parānaṣṭavidhenāmanāpena na samudācarati /
T06bsa034_u:3443: iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ pratiśeddhavyāni sthānāni pratiṣedhayati /
T06bsa034_u:3449: punaranyaddānasahagataṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntisahagataṃ [vīryasahagataṃ] dhyānasahagataṃ prajñāsahagatañca pañcavidham /
T06bsa034_u:3451: tasya ca bodhisattvasya pareṣāñca dṛṣṭadharmasaṃparāyasukhāya saṃvartate /
T06bsa034_u:3455: ādita eva sugṛhīta bhavati śrāmaṇyasabodhikāmatayā na jīvikānimittam /
T06bsa034_u:3461: samyakpraṇihitaṃ bhavati lābhasatkāragardhavigamāt devatvāya praṇidhāya brahmacaryāvāsānābhyupagamācca /
T06bsa034_u:3468: ityeṣa bodhisattvasya mahān śīlaskandho mahābodhiphalodayo yamāśritya (Dutt 129)
T06bsa034_u:3470: yāvacca nābhisabudhyate tāvadayamasminnaprameye bodhisattvaśīlaskandhe śikṣamāṇaḥ pañcānuśaṃsān pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:3473: kāyasya ca bhedāttatropapadyate yatrāsya samānādhikaśīlā bodhisattvāḥ sabhāgāḥ sahadhārmikāḥ kalyāṇamitrabhūtā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:3475: dṛṣṭe dharme samparāye 'pi prakṛtiśīlatāṃ śīlatanmayatāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:3476: sarvañcaitacchīlaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ svabhāvaśīlādikaṃ navākāraṃ trividhena śīlena saṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:3478: tatpunastrividhaṃ śīlaṃ samāsato bodhisattvasya trīṇi kāryāṇi karoti /
T06bsa034_u:3487: etāvat bodhisattvaśīlakāryaṃ nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3497: yā pratisaṃkhyānabalasanniśrayeṇa vā prakṛtyā vā parāpakārasya marṣaṇā sarveṣāñca marṣaṇā sarvasya ca marṣaṇā nirāmiṣeṇa ca cittena kevalayā karuṇayā [marṣaṇā] /
T06bsa034_u:3506: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvaḥ parāpakāraṃ marṣayati kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3507: iha bodhisattvastīvre nirantare citre dīrghakālikea 'pi parāpakāraje duḥkhe sammukhībhūte idaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate /
T06bsa034_u:3509: yenāhaṃ svayaṃkṛtasyāśubhasya karmaṇo duḥkhamīdṛśaṃ phalaṃ pratyanubhavāmi /
T06bsa034_u:3517: tatpare tāvadajñāḥ ye asmākaṃ prakṛtiduḥkhitānāṃ bhūyo duḥkhamupasaṃharanti /
T06bsa034_u:3518: asmākaṃ tu vijñānāṃ satāṃ na pratirūpaṃ syādyadvayamapi pareṣāṃ prakṛtiduḥkhitānāṃ bhūyo duḥkhamupasaṃharemaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3519: bhūyo 'pi cātmārthe tāvatprayuktānāṃ śrāvakāṇāmakṣāntirna yuktarūpā syāt svapareṣāṃ duḥkhajanikā /
T06bsa034_u:3522: bodhisattvaḥ pañcākārāṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayan mitrāmitrodāsīnebhyaḥ hīnatulyaviśiṣṭebhyaḥ sukhitaduḥkhitebhyo guṇadoṣayuktebhyaśca sattvebhyaḥ sarvāpakārāṃstitikṣate
T06bsa034_u:3529: nāsau sattvaḥ sulabharūpo yo me na dīrghasyādhvano 'tyayāt pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu mātā vābhūt pitā vā bhrātā vā bhaginī vā ācāryo vā upādhyāyo vā gururvā gurusthānīyo vā /
T06bsa034_u:3530: tasyaivaṃ yoniśo manasikurvataḥ pratyarthikasaṃjñā apakāriṣu sattveṣu antardhīyate suhṛtsaṃjñā ca saṃtiṣṭhate /
T06bsa034_u:3531: sa tāṃ suhṛtsaṃjñāṃ niśrityāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3532: kathañca bodhisattvaḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu dharmamātrānusāriṇīṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /
T06bsa034_u:3535: nāstyatra kaścidātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā janturvāya ākrośedroṣayettāḍayed bhaṇḍayet paribhāṣeta vā yo vā punarākruśyeta vā roṣyeta vā tāḍayeta vā bhaṇḍayeta vā paribhāṣyeta vā /
T06bsa034_u:3538: sa tāṃ dharmamātrasaṃjñāniścitya pratiṣṭhāpya parataḥ sarvāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3541: ye kecit sattvā jātā bhūtāḥ sarve te anityā maraṇadharmāṇaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3542: eṣa ca paramaḥ pratyatakāro yaduta jīvitādvayaparopaṇam /
T06bsa034_u:3543: evañca prakṛttyā maraṇadharmakeṣvanityeṣu sattveṣu na pratirūpaṃ syādvijñapuruṣasya
T06bsa034_u:3544: kaluṣamapi tāvaccittamutpādayituṃ prāgeva pāṇinā vā prahartuṃ loṣṭena vā daṇḍena
T06bsa034_u:3546: tasyaivaṃ yoniśo manasi kurvataḥ nityasārasajñā ca prahīyate /
T06bsa034_u:3548: sa tāmapi anityāsārasaṃjñāṃ niśritya sarvāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3549: kathañca bodhisattvaḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /
T06bsa034_u:3550: iha bodhisattvo ye tāvat sattvā mahatyāmapi sampadi vartante tānapi tisṛbhiḥ (Dutt 132)
T06bsa034_u:3551: duḥkhatābhiranuṣaktān paśyati- saṃskāraduḥkhatayā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā duḥkhaduḥkhatayā ca prāgeva vipattisthitān /
T06bsa034_u:3553: evaṃ sadā duḥkhānugatānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpakarṣaṇāyāsmābhirvyāyacchitavyaṃ na duḥkhopasaṃhārāya /
T06bsa034_u:3554: tasyaivaṃ yoniśo manasi kurvataḥ sukhasaṃjñā prahīyate duḥkhasaṃjñā cotpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:3555: sa tāṃ duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ niśritya pareṣāṃ sarvāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3558: mayā khalu sarvasattvā bodhāya cittamutpādayatā kaḍatrabhāvena parigṛhītāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3560: tanna me pratirūpaṃ syādyadahamevaṃ sarvasattvānupādāyaiṣāmarthaṃ kariṣyāmītyanarthameva kuryāmapakāramamarṣayan /
T06bsa034_u:3561: tasyaiva yāniśo manasi kurvataḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu parasaṃjñā prahīyate /
T06bsa034_u:3563: sa tāṃ parigrahasajñāṃ niśritya pareṣāṃ sarvāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3570: mayā khalu pūrva kāmacaryāsu vartamānena kāmānparyeṣatā pratisaṃkhyāya duḥkhahetutayā
T06bsa034_u:3571: duḥkhātmakānāṃ kāmānāmarthe prabhūtāni tīvrāṇi duḥkhāni abhyupagatāni adhivāsitānyanubhūtāni
T06bsa034_u:3573: evaṃ tadvayarthaṃ duḥkhasyaivārthe mayā mahad duḥkhamabhyupagataṃ pratisaṃkhyāyājñānadoṣeṇa /
T06bsa034_u:3574: sāṃprataṃ tu mama sukhāhārake kuśale prayuktasya [pratisaṃkhyāya] tataḥ koṭīśatasahasraguṇasya duḥkhasyādhivāsanābhyupagamaḥ pratirūpaḥ syāt
T06bsa034_u:3576: evaṃ yoniśo manasi kurvan bodhāya prayukto bodhisattvaḥ sarvavastukaṃ duḥkhamadhivāsayati /
T06bsa034_u:3585: tairbodhisattvo lūhaiḥ stokairasatkṛtya dhandhañca labdhairnotkaṇṭhyate na paritrasyati nāpi tato nidānaṃ vīryaṃ sraṃsayati /
T06bsa034_u:3588: alābhaḥ ayaśo nindā duḥkhaṃnāśadharmakasya nāśaḥ kṣayadharmakasya kṣayaḥ jarādharmakasya jarā vyādhidharmakasya vyādhiḥ maraṇadharmakasya maraṇam
T06bsa034_u:3589: eṣāṃ lokadharmāṇāṃ samastavyastānām āpatanāt sammukhībhāvāt yadduḥkhamutpadyate tallokadharmādhiṣṭhānamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:3590: tenāpi spṛṣṭo bodhisattvo na tannidānaṃ vīryaṃ sraṃsayati pratisaṃkhyāyodvahate adhivāsayati /
T06bsa034_u:3593: tatra bodhisattvaḥ caṃkramaniṣadyābhyāṃ divārātrau vā āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayaṃstana nidānaṃ pariśramajaṃ duḥkhamadhivāsayati
T06bsa034_u:3594: na tvakāle pārśvamanuprayacchati mañce vā pīṭhe vā tṛṇasaṃstare vā parṇasaṃstare vā /
T06bsa034_u:3597: vistareṇa deśanā vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyakriyā ekākino rahogatasya samyak cintanā
T06bsa034_u:3598: tulanā upaparīkṣaṇā yogamanasikārasaṃgṛhītā śamathavipaśyanā bhāvanā ca /
T06bsa034_u:3599: asmin saptākāre dharmaparigrahe bodhisattvasya vyāyacchamānasya yad duḥkhamutpadyate tadapyasāvadhivāsayati /
T06bsa034_u:3611: ityevaṃ rūpaṃ kṛcchrasaṃbādhaṃ bhikṣākavṛttamāgamya yadduḥkhamutpadyate tadapi bodhisattvo 'dhivāsayati /
T06bsa034_u:3613: kuśalapakṣābhiyuktasyāpi ca bodhisattvasya [ye] pariśramanidānā utpadyante kāyikāḥ klamāḥ caitasikāḥ apyupāyāsā na bodhisattvastannidānaṃ vīryaṃ saṃstrayati /
T06bsa034_u:3621: yatpunarbodhisattvaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ sannanyatamena duḥkhena prayujyata evānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye /
T06bsa034_u:3627: iha bodhisattvasya samyagdharmapravicayasuvicāritayā buddhyā aṣṭavidhe adhimuktyadhiṣṭhāne
T06bsa034_u:3628: adhimuktiḥ susanniviṣṭā bhavati ratnaguṇeṣu tattvārthe buddhabodhisattvānāṃ mahāprabhāve
T06bsa034_u:3629: hetau phale prāptavye 'rthe ātmanastatprāptyupāye jñeyagocare ca /
T06bsa034_u:3649: iha bodhisattvaḥ ādita eva kṣāntāvanuśaṃsadarśī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3661: sā ṣaḍvidhā saptavidhā caikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya trayodaśavidhā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:3663: sattveṣu ca dayācittaḥ kāruṇyacitta [snigdhacittaḥ] snehādapi kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3664: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tīvracchandaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayitukāmaḥ kāraṇahetorapi kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3666: tadanenāpi paryāyeṇa na yuktarūpā samāttaśīlasya pravrajitasyākṣāntiriti dharmasamādānato 'pi kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3667: gotrasampadi pūrvake ca kṣāntyabhyāse vartamāno 'vasthitaḥ prakṛtyāpi kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3672: rahasi vā mahājanasamakṣaṃ vā sarvakālañca kṣamate /
T06bsa034_u:3673: pūrvāhne 'pi madhyāhne 'pi sāyāhne 'pi rātrau ca divā vā 'tī tamapyanāgatamapi pratyutpannamapi glāno 'pi svastho 'pi patito 'pyutthito 'pi
T06bsa034_u:3684: duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpanayanāya vyāyacchataḥ dharmān paryeṣataḥ dharmasyānudharme
T06bsa034_u:3685: pratipadyabhānasya tāneva dharmān pareṣāṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayataḥ sattvakṛtyeṣu
T06bsa034_u:3688: yena ca sattvā vidhātinaḥ syuḥ tasya ca kṣāntyā parivarjanāt /
T06bsa034_u:3692: iha bodhisattvaḥ apramatto viharan kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu kṣamo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3693: śītasyoṣṇasya jighatsāpipāsayoḥ daṃśasaṃsparśānāṃ [maśakasaṃsparśānāṃ vātātapayoḥ sarīsṛpasaṃsparśānāṃ] kṣamo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3696: kṣamo bodhisattva ātmanā ca dṛṣṭe ca dharme sukhasaṃsparśaṃ viharatyavyavakīrṇaḥ
T06bsa034_u:3700: ] pareṣāmapi ca dṛṣṭe dharme saṃparāya sukhāya pratipanno bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3704: iha bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāmantikādapakāraṃ vighātaṃ vyatikramaṃ labhamāno nāpi pratyapakāraṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:3707: upakārāya cābhimukho bhavati yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścānnopakārakriyayā 'pakāramupekṣate
T06bsa034_u:3708: apakāriṣu ca svayameva saṃjñaptimanuprayacchati na ca khedayitvā pareṣāmantikāt saṃjñaptiṃ
T06bsa034_u:3710: etameva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā akṣāntimārabhya tīvreṇa [hrīvyapatrāpyena] samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3711: kṣāntimārabhya tīvreṇa śāstari premagauraveṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3712: sattvāviheṭhanatāmārabhya tīvreṇa sattveṣu karuṇāśayena sanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3713: sarveṇa vā sarvamakṣāntidharmasahāyaṃ prahāya kāmavītarāgo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3716: ityetāṃ svabhāva-[kṣāntyādikaṃ viśuddha-]kṣāntiparyavasānāṃ kṣāntiṃ vipulāmapramāṇāṃ mahābodhiphalo[dayāṃ] niśritya bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate
T06bsa034_u:3717: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre yogasthāne ekādaśamaṃ kṣāntipaṭalaṃ samāptam /
T06bsa034_u:3731: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvameva vīryārambhaprayogādevaṃ cetaso 'bhyutsāhapūrvakaṃ sannāhaṃ sannahyate /
T06bsa034_u:3733: nānyagativāsena yāvatā kālena bodhisattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante
T06bsa034_u:3738: prāgeva nyūnatareṇa kālena tanutareṇa ca duḥkhena /
T06bsa034_u:3740: yo bodhisattvaḥ evarūpe bodhisattvānāṃ sannāhavīrye 'dhimuktimātrakaṃ prasādamātrakamapyutpādayet
T06bsa034_u:3741: so 'pi tāvadbodhisattvo dhīro 'pramāṇasya bodhāya vīryārambhasya dhātuṃ paripoṣayet /
T06bsa034_u:3742: prāgeva yo bodhisattvaḥ īdṛśenaiva sannāhavīryeṇa samanvāgataḥ syāt na ca punastasya
T06bsa034_u:3743: bodhisattvasya bodherarthe sattvānāmarthāya kiñcidasti duṣkaraṃ karaṇīyaṃ karma yatrāsya
T06bsa034_u:3744: bodhisattvasya saṃkoco vā syāt cetaso duṣkaraṃ vā kartum /
T06bsa034_u:3756: ityebhiḥ saptabhirākāraiḥ kuśaladharmasaṃgrahāya vīryārambhaprayogo bodhisattvānāṃ kṣipraṃ pāramitāparipūraye 'nuttarasamyaksaṃbodhyadhigamāya saṃvartate /
T06bsa034_u:3757: yataśca sarveṣāṃ bodhikarakāṇāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmaṇāmevaṃ samudāgamāya vīryameva pradhānaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ kāraṇaṃ na tathānyat /
T06bsa034_u:3765: yadbodhisattvo nairantaryeṇa cīvarasaṃjñāṃ piṇḍapātasaṃjñāṃ śayanāsanasaṃjñāmapi ātmasaṃjñāmakurvan kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu bhāvanāsātatyena prayukto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3767: punarbodhisattvastena tathārūpeṇa vīryārambheṇa ā-nikāyasabhāganikṣepāt sarvakālaṃ prayukto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3769: punarbodhisattvaḥ samatāprativedhaguṇayuktena nātilīnena nātyārabdhenāviparītenārthopasaṃhitena vīryeṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3771: asya khalu bodhisattvānāṃ duṣkaravīryasya balaṃ sattveṣu karuṇā prajñā ca saṃgrahaheturveditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3779: tatra karmapariśodhakaṃ bodhisattvasya vīryaṃ yat trayāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ viśuddhaye saṃgrahāya kuśalasya kāyakarmaṇo vākkarmaṇo manaskarmaṇaśca /
T06bsa034_u:3781: yacchru tacintābhāvanāmayyāḥ prajñāyāḥ samudāgamāya parivṛddhaye saṃvartate /
T06bsa034_u:3796: idaṃ tāvat ṣaḍvidhaṃ sarvākāraṃ vīryaṃ yena samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ ārabdhavīryaḥ sthāmavān vīryavānutsāhī dṛḍhaparākramaḥ anikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:3797: saptavidhaṃ punaḥ chandasahagataṃ bodhisattvasya vīryaṃ punaḥ punaranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T06bsa034_u:3798: tīvracchanda praṇidhānānuvṛṃhaṇatayā sāmyayuktaṃ bodhisattvasya vīryaṃ yadanyatamena
T06bsa034_u:3801: vaiśeṣikaṃ vīryaṃ bodhisattvasyānyatamenopakleśenopakliṣṭacetasaḥ [paryavasitacetasaḥ] tasyopakleśasya prahāṇāya yadādīptaśiro nirvāṇopamaṃ vīryam /
T06bsa034_u:3803: śikṣāvīryaṃ bodhisattvasya teṣveva paryeṣiteṣu dharmeṣu yathāyogyaṃ yathārhaṃ dharmānudharmapratipattisaṃpādanatayā /
T06bsa034_u:3806: skhalitasya ca yathādharmapratikaraṇatāyai vīryaṃ saptamaṃ bodhisattvasya /
T06bsa034_u:3808: vighātārthikavīryaṃ cehāmutrasukhañca bodhisattvānāṃ vīryaṃ kṣāntivad draṣṭavyam /
T06bsa034_u:3810: yā tatra kṣāntiḥ seha vīryamabhyutsāho vaktavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:3813: anurūpamabhyastamaślathaṃ sugṛhītaṃ kālābhyāsa-prayuktaṃ nimittaprativedhayuktamalīnamavidhuraṃ samaṃ mahābodhipariṇamitañceti /
T06bsa034_u:3822: iha bodhisattvo na ādikarmika-tatprathamakarmikavīryeṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3826: na cāpi bodhisattvaḥ abhyastaprayogo bhavati avavādānuśāsanyāṃ cittasthitimārabhya /
T06bsa034_u:3827: api tvādikarmika eva sa bodhisattvastasmin prayoge 'ślathaprayogo bhavati sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogitayā /
T06bsa034_u:3829: punarbodhisattvo guruṇāmantikāta svayameva vā bāhuśrutyabalādhānatayā 'viparītagrāhitayā cittasthitaye vīryamārabhate /
T06bsa034_u:3836: punarbodhisattvaḥ śamathapragrahopekṣānimittānāṃ samādhisthitivyutthānanimittānāṃ copalakṣaṇāsaṃpramoṣa-prativedhāya sātatyakārī bhavati satkṛtyakārī
T06bsa034_u:3838: punarbodhisattvaḥ paramodārān paramagambhīrānacintyāprameyān bodhisattvānāṃ vīryārambhanirdeśān śrutvā nātmānaṃ paribhavati na salīnacitto bhavati
T06bsa034_u:3842: punarbodhisattvaḥ kālena kālamindriyairguptadvāratāṃ bhojane mātrajñatāṃ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ
T06bsa034_u:3843: jāgarikānuyuktatāṃ saprajānan vihāritāmityevaṃbhāgīyān samādhisaṃbhārān samādāya vartate /
T06bsa034_u:3848: sama yogavāhi sarveṣu cārambhakaraṇīyeṣu samaṃ satkṛtyakārī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:3850: punarbodhisattvaḥ sarvavīryārambhānabhisaṃskṛtānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇamayatīdaṃ bodhisattvasya samyak pariṇamitaṃ vīryamityucyate
T06bsa034_u:3852: yadāśritya bodhisattvā vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrya anuttarāṃ samyak saṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā
T06bsa034_u:3854: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre yogasthāne dvādaśamaṃ vīryapaṭalaṃ samāptam /
T06bsa034_u:3860: cittaikāgryañcittasthitiḥ śamathapakṣyā vā vipaśyanāpakṣyā vā yuganaddhavāhimārgaṃ
T06bsa034_u:3867: dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya dhyānaṃ bodhisattva-samādhiguṇanirhārāya dhyāna sattvārthakriyāyai dhyānam /
T06bsa034_u:3868: tatra yadbodhisattvānāṃ sarvavikalpāpagataṃ kāyikacaittasikaprasrabdhijanakaṃ paramapraśāntaṃ manyanāpagatamanāsvāditaṃ sarvanimittāpagataṃ dhyānam /
T06bsa034_u:3871: yeṣāṃ samādhīnāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā api nāmāpi na prajānanti kutaḥ punaḥ samāpatsyante /
T06bsa034_u:3875: yaddhyānaṃ niśritya bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtyeṣvarthopasaṃhiteṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:3892: tatparamaṃ dhyānasukhaṃ vyāvartya pratisaṃkhyāya sattvānukampā prabhūtāṃ sattvārthakriyāṃ
T06bsa034_u:3907: kuśalaṃ dhyānamavyākṛtaṃ ca nirmitanirmāṇāya dhyānaṃ śamathapakṣyaṃ vipaśyanāpakṣyaṃ
T06bsa034_u:3921: daśasu dikṣu pramattānāṃ sattvānāṃ samyaksaṃbodhanāya dhyānam /
T06bsa034_u:3933: apāyabhūmyupapannānāñca sattvānāṃ tat kālāpāyikaduḥkhapratiprasrambhaṇatāyai raśmipramocakaṃ dhyānam /
T06bsa034_u:3940: dhyānavyāvartane punaḥ samādapanavaśitā-viśuddhyā viśuddhaṃ dhyānam abhijñāvikurvaṇavaśitā-viśuddhyā viśuddhaṃ dhyānam /
T06bsa034_u:3943: ityetaddhyānamaprameya bodhisattvānāṃ mahābodhiphalaṃ yadāśritya bodhisattvā dhyānapāramitāṃ
T06bsa034_u:3950: sarvajñeyapraveśāya ca sarvajñeyānupraviṣṭaśca yo dharmāṇāṃ pravicayaḥ pañcavidyāsthānānyālambya
T06bsa034_u:3958: pañcasu ca yathānirdiṣṭeṣu vidyāsthāneṣu triṣu ca rāśiṣu kauśalyakriyāyai sattvārthakriyāyai ca /
T06bsa034_u:3959: yā bodhisattvānāmanabhilāpyaṃ dharmanairātmyamārabhya satyāvabodhāya vā satyāvabodhakāle
T06bsa034_u:3960: vā satyābhisaṃbodhādvā urddhaṃ prajñā paramapraśamapratyupasthānā nirvikalpā sarvaṃprapañcāgatā
T06bsa034_u:3964: pañcasu vidyāsthāneṣu kauśalyaṃ vistareṇa pūrvavadveditavyaṃ tadyathā balagotrapaṭale /
T06bsa034_u:3968: ityeteṣvaṣṭāsu sthāneṣu prajñāyāḥ kauśalyaparigraho mahāntaṃ niruttaraṃ jñānasambhāraṃ paripūrayatyanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye /
T06bsa034_u:3970: teṣveva sthāneṣu yā prajñā sā sattvārthakriyāyai prajñā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:3972: sā trividhā draṣṭavyā gambhīrasya dharmanairātmyajñānāya duṣkarā /
T06bsa034_u:3978: śrāvakapiṭakaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakaṃ cārabhya śrutamayī prajñā cintāmayī prajñā /
T06bsa034_u:3983: saddharmaśravaṇasamudāgatā pratyātmaṃ yoniśo manaskārasahagatā svaparārthaniścitā prajñā kleśavijahanā ca prajñā /
T06bsa034_u:3991: sā ṣaḍvidhā saptavidhā caikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya trayodaśavidhā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:3995: saptavidhā punaḥ dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānamabhijñājñānaṃ lakṣaṇajñānaṃ daśabalapūrvaṅgamaṃ jñānaṃ catasṛṣu ca yuktiṣu yuktijñānam
T06bsa034_u:4005: rājanītilaukikavyavahāranītiṣu ca bodhisattvasya yā niścitā prajñā /
T06bsa034_u:4009: hetuvidyāyāṃ śabdavidyāyāṃ cikitsāvidyāyāṃ laukikaśilpakarmasthānavidyāyāṃ suvyavadātā no tu pratiṣṭhitā prajñā /
T06bsa034_u:4010: tāmeva ca suvyavadātāṃ pañcaprakārāṃ vidyāṃ niśritya yā bodhisattvasya (Dutt 148)
T06bsa034_u:4011: pareṣāṃ vineyānāṃ mūḍhānāṃ pramattānāṃ saṃlīnānāṃ samyak pratipannānāṃ yathākramaṃ saṃdarśanī samādāpanī samuttejanī saṃpraharṣaṇī ca prajñā
T06bsa034_u:4014: tattvārthe dvividhā yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca tattvārthasya grahaṇāt /
T06bsa034_u:4018: itīyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ paścākārā daśaprabhedā prajñā viśuddhā paramayā viśuddhyā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4019: itīyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ su-viniścitā cāprameyā ca prajñā mahābodhiphalā yāmāśritya bodhisattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisaṃbudhyante
T06bsa034_u:4020: sa khalveṣa ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ teṣu-teṣu sūtrāntareṣu bhagavatā vyagrāṇāṃ nirdiṣṭānāmayaṃ samāsa-saṃgraha-nirdeśo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4021: yasmiṃtathāgata-bhāṣite sūtre dānapāramitā vā yāvat prajñāpāramitā vā uddeśamāgacchati nirdeśaṃ vā sā svabhāva-dāne vā yāvat viśuddhe vā dāne 'vatārayitavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4023: evamanyeṣāṃ śīlādīnāṃ prajñāvasānānāṃ yathānirdiṣṭānāmavatāraḥ saṃgrahaśca yathāyogaṃ veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4024: yāni ca tathāgatānāṃ bodhisattvacaryā-janmāprameyāṇi jātakāni duṣkaracaryā-pratisaṃyuktāni tāni sarvāṇi dānapratisaṃyuktāni dānamārabhya veditavyāni
T06bsa034_u:4025: yathā dānamevaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ sarvāṇiṃ prajñāpratisaṃyuktāni prajñāmārabhya veditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:4027: kāniciccatuḥsaṃsṛṣṭāni kānicitpañcasaṃsṛṣṭāni kānicitsarvā eva ṣaṭpāramitā ārabhya veditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:4028: ābhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiranuttarāyai samyak saṃbodhaye samudāgacchanto bodhisattvā mahāśukladharmārṇavā mahāśukladharmasamudrā ityucyante /
T06bsa034_u:4030: asya punareṣāmevamapramāṇasya puṇyajñānasaṃbhārasamudāgamasya nānyatphalamevamanurūpaṃ yathānuttaraivaṃ samyaksaṃbodhiriti /
T06bsa034_u:4036: iha bodhisattvo manāpāṃ satyāṃ dharmyāñcārthopasaṃhitāñca sattveṣu vācamudāharati /
T06bsa034_u:4040: iha bodhisattvasya yā vāksammodanī yayā vācā bodhisattvo vigatabhṛkuṭiḥ pūrvābhilāpī
T06bsa034_u:4041: uttānamukhavarṇaḥ smitamukha pūrvaṅgamaḥ kṣemasvastyayanaparipṛcchayā vā dhātusāmyaparipṛcchayā
T06bsa034_u:4042: vā sukharātrindivaparipṛcchayā vā ehīti svāgata[vādi]tayā vā ityevamādibhirākāraiḥ
T06bsa034_u:4044: yā ca vāgbodhisattvasyānandanī yayā vācā bodhisattvaḥ putravṛddhiṃ [dāravṛddhiṃ]
T06bsa034_u:4045: jñātivṛddhiṃ dhanavṛddhiṃ dhānyavṛddhiṃ vā dṛṣṭvā apratisaṃviditātmavṛddhikānāṃ sattvānāmāvedayannānandayati
T06bsa034_u:4047: yā ca bodhisattvasya sarvākāraguṇopetadharmadeśanāpratisaṃyuktā vāk sattvānāṃ hitasukhāya satatasamitaṃ pratyupasthitā parameṇopakāreṇopakāribhūtā
T06bsa034_u:4048: iyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ priyavāditā prabhedaśaḥ sarvā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4049: tatra katamā bodhisattvānāṃ samāsataḥ sarvā priyavāditā /
T06bsa034_u:4052: tatra yā ca sammodanīvāg yā cānandanī iyaṃ lokayātrānugatā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4053: tatra yeyaṃ vāgupakarā parameṇopakāreṇa pratyupasthitā nirdiṣṭā iyaṃ samyagdharmadeśanānugratā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4056: yadbodhisattvo vadhakeṣu pratyarthiṣu pratyamitreṣu suviśuddhena niṣkaluṣeṇa cetasā pratisaṃkhyāya sammodanīṃ vā ānandanīṃ vā upakarāṃ vācamudīrayati iyaṃ (Dutt 150)
T06bsa034_u:4059: pratisaṃkhyāya dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kathayati khedamabhyupagamya grāhayati nyāyaṃ dharmaṃ
T06bsa034_u:4060: kuśalam iyaṃ dvitīyā bodhisattvasya duṣkarā priyavāditā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4063: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya tṛtīyā duṣkarā priyavāditā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4068: pramattānāṃ sattvānāṃ gṛhi-pravrajitānāṃ samyaksaṃcodanā pramādacaryāyā utthāpya apramādacaryāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpanārtham /
T06bsa034_u:4072: iha bodhisattvabhūtāstathāgatabhūtāśca bodhisattvāḥ sanidānameva vineyānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti saniḥsaraṇaṃ sapratisaraṇaṃ saparākramaṃ saprātihāryam
T06bsa034_u:4077: caturbhiḥ pratisaraṇaiḥ saṃgṛhītāmaviparītāṃ dharmavinaye 'smin pratipattiṃ prajñapayanti /
T06bsa034_u:4084: sā ṣaḍvidhā saptavidhā caikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya trayodaśavidhā draṣṭavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4094: pareṣāṃ sarvopakaraṇairalpotsukatāyāṃ sarvakṛtyeṣu ca samyaggateṣvalpotsukatāyāṃ viśadapravāraṇī priyavāditā /
T06bsa034_u:4097: akuśalāt sthānād vutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ samyagdṛṣṭa-śruta-pariśaṅkita-saṃcodanāvasādanī priyavāditā /
T06bsa034_u:4099: iyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ trayodaśākārā priyavāditā sarvākārā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4102: yā bodhisattvasya caturvidhāṃ vāgviśuddhiṃ niśrityāṣṭaskāryeṣu vyavahāreṣu vāk /
T06bsa034_u:4108: dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditā śrute mate vijñāte vijñātabāditā /
T06bsa034_u:4116: śīlasaṃpade dṛṣṭisaṃpade ācārasaṃpade ājīvasaṃpade ca yā priyavāditā saddharmadeśanā /
T06bsa034_u:4121: tatrārthacaryā yathaiva priyavāditā tathaiva vistareṇa veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4123: tathā hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvaprakārayā 'nayā priyavāditayā tatra-tatropagamārthaṃ sattvānāmācarati /
T06bsa034_u:4125: evaṃ priyavāditayā yuktisaṃdarśitānāṃ sattvānāṃ yathāyogaṃ śikṣāsvarthacaryāyāṃ dharmānudharmapraticaryāyāṃ kāruṇyacittamupasthāpya nirāmiṣeṇa (Dutt 152)
T06bsa034_u:4136: tatra dhārmikaiḥ karmaguṇaiḥ bhogānāmarjana-rakṣaṇa-vardhana-samyak-samādāpanatayā dṛṣṭadhārmike 'rthe samādāpanā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4137: yenāyaṃ parataśca praśaṃsāṃ labhate dṛṣṭe ca dharmai sukham /
T06bsa034_u:4141: yenāyaṃ niyataṃ saṃparāyasukhito bhavati na tvavaśyaṃ dṛṣṭe dharme /
T06bsa034_u:4142: tatra yā gṛhiṇo vā pravrajitasya vānupūrveṇa vairāgya-gamana-samādāpanā /
T06bsa034_u:4144: yenāyaṃ dṛṣṭe ca dharme prasrabdha-kāya prasrabdha-cittaḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharati /
T06bsa034_u:4150: tathā hi te duḥkhasamādāpyā bhavanti kuśale /
T06bsa034_u:4151: mahatyāṃ bhogasaṃpadi vartamāneṣu sattveṣu tadadhyavasānagateṣvarthacaryā bodhisattvānāṃ duṣkarā /
T06bsa034_u:4152: tathāhi te mahati pramādapade pramādasthāne vartante /
T06bsa034_u:4153: ito bāhyakeṣu tīrthikeṣu pūrvaṃ [ca] tīrthika dṛṣṭicariteṣu sattveṣvarthaṃcaryā bodhisattvānāṃ duṣkarā /
T06bsa034_u:4154: tathā hi te svayaṃ saṃmūḍhāścābhiniviṣṭāścāsmin dharmavinaye /
T06bsa034_u:4157: iha bodhisattvaḥ aśrāddhaṃ śraddhāsaṃpadi samādāpayati yāvatpratiṣṭhāpayati /
T06bsa034_u:4158: duḥśīlaṃ śīlasaṃpadi duṣprajñaṃ prajñāsaṃpadi matsariṇaṃ tyāgasaṃpadi samādāpayati yāvatpratiṣṭhāpayati /
T06bsa034_u:4168: sā ṣaḍvidhā saptavidhā caikadhyamabhisakṣipya trayodaśavidhā draṣṭavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4169: iha bodhisattvaḥ saṃgrahītavyāṃśca sattvān samyak saṃgṛhṇāti /
T06bsa034_u:4173: avatīrṇāśca sattvān samyak triṣu yāneṣu paripācayati /
T06bsa034_u:4177: yathā sambhārarakṣopacaye evaṃ praviveke cittaikāgratāyāmāvaraṇaviśudau manaskārabhāvanāyāṃ ca sanniyojayati /
T06bsa034_u:4202: iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvānna duścaritavyāmiśre duścaritapūrvagame sāvadye sakliṣṭe 'kuśale sanniyojayati /
T06bsa034_u:4204: punarbodhisattvo nāmokṣe cānekāntaviśuddhe cāyatane mokṣa eṣa ekāntaviśuddha eṣa iti sattvāṃstatraiva samādāpayati /
T06bsa034_u:4206: punarbodhisattvaḥ pūrvaṃ bālaprajñānāṃ sattvānāmuttānāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:4208: madhyaprajñāṃścaināṃviditvā madhyāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ sūkṣmāmavavādānuśāsanīmanupravartayati anupūrveṇa kuśalapakṣasamudāgamāya /
T06bsa034_u:4214: punarbodhisattvo ye sattvā yasmin svārthe kuśale parītte madhye 'dhimātre vā śakyarūpāḥ samādāpayituṃ yena copāyena śakyarūpāḥ samādāyituṃ tān yathāyogaṃ tatra tathā samādāpayati /
T06bsa034_u:4215: iyaṃ tāvadbodhisattvānāṃ sattveṣu pañcavidhā vahiḥśuddhā arthacaryā /
T06bsa034_u:4217: iha bodhisattvo vipulena sattveṣu kāruṇyāśayena pratyupasthitenārthamācarati /
T06bsa034_u:4219: punarbodhisattvaḥ pravarāyāmagryāyāmapi saṃpadi vartamāno dāsavatpreṣyavadvaśyaputravaccaṇḍāladārakavannīcacitto nihatamadamānāhaṃkāraḥ nāmarthamācarati
T06bsa034_u:4220: (Dutt 155) punarbodhisattvo nirāmiṣeṇākṛtrimeṇa ca parameṇa ca premṇā sattvānāmarthamācarati /
T06bsa034_u:4221: punarbodhisattva ātyantikenāpunaḥ pratyudāvartyena maitreṇa cetasā sattvānāmarthamācarati /
T06bsa034_u:4223: yā ca pañcavidhā vahiḥśuddhā yā ca pañcavidhā 'ntaḥśuddhā tāṃ sarvāmekadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya daśavidhā bodhisattvānāṃ viśuddhā 'rthacaryetyucyate
T06bsa034_u:4225: iha bodhisattvo yasminnarthe yasmin kuśalamūle parān samādāpayati tasminnarthe tasmin kuśalamūla samādāpane tulye vā 'dhike vā svayaṃ saṃśikṣyate
T06bsa034_u:4226: iti yaivaṃ bodhisattvasya paraistulyārthatā iyamucyate samānārthatā /
T06bsa034_u:4227: tāṃ samānārthatāṃ pare vineyā bodhisattvebhya upalabhya dṛḍhaniścayā bhavantyapratyudāvartyāstasmin kuśala[mūla]samādāpane /
T06bsa034_u:4231: yasmādayaṃ bodhisattvo yatraivāsmān sanniyojayati tadevātmanā samudācarati /
T06bsa034_u:4232: tatrāyaṃ jānannahitamasukhaṃ nātmanā samudācarediti na cāsya samānārthasya bodhisattvasyaivaṃ bhavanti pare vaktāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4233: tvaṃ tāvat svayaṃ na kuśalaṃ samādāya vartase /
T06bsa034_u:4234: kasmāttvaṃ paraṃ kuśale 'tyartha samādāpayitavyaṃ vaktavyamavavaditavyaṃ manyase /
T06bsa034_u:4236: asti bodhisattvaḥ paraiḥ samānārtha eva saṃstāṃ samānārthatāṃ pareṣāṃ nopadarśayati /
T06bsa034_u:4240: tatra prathamā koṭi tulyaguṇaprabhāvānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ bodhisattvamārge ācāryatvamabhyupagatānāṃ
T06bsa034_u:4241: tulyaguṇaprabhāvo bodhisattvaḥ praticchannakalyāṇatayā guṇān prabhāvañca nopadarśayati /
T06bsa034_u:4242: dvitīyā koṭī hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ gaṃbhīreṣu sthāneṣūttrastānāṃ pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvaḥ teṣāmeva sattvānāṃ tenopāyena vinayanārthaṃ sahadhārmikamātmānamupadarśayati /
T06bsa034_u:4243: saṃcintya ā-caṇḍālānām ā-śunāmarthaṃ kartukāma upadravaṃ saṃśamitukāmo vinayitukāma ā-caṇḍālānām āśunāṃ (Dutt 156)
T06bsa034_u:4245: tṛtīyā koṭī calakuśalamūlasamādānānāṃ vineyānāṃ sthirīkaraṇārthaṃ bodhisattvaḥ samānārthaḥ adhikārtho vā samānārthatāmupadarśayati /
T06bsa034_u:4247: tatra yacca dānamanekavidhaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ yacca śīlaṃ vistareṇa yāvadyā ca samānārthatā tatra pāramitābhiradhyātmaṃ buddhadharmaparipākaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4250: tatra yacca dānamanekavidhaṃ pūrvavadyāvat samānārthatā ityeṣāmanekavidhānāmaprameyāṇāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bodhipākṣikānāṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ samudācāro veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4254: udāratvādasaṃkliṣṭatvācca śreṣṭhatā niruttaratā asādhāraṇatā ca veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4256: tatra sattvābhedo yadbodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānadhiṣṭhāya sarvasattvānārabhya tāni dānādīni kuśalamūlāni samudācarati na kevalasyātmana evārthe
T06bsa034_u:4257: tatra vastvabhedo yadbodhisattvaḥ sarvāṇi sarvākārāṇi tāni kuśalamūlāni dānādikāni samādāya vartate /
T06bsa034_u:4259: ca divā vā dṛṣṭe vā dharme tenaiva ca hetunā 'bhisaṃparāye 'pi tāni dānādīni kuśalamūlāni samudācarati /
T06bsa034_u:4261: iha bodhisattvo muditacittaḥ tān kuśalān dharmānniṣevate na duḥkhī na durmanā avipratisārī bhavati tato nidānam /
T06bsa034_u:4262: punarbodhisattvaḥ paramanapahatya dṛṣṭigatānyanabhiniviśya duścaritenāvyāmiśrāṇi tāni kuśalamūlāni dānādikāni samudācarati /
T06bsa034_u:4263: punarbodhisattvaḥ satkṛtya sarvātmanā teṣveva guṇadarśī sāradarśī śāntadarśī suniścito 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ tān kuśalān dharmān dānādīn samādāya vartate /
T06bsa034_u:4264: punarbodhisattvo na terṣā dānādīnāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṃṇāṃ vipākaṃ pratikāṃkṣate cakravartitvaṃ vā śakratvaṃ vā māratvaṃ vā brahmatvaṃ vā nāpi parataḥ pratikāraṃ pratyāśaṃsate /
T06bsa034_u:4266: na sarvalābhasatkāraślokeṣu nāpyantataḥ kāyajīvite 'pi niśrito bhavati /
