T06bsa034_u:4267: iti ya ebhirākāraiḥ prasādaprāmodyasahagataścāviṣamaśca satkṛtya cāniśritaśca dānādīnāṃ samānārthatāparyavasānānāṃ (Dutt 157)
T06bsa034_u:4271: tatrāśaya śuddhibhūmipraviṣṭasya bodhisattvasya uttaptānyacalāni caitāni kuśalamūlāni bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:4272: tatreyamuttaptatā yadāśayaśuddhasya bodhisattvasya sarve te kuśalā dharmā apratisaṃkhyānakaraṇīyā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:4273: tatreyamacalanatā yadāśayaśuddho bodhisattvo yathā pratilabdhebhyo yathopacitebhyaśca ebhyaḥ kuśalebhyo dharmebhyo na parihīyate /
T06bsa034_u:4275: nānyatra teṣāṃ teṣāṃ rātridivānāmatyayātteṣāṃ teṣāmātmabhāvānāṃ samatikramāccandro
T06bsa034_u:4276: vā śuklapakṣe pratyupasthite vardhata eva ebhiḥ kuśalairdharmairna [pari]hīyate bodhisattvaḥ
T06bsa034_u:4278: vā ete kuśalā dharmāḥ suviśuddhā veditavyā yeṣāmuttari bodhisattvabhūmau pariśuddhataratā nāsti /
T06bsa034_u:4279: evaṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaireṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samudācāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4281: tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ suviśuddhatā veditavyā dānādīnāṃ samānarthatāvasānānām /
T06bsa034_u:4282: tatra sarvadānasya sarvaśīlasya vistareṇa yāvatsarvasamānarthatāyā āsevitāyāḥ suviśodhitāyāḥ
T06bsa034_u:4285: tatra duṣkaradānena duṣkaraśīlena yāvadduṣkarasamānārthatayā āsevitayā suviśodhitayā tathāgatasyāpratisamāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgatatvaṃ phalamabhinirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:4286: tatra sarvatomukhena dānena sarvatomukhena śīlena vistareṇa yāvatsarvatomukhayā samānārthatayā tathāgatasya sarvataḥ pradhānasattvairdevamanuṣyaiḥ pūjyatvaṃ phalamabhinivartate /
T06bsa034_u:4288: ye kecitsattvā apadā vā [dvipadā vā] catuṣpadā vā bahupadā vā rūpiṇo vā 'rūpiṇo vā
T06bsa034_u:4289: saṃjñino vāsaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagā vā [teṣāṃ] sarveṣāṃ sattvānāmagryatvaṃ
T06bsa034_u:4291: tatra sarvākārasya dānasya [sarvākārasya] śīlasya vistareṇa yāvatsarvākārāyāḥ samānārthatāyāstathāgatasyāprameyavicitrapuṇyaparigṛhītaṃ
T06bsa034_u:4296: tatrehāmutrasukhasya dānasya ihāmutrasukhasya śīlasya vistareṇa yāvadihāmutrasukhāyāḥ samānārthatāyāstathāgatasya paramadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattisukhaṃ phalamabhinirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:4297: tatra viśuddhasya dānasya viśuddhasya śīlasya vistareṇa yāvadviśuddhāyāḥ samānārthaṃtāyā
T06bsa034_u:4301: idamasya bodhisattvasya dānādīnāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ paryantagataṃ phalaṃ niruttaram /
T06bsa034_u:4310: śarīra-pūjā caitya-pūjā sammukha-pūjā vimukha-pūjā svayaṃkṛta-pūjā para-kārita-pūjā lābha-satkāra-pūjā udāra-pūjā asaṃkliṣṭapūjā pratipatti-pūjā ca /
T06bsa034_u:4313: tatra yadbodhisattvastathāgatamuddisya stūpaṃ vā gahaṃ vā kūṭaṃ vā purāṇacaitya vā abhinava-caityaṃ vā pūjayati /
T06bsa034_u:4315: yad bodhisattvastathāgata-kāya vā tathāgata-caityaṃ vā sammukhībhūtamadhyakṣa pūjayati /
T06bsa034_u:4317: tatra yad bodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgate-caitye vā sammukha-pūjāṃ kurvannevamadhyāśaya-sahagataṃ prasāda-sahagataṃ cittamabhisaṃskaroti
T06bsa034_u:4318: yā ekasya tathāgatasya dharmatā sā sarveṣāṃ tathāgatānāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ dharmatā /
T06bsa034_u:4319: yā ekasya tathāgata-caityasya dharmatā sā sarveṣāṃ tathāgata-caityānāṃ dharmatā /
T06bsa034_u:4320: ityato 'hametañca sammukhībhūtaṃ tathāgataṃ pūjayāmi sarvāṃśca tān atītānāgatapratyutpannāṃśca tathāgatān pūjayāmi /
T06bsa034_u:4322: tadanyāni ca daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvāṇi stūpāni gahāni kūṭāgārāṇi purāṇa-caityāni abhinava-caityāni pūjayāmi /
T06bsa034_u:4324: vimukhā ca tathāgata-pūjā tathāgata-caitya-pūjā ca veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4325: yatpunarbodhisattvaḥ asammukhībhūte tathāgate tathāgata-caitye vā tathāgatacittamabhisaṃskṛtya (Dutt 160)
T06bsa034_u:4328: yadapi bodhisattvaḥ parinirvṛte tathāgate tathāgatamuddiśya tathāgatasya śarīraṃ
T06bsa034_u:4329: stūpaṃ vā kārayati gahaṃ vā kūṭaṃ vā ekaṃ vā dvau vā sambahulāni vā yāvat koṭi-śatasahasrāṇi
T06bsa034_u:4331: iyamapi bodhisattvasya tathāgateṣu vimukhā vipulā pūjā apramāṇa-puṇya-phalā 'nekabrāhmapuṇyaparigṛhītā /
T06bsa034_u:4333: na cānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ sambhāraṃ na paripūrayati tannidānam /
T06bsa034_u:4334: tatra yeyaṃ bodhisattvasya kevalaiva tathāgate tathāgatacaitye vā pūjā iyameva tāvadvipulapuṇyaphalā draṣṭavyā tato vipulatarapuṇyaphalā kevalaiva vimukhā draṣṭavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4336: tatra yad bodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā pūjāṃ kartukāmaḥ svayameva
T06bsa034_u:4340: tatra yadbodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā pūjāṃ kartukāmo na kevalaṃ svayeva
T06bsa034_u:4343: śreṣṭhabhiḥ sārthavāhairantataḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikābhiḥ kṛpaṇaiduḥkhitaira ā-caṇḍālairapi kārayati /
T06bsa034_u:4344: tathā 'cāryopādhyāyaiḥ sārdhavihāryantevāsibhiḥ sabrahmacāribhiśca pravrajitairapyanyatīrthyaistathāgate [vā tathāgata-]caitye vā pūjāṃ kārayati
T06bsa034_u:4345: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya sādhāraṇā pūjā svaparakṛtā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4346: yatpunarbodhisattvaḥ parītte pūjākaraṇīye deyavastuni saṃvidyamāne karuṇāsahagatena
T06bsa034_u:4347: cetasā saṃcintya pareṣāmeva tadvastvanuprayacchatyete duḥkhitāḥ sattvā alpapuṇyāścāśaktāśca
T06bsa034_u:4348: tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā kārāṃ kṛtvā sukhitā bhavantviti /
T06bsa034_u:4349: pare ca tena vastunā tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā pūjāṃ kurvanti na bodhisattvaḥ iyaṃ bodhisattvasya kevalā parakāritā pūjā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4351: tatra yā kevalā svayaṃkṛtā sā mahāpuṇyaphalā /
T06bsa034_u:4353: yā punaḥ sādhāraṇā yā mahattamapuṇyaphalā niruttarā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4354: tatra yadbodhisattvaḥ tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārairabhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalikarmabhiśca
T06bsa034_u:4359: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā lābhasatkārapūjā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4360: tatra yadbodhisattvo dīrghakālikīñca tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā etāmeva lābhasatkārapūjāṃ
T06bsa034_u:4362: ghanarasena ca prasādena sammukhībhūtena tīvrayā cādhimuktyā pūjāṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:4365: tatra yadbodhisattvaḥ svahastaṃ tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā kārāṃ karoti na parairavajñayā kārayati pramādakausīdyādvā /
T06bsa034_u:4368: na buddhābhiprasannānāṃ rājādīnāmudārasattvānāṃ lābhasatkārahetoḥ kuhanārthaṃ pratirūpeṇa ca vastunā pūjayati /
T06bsa034_u:4371: tāṃ punaretāmudārāmasaṃkliṣṭāṃ lābhasatkārapūjāṃ bodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā svabāhubalopārjitairbhogaiḥ karoti parato vā paryeṣitaiḥ
T06bsa034_u:4374: trīnvā saṃbahulān vā samucchrayān yāvat samucchryakoṭīniyutaśatasahastrāṇyanekānyabhinirmāya sarvaistaiḥ samucchrayaistathāgateṣu praṇāmaṃ karoti
T06bsa034_u:4375: teṣāñca samucchrayāṇāmekaikasya hastaśataṃ hastasahasraṃ vā tato vā pareṇa nirmāya
T06bsa034_u:4377: sarve ca te samucchrayā atyudārāṇi tathāgatabhūtaguṇopasaṃhitāni stotrāṇi bhāṣante /
T06bsa034_u:4378: sarvaireva ca taiḥ samucchrayairvicitrāṇyamātrāṇi [agrāṇi] praṇītāni keyūramaṇikuṇḍalāni chatradhvajapatākāśca tathāgateṣūtsṛjayattyāropayati
T06bsa034_u:4380: na cāsya punarbuddhotpādaḥ pratyāśaṃsitavyaḥ prārthayitavyo vā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4383: no cāpi bodhisattvasya svabāhubalopārjitā bhogā bhavantināpi ca parataḥ paryeṣitalabdhā vā /
T06bsa034_u:4385: api tu yā kācit tathāgatapūjā jambūdvīpe [vā] cāturdvīpe vā sāhasre [vā dvisāhasre
T06bsa034_u:4386: vā trisāhasra-]mahāsāhasre vā yāvaddaśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu mṛdumadhyādhimātrā pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:4387: tāṃ sarvāṃ śrāddho bodhisattvaḥ prasādasahagatenodārādhimuktisahagatena cetasā spharitvābhyanumodate /
T06bsa034_u:4388: iyamapi bodhisattvasyālpakṛcchreṇa mahatī apramāṇā tathāgatapūjā bodhāya mahāsaṃbhāraparigṛhītā yasyāṃ bodhisattvena satata-samitaṃ kalyāṇacittena hṛṣṭacittena yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4389: tatra yadbodhisattvaḥ stokastokaṃ muhūrtamuhūrtamantato godohamātramapi sarvasattva prāṇibhūteṣu maitracittaṃ bhāvayati /
T06bsa034_u:4391: tathā sarvasaṃskāreṣvanityasaṃjñāmanitye duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ duḥkhe 'nātmasaṃjñāṃ nirvāṇe cānuśaṃsasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /
T06bsa034_u:4393: tathā stokastokaṃ muhūrtamuhūrtaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ prādeśikena mṛdukṣāntikenāpi jñānena nirabhilāpyadharmasvabhāvatathatādhimukto nirvikalpena nirnimittena cetasā viharati /
T06bsa034_u:4400: yasyāḥ pūjāyāḥ pūrvikā lābhasatkārapūjā sarvākārāpi śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti vistareṇa yāvadupaniṣadamapi nopaiti
T06bsa034_u:4402: yathā tathāgatapūjā evaṃ dharmapūjā saṃghapūjā yathāyogaṃ veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4403: tatra triṣu ratneṣvetāṃ daśākārāṃ pūjāṃ kurvanbodhisattvastathāgatālambanaiḥ ṣaḍmiradhyāśayaiḥ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:4405: udumbarapuṣpavat sudurlaṃbhā 'dhyāśayatayā ekākinastrisāhasrama sāhasre loka utpādātkevalādhyāśayatayā
T06bsa034_u:4407: tasyaibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiradhyāśayaiḥ tathāgate tasya vā dharme tasya vā saṃghe pūjā prakalpitā parīttāpyaprameyaphalā bhavanti prāgeva prabhūtā /
T06bsa034_u:4408: tatra katibhirākāraiḥ samanvāgataṃ bodhisattvasya kalyāṇamitraṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:4413: katyākārayā ca saṃjñayā kalyāṇamitrasyāntikādbodhisattvena dharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4414: katiṣu ca sthāneṣu kalyāṇamitrasyāntikād bodhisattvena dharmaṃ śruṇvatā tasmindharmabhāṇake pudgale 'manasikāraḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4415: tatrāṣṭābhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgataṃ bodhisattvasya kalyāṇamitraṃ sarvākāraparipūrṇaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:4418: adhigamayuktaśca bhavati lābhī bhāvanāmayasyānyatamānyatamasya kuśalasya lāmī śamathavipaśyanāyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4419: anukampakaśca bhavati kāruṇikaḥ so 'dhyupekṣya svaṃ dṛṣṭadharmaṃsukhavihāraṃ pareṣāmarthāya parayujyate /
T06bsa034_u:4420: viśārado bhavati na pareṣāmasya dharmaṃ deśayataḥ smṛtiḥ pratibhānaṃ - va śāradyabhayāt pramuṣyate /
T06bsa034_u:4421: kṣamaśca bhavati parato 'vamānanāvahasanāvaspandana durukta-durāga-tādīnāmaniṣṭānāṃ vacanspathānāṃ vividhānañca sattvavipratipattīnām /
T06bsa034_u:4423: bhavati balavān pratisaṃkhyānabahulaḥ akilāsī catasṛṇāṃ pariṣadāṃ dharmadeśanāyai /
T06bsa034_u:4425: tatra pañcabhirākāraireva sarvākāraguṇayuktasya bodhisattvasya kalyāṇamitrasyābandhyaṃ kalyāṇamitrakaraṇīyaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4426: sa hi pareṣāmādita eva hitasukhaiṣī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4429: yena copāyena yadrupayā dharmadeśanayā yaḥ sattvaḥ śakyarūpo bhavati vinetuṃ tatra śakto bhavati pratibalaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4433: tatra pañcabhirākāraistatkalyāṇamitraṃ prasādapadasthitaṃ bhavati yenainaṃ pare 'tyarthamabhiprasīdantyanuśraveṇāpi śrutvā prāgeva sammukhaṃ nirīkṣya /
T06bsa034_u:4436: niṣkuhakaśca bhavati na pareṣāṃ kuhanārthamīryāpathaṃ sthairyaṃ vā pratisaṃkhyāya kalpayati /
T06bsa034_u:4437: anīrṣukaśca bhavati na pareṣāṃ dharmyaṃ kathāṃ lābhasatkāraṃ vā ārabhyāmarṣamutpādayati /
T06bsa034_u:4438: api tu svayamadhyeṣyamāṇo 'pi dharmakathane paraiḥ labhamāno 'pi vipulaṃ lābhasatkāraṃ paramapadiśati aśaṭhena cetasā prasannena /
T06bsa034_u:4440: yathā svena lābhasatkāreṇa tuṣṭo bhavati tathā bhṛśataraṃ paralābhena parasatkāreṇa tuṣṭo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4442: tatra pañcabhirākārairayaṃ kalyāṇamitrabhūto bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ vineyānāṃ kalyāṇamitrakāryaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:4449: tadyathā śrāvakabhūmāvavavādānuśāsanañca bhūyastata uttari veditavyaṃ tadyathā balagotrapaṭale /
T06bsa034_u:4453: niśritasya ca dhārmikeṣvarthasaṃyoga-viyogeṣu vaśavartanatayā avikampanatayā yathābhūtatvāviṣkaraṇatayā /
T06bsa034_u:4455: tatra kalyāṇamitrasyāntikāddharmaṃ śrotukāmena bodhisattvena pañcākārayā saṃjñayā dharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4461: tatra bodhisattvena kalyāṇamitrasyāntikāddharmaṃ śruṇvatā tasmindharmabhāṇake pudgale pañcasthāneṣvamanasikāraṃ kṛtvā 'vahitaśrotreṇa prasannamānasena dharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4472: naivaṃ cittamabhisaṃskartavyaṃ paruṣavākyoyaṃ krodhano na ca madhuraṃ dharmaṃ bhāṣate nāhamataḥ śroṣyāmīti /
T06bsa034_u:4473: ityevaṃ pañcasu sthāneṣvamanasikāraṃ kṛtvā bodhisattvena sādareṇa saddharmaparigrahaḥ kāryo na jātu dharmaḥ pudgaladoṣeṇa duṣṭo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4474: tatra yo 'sau mandaprajño bodhisattvaḥ pudgaladoṣeṣūpahatacitto dharmaṃ necchati śrotuṃ sa ātmana evāhitāya prajñāparihāṇāya pratipanno veditavyaḥ
T06bsa034_u:4480: yadbodhisattvastriṣu rāśiṣu sarvasattvānavasthāpya sukhitān duḥkhitān aduḥkhitāsukhitān
T06bsa034_u:4481: sattvān sukhakāmānadhikṛtya sukhopasaṃhārādhyāśayagatena maitreṇa cetasā daśadiśaḥ
T06bsa034_u:4484: yatpunaḥ dharmamātrasaṃjñī dharmamātre sattvopacāramāśayataḥ saṃpaśyaṃstāmeva maitrīṃ bhāvayati /
T06bsa034_u:4488: yathā sattvālambanā dharmālambanā 'nālambanā maitrī evaṃ karuṇā muditopekṣā api veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4489: tatra bodhisattvo duḥkhitān sattvānārabhya duḥkhāpanayanādhyāśayo daśasu dikṣu karuṇāsahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /
T06bsa034_u:4491: sukhitānvā punaḥ sattvānārabhya sukhānumodanādhyāśayo dasaśu dikṣu muditāsahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /
T06bsa034_u:4493: sa teṣāmeva trividhānāṃ sattvānāmaduḥkhāsukhitānā duḥkhitānāṃ sukhitānāñca yathākramaṃ mohadveṣarāgakleśavivekādhyāśayo daśasu dikṣūpekṣāsahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /
T06bsa034_u:4495: tatra yāni bodhisattvasya maitryādīnyapramāṇāni sattvālambanāni tānyanyatīrthya sādhāraṇāni veditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:4496: yāni punardharmālambanāni tāni śrāvakapratyekabuddhasādhāraṇāni na tvanyatīrthyasādhāraṇāni veditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:4500: ekama pramāṇaṃ hitādhyāśayasaṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyaṃ yaduta upekṣā /
T06bsa034_u:4504: tatra daśottaraśatākāraṃ duḥkhaṃ sattvadhātau saṃpaśyanto bodhisattvāḥ sattveṣu karuṇāṃ bhāvayanti /
T06bsa034_u:4510: sammohavipākañca duḥkhaṃ yaistīvraiḥ śārīrairveditaiḥ spṛṣṭastasminnātmabhāve ahamiti vā mameti vā sammūḍho 'tyarthaṃ śocati /
T06bsa034_u:4512: trividhaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatayā saṃskāraduḥkhatayā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā ca /
T06bsa034_u:4525: jātirduḥkhaṃ jarāvyādhirmaraṇamapriyasaṃyogaḥ priyavinābhāvaḥ yadapīcchanparyeṣamāṇo na labhate tadapi duḥkham /
T06bsa034_u:4539: sarvaduḥkhaṃ mahāduḥkhaṃ sarvatomukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipratipattiduḥkhaṃ pravṛttiduḥkhamakāmakāraduḥkhaṃ vighātaduḥkhamānuṣaṅgikaṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvākārañca (Dutt 168) duḥkham /
T06bsa034_u:4541: tatra mahāduḥkhaṃ yaddīrghaṃkālikaṃ pragāḍhaṃ citraṃ nirantarañca /
T06bsa034_u:4542: tatra sarvatomukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ yannārakaṃ tairyagyonikaṃ pretalaukikaṃ sugatiparyāpannañca /
T06bsa034_u:4543: tatra vipratipattiduḥkhaṃ yad dṛṣṭe vā dharme paravyatikramāt parāpakārakaraṇāllabhate samutthāpayati /
T06bsa034_u:4545: anayena vātmadṛṣṭadharmaduḥkhopakramāt svayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ samutthāpayati /
T06bsa034_u:4548: tatra pravṛttiduḥkhaṃ yat ṣaḍākārādaniyamādutpadyate saṃsāre saṃsarataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4551: mitrāmātyajñātisālohitāniyamāt mātāpitarau bhūtvā yāvadvistareṇa mitrāmātyajñātisālohito bhūtvā 'pareṇa samayena saṃsarato vadhako bhavati pratyarthikaḥ pratyamitraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4552: bhogāniyamācca saṃsāre saṃsaran mahābhogo bhūtvā punarapareṇa samayena paramadaridro bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4561: yacca dukhaṃ durbhikṣopaghātādvā paracakropadhātādvā 'ṭavīdurgapraveśasambādha saṃkaṭopaghātādvā utpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:4565: tatrānuṣaṅgikaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadaṣṭāsu lokadharmeṣu duḥkhaṃ naśana dharmake naṣṭe kṣayadharmake
T06bsa034_u:4566: kṣīṇe jarādharmake jīrṇe vyādhidharmake vyādhite maraṇadharmake mṛte 'lābhato vā
T06bsa034_u:4571: yatpañcākāraṃ yathoddiṣṭasukhavipakṣeṇa duḥkhaṃ hetuduḥkhaṃ vedayitaduḥkhaṃ sukhābhāvamātraduḥkhaṃ
T06bsa034_u:4576: ityetat pañcavidhaṃ pūrvakaṃ caikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya daśavidhaṃ dukhaṃ sarvākāramityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:4578: daśottaraśatākāraṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati bodhisattvaḥ karuṇāyā ālambanaṃ yenālambanena
T06bsa034_u:4582: sammohavipākaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃskāraduḥkhatāsaṃgṛhītaṃ duḥkhamātyantikaṃ duḥkhaṃ hetuduḥkhaṃ
T06bsa034_u:4584: pūrvahetukaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahadduḥkhaṃ nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ sugatisaṃgṛhītaṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvavipratipattijaṃ
T06bsa034_u:4587: tatra caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ karuṇā mahākaruṇetyucyate gambhīraṃ sūkṣmaṃ durvijñeyaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhamālamvyotpannā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4589: tīvreṇa cābhogenālambane pravṛttā bhavati yadrūpeṇābhogenāyaṃ karuṇāviṣṭo bodhisattvaḥ
T06bsa034_u:4590: sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpanayanahetoḥ svajīvitaśatānyapi parityajet prāgevaikaṃ jīvitaṃ prāgeva ca kāyapariṣkāram /
T06bsa034_u:4592: suviśuddhā ca bhavati tadyathā niṣṭhāgatānāśca bodhisattvānāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiviśuddhyā tathāgatānāñca tathāgatabhūmiviśuddhyā /
T06bsa034_u:4593: anena khalu daśottareṇākāraśatena ye bodhisattvaḥ karuṇāṃ bhāvayanti sattveṣu te sarvāṃ bodhisattvakaruṇāṃ bhāvayanti /
T06bsa034_u:4595: sattveṣu cātyarthaṃ snigdhacittāśca bhavanti premacittāśca kartukāmacittāścākhinnacittāśca duḥkhodbahanacittāśca karmaṇyavaśyacittāśca /
T06bsa034_u:4596: na ca tathā duḥkhasatyamabhisamitavata āryaśrāvakasya niṣṭhāgatasya dūrībhūtā (Dutt 170)
T06bsa034_u:4597: nirvit-sahagatā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate yathā bodhisattvasyura sattveṣu karuṇāpūrvaṅgamena cittena daśottarākāraśatapatitametaṃ mahāntaṃ duḥkhaskandhaṃ saṃpaśyataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4598: na ca bodhisattva evaṃ karuṇāparibhāvitamānasaḥ kiñcidādhyātmikabāhyaṃ vastu yanna parityajet /
T06bsa034_u:4604: tasmāttathāgatāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ santaḥ-kutra pratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvasya bodhiriti-samyak vyākurvāṇā vyākurvanti karuṇāpratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvasya bodhiriti
T06bsa034_u:4605: tatraikaikamatra yathānirdiṣṭamapramāṇa[mapramāṇayā] samṛddhyā samṛddhiṃ bodhisattvasya pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:4624: avadyasamudācāre ātmana evāpratirūpatāṃ viditvā bodhisattvasya lajjā hrīḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4626: sā punarllajjā bodhisattvasya prakṛtyaiva tīvrā bhavati prāgevābhyastā /
T06bsa034_u:4635: tathā bodhisattvasya kaukṛtye samutpanne sapratisaraṇe ānuṣaṅgike yā lajjā /
T06bsa034_u:4642: bhayabhairavairāmukhaiḥ samyak prayogāvikampanatā prakṛtisattvayogāt pratisaṃkhyānādvā dhīratā /
T06bsa034_u:4645: asyāḥ khalu bodhisattvānāṃ dhṛtibalādhānatāyāḥ samāsataḥ pañcavidhamadhiṣṭhānaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:4651: tatra pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairaparikhinnamānasatā bodhisattvānāṃ sarvasamyak prayogeṣu veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4652: iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā balavān bhavati yena na parikhidyate /
T06bsa034_u:4653: punaḥ saivākhinnamānasatā 'nena punaḥ punarabhyastā bhavati yena na parikhidyate /
T06bsa034_u:4654: punarupāyaparigṛhītenavīryāṃrambheṇa prayukto bhavati yena paurvāparyeṇa viśeṣaṃ samanupaśyan na parikhidyate /
T06bsa034_u:4655: tīvreṇa ca prajñāpratisaṃkhyānabalena samanvāgato bhavati yena na parikhidyate /
T06bsa034_u:4656: tīvrañcāsya bodhisattvasya sattveṣu kāruṇyacittamanukampācittaṃ satatasamitaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati yena na parikhidyate /
T06bsa034_u:4658: iha bodhisattvena pañcavidhāsthānānyārabhya nāmakāya-padakāya-vyañjanakāya-pratisaṃyukto dharmaḥ parataḥ sugṛhīto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4660: tasyaiva ca dharmasyārthaḥ parato vā suśruto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4662: evamapi ca dharmajñenārthajñena bodhisattvena tasyaiva ca dharmasyārthasyāvismaraṇāya
T06bsa034_u:4664: śrutacintāniṣṭhāgatenāpi cānena kālāntarakṛtaḥ paripākaḥ prasādaḥ tasmindharme cārthe ca pratilabdho bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4665: ebhirākārairbodhisattvasyāpramāṇā paripūrṇā aviparītā ca śāstrajñatā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4667: iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvalokamārabhyaivaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti-kṛcchraṃ vatāyaṃ loka
T06bsa034_u:4668: āpanno yaduta jāyate 'pi jīryate 'pi mriyate 'pi cyavatepyupapadyatepyatha ca punaramī
T06bsa034_u:4671: niṣkaṣāyānutsadakaṣāyakālatāñca yaduta pañcakaṣāyānārabhya āyuṣkaṣāyaṃ [sattvakaṣāyaṃ] kleśakaṣāyaṃ kalpakaṣāyam /
T06bsa034_u:4672: tadyathā etarhyalpaṃ jīvitaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ yaściraṃ jīvati sa varṣaśatam /
T06bsa034_u:4673: tadyathaitarhi sattvā yadbhūyasā [a]mātṛjñā apitṛjñā aśrāmaṇyā abrāhmaṇyā na kulajyeṣṭhāpacāyakā
T06bsa034_u:4674: nārthakarā na kṛtyakarā na iha loke na paraloke avadye bhayadarśino na dānāni dadati
T06bsa034_u:4675: na puṇyāni kurvanti nopavāsamupavasanti na śīlaṃ samādāya vartante /
T06bsa034_u:4678: tadyathaitarhi saddharmapralopāya saddharmāntardhānāya saddharmapratirūpakāṇi prabhūtāni prādurbhūtāni mithyādharmārtha-santīraṇāpūrvikāṇi /
T06bsa034_u:4683: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sattvalokamārabhya lokajño bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4684: punarbodhisattvo bhājanalokasya saṃvartavivartaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yathā bhājanalokaḥ saṃvartate vivartate ca /
T06bsa034_u:4686: lokanirodhagāminīñca pratipadaṃ lokasyāsvādamādīnavañca niḥsaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:4687: punarbodhisattvaḥ cakṣuryāvanmanaḥ arūpiṇaśca skandhāṃścāturmahābhautikañca puruṣasya samucchrayametāvanmanuṣyatvamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:4688: tatra yā saṃjñā ātmā vā sattvo veti saṃjñāmātramevaitat /
T06bsa034_u:4689: tatra yā pratijñā ahaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyāmi yāvanmanasā dharmāna vijānāmīti pratijñāmātrameva tat /
T06bsa034_u:4690: tatra yo vyavahāra ityapi sa āyuṣmānevaṃnāmā evaṃjātīya evaṃgotra evamāhāra evaṃ
T06bsa034_u:4691: sukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evaṃ dīryāyurevaṃ cirasthitika evamāyuṣparyanta iti vyavahāramātramevaitaditi
T06bsa034_u:4693: iti hi sa bodhisattvaḥ sattvalokapravṛttiñca bhājanalokapravṛttiñca aṣṭākāralokopaparīkṣārthañca [lokaparamārthaṃ ca] yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T06bsa034_u:4695: punarbodhisattvo vṛddhatarakaṃ guṇaprativiśiṣṭatarakaṃ dṛṣṭvā samyak saṃbhāṣayatyutthāyāsanenopanimantrayati (Dutt 174)
T06bsa034_u:4697: tulyaṃ vā punarvayasā guṇaiśca dṛṣṭvā samyagālapati pratisamodayati ślakṣṇairmadhurairvacanapathaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4699: hīnaṃ vā punarvayasā guṇaiśca dṛṣṭvā śaktyā guṇādhānamārabhya protsāhayati /
T06bsa034_u:4704: nāpyarthikaṃ kenaciddharmāmiṣeṇa taṃ jñātvā vimukho bhavati bhṛkuṭīkṛtaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4707: tathā sarveṣāmeva hīnatulyaviśiṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvābhibhāṣī ca bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4708: ehi svāgatavādī samyak pratiśāmakaśca samyagdharmāmiṣābhyāṃ yathāśaktyā saṃgrāhakaśca /
T06bsa034_u:4709: nāpi ca sattveṣu kuṭilagāmbhīryopeto bhavati na garvitaḥ kenacidevocchrayaviśeṣeṇa /
T06bsa034_u:4710: yathopāttaṃ sattvaṃ sarvopakaraṇairapi nādhyupekṣate glānaṃ vā svasthaṃ vā ānulomikena ca kāyavākkarmaṇā /
T06bsa034_u:4711: yathā saṃstutaṃ tathaivāsaṃstutaṃ sarvaṃ mitrasakhā ca bhavati vigatapratyarthikaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4712: sarveṣāñcānāthānāmapratisaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ cārthakriyāṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:4713: na ca kenacit paryāyeṇa pareṣāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyamupasaṃharati kaccideṣāṃ muhūrtamapyasparśavihāro bhavatviti /
T06bsa034_u:4714: etameva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā parihasannapi paraiḥ saha yuktaparihāso bhavati nāyuktaparihāsaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4715: asatyavacanāni ca na kathayatyapi niratyayaiḥ paramaviśrambhopagatairvayasyakaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4717: kroddho 'pi ca pareṣāṃ na marmāṇi kīrtayati /
T06bsa034_u:4718: paraiśca kāyena vācā vāhataḥ san pratisaṃkhyāya dharmatāṃ vā pratisarati ātmānameva vā 'parādhikaṃ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:4724: dṛṣṭadharmahitārthaṃ vā bhogapratisaṃyuktamārabhya utthānasaṃpanno bhavatyārakṣāsaṃpannaḥ samajīvī /
T06bsa034_u:4730: nikṣiptasya viśvāsena paradraviṇasya na drogdhā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4731: upāttasya parata ṛṇasya na visaṃvādayitā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4733: ratnaṃ vā ratnasammatamupādāya yāvat kārṣāpaṇe 'pi sammūḍhānāṃ na vipralambhayitā bhavati vipralobhyainām /
T06bsa034_u:4735: teṣu ca teṣvarthakaraṇīyeṣu parairāyācitaḥ san sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati na vikampate nānyenānyaṃ pratisarati /
T06bsa034_u:4737: rājyaṃ vā punaḥ kārayan dharmeṇa kārayati nāgharmeṇa /
T06bsa034_u:4741: dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditayā śrute mate vijñāte vijñātavāditayā adṛṣṭe 'dṛṣṭavāditayā aśrute
T06bsa034_u:4743: yathā loke vijñātavyo yathā loke vartitavyaṃ tatsarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tasmāllokajña ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:4745: iha bodhisattvaḥ arthārthī parato dharmaṃ śruṇoti na vyañjanābhisaṃskārārthī /
T06bsa034_u:4746: so 'rthārthī dharmaṃ śuṇvan na vyañjanārthī prākṛtayāpi vācā dharmaṃ deśayamānamarthapratisaraṇo bodhisattvaḥ satkṛtya śṛṇoti /
T06bsa034_u:4748: prajānan yuktipratiśaraṇo bhavati na sthavireṇābhijñātena vā pudgalena tathāgatena vā [saṃghena vā] ime dharmā bhāṣitā iti pudgalapratisaraṇo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4749: sa evaṃ yuktipratisaraṇo na pudgalapratisaraṇastattvārthāt na vicalati /
T06bsa034_u:4750: a-parapratyayaśca bhavati dharmeṣu punarbodhisattvastathāgate viviṣṭaśraddho niviṣṭaprasāda ekāntiko vacasyabhiprasannastathāgata-nītārthaṃ sūtraṃ pratisarati na neyārtham /
T06bsa034_u:4752: tathāhi neyārthasya sūtrasya nānāmukhaprakṛtārthavibhāgo 'niścitaḥ saṃdehakaro bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4753: sacetpunarbodhisattvo nītārthe 'pi sūtre 'naikāntikaḥ syādevamasau saṃhāryaḥ syādasmāddharmavinayāt /
T06bsa034_u:4755: sa yadbhāvanāmayena jñānena jñātavyaṃ na tacchakyaṃ śrutacintāvijñānamātrakeṇa vijñātumiti (Dutt 176)
T06bsa034_u:4756: viditvā paramagambhīrānapi tathāgatabhāṣitāndharmān śrutvā na pratikṣipati nāpavadati /
T06bsa034_u:4759: tatraiṣu caturṣu pratisaraṇeṣu samāsataścaturṇāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ saṃprakāśitam /
T06bsa034_u:4763: yatsarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvaparyāyeṣu yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca bhāvanāmayamasaktamavivartyaṃ jñānam /
T06bsa034_u:4765: yatpunaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmeva sarvalakṣaṇeṣu yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca bhāvanāmayamasaktamavivartyaṃ jñānam /
T06bsa034_u:4767: yatpunaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmeva sarvanirvacaneṣu yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca bhāvanāmayamasaktamavivartyaṃ jñānam /
T06bsa034_u:4769: yatpunaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmeva sarvaprakārapadaprabhedeṣu yāvadbhāvikatayā yathāvadbhāvikatayā ca bhāvanāmayamasaktamavivartyaṃ jñānam /
T06bsa034_u:4771: etāścatasro bodhisattvapratisaṃvido niśrityo 'prameyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ pañcasthānakauśalyaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:4776: ata uttari svayamabhisaṃbodho nāsti kutaḥ punaḥ pareṣāṃ prakāśanā /
T06bsa034_u:4782: sa punaḥ puṇyajñānasaṃbhāro bodhisattvasya prathame kalpāsaṃkhyeye mṛdurveditavyo dvitīye madhyastṛtīye 'dhimātro veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4783: kathaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saptatriṃsatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu yogaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:4784: iha bodhisattvaścatasro bodhisattvapratisaṃvido niśrityopāya-parigṛhītena jñānena saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāndharmānyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:4786: sa (Dutt 177) dvividhenāpi yānanayena tān yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti śrāvakayānanayena ca mahāyānanayena ca /
T06bsa034_u:4788: tadyathā śrāvakabhūmau sarvaṃ yathā nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:4791: iha bodhisattvaḥ kāye kāyānudarśī viharan naiva kāyaṃ kāyabhāvato vikalpayati /
T06bsa034_u:4796: yathā kāye kāyānupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānaṃ evamavaśiṣṭāni smṛtyupasthānāni aviśiṣṭāśca bodhipakṣyā dharmā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4797: sa naiva kāyādīndharmān duḥkhato vā vikalpayati samudayato vā /
T06bsa034_u:4800: nirabhilāpyasvabhāvadharmatayā ca duḥkhadharmatāṃ samudayadharmatāṃ nirodhadharmatāṃ mārgadharmatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:4803: tatra yā bodhisattvasyaiṣā dharmāṇāmevamavikalpanā so 'sya śamatho draṣṭavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4804: yacca tadyathābhūtajñānaṃ pāramārthikaṃ yacca tadapramāṇa-vyavasthānanayajñānaṃ dharmeṣu iyamasya vipaśyanā draṣṭavyā /
T06bsa034_u:4807: anābhogavāhanaḥ tasmiṃśca nirabhilāpye vastumātrai nirnimittatayā ca nirvikalpacittāśāntyā
T06bsa034_u:4811: etaccaturākāra-śamathapūrvaṅgamā sarvadharmeṣu samāropāsadgrāhāntavivarjitā apavādāsadgrāhāntavivarjitā apramāṇadharmaprabhedavyavasthāna-nayānugatā ca vipaśyanā /
T06bsa034_u:4820: yā bodhisattvasya sarvasattveṣu karuṇāsahagatā apekṣā yacca sarvasaṃskāreṣu yathābhūtasarvaparijñānaṃ yā cānuttarasamyaksaṃbodhijñāne spṛhā
T06bsa034_u:4821: yacca sattvāpekṣāṃ niśritya saṃsārāparityāgaḥ yā ca saṃskāreṣu yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ niśrityāsaṃkliṣṭacittasya saṃsārasaṃsṛtī /
T06bsa034_u:4831: kathañca bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ parīttāni kuśalamūlāni apramāṇaphalatāyāmupanayati /
T06bsa034_u:4832: iha bodhisattvo yat kiṃcit sattvaṃ pratyavaramapi vastvantataḥ saktuprasṛtaṃ pratyavara
T06bsa034_u:4833: eva kṣetre pradāpayati antatastiryagyonigate 'pi parīttaṃ tacca prāṇibhūte dāpayitvā
T06bsa034_u:4835: evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ vastuto 'pi kṣetrato 'pi parīttaṃ tacca pariṇāmanā-vaśenāpramāṇaphalatayāmupanītaṃ bhavati
T06bsa034_u:4836: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāmalpakṛcchreṇa vipulānyapramāṇāni kuśalamūlāni saṃjanayati /
T06bsa034_u:4843: samyagdhyānaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya cāyatyāṃ akṛchreṇa sahaiva sukhena saha saumanasyena
T06bsa034_u:4846: punargambhīrāṃstathāgatabhāṣitān śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktāndharmān tathā tathā uttānīkaroti saṃprakāśayati yathā pare śrutvā tīvrañca saṃvegamutpādayanti tīvraṃ ca prasādam /
T06bsa034_u:4847: tadekakṣaṇikamapi saṃvegaprasādasahagataṃ cittaṃ vipula[kuśamūla]saṃgrahe saṃkhyāṃ gacchati prāgeva prābandhikam /
T06bsa034_u:4848: punarbodhisattvo yāni kānicinmālyāni gandhajātāni ca loke vividhāni pravarāṇi praṇītāni
T06bsa034_u:4850: punaḥ sarvā diśastenaiva prasādasahagatenādhyāśayena spharitvā sarvāṃ triratnapūjāmabhyanumodate parāṃścābhyanumodayati /
T06bsa034_u:4851: punarbuddhānusmṛtiṃ satatasamitaṃ bhāvayati pareṣāñca samādāpayati dharmānusmṛtiṃ saṃghānusmṛtiṃ yāvaddevatānusmṛtim /
T06bsa034_u:4852: punarmanojalpaistriratna-namaskriyayā abandhyaṃ kālaṃ karoti kārayati ca /
T06bsa034_u:4856: punaratītapratyutpannāni sarva-skhalitāni sarvavyatikramāṃśca kalyāṇena śikṣākāmānugatena cetasā sarvadikṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike pratideśayati
T06bsa034_u:4858: tasyaivamabhīkṣṇaṃ skhalitaṃ pratideśayataḥ sarvakarmāvaraṇebhyo vimokṣo bhavatyalpakṛcchreṇa /
T06bsa034_u:4859: punaḥ prabhūtairvicitraiśca nirmāṇaiḥ sarvadikṣu buddhadharmasaṃghādhiṣṭhānaṃ sattvādhiṣṭhānañcāprameyaṃ bodhisattvaḥ ṛddhimāṃścetovaśiprāptaḥ puṇyaparigrahaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:4862: evaṃ hi bodhisattvo 'lpakṛcchreṇa vipulānyaprameyaphalāni kuśalamūlānyabhinirharati samudānayati /
T06bsa034_u:4867: (Dutt 180) atrāpi bodhisattvasya caturvidhasyāpyasya sattvārthasyābhiniṣpattaye samāsataḥ ṣaḍvidha evopāyo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4868: ānulomiko vibandhasthāyī visabhāgāśayaḥ avaṣṭambhajaḥ kṛtaprakṛtikaḥ viśuddhaśca ṣaṣṭha upāyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4870: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvameva tāvad yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayitukāmo bhavati teṣāṃ
T06bsa034_u:4876: tañca punardharmaṃ yathārhaṃ supraveśaṃ gamakaṃ kālenānupūrvamaviparītamarthopasaṃhitañca deśayati /
T06bsa034_u:4878: sattvavinaye paramayā ca kartukāmatayā anukampācittena samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4879: sa ṛddhyā cittādeśanayā yuktarūpayā dharmadeśanayā paraṃ vā 'dhyeṣya vicitrairvā prabhūtaiśca nirmitaiḥ sattvānvinayati /
T06bsa034_u:4881: tathā uddeśadānena anusmaraṇaparipṛcchādānena dhṛtānāñcodgṛhītānāñca dharmāṇāṃ samyagarthavivaraṇatayā
T06bsa034_u:4883: ye ca sattvā gambhīrāṇāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktānāṃ sūtrāntānāmābhiprāyikaṃ
T06bsa034_u:4884: tathāgatānāmarthamavijñāya ye te sūtrāntāḥ niḥsvabhāvatāṃ dharmāṇāmabhivadanti nirvastukatāmanutpannāniruddhatāmā
T06bsa034_u:4886: tān sūtrāntān sarveṇa sarvaṃ pratikṣipanti naite tathāgatabhāṣitā iti /
T06bsa034_u:4887: teṣāmapi sattvānāṃ sa bodhisattvaḥ ānulomikenopāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ tathāgatābhiprāyikamarthaṃ yathāvadanulomayati /
T06bsa034_u:4890: yathā neme dharmāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante api tvabhilāpātmakaḥ svabhāva eṣāṃ nāsti teneme niḥsvabhāvā ityucyante /
T06bsa034_u:4891: yadyapyetavabhilāpyavastu vidyate yadāśrityābhilāpāḥ pravartante tadapi yairabhilāpairyat svabhāvamabhilapyate tadapi na tatsvabhāva paramārthataḥ
T06bsa034_u:4892: tasmānnirvastukā ityucyante evañca sati te 'bhilāpyāḥ svabhāvā dharmāṇāmādita eva sarveṇa (Dutt 181)
T06bsa034_u:4894: te kimutpatsyante vā nirotsyante vā tasmādanutpannā aniruddhā ityucyante /
T06bsa034_u:4895: tadyathā cākāśe vicitrāṇi prabhūtāni rūpāṇi rūpakarmāṇi copalabhyante /
T06bsa034_u:4896: sarveṣāñca teṣāṃ rūpāṇāṃ rūpakarmaṇāṃ cāvakāśaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:4898: yadā ca punastad rūpaṃ tāni ca rūpakarmāṇyapanītāni bhavanti tadā rūpābhāvamātrātmakameva pariśuddhamākāśaṃ khyāti /
T06bsa034_u:4899: evaṃ tasminnākāśasthānīye nirabhilāpye vastuni vividhābhilāpakṛtāḥ saṃjñā vikalpāḥ prapañcasaṃjñānugatāḥ rūpakarmasthānīyāḥ pravartante /
T06bsa034_u:4900: sarveṣāñca teṣāmabhilāpakṛtānāṃ saṃjñāvikalpānāṃ prapañcasaṃjñānugatānāṃ citrarūpakarmasthānīyānāṃ tannirabhilāpyaṃ vastvākāśa sthānīyamavakāśaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:4902: prapañcasaṃjñānugatāḥ sarveṇa sarvamapanītā bhavanti tadā teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ paramāryāṇāṃ
T06bsa034_u:4905: na ca tasmāt paramanyaṃ svabhāvamasya mṛgayante /
T06bsa034_u:4907: tadyathā māyā na ca yathā khyāti tathāsti /
T06bsa034_u:4908: na ca punaḥ sarveṇaiva sarvaṃ nāsti tanmāyākṛtam /
T06bsa034_u:4909: evaṃ na caite dharmā yathaivābhilāpasaṃstavavaśena khyānti bālānāṃ tathaiva saṃvidyante /
T06bsa034_u:4910: na ca punaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante pāramārthika-nirabhilāpyātmanā /
T06bsa034_u:4911: te cānena nayapraveśena na santo nāsanta ityadvayā māyāvat /
T06bsa034_u:4913: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasmāddharmadhātorna kiñcidutkṣipati na ca kiñcit pratikṣipati nonī-karoti nādhikaṃ karoti na vināśayati /
T06bsa034_u:4917: tatra katamo bodhisattvasya vibandhasthāyī upāyaḥ iha bodhisattvo bhojanapānādi-daśa-kāyādipariṣkārārthikānāṃ [sattvānāṃ] vipratibandhenāvatiṣṭhate
T06bsa034_u:4918: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pitṛjñāḥ śrāmaṇyāḥ brāhmaṇyā vistareṇa pūrvavat yāvatsacecchīlaṃ
T06bsa034_u:4919: samādāya vartadhve evamahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ bhojanapānādīn kāyapariṣkārānyāvadarthamanupradāsyāmi /
T06bsa034_u:4924: evamahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ vistareṇa yāvatkṛtyeṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gamiṣyāmi sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pūrvavat /
T06bsa034_u:4927: sa cenmātṛjñāḥ [pitṛjñā] bhavatheti vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavato 'smādvyasanādvimocayiṣyāmīti /
T06bsa034_u:4929: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatheti pūrvavat vistareṇaivamahaṃ bhavato 'smādbhayāt paritrāsyāmīti /
T06bsa034_u:4931: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatha vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavatāṃ priyasamāgamamapriyavinābhāvaṃ copasaṃhariṣyāmīti /
T06bsa034_u:4933: sa cenmātṛjñā bhavatha vistareṇa pūrvavat evamahaṃ bhavato 'smādvyādhiduḥkhāt parimocayiṣyāmīti /
T06bsa034_u:4934: te ca sattvāḥ evaṃ vibandhāvasthitasya bodhisattvasya laghuladhveva tasmin kuśalasamādāne pāpaprahāṇe ca yathākāmaṃ karaṇīyā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:4936: ye punaḥ sattvā evaṃ vibandhasthāyino bodhisattvasya yathāparikīrtiteṣu vastuṣu na
T06bsa034_u:4937: laghu-laghveva yathākāmaṃ pratipadyante teṣāṃ bodhisattvo yathā parikīrtitairvastubhirarthikānāṃ
T06bsa034_u:4940: vyasanasthān bhītānpriyāpriyasaṃyogavisaṃyogakāmān vyādhiduḥkhena ārtān sattvān kañcitkālamadhyupekṣate hitakāmatayā /
T06bsa034_u:4942: te ca sattvā evaṃ niṣṭhurakarmaṇā pratipadyamānasya bodhisattvasya na tvāśayataḥ apareṇa samayena yathākāmakaraṇīyā bhavanti pāpaprahāṇāya kuśalasamādānāya ca /
T06bsa034_u:4944: bodhisattvasya nāpi ca vyasanasthā nāpi vistareṇa yāvadvyādhitāste cāsya saṃstutāḥ sapraṇayāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:4945: tānapi bodhisattvastasminneva kuśala-[mūle] samādāpayati yaduta mātṛjñatāyāṃ vistareṇa yāvacchīlasamādānānuvartanāyām /
T06bsa034_u:4946: ta evaṃ bodhisattvena samādāpyamānāḥ sa cedvikampanena [na] pratipadyante teṣāṃ bodhisattvaḥ kupitamapyātmānamupadarśayati hitakāmatayā /
T06bsa034_u:4952: visabhāgo 'sya bodhisattvasya teṣu [sattveṣu] tasyāśceṣṭāyāḥ sa āśayo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:4953: tena ca tānsattvāṃstasmin pāpaprahāṇe kuśalasamādāne ca sanniyojayati /
T06bsa034_u:4956: iha bodhisattvaḥ svāmibhūto vā rājabhūto vā ādhipatyaprāptaḥ svaṃ vā parijanaṃ sva vā vijitamevaṃ samyak samanuśāsti /
T06bsa034_u:4957: yo me kaścitparijane vā vijite vā 'mātṛjño bhaviṣyati vistareṇa yāvaddauśīlyaṃ samādāya
T06bsa034_u:4958: vartiṣyate tasyāhamucitaṃ vā bhaktācchādanaṃ samucchetsyāmi vārayiṣyāmi vā tāḍayiṣyāmi
T06bsa034_u:4959: vā sarvasvena vā viyojayiṣyāmi sarveṇa vā sarva vijitāt pravāsayiṣyāmīti /
T06bsa034_u:4960: tatra ca karmaṇi kuśalān dakṣān pauruṣeyānviniyojayati /
T06bsa034_u:4961: te ca sattvāstasmānmahato daṇḍakarmaṇo bhītāḥ pāpañca prajahati kuśalañca samādāya vartante /
T06bsa034_u:4962: akāmakā api tena balāvaṣṭambhena kuśale sanniyojyante te sattvā anenopāyena /
T06bsa034_u:4965: saha bodhisattvena yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvamevopakāraḥ parīttaḥ prabhūto vā kṛto bhavati dānena vā vyasanaparitrāṇatayā (Dutt 184)
T06bsa034_u:4966: vā bhayaparitrāṇatayā vā priyāpriyasaṃyogavisayogopasaṃharaṇatayā vā vyādhisaśamanatayā
T06bsa034_u:4967: vā teṣāṃ kṛtajñānāṃ kṛtavedināṃ pratyupakāra-kāmānāmantikādbodhisattvaḥ kuśalasamādānameva
T06bsa034_u:4972: sa cedyūyameva mātṛjñā bhavatha pitṛjñā vistareṇa yāvacchīlaṃ samādāya vartadhve
T06bsa034_u:4973: kṛtasya pratikṛtaṃ kuśalasamādānaṃ parataḥ pratyāsaṃśate tena copāyena parāṃstatra
T06bsa034_u:4977: iha niṣṭhāgamana-bodhisattvabhūmi-sthito bodhisattvaḥ suviśodhitabodhisattvamārgastuṣite devanikāye upapadyate /
T06bsa034_u:4979: sa na cirasyedānīṃ jambūdvīpe anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /
T06bsa034_u:4982: punarbodhisattvastuṣitāddevanikāyāccyutvā ucce vā sammate vā kule upapadyate yaduta rājakule vā purohitakule vā /
T06bsa034_u:4990: nāvaramātrakametaddharmākhyānaṃ bhavati yatredānīṃ brahmā [svayaṃ] dharmadeśanāyai bhagavantamadhyeṣata iti /
T06bsa034_u:4993: paravyāpāritena na tu svena sattveṣu kāruṇyacittena nātmana eva pratirupatāṃ viditveti /
T06bsa034_u:4999: yasmādupāyādanya upāya uttari atikrāntataraśca praṇītataraśca nāsti /
T06bsa034_u:5002: sattvānāṃ pratighātāya nayanāya madhyasthānāmavatārāyāvatīrṇānāṃ paripākāya paripakkānāṃ vimocanāya /
T06bsa034_u:5012: iha bodhisattvastadrūpāṃ smṛtiprajñābalādhānatāṃ pratilabhate yathā śrutamātrakeṇaivānāmnātān
T06bsa034_u:5020: iha bodhisattvastadrūpaṃ samādhivaśitāṃ pratilabhate yathā yāni mantrapadānīti saṃśamanāya sattvānāmadhitiṣṭhanti /
T06bsa034_u:5025: iha bodhisattvaḥ svayaṃ pragāḍhahetucaritaḥ prajñāvān praviviktavihārī vācamapyanudīrayan
T06bsa034_u:5026: darśanapathamapyanāgacchan kenacit saha tathā mātrābhojī asaṃkīrṇabhojī ekaprakārāśanabhojī
T06bsa034_u:5027: pradhyānaparataḥ alpaṃ rātrau svapan bahu jāgran yānīmāni tathāgatabhāṣitāni bodhisattvakṣāntilābhāya
T06bsa034_u:5028: mantrapadāni tadyathā iṭi miṭi kiṭibhiḥ kṣāntipadāni svāhā /
T06bsa034_u:5030: sa teṣāṃ mantrapadānāmevaṃ samyak pratipanna evamarthaṃ svayamevāśrutvā kutaścit pratividhyati /
T06bsa034_u:5031: tad yathā nāstyeṣāṃ mantrapadānāṃ kācidarthapariniṣpattiḥ nirarthā evaite /
T06bsa034_u:5034: iyatā tena teṣāṃ mantrapadānāmarthaḥ supratividdho bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5035: sa (Dutt 186) teṣāṃ mantrapadānāmarthaṃ samyak pratividhya tenaivārthānusāreṇa sarvadharmāṇāmatyarthaṃ samyak pratividhyati svayamevāśrutvā parataḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5039: sa evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvārthaṃ samyak pratividhya tasmātparamarthaṃ na samanveṣate /
T06bsa034_u:5041: tena bodhisattvena pratilabdhā tāni dhāraṇīpadānyadhiṣṭhāya bodhisattvakṣāntirvaktavyā /
T06bsa034_u:5042: tasyāśca lābhāt sa bodhisattvo na cirasyedānīmadhyāśayaviśuddhiṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:5045: tatra dharmadhāraṇīmarthadhāraṇīñca bodhisattvaḥ prathamasya kalpāsaṃkhyeyasyātyayācchuddhādhyāśayabhūmipraviṣṭo labhate niyatāṃ sthirāmudārāñca
T06bsa034_u:5046: tataḥ punararvāg labhate praṇidhānavaśena vā dhyānasanniśrayeṇa vā natu niyatāṃ na sthirāṃ nodārām /
T06bsa034_u:5048: bodhisattvakṣāntilābhāya tu dhāraṇī yathaiva vyākhyātā tathaiva labhyate /
T06bsa034_u:5049: etāḥ punaḥ sarvā dhāraṇīrbodhisattvaścaturbhiguṇairyukto labhate nānyatamavikalaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5053: dharmārāmaśca bhavati dharmarato bodhisattvapiṭakamārabhya piṭakamātṛkāṃ vā
T06bsa034_u:5061: āyatyāṃ sarvabodhisattvakuśalasaṃgrahāya sarvaguṇasaṃgrahāya ca samāsato vyāsato vā praṇidhānaṃ bodhisattvasya samyak praṇidhānamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5065: buddhānāṃ ca bhagavatāṃ saddharma-parigrahārakṣaṇatāyai dharmanetrīsandhāraṇāya mahāpraṇidhānam /
T06bsa034_u:5075: iha bodhisattvasya sarvābhilāṣātmakena svabhāvena virahitaṃ nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu paśyataḥ yā cittasya sthitiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5078: iha bodhisattvasya tadeva nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu mithyāvikalpasamutthāpitena
T06bsa034_u:5079: kleśena duḥkhena ca parigṛhītatvādanekadoṣaduṣṭaṃ samanupaśyato yā āyatyāṃ tatrāpraṇidhānapūrvikā cittasthitiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5082: iha bodhisattvasya tadeva nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu sarvavikalpaprapañca nimittānyapanīya yathābhūtaṃ śāntato manasi kurvato yā cittasthitiḥ
T06bsa034_u:5085: nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ dvayamidaṃ saccāsacca /
T06bsa034_u:5086: tatra saṃskṛtamasaskṛtañca sat asadātmā vātmīyaṃ vā /
T06bsa034_u:5089: yat punaretadasadeva vastu tatra bodhisattvena na praṇidhānaṃ nāpraṇidhānaṃ karaṇīyam /
T06bsa034_u:5092: evaṃ hi bodhisattva eṣu triṣu samādhiṣu yogaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:5094: tadanyākārānapi trīnsamādhīnyathābhūta-vyavasthāna-nayapraveśena bhāvanā-nayapraveśena ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yeṣu śrāvakāḥ śikṣante samudāgacchati ca /
T06bsa034_u:5095: catvārīmāni dharmoddānāni yāni buddhāśca bodhisattvāśca sattvānāṃ viśuddhaye deśayanti /
T06bsa034_u:5101: etat pratisaṃyuktārtha yadbhūyasā dharmamudīrayanti buddhabodhisattvāḥ sattvānām /
T06bsa034_u:5106: iha bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārāṇāmabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ nityakālameva nāstītyupalabhyānityataḥ sarvasaṃskārān paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:5107: punaravijñātasya bhūtatastasyaiva nirabhilāpyasya vastunaḥ aparijñānahetukamudayavyayamupalabhyatān nirabhilāpyasvabhāvān sarvasaṃskārānanityataḥ samanupaśyati /
T06bsa034_u:5110: tasmātteṣāṃ naiva hetuto naiva svabhāvato vidyamānatāṃ samanupaśyati /
T06bsa034_u:5114: tasmātteṣāṃ svabhāvato vidyamānatāṃ samanupaśyati no tu hetutaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5120: sa eva triṣvadhvasvavyavacchinnāṃ saṃskāra-santatiṃ pravartamānāṃ dṛṣṭvā ekaikasmin saṃskārakṣaṇe trīṇi saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni paśyati
T06bsa034_u:5122: tatra pūrvasaṃskārakṣaṇe svabhāvavināśānantara yo 'pūrvasaṃskārakṣaṇasvabhāvaprādurbhāvaḥ sā jātiriti paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:5124: taṃ pūrvaniruddhaṃ saṃskārajñaṇasvabhāvamapekṣya tasyotpannasya yadanyatvamanyathātvaṃ vā sā jareti paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:5125: tasmājjātikṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ tasyaivotpannasya saṃskārakṣaṇasya yaḥ svabhāvavināśaḥ sa vyaya iti paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:5127: tatsvabhāvāneva tasya jātiṃ sthitiṃ jarāṃ ca /
T06bsa034_u:5129: tasmācca kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ ca eva tasya saṃskārakṣaṇa[svabhāva]syāpagamaḥ sa eva teṣāṃ
T06bsa034_u:5130: jātyādīnāmiti yathābhūtaṃ paśyati tānyetāni catvāryaṣi saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānyabhisamasya
T06bsa034_u:5133: tatra bhagavatā yo bhāvastadekaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
T06bsa034_u:5135: sa ca bhāvasteṣāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ sthityanyathātvaprabhāvita iti kṛtvā tṛtīyaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
T06bsa034_u:5136: tatra bodhisattvaḥ saṃskāramātraṃ sthāpayitvā na tasya jātiṃ na sthitiṃ na jarāṃ nānityatāṃ sarvakālaṃ dravyasvabhāvapariniṣpattitaḥ paśyati
T06bsa034_u:5139: nāsyānyāṃ jātiṃ na sthitiṃ na jarāṃ nānityatām /
T06bsa034_u:5140: saṃskāramātrameva ca jāyamānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ jīryamāṇaṃ vinaśyamānamupalabhate /
T06bsa034_u:5142: yuktyāpi bodhisattvo vimṛśannetān jātyādīn dravyato nopalabhate /
T06bsa034_u:5144: sa cedrūpādisaṃskāravinirmuktaḥ anyo jātidharmaḥ syāt sa yathaiva rūpādikaḥ saṃskāraḥ svātmanotpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:5146: evaṃ sati dve janmanī syātām yacca saṃskāra-janma yacca jāti-janma tatra tatsaṃskārajanma tasmājjātijanmanaḥ ananyadeva vā syāt /
T06bsa034_u:5150: (Dutt 190) atha ca punaranyadevaṃ sati saṃskāra-janma jātirna bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5152: yathā jātirevaṃ sthitirjarā vināśaśca vistareṇa veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5153: sa cedvināśo nāma svabhāvato dharmaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ syāt so 'pyutpadyeta nirudhyeta vā /
T06bsa034_u:5154: yadā ca vināśa utpannaḥ syāttadā sarvasaṃskārairniruddhairbhavitavyaṃ syāt /
T06bsa034_u:5155: evaṃ satyalpakṛcchreṇa nirodhasamāpannasyeva cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāmapravṛttiḥ syāt /
T06bsa034_u:5156: tasya ca punarvināśasya nirodhāt niruddhairapi taiḥ saṃskāraiḥ punareva bhavitavyaṃ syāt vināśa eṣāṃ nāstīti kṛtvā /
T06bsa034_u:5157: ato vināśa utpadyate nirudhyate ceti na yujyate /
T06bsa034_u:5158: na ca punaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā sarvakālāstitāñca dravyasatāṃ svabhāvapariniṣpatiñca prajñapti satāṃ paśyato nirvidvirāgo vimuktiśca yujyate /
T06bsa034_u:5160: ityebhirākārairbodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārā anityā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:5161: tān punareva anityān saṃskārān prabandhena vartamānādbodhisattvaḥ triḥprakārāyā duḥkhatāyāḥ
T06bsa034_u:5163: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃskārā duḥkhā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:5164: punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dvividhaṃ nairātmyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:5170: yatsarveṣvabhilāpyeṣu vastuṣu sarvābhilāpasvabhāvo dharmo na saṃvidyate /
T06bsa034_u:5171: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvadharmā anātmāna iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:5175: evaṃ ca tāvadanadhyāśayaśuddho bodhisattvaḥ adṛṣṭasatyo vā śrāvakāyānīyo nirvāṇamadhimukto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5180: tadyathā rājaputro vā gṛhapatiputro vā rājñā gṛhapatinā vā 'ntargṛhe saṃvardhitaḥ
T06bsa034_u:5181: syāt tasya ca daharasyaiva kumārabhūtasya tena rājñā gṛhapatinā vā kṛtrimakā mṛgarathakā
T06bsa034_u:5182: vā go-aśvarathakā vā hastirathakā vā upasaṃhṛtā bhaveyuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5183: sa ca rājaputro vā gṛhapatiputro vā taiḥ krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ paricārayaṃsteṣveva kṛtrimeṣu mṛgeṣu mṛgasaṃjñī syāt kṛtrimeṣu go 'śveṣu hastiṣu hastisaṃjñī syāt /
T06bsa034_u:5184: athaikadā sa rājā vā gṛhapatirvā svasya putrasya vṛddheranvayādindriyāṇāṃ paripākādbhūtānāṃ mṛgāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣeta /
T06bsa034_u:5186: tasya punā rājaputrasya [vā] gṛhapatiputrasya vā ta varṇavādaṃ śrutvā evaṃ syāt /
T06bsa034_u:5187: eṣāmayaṃ rājā gṛhapatirvā asmākaṃ mṛgarathakānāṃ yāvaddhastirathakānāṃ vā varṇaṃ bhāṣata iti /
T06bsa034_u:5188: athāpareṇa samayena sa rājā gahapatirvā svaṃ putraṃ bahirāgārānnivīṣya bhūtāneva mṛgāṃstasmai upadarśayedbhūtāneva yāvaddhastina upadarśayet
T06bsa034_u:5189: tasya tān dṛṣṭvā tasminsamaye pratyātmaṃ pratyavagamo yathābhūta utpadyeta /
T06bsa034_u:5190: ime te bhūtārthikā mṛgarathakā vistareṇa yāvaddhastirathakā yeṣāmasmākaṃ pitā dīrgharātraṃ
T06bsa034_u:5191: varṇaṃ bhāṣitavānasmākameva tvayathābhūte arthe tat pratirūpamātrake tatpratibimbapratibhāsamātrake
T06bsa034_u:5196: bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakāṇāñca purastānnirvāṇasya yathādṛṣṭasya varṇo bhāṣitaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5197: taiśca tannirvāṇaṃ guṇato ghoṣamātrānusariṇyā buddhyā dīrgharātramadhimuktam /
T06bsa034_u:5198: yadā punasteṣāṃ saṃbhāraparipākavṛddheranvayāt śraddhāśayānāñca bodhisattvānāṃ dṛṣṭasatyānāñca śrāvakāṇāṃ nirvāṇe pratyakṣaṃ jñānadarśanamutpadyate
T06bsa034_u:5200: idaṃ tannirvāṇaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ yasya buddhabodhisattvairvarṇā bhāṣitaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5206: tadyathā kiñcidvyādhitaṃ puruṣaṃ kaścinmahāvaidyastasya prapyupasthitasya vyādheḥ praśamāyānulomikairbhaiṣajyairūpatiṣṭhet /
T06bsa034_u:5207: sa ca vyādhitapuruṣo dīrghakālapratiniṣevaṇātteṣāṃ bhaiṣajyānāṃ tadadhimukta eva bhavet tadārāmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5209: atha tasyaiva vyādhitapuruṣasya sa ca pūrvako vyādhistayā bhaiṣajyāsevayā vyupaśāmyedanyaścāpūrvo vyādhiranyabhaiṣajyasādhyaḥ prādurbhavet /
T06bsa034_u:5210: atha sa mahāvaidyaḥ pūrvakasya ca vyādheḥ praśamaṃ paścimakasya cotpādamanyabhaiṣajyasādhyaṃ
T06bsa034_u:5211: viditvā tañca pūrvakaṃ bhaiṣajyaprayogaṃ pratikṣipedanyaṃ cānulomikaṃ vyapadiśed bhaiṣajyam /
T06bsa034_u:5212: sa bālo vyādhita puruṣaḥ pūrvabhaiṣajyādhimuktasteṣveva pathyasaṃjñī yenaiva mahāvaidyena tāni pūrvapaścimāni bhaiṣajyāni vyapadiṣṭāni /
T06bsa034_u:5213: evamapyucyamānastena saṃmukhamapathyānyetāni pūrvakāṇi bhaiṣajyāni paścime vyādhāviti
T06bsa034_u:5214: saṃpratyayena na gacchannāṣya vacanamabhiśraddhavyādevameva tadupamāste bālā bodhisattvāḥ
T06bsa034_u:5218: samyagvyapadeśamavavādānuśāsanīṃ nāvataranti nādhimucyante na pratipadyante dharmasyānudharmam /
T06bsa034_u:5219: tatra śrāddho bodhisattvaḥ śrāvako vā na kasmiṃścittathāgatabhāṣite vimatisandehamutpādayati /
T06bsa034_u:5221: kuśala iva sārathiryāvatī tena bhūmirgantavyā bhavatyanuprāptavyā tāṃ laghuladhveva
T06bsa034_u:5229: pañceme bodhisattvāsyāścaryādbhūtā dharmā anuttare samyaksaṃbodhiyāne śikṣamāṇasya veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5236: ime pañca bodhisattvānāmāścaryādbhutā dharmā asādhāraṇastadanyaiḥ sarvasattvaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5237: pañcemāni bodhisattvasyānāścaryāṇi yaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5239: yad bodhisattvaḥ parahitahetukena duḥkhena sukhātmaka eva san kṛtsnaṃ parahitahetukaṃ duḥkhamabhyupagacchati /
T06bsa034_u:5240: idaṃ bodhisattvasya prathamamanāścaryaṃ yena samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5241: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ saṃsāradoṣajño nirvāṇaguṇajña eva ca san sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaḥ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā saṃsāramabhyupagacchati /
T06bsa034_u:5243: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvastūṣṇīṃbhāva-sukharasajña eva san sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaṃ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā sattvānāṃ dharmedeśanāyai prayujyate /
T06bsa034_u:5245: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ [ṣaṭ] pāramitopacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaḥ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvānāmāśayataḥ samutsṛjati /
T06bsa034_u:5246: na ca punastasya samutsargasya vipākenārthī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5248: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ parakāryasvakārya iva sarvaparakāryārthakriyāsu saṃdṛśyate /
T06bsa034_u:5249: idaṃ bodhisattvasya pañcamamanāścaryaṃ yena samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5254: tathā hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthe samaṃ taccittamutpādayati /
T06bsa034_u:5256: bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu ekaputraka iva premasahagatena cittena samacitto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5257: bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu ekaputraka eva premasahagatena cittena samacitto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5259: viditvā bodhisattvo yā ekasya sattvasya dharmatā sā sarveṣāmiti dharmasamatānugatena
T06bsa034_u:5262: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvārthakriyāsahagatena cetasā sarvasattveṣu smacitto viharati /
T06bsa034_u:5270: pañcabhirākāraiḥ sattvā upakāriṇo bodhisattvasya pratyupakāreṇa pratyupasthito bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:5272: ātmānaṃ guṇaiḥ saṃyojayanti paraguṇādhānāya prayuktāro bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:5273: anātheṣu duḥkhiteṣu kṛpaṇeṣvapratiśaraṇeṣu sattveṣu sānāthyaṃ kurvanti /
T06bsa034_u:5275: tathāgatābhāṣitañca dharmamukhena vā lekhayitvā vā dhārayanti tañca pūjayanti /
T06bsa034_u:5286: iha bodhisattva ādita eva sattveṣu hitasukhaiṣī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5289: iti sarvaṃ pūrvavad veditavyaṃ yadyathā pūjāsevā 'pramāṇapaṭale /
T06bsa034_u:5293: pañcabhiḥ prayogairbodhisattvasya sarvasamyaksaṃprayoga saṃgraho veditavyaḥ katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5298: tatra bodhisattvo 'nurakṣaṇā prayogeṇa medhāṃ rakṣati yena sahajena jñānena dharmān laghuladhvevodgṛhṇāti /
T06bsa034_u:5299: smṛtiṃ rakṣati yayā smṛtyā udgṛhītān dharmān dhārayati /
T06bsa034_u:5304: tatra bodhisattvasyānavadyaprayogo yaḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvaviparītaścottaptaścāpramāṇaśca satataśca bodhipariṇāmitaśca /
T06bsa034_u:5307: niyatipatitaprayogo niyatāyāṃ bhūmau niṣṭhāgamanabhūmau ca draṣṭavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5315: tadanyaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ saha paritulanābhimānatā dharmaviparyāsābhimānatā ca /
T06bsa034_u:5318: te punareṣāmeva pañcānāṃ kṛṣṇapakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yathākramaṃ viparyayeṇa veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5334: saddharmasya ca prakāśanā saddharmapratirūpakāṇāṃ ca pratikṣepaṇatā /
T06bsa034_u:5335: daśasu sthāneṣu samāsato bodhisattvā vineyān sattvān samyageva vinayanti /
T06bsa034_u:5355: aparimitakālaṃ vyākurvanti na tu kālaniyama kurvanti /
T06bsa034_u:5362: punarekatyo bodhisattvo niyataṃ cittamutpādayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na punastāvatpratyudāvartayati yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate
T06bsa034_u:5363: punarbodhisattvo vaśitāprāptaḥ sarvāṃ sattvārthacaryāṃ yathecchati yathārabhate tathaivābandhyāṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:5368: tatra paścimaṃ niyatipātamārabhya tathāgatā niyatipatitaṃ bodhisattvaṃ vyākurvāṇā vyākurvanti /
T06bsa034_u:5369: pañcemāni sthānāni bodhisattvasyāvaśyakaraṇīyāni bhavanti yānyakṛtvā bodhisattvaḥ abhavyo bhavatyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
T06bsa034_u:5381: daśeme dharmā bodhisattvānāṃ pradhānasammatā yān bodhisattvā agrato dhārayantyagryaprajñaptiṣu ca prajñapayanti /
T06bsa034_u:5385: vīryaṃ ca prajñā ca sarvapāramitānāṃ pradhānam /
T06bsa034_u:5399: catvārīmāni bodhisattvānāṃ prajñaptivyavasthānāni yāniṃ bodhisattvā eva samyak prajñapayanti vyavasthāpayanti tathāgatā vā /
T06bsa034_u:5400: na tvanyaḥ kaściddevabhūto vā manuṣyabhūto vā śramaṇabrāhmaṇabhūto vānyatraitebhya evaṃ śrutvā /
T06bsa034_u:5403: tatra yā dvādaśāṅgasya sūtrādikasya vacogatasyānupūrvaracanā anupūrvavyavasthānasamāyogaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5414: ] hetusatyaṃ phalasatyaṃ jñānasatyaṃ jñeyasatyaṃ agryasatyaṃ ca /
T06bsa034_u:5416: satyasatyaṃ mṛṣāsatyaṃ parijñeyasatyaṃ prahātavyasatyaṃ sākṣātkartavyasatyaṃ bhāvayitavyasatyaṃ ca /
T06bsa034_u:5418: āsvādasatyaṃ ādīnavasatyaṃ niḥsaraṇasatyaṃ dharmatāsatyaṃ adhimuktisatyaṃ āryāṇāṃ satyaṃ anāryāṇāṃ satyaṃ ca /
T06bsa034_u:5420: saṃskāraduḥkhatāsatyaṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāsatyaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatāsatyaṃ pravṛttisatyaṃ nivṛtisatyaṃ saṃkleśasatyaṃ vyavadānasatyaṃ samyakprayogasatyaṃ ca /
T06bsa034_u:5434: caturṣvāryasatyeṣu yā prajñā tasyā eva ca prajñāyā ya āśrayaḥ ālambanaṃ sahāyaḥ karma
T06bsa034_u:5435: saṃbhārastasyā eva ca prajñāyā yat phalam ebhiḥ saptabhirākāraiḥ śrāvakayānaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ
T06bsa034_u:5438: nirabhilāpyaṃ vastvālambanīkṛtya sarvadharmeṣu yā tathatā nirvikalpasamatā niryāṇatā
T06bsa034_u:5439: prajñā tasyā eva ca prajñāyā ya āśraya ālambanaṃ sahāyaḥ karma sambhārastasyā eva
T06bsa034_u:5442: atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvaṣu ye kecidbodhisattvāḥ samyakprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ kṛtavantaḥ kariṣyanti kurvanti vā punaḥ sarve ta ebhiścatubhirvastubhiḥ
T06bsa034_u:5450: eṣāṃ ca vibhāgaḥ pūrvavadveditavyaḥ tadyathā tattvārthapaṭale /
T06bsa034_u:5453: nāmaparyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastuparyeṣaṇāgataṃ svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇāgataṃ viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānam
T06bsa034_u:5462: daśasu dikṣuprameyā aprameyanāmalokadhātavastadyathā iyaṃ sahā nāma lokadhāturyasya nāmnā brahmā sahāṃpatirityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5464: syādekavidho vineyaḥ sarvasattvā vineyā iti kṛtvā /
T06bsa034_u:5475: pratihato madhyasthaḥ vipañcitajñaḥ uddhaṭitajñaḥ tadātvavineyaḥ āpattivineyaḥ pratyayahāryaścavineyo yādṛśān pratyayān labhate tathā tathā pariṇamati /
T06bsa034_u:5480: tathāgatavineyaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhavineyaḥ bodhisattvavineyaḥ kṛcchrasādhyaḥ [akṛcchrasādhyaḥ] ślakṣṇasādhyaḥ avasādanā-sādhyaḥ dūre vineyaḥ antike ca vineyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5482: nārakaḥ tairyakyonikaḥ yāmalaukikaḥ kāmāvacaro divyamānuṣyakaḥ āntarābhavikaḥ rūpī arūpī sajñī asaṃjñī naivasajñīnāsaṃjñī ca /
T06bsa034_u:5485: tatra (Dutt 201) sattvadhātu vineyadhātvoḥ kiṃ nānākaraṇam sattvadhāturaviśeṣeṇa sarvasattvā gotrasthāścāgotrasthāśca /
T06bsa034_u:5486: ye purnagotrasthā eva tāsu tāṣvavasthāsu vartante /
T06bsa034_u:5492: iha bodhisattvo yeṣāṃ sattvānāmarthe prayujyate sa prathamo 'prameyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5494: sa dvitīyo 'prameyaḥ tānpunaḥ sattvāṃsteṣu teṣu lokadhātuṣu yairdharmaiḥ saṃkliśyamānāṃśca viśudhyamānāṃścopalabhate /
T06bsa034_u:5496: tebhyaśca sattvebhyo yānsattvān bhavyān śakyarupānatyantaduḥkhavimokṣāya paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:5500: pañceme buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sattveṣu dharmadeśanāyā vipulāḥ phalānuśaṃsā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5502: tadekatyāḥ sattvāḥ tasminneva saddharme deśyamāne virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurūtpādayanti /
T06bsa034_u:5503: tadekatyāḥ sattvā deśyamāna eva saddharmataḥ āsravakṣayamanuprāpnuvanti /
T06bsa034_u:5506: śrutamātra eva tasminsaddharme deśitaśca saddharmo buddhairbodhisattvaiśca uddeśasvādhyāyasaṃpratipattipāraṃparyayogena saddharmanetryāścirasthitikatāyai saṃvartate /
T06bsa034_u:5507: itīme pañca deśanāyā vipulāḥ phalānuśaṃsā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5508: saptemāni mahattvāni yairyuktaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yānaṃ mahāyānamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5527: tatra yacca dharmamahattvaṃ yacca cittotpādamahattvaṃ yaccādhimuktimahattvaṃ yaccādhyāśayamahattvaṃ
T06bsa034_u:5528: yacca sambhāramahattvaṃ yacca kālamahattvamitīmāni ṣaṭmahattvāni hetubhūmāni samudāgama-mahattvasya /
T06bsa034_u:5530: aṣṭāvime dharmāḥ sarvasya mahāyānasya saṃgrahāya saṃvartante /
T06bsa034_u:5532: tasminneva ca bodhisattvapiṭake ya sarvadharmāṇāṃ tattvārthaprakāśanā /
T06bsa034_u:5533: tasminneva bodhisattvapiṭake yā sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāmacintyā paramodārā prabhāvasaṃprakāśanā /
T06bsa034_u:5539: evaṃ hi bodhisattvāḥ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhthante /
T06bsa034_u:5540: ke punaste bodhisattvā ya evaṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
T06bsa034_u:5554: sa eva punaravatīrṇo yāvat śuddhāśayabhūmimapraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaśuddhāśaya ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5556: sa eva punaḥ śuddhāśayo yāvanniṣṭhāgamanabhūmimapraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaparipakva ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5564: tatra te gotramupādāya yāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdaśa bodhisattvā nirdiṣṭāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5565: ye bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣante teṣāṃ nāta uttari śikṣā vidyate /
T06bsa034_u:5566: yatra śikṣeran yathā ca śikṣeran na ca ebhyo yathā nirdiṣṭebhyo bodhisattvebhya uttari bodhisattvo vidyate yo bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣate /
T06bsa034_u:5567: teṣāṃ punaḥ sarveṣāṃ eva bodhisattvānāmabhedenimānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni gauṇāni nāmāni veditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:5568: tadyathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dhīmānuttamadyutiḥ jinaputro jinādhāraḥ vijetā jināṅkuraḥ vikrāntaḥ paramāryaḥ sārthavāho mahāyaśaḥ kṛpālurmahāpuṇyaḥ īśvaro dhārmikaśceti /
T06bsa034_u:5569: teṣāṃ punardaśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣvanantānāṃ bodhisattvānāmaprameyāḥ prayātmagatāḥ saṃjñāprāptayo veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5570: tatra ye bodhisattvāḥ sma iti pratijñāyāṃ bodhisattvā vartante na ca bodhisattvaśikṣāsu samyak pratipadyante te bodhisattvapratirūpakā veditavyāḥ
T06bsa034_u:5572: bodhisattvāḥ sma iti pratijñāyāṃ vartante samyak [ca ye] bodhisattvaśikṣāṣu śikṣante te bhūtā bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5580: pañcemāni bhūtasya bodhisattvasya bodhisattvaliṅgāni yaiḥ samanvāgato [bodhisattvo] bodhisattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:5582: anukampā priyavāditā vairyaṃ muktahastatā gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatā ca /
T06bsa034_u:5583: ime punaḥ pañca dharmāḥ pañca parivartena veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5588: pratipattigataśca svabhāvato 'nukampāyāḥ yadāśayo bhavati bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu tadeva yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ kāyena vācā upasaṃharati /
T06bsa034_u:5589: tatra priyavāditāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ pūrvavadāmodanī saṃmodanī upakarā ca vāgveditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:5591: tatra sattvaṃ dhṛtiralīnatvaṃ ca yadbalaṃ bodhisattvasya ayaṃ vairyaṃsvabhāva ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5594: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidastāsāmeva cābhinirhārāya yatsamyak prāyogikaṃ jñānamayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatāyāḥ svabhāvo veditavyaḥ
T06bsa034_u:5597: duḥkhitāḥ sattvā duścaritacāriṇaḥ pramattā mithyāpratipannāḥ kleśānuśayitāśca /
T06bsa034_u:5598: nārakānsattvānupādāya śeṣāṃ keṣāṃcitsattvānāṃ duḥkhā vedanā prābandhikī santatisamārūḍhā vartate /
T06bsa034_u:5600: ye punarnāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitāapi tu bahulaṃ kāyaduścaritamadhyācaranti vāgduścaritaṃ manoduścaritamadhyācaranti /
T06bsa034_u:5603: ye punarnāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitā na duścaritacāriṇo 'pi tvadhyavasitāḥ kāmānupabhuñjate naṭanartakahāsakalāsakaprekṣaṇaparā viharanti ātmopalāḍanaparāḥ
T06bsa034_u:5604: ime sattvāḥ pramattā ityucyante tadyathā tadekatyāḥ kāmopabhoginaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5605: ye punarnāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitā na duścaritacāriṇo na vāpi pramattāḥ api tu dṛṣṭivipattimāśritya duḥkhavimokṣāya pratipannāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5606: ime sattvā mithyāpratipannā ityucyante tadyathā kāmānutsṛjya durākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5607: ye punaḥ sattvā nāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitā vistareṇa yāvan na mithyāpratipannāḥ api tu sakalabandhanāśca
T06bsa034_u:5608: vikalabandhanāśca kleśaiḥ ime sattvāḥ kleśānuśayitā ityucyante tadyathā ye ca samyak
T06bsa034_u:5609: prayuktāḥ pṛthagjanā kalyāṇakā ye ca śaikṣāḥ etāvadanukampādhiṣṭhānaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
T06bsa034_u:5621: yaireva pañcabhirākārairbodhipakṣapaṭale dhṛtibalādhānatā bodhisattvānāmuktā tānyeva bodhisattvasya vairyādhiṣṭhānāni ve ditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:5627: abhīkṣṇadānatā pramuditadānatā satkṛtyadānatā asaṃkliṣṭadānatā aniśrityadānatā ca /
T06bsa034_u:5634: ye te tathāgatabhāṣitāḥ sūtrāntāḥ gambhīrāgambhīrāvabhāṣāḥ śūnyatā-pratisaṃyuktā idaṃpratyayatā /
T06bsa034_u:5647: anukampā bodhisattvasya sattveṣvādita eva tāvadvairaprahāṇāya saṃvartate /
T06bsa034_u:5650: anukampā tad-bahulavihāritā cāsyānavadyadṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya parānugrahāya ca saṃvartate /
T06bsa034_u:5651: ye ca bhagavatā maitryā anuśaṃsā uktānāsya kāye viṣaṃ krāmati na śasramityevamādayaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5654: priyavādī bodhisattvo dṛṣṭe dharme caturvidhaṃ vāgdoṣaṃ vijahāti mṛṣāvādaṃ paiśūnyaṃ ṣāruṣyaṃ sambhinnapralāpañca /
T06bsa034_u:5655: sā cāsya bāgātmānugrahāya parānugrahāya ca pravṛttā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5656: dṛṣṭa eva ca dharme āyatyāṃ ca priyavādī bodhisattvaḥ ādeyavacano bhavati grāhyavacanaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5658: dhīro bodhisattvo dṛṣṭe [tāvata] dharme sarveṇa sarvamālasyakausīdyāpagato bhavati pramuditacittaśca /
T06bsa034_u:5662: āyatyāṃ ca sarvabodhisattvakṛtyasamārambheṣu prakṛtyā dṛḍhasamāraṃbho bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5669: pūrvaṃ tāvadbodhisattvo 'nukampayā sattvānanugṛhṇāti teṣu ca sāpekṣo bhavatyarthakāmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5670: tataścākuśalātsthānādvyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya yuktiṃ bhāṣate grāhayati vyapadiśati /
T06bsa034_u:5671: evamavatīrṇeṣu ca sattveṣu sattvavipratipattiṣu [ca] kleśaviprakṛtāsvarthavidhāsu vimardasaho bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5673: sa evaṃ dhīraḥ ekatyānsattvānāmiṣasaṃgraheṇa paripācayati ekatyāndharmasaṃgraheṇa tadekatyāṃstadubhābhyāṃ dharmābhiṣasaṃgrahābhyām /
T06bsa034_u:5676: āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ katamayā pāramitayā katamadbodhisattvaliṅgaṃ saṃgṛhītam /
T06bsa034_u:5679: vairyaṃ vīryapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā prajñāpāramitayā ca saṃgṛhītam /
T06bsa034_u:5681: gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatā dhyānapāramitayā prajñāpāramitayā ca saṃgṛhītā evamimāni [pañca bodhi]sattvaliṅgāni pañcaparivartena veditavyāni
T06bsa034_u:5687: sukṛtakarmāntatā kauśalyaṃ parānugrahaḥ pariṇāmanaṃ ca paścimam /
T06bsa034_u:5688: gṛhipakṣe vā pravrajitapakṣe vā vartamānasya bodhisattvasya samāsataścatvāro dharmā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5689: yeṣu gṛhī pravrajito va bodhisattvaḥ śikṣamāṇaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
T06bsa034_u:5693: yā pāramitāsu niyatakāritā nipuṇakāritā nityakāritā anavadyakāritā ca /
T06bsa034_u:5694: kathañca bodhisattvo niyatakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
T06bsa034_u:5695: iha bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyamāne deyadharme yācanake samyak prapyupasthite apakāriṇyupakāriṇi vā guṇavati doṣavati vā 'vaśyaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:5696: nāsya dānacittaṃ kaścidvikampayituṃ samartho bhavati manuṣyo vā 'manuṣyo vā śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā kaścidvā punarloke sahadharmeṇa /
T06bsa034_u:5697: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvo nipuṇakārī bhavati yadut dāne /
T06bsa034_u:5698: iha bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyamāne deyadharme samyak pratyupasthite yācanake sarvaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:5699: nāstyasya kiñcidyadaparityājyaṃ bhavati sattvebhyaḥ ādhyātmikamapi vastu prāgeva bāhyam /
T06bsa034_u:5700: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvo nityakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
T06bsa034_u:5701: iha bodhisattvo aparikhidyamāno dānena satatasamitameva sarvakālaṃ yathotpannaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:5702: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvaḥ anavadyakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
T06bsa034_u:5703: iha bodhisattvo yattatsaṃkliṣṭaṃ dānaṃ varṇitaṃ dānapaṭale tatsaṃkliṣṭaṃ varjayitvā asaṃkliṣṭaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
T06bsa034_u:5704: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sukṛtakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
T06bsa034_u:5707: eta eva catvāra ākārā niyatakāritā nipuṇakāritā nityakāritā anavadyakāritā ca /
T06bsa034_u:5709: tatsamāsato daśavidhaṃ veditavyam pratihatānāṃ sattvānāṃ pratighātāpanayāyopāyakauśalyam /
T06bsa034_u:5714: eṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva kauśalyānāṃ pūrvavadyathāyogaṃ tatra tatrāsyāmeva bodhisattvabhūmau pravibhāgo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5715: etāni punarbodhisattvasya daśa kauśalyāni pañcakṛtyāni kurvanti /
T06bsa034_u:5722: tribhinnaṃ kauśalyairbodhisattvo yathā gotrendriyādhimuktānāṃ tadupamaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
T06bsa034_u:5728: iha bodhisattvaścatvāri saṃgrahavastūni niśritya dānaṃ priyavāditāmarthacaryāṃ samānārthatāñca tadekatyānāṃ sattvānāṃ hitamapyupasaṃharati /
T06bsa034_u:5738: na tasya kuśalamūlasyānyaṃ phalavipākaṃ pratikāṃkṣati nānya[trā]nuttarāmeva samyaksaṃbodhim /
T06bsa034_u:5739: ye ca kecidbhagavatā gṛhiṇāṃ vā pravrajitānāṃ vā bodhisattvānāṃ śikṣādharmā vyapadiṣṭāḥ
T06bsa034_u:5740: sarveṣāṃ teṣāmeṣveva caturṣu saṃgraho veditavyaḥ sukṛtakarmāntatāyāṃ kauśalye parānugrahe pariṇāmanāyāṃ ca /
T06bsa034_u:5741: tasmādevaṃ sukṛtakarmāntasya bodhisattvasya kuśalasya parānugrahapravṛttasya pariṇāmakasya evaṃ duṣprāpā duradhigamā ca bodhirāsannā samāsannā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:5742: atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu ye kecidbodhisattvā gṛhi-pravrajita pakṣeṣu śikṣamāṇā
T06bsa034_u:5746: evamapi caturṣu dharmeṣu samyakprayukto gṛhī pravrajito vā bodhisattvo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5747: api tu gṛhiṇo bodhisattvasyāntikātpravrajitasya bodhisattvasya sumahān viśeṣaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5749: tathāhi pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ parimukto bhavatyādita eva tāvanmātāpitṛputtadārādikalatraparigrahadoṣāt /
T06bsa034_u:5751: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ parimukto bhavati tasyaiva parigrahasyārthe kṛṣivaṇijyā-rājapauruṣyādi-parikleśe vyāsaṅgaduḥkhebhyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5753: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattva ekāntasaṅkalīkṛtaṃ brahmacaryaṃ śaknoti carituṃ [na tu] gṛhī bodhisattvaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5754: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ sarveṣu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu kṣiprābhijño bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5755: yadyadeva kuśalamārabhate tatra tatraiva laghuladhveva niṣṭhāṃ gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:5757: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ vrataniyame sthitatvād ādeyavacano bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5766: saptākāraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sattveṣu vātsalyaṃ pravartate yena vātsalyenopetā bodhisattvāḥ kalyāṇāśayāḥ paramakalyāṇāśayā ityucyante /
T06bsa034_u:5770: ānulomikena kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā samudācarati manāpena hitasukhena ca /
T06bsa034_u:5771: na ca punarbodhisattvasya sattveṣu yogarahitaṃ vātsalyaṃ pravartate tadyathā adharme 'vinaye 'satyasamudācāre asthāne samādāpanatāyai /
T06bsa034_u:5772: tathā ca bodhisattvo vatsalo bhavati sattveṣu yathā teṣāmarthe sarvārambhairna parikhidyate /
T06bsa034_u:5773: ayācita eva ca bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu vatsalo bhavati na tu kenacidyācitaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5774: nirāmiṣeṇa ca cittena vatsalo [bhavati] na parataḥ pratyupakāraṃ pratikāṃkṣamāṇaḥ paratra ca vipākamiṣṭaṃ pratyāśaṃsamāna iti niṣkāraṇavatsalo bhavati sattveṣu bodhisattvaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5775: vipulañca tadbodhisattvasya vātsalyaṃ bhavati sattveṣu na parīttam /
T06bsa034_u:5776: tathā ca vipulaṃ bhavati yathaiṣāṃ sattvānāmantikādbodhisattvaḥ sarvākāramapyapakāraṃ labhamāno notsṛjati ātmānaṃ kāmamapriyaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:5778: tatpunarevaṃ lakṣaṇameva guṇayuktaṃ vātsalyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvasattveṣveva samamāsamanta sattvadhātuprādeśikaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5779: evamanena saptākāreṇaiva vātsalyena yuktā bodhisattvāḥ kalyāṇāśayāḥ paramakalyāṇāśayā ityucyante /
T06bsa034_u:5781: tatra śraddhāpūrvaṃko dharmavicayapūrvakaśca buddhadharmeṣu yo 'dhimokṣaḥ pratyavagamo niścayo bodhisattvasya so 'dhyāśaya ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5782: te punaradhyāśayā bodhisattvasya samāsataḥ pañcadaśa veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5784: agryāśayo vṛttāśayaḥ pāramitāśayaḥ tattvārthāśayaḥ prabhāvāśayaḥ hitāśayaḥ sukhāśayo
T06bsa034_u:5785: vinirmuktāśayaḥ dṛḍhāśayaḥ avisaṃvādanāśayaḥ aśuddhāśayaḥ śuddhāśayaḥ suśuddhāśayaḥ
T06bsa034_u:5787: tatra yo buddhadharmasaṃgharatneṣu bodhisattvasyādhyāśayaḥ so 'gryāśaya ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5790: dharmapugdalanairātmye paramārthe ca dharmatathatāyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ yo 'dhyāśayo 'yaṃ tattvārthāśaya ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5791: buddhabodhisattvānāmacintye 'bhijñāprabhāve sahaje vā prabhāve yo 'dhyāśayo 'yaṃ prabhāvāśaya ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5794: sattveṣveva nirāmiṣacittatā iṣṭe ca vipāke niṣpratibaddhacittatā vinirmuktāśaya ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5795: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yā citaikāntikatāyaṃ dṛḍhāśaya ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5800: tatra yo hi [a]śuddhāśayaḥ sa eva nigṛhī[tāśaya] ityucyate pratisaṃkhyānakaraṇīyatayā /
T06bsa034_u:5801: yaḥ punaḥ śuddhaḥ suśuddhaścādhyāśayaḥ sa sahajo 'dhyāśaya ityucyate prakṛtyā tanmayatayā āśrayasusaṃniviṣṭatayā ca /
T06bsa034_u:5802: ityebhirbodhisattvāḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ kalyāṇairadhyāśayaiḥ sarvabhūmigataiḥ samāsato daśakṛtyāni kurvanti /
T06bsa034_u:5808: pāramitāśayena kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhāvanāsātatyakriyayā 'pramādavihāriṇo bhavanti paramāpramādavihāriṇaśca /
T06bsa034_u:5811: prabhāvādhyāśayena ghanarasaṃ ca śāsane prasādaṃ pravedayanti /
T06bsa034_u:5812: bhāvanāyāṃ ca sārasaṃjñinaḥ spṛhājātā bahulaṃ viharanti /
T06bsa034_u:5814: hitāśayena sukhāśayena vinirmuktāśayena ca sarvākarāsu sattvārthakriyāsu prayujyante /
T06bsa034_u:5819: avisaṃvādanādhyāśayena kṣiprābhijñā bhavanti teṣu teṣu kuśaladharmābhinirhāreṣu /
T06bsa034_u:5822: sahajena punaradhyāśayena kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇām /
T06bsa034_u:5823: tatra ye kecidbhagavatā bodhisattvānāmadhyāśayā ākhyātāḥ prajñaptāḥ prakāśitāsteṣu teṣvadhikaraṇeṣu teṣāṃ sarveṣāmebhireva pañcadaśabhiradhyāśayaiḥ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5837: evaṃ gotrasaṃpadamupādāya yathoktāyāṃ bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇānāṃ yathokteṣu
T06bsa034_u:5838: ca bodhisattvaliṅgeṣu saṃdṛśyamānānāṃ bodhisattvapakṣyaprayogeṣu ca samyak prayuktānāṃ
T06bsa034_u:5839: bodhisattvādhyāśayāñca yathoktāṃ viśodhayatāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ samāsato dvādaśabodhisattvavihārā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:5841: trayodaśaśca tathāgato vihāro yo 'sya bhavatyabhisaṃbodherniruttaro vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5852: iti yena [ca] bodhisattvastattvaṃ paśyati yañca tattvaṃ paśyati tasya ca tattvasyājñānād yathā pravṛttirduḥkhasya jñānācca punarapravṛttirduḥkhasya bhavati sattvānām /
T06bsa034_u:5853: tadetadbodhisattvasya tribhirmukhaiḥ prajñayā vyavacārayataḥ trayoradhiprajñavihārā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:5860: punarvihāro yaḥ sarvabodhisattvavihārasamatikrāntasyābhisaṃbuddhabodhervihāraḥ tatra tathāgatasya paścimasya vihārasya pratiṣṭhāyogasthāne paścime sākalyena nirdeśo bhaviṣyati /
T06bsa034_u:5861: dvādaśānāṃ punarbodhisattvavihārāṇāṃ yathā vyavasthānaṃ bhavati tathā nirdekṣāmi /
T06bsa034_u:5864: iha bodhisattvo gotravihārī prakṛtibhadrasantānatayā prakṛtyā bodhisattvaguṇairbodhisattvārhaiḥ kuśalairdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5866: prakṛtibhadratayaiva na haṭhayogena tasmin kuśale pravarttate /
T06bsa034_u:5867: api tu pratisaṃkhyānataḥ sāvagrahaḥ sambhṛto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5868: sarveṣāṃ ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ gotravihārī bodhisattvo bījadharo bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5878: iha bodhisattvasya prathamaṃ cittotpādamupādāya aśuddhādhyāśayasya yā kācidbodhisattvacaryā ayamasyādhimukticaryāvihāra ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:5879: tatra gotravihārī bodhisattvastadanyeṣāṃ [sarveṣāṃ] bodhisattvavihārāṇāmekādaśānāṃ tāthāgatasya ca vihārasya hetumātre vartate hetu parigraheṇa
T06bsa034_u:5880: no tu tena kaścitu tadanyo bodhisattvavihāra ārabdho bhavati na pratilabdho na viśodhitaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5882: adhimukticaryāvihāriṇā punarbodhisattvena sarve bodhisattvavihārāstāthāgataśca vihāra ārabdhā bhavanti (Dutt 219)
T06bsa034_u:5890: evaṃ vistareṇa yāvatparamaḥ paraniṣpanno bodhisattvavihāro veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5891: parame pariniṣpanne bodhisattvavihāre pariśuddhe 'nantaraṃ pūrvārabdhasya tātathāgatasya vihārasya sakṛtpratilambho viśuddhiśca veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:5900: yo laukikaṃ jñānaviśuddhisanniśrayabhūtaṃ samādhiṃ niśrṛtya satyāvabodhāya samyak smṛtyupasthānādīnāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravicayavihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5906: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ sābhisaṃskāraḥ sābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5907: yastameva trividhamapyadhiprajñavihāramadhipatiṃ kṛtvā 'bhisaṃskāreṇābhogena niśchidranirantaraḥ sarvadharmeṣu tathatā-nirvikalpaprajñābhāvanā sahagato vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5908: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ anabhisaṃskāro 'nābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5909: (Dutt 220) yastasyaiva pūrvakasya nirnimittasya vihārasya bhāvanā-bāhulyāt svarasenaiva niśchidranirantara-vāhirmārgānugato vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5911: yastameva supariśuddhaṃ niścalaṃ prajñāsamādhiṃ niśritya mahāmativaipulyamanuprāptasya
T06bsa034_u:5914: yatra sthito bodhisattvo bodhisattvamārganiṣṭhāgato 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau mahādharmābhiṣekaprāpta ekajātipratibaddho vā bhavati caramabhaviko vā /
T06bsa034_u:5915: yasya vihārasyānantaraṃ saṃhitamevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvabuddhakāryaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:5916: tatrādhimukticaryāvihāre [bodhisattvo] bodhisattvabhāvanāyāṃ parīttakārī bhavati cchidrakārī aniyatakārī punarlābhaparihāṇitaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5917: pramuditavihāre bodhisattvastasyāmeva bodhisattvabhāvanāyāṃ vipulakārī bhavatyacchidrakārī niyatakārī yathāpratilabdhāparihāṇitaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5919: pratharma nirnimittaṃ vihāramupādāya yāvatparamādbodhisattvavihārādbodhisattvo bodhisattvabhāvanāyāṃ apramāṇakārī bhavatyacchidrakārī niyatakārī ca /
T06bsa034_u:5921: pramuditavihāre 'ghiśīlādhicittādhiprajñavihāreṣu ca tasyā bodhisattva-nirnimittabhāvanāyāḥ pratilambho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5923: pratisaṃvidvihāre parame ca vihāre tasyā eva bodhisattva-nirnimitta-bhāvanāyāḥ phalapratyanubhāvanā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:5924: adhimukticaryāvihāre vartamānasya bodhisattvasya ke ākārāḥ kāni liṃgāni kāni nimittāni bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:5928: dṛḍhāyāḥ sthirāyāḥ avivartayā bodhisattvabhāvanāyāḥ alābhī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5932: pratisaṃkhyāya ca sattvārtheṣu prayujyate na prakṛtyanukampā-prematayā /
T06bsa034_u:5933: ekadā ca sattveṣu mithyāpi pratipadyate kāyena vācā manasā /
T06bsa034_u:5937: no tu pratyātmaṃ tattvajño bhavati yaduta tathāgataṃ vā ārabhya dharmaṃ vā saṃghaṃ
T06bsa034_u:5938: vā tattvārthaṃ vā buddhabodhisattvaprabhāvaṃ vā hetuṃ vā phalaṃ vā prāptavyaṃ vā
T06bsa034_u:5940: parīttena ca śrutamayacintāmayena jñānena samanvāgato bhavati nāpramāṇena /
T06bsa034_u:5943: duḥkhayā ca dhandhābhijñayā bodhisattva-pratipadā samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5959: sā cāsya haṭhena pravartitā na yathābhūtamājñāya /
T06bsa034_u:5963: ekadā ca bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānān nivartate notsahate vā /
T06bsa034_u:5964: ekadā sattvārthakriyāprayukto 'pi khedamantarā kṛtvā tasmātsattvārthakriyāprayogāt pratinivartate /
T06bsa034_u:5965: āśayataścātmanaḥ sukhakāmo bhavati pratisaṃkhyāya ca parasukhakāmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5967: no tu parijñāya parijñāyāśeṣa-prahāṇavān punaḥ punaḥ skhalitādhyācāratayā /
T06bsa034_u:5970: bhavati cāsya cetaso vikampitatvaṃ vimatiḥ sandehaśca /
T06bsa034_u:5971: sarveṇa ca sarvaṃ mahākaruṇāsamudācāravivarjito bhavati sattveṣu /
T06bsa034_u:5972: alpena ca hitasukhopasaṃhāreṇa sattveṣu pratyupasthito bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:5973: na vipulena nāprameyeṇa ca sarvāsu paripūrṇāsu yathānirdiṣṭāsu bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣate /
T06bsa034_u:5975: na ca sarveṣu yathānirdiṣṭeṣu bodhipakṣaprayogeṣu paripūrṇeṣu saṃdṛśyate /
T06bsa034_u:5977: na ca tathā nirvāṇe 'syādhyāśayaḥ sanniviṣṭo bhavati yathā saṃsārasaṃsṛtau /
T06bsa034_u:5979: itīmānyevaṃbhāgīyāni liṅgāni nimittānīme ākārā adhimukticaryāvihāre vartamānasya bodhisattvasya veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5980: adhimukticaryāvihāre mṛddhyāṃ kṣāntyāṃ vartamānasya bodhisattvasyaiṣāṃ yathā nirdiṣṭānāmākāraliṅga-nimittānāmadhimātratā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:5982: adhimātrāyāṃ kṣāntau vartamānasya bodhisattvasyaiṣāmākāraliṅganimittānāṃ mṛdutā tanutvaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:5983: adhimātrāyāmeva kṣāntau vartamānasyaiṣāmākāraliṅganimittānāmaśeṣaprahāṇāmanantarañca pramuditavihārapraveśo bodhisattvasya veditavyaḥ pratilambhayogena
T06bsa034_u:5984: tasyāsya pramuditavihāravihāriṇa ete [sarva]dharmāḥ sarvena sarvaṃ na bhavanti ye 'dhimukticaryāvihāra-vihāriṇa ākhyātāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:5985: etadviparyayeṇa ca sarve śuklapakṣyā dharmāḥ saṃvidyante /
T06bsa034_u:5991: pramuditavihārasthitasya tu bodhisattvasya sarveṣāmeṣāmadhimokṣopakleśānāṃ prahāṇānnirūpakleśaḥ śuddho 'dhimokṣaḥ pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:5992: tatrapramuditavihāre vartamānasya bodhisattvasya ke ākārāḥ kāni liṅgāni kāni nimittāni veditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:5995: prahāyānyadabhinavaṃ ṣaḍbhirākāraiḥ su[vi]niścitaṃ pratyātmaṃ bhāvānāmayaṃ bodhisattvapraṇidhānamutpādayati /
T06bsa034_u:5999: ekakṣaṇa[mātraṃ] samutpanne api tasmin praṇidhāne dharmaprakṛtiḥ sā tādṛśī yā 'prameyaśulkadharmeṣṭaphalā bhavati bodhisattvānām /
T06bsa034_u:6001: nāsya pratilabdhasya kenacitparyāyeṇa parihāṇiranyathābhāvo vā upalabhyate /
T06bsa034_u:6012: tatrādhimukticaryāvihāriṇāṃ sarvākārasūpacitakuśalamūlānāṃ samāsataḥ samyagbodhisattvacaryāniryātānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ taccittamutpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:6026: sarvākārāṃ bodhiṃ buddhadharmāṃśca buddhakṛtyānuṣṭhānaṃ ca śuddhenādhyāśayenālambanīkurvan
T06bsa034_u:6029: kuśalenodāreṇa naiṣkramyopasaṃhitena nirāmiṣeṇāpratisamena kāyacittānugrāhakeṇa prāmodyena uttaptairacalairasmi kuśalairdharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ
T06bsa034_u:6034: tathā hyasya [suvi]niścitotpāditacittasya bodhisattvasya pañca bhayāni prahīṇāni bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6036: kutaḥ punarasya ātma[sneho] vā upakaraṇasneho vā bhaviṣyati /
T06bsa034_u:6044: maraṇāt me ūrdhvamāyatyāṃ niyataṃ buddhabodhisattvaiḥ samavadhānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti evaṃ niścito bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6049: sa evaṃ sarva bhayāpagataḥ sarvagambhīṃranirdeśatrāsāpagataḥ sarvocchrayamānastaṃbhāpagataḥ
T06bsa034_u:6051: uttaptatvādaprakṛtenāśayena sarvakuśaladharmasamudāgamāya dṛṣṭe ca dharme sarvākāraṃ
T06bsa034_u:6053: āyatyāñca yāni tāni pūrvanirdiṣṭāni bodhipakṣyapaṭale daśamahāpraṇidhānāni tānyasmin
T06bsa034_u:6060: buddhakṛtyakaraṇatāyai ca daśamaṃ mahāpraṇidhānabhinirharati pāramparyeṇa ca sattvadhātvanupacchedavallokadharmānupacchedavadeṣāmeva
T06bsa034_u:6063: pūrvakaṃ praṇidhātavye 'rthe praṇidhānaṃ paścimakaṃ praṇidhānaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:6064: etānyeva ca mahāpraṇidhānāni pramukhāni kṛtvā tasya bodhisattvasya daśapraṇidhānāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇyutpadyante samyak praṇidhānānām /
T06bsa034_u:6065: tasyaivamāyatyāñca praṇidhānavataḥ dṛṣṭe ca dharme ārabdhavīryasya daśavihārapariśodhanā dharmāḥ pramuditavihārapariśuddhaye saṃvartante /
T06bsa034_u:6067: pratītyasamutpādayogena kevalaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaskandhasamudāgamaṃ paśyataḥ karuṇā /
T06bsa034_u:6068: mayaite sattvā asmātkevalād duḥkhaskandhādvimocayitavyā iti saṃpaśyato maitrī /
T06bsa034_u:6078: yaduta śraddhā karuṇāmaitrītyāgaḥ akhedaḥ śāstrajñatā lokajñatā hrīvyapatrāpyatā dhṛtibalādhānatā tathāgatapūjopasthānatā ca /
T06bsa034_u:6080: sa ca bodhisattva etāṃśca dharmāṃ samādāya vartate bahalīkaroti /
T06bsa034_u:6081: tadanyeṣāñca navānāmadhiśīlādīnāṃ bodhisattvavihārāṇāṃ sarvākāramārgaguṇadoṣān paryeṣate buddhabodhisattvānāmantikāt /
T06bsa034_u:6084: yairākāraiḥ praveśati ta ākārāḥ yaḥ praveśaḥ sa pratilambhaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6085: praviṣṭasya yā [mahā]phalānuśaṃsaniṣpattiḥ samudāgamaśca sa niṣyando veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6086: tasyāsminvihāre vyavasthitasya dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bahavo buddhā ābhāsamāgacchanti audārikadarśanasya /
T06bsa034_u:6087: ye ca tena śrutā bhavanti bodhisattvapaṭike /
T06bsa034_u:6089: santi daśasu dikṣu nānā-nāmasu lokadhātuṣu nānā-nāmānastathāgatā iti /
T06bsa034_u:6096: sa evamaudārikaprasādadarśanatayā praṇidhānabalādhānatayā ca tāṃstathāgatān dṛṣṭvā sarvākārāṃ pūjāṃ sukhopadhānatāmupasaṃharati yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ saṃghasammānanāṃ ca karoti /
T06bsa034_u:6097: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāmantikāddharmaṃ śṛṇoti udgṛhaṇāti dhārayati /
T06bsa034_u:6099: tāni ca sarvāṇi kuśalamūlāni mahābodhau pariṇāmayati /
T06bsa034_u:6104: tadyathā suvarṇaṃ prakṛtisthitaṃ yathā yathāgnau prakṣipyate dakṣeṇa karmāreṇa tathā tathā viśuddhataratāṃ gacchati /
T06bsa034_u:6105: evamevāsyāśayaśuddhasya bodhisattvasya tāni kuśalamūlāni taiviṃśuddhikāraṇairviśuddhitaratāṃ gacchanti /
T06bsa034_u:6109: yacca kiñciccaturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ karmārabhyate tatsarvamavirahitaṃ ratnasarvākārabodhisamudāgama-manaskāraiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6111: ākāṃkṣamāṇaśca tadrūpaṃ vīryamārabhate yatsarvagṛhakalatrabhogānutsṛjya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitvā ekakṣaṇalavamuhūrtena śataṃ bodhisattvasamādhīnāṃ samāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:6122: kāyañca kāyaṃ bodhisattvaśataparivāramādarśayati ataḥparaṃ praṇidhānabalenāpramāṇā prabhāvavikurvaṇā bodhisattvānāṃ veditavyā asmin pramuditavihāre sthitānām /
T06bsa034_u:6124: teṣāṃ samyak praṇidhānāṃ na sukarāṃ saṃkhyā kartu yāvatkalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrairapi /
T06bsa034_u:6125: evamayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ pramuditavihāraḥ suviniścita[taḥ] caturākāraḥ cittotpādataḥ
T06bsa034_u:6129: yāśca daśabhūmike sūtre daśa bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ ta iha bodhisattvapiṭake mātṛkānirdeśa-daśa-bodhisattvavihārā yathākramaṃ pramuditavihāramupādāya yāvatparamavihārādveditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6132: tatra katame bodhisattvānāmadhiśīlavihārasya ākārāḥ kāni liṅgāni kāni nimittani veditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:6149: daśasu ca paripūrṇeṣu [kuśaleṣu] karmapatheṣu prakṛtyā saṃdṛśyate /
T06bsa034_u:6150: sa evaṃ prakṛtiśīlī prajñayā kliṣṭākliṣṭānāṃ karmapathānāṃ durgatisugatiyāneṣu karmasamudācāre hetuphalasamudāgamavyavasthānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T06bsa034_u:6153: parāṃśca tatraiva samādāpayitukāmo bhavati samādāpayati ca viṣamakarmasamācāradoṣaduṣṭañca
T06bsa034_u:6154: sattvadhātuṃ sarvamaviśeṣeṇa sampattivipattigataṃ paramārthato duḥkhitaṃ vyasanasthaṃ
