T06bsa034_u:6156: tasyāsmin adhiśīlavihāre vyavasthitasya buddhadarśanaṃ kuśalamūlaviśuddhiḥ pūrvavadveditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:6158: tadyathā tadeva suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa kāsīsaṃ grakṣiptaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā viśuddhataraṃ bhavatyagnau prakṣipyamāṇam /
T06bsa034_u:6161: yadbhūyasā bāhulyena ca dauḥśīlyādakuśalebhyaḥ karmapathebhyaḥ sattvān vyāvartayati /
T06bsa034_u:6168: vistaranirdeśataḥ punaryathā sūtrameva yathā daśabhūmike vimalāyāṃ bhūmau dauḥśīlyamalāpagatatvāt vimalā bhūmirityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:6170: yā tatra vimalā bhūmiḥ sehādhiśīlavihāro veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6171: tatra katame bodhisattvānāmākārāḥ kāni liṅgāni kāni nimittāni adhicittavihārasya /
T06bsa034_u:6172: iha bodhisattvena pūrvamevādhiśīlavihāre te daśa śuddhāśayā manasikṛtā bhavanti juṣṭāḥ pratividdhāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6176: sarvāsravasāsraveṣu me dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandati pratikūlatāyāṃ ca santiṣṭhata iti manasikāreṇa /
T06bsa034_u:6177: tatpratipakṣabhāvanāyāṃ ca me vijñānaṃ saṃsthitamiti manasikāreṇa /
T06bsa034_u:6180: asaṃlīnaṃ ca me mānasaṃ pravartate sarvabuddhadharmeṣviti manasikāreṇa /
T06bsa034_u:6181: sarvaduṣkaracaryāsu ca me nāsti vyatheti manasikāreṇa /
T06bsa034_u:6182: adhimuktaṃ ca me mahāyāne cittamekāntena na tadanyahīnayāneṣviti manasikāreṇa /
T06bsa034_u:6188: tatra ca spṛhājāto bhavati ghanarasena cchandena /
T06bsa034_u:6195: (Dutt 230) tasya ca vimokṣasya samudāgamāya dharmadhātau sarvavikalpapracāra-saṃlkeśotpattipratipakṣaṃ prajñāṃ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:6196: tasya ca jñānālokasya niṣpattaye samyaksaṃbodhiṃ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:6199: saddharmaśravaṇahetornāsti taddraviṇaṃ pariṣkāramādhyātmika-vāhyaṃ vastu yanna parityajati /
T06bsa034_u:6203: sa prītataro bhavatyeka catuṣpadagāthāśravaṇena na tvevaṃ trisāhasrapūrṇapratimena mahāratnarāśinā /
T06bsa034_u:6208: te 'nuśrāvayiṣyāmi sa cenmahatyāmagnikhadāyāmātmānaṃ prakṣipasi mahāntañca duḥkhopakramaṃ saṃpratīcchasīti /
T06bsa034_u:6210: utsahāmyahamasya dharmapadasyārthe pūrvavat trisāhasramahāsāhasrapratimāyāmāpyagnikhadāyāṃ brahmalokādātmānamutsraṣṭuṃ prāgeva pratyavarāyām
T06bsa034_u:6212: evaṃrūpeṇa vīryārambheṇa dharmān paryeṣyaivaṃ yoniśo manasikaroti /
T06bsa034_u:6214: viditvā tadeva śrutaṃ niśritya dharmanimittāni samyagālambanīkurvan viviktaṃ kāmairvistareṇa
T06bsa034_u:6215: prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthañca dhyānaṃ laukikaṃ catasra ārūpyasamāpattīrlaukikīścatvāryapramāṇāni
T06bsa034_u:6217: sa tairbahulaṃ vihṛtya tāni dhyānāni samādhīn samāpattīḥ vyāvartayitvā praṇidhānavaśena kāmadhātau yatra sattvārthaṃ bodhipakṣadharmaparipūriṃ ca paśyati tatropapadyate /
T06bsa034_u:6221: adhimukticaryā-bhūmāvevāsya pūrvameva dharmatathatādhimokṣād dṛṣṭikṛtabandhanāni prahīṇāni bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6225: tadyathā tadeva suvarṇakuśalasya karmārasya hastagataṃ prakṣīṇamalakaṣāyamapi samadharaṇamavatiṣṭhate tulyamānam /
T06bsa034_u:6229: prabhāve 'pi yatra pūrvake vihāre sahasramākhyātaṃ tatreha śatasahasraṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:6234: vistaranirdeśaḥ punaryathāsūtraṃ tadyathā daśabhūmike prabhākaryāṃ bhūmau /
T06bsa034_u:6236: adhyātmaṃ cittaviśuddhimupādāya sā prabhā saṃbhavati tasmātsa vihāraḥ adhicitta ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:6239: iha bodhisattvena pūrvamevādhicittavihāre daśa dharmālokapraveśāḥ śrutaparyeṣṭimadhipattiṃ kṛtvā pratilabdhā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6241: [te] punardaśa dharmālokapraveśā granthato yathā sūtrameva veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6242: ye ca prajñapyante yatra ca prajñapyante yena ca prajñapyante te ca yatsamāḥ paramārthaḥ
T06bsa034_u:6243: yasya ca saṃkleśa-vyavadānaśca saṃkliśyante viśuddhante ca yatpratiyusaṃktena saṃkleśena
T06bsa034_u:6248: abhedyāśayatā pūrvaṅgamairyathāsūtrameva daśākāreṇa jñānaparipākena [jñāna-]paripācakairdharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati tathāgatakule tadātmaka-dharmapratilambhāt /
T06bsa034_u:6249: sarvākārāṃ bodhisattvāpekṣāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā smṛtyupasthānapramukhān saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayanti yathāsūtrameva /
T06bsa034_u:6250: tasya tāndharmānupāyaparigraheṇa bhāvayataḥ satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ susūkṣmāpyasya skandhadhātvāyatanānyabhiniveśaḥ sarveñjitāni cātyantāsamudācārataḥ prahīyante /
T06bsa034_u:6251: teṣāṃ prahāṇād yāni tathāgata-vivarṇitāni karmāṇi tāni sarveṇa sarvaṃ nādhyācarati /
T06bsa034_u:6253: tathābhūtaśca bhūyasā mātrayā snigdhamṛdukarmaṇyacittaśca bhavati tathā citrākārasuviśuddhacittaśca /
T06bsa034_u:6255: uttari ca bhūmipariśodhakāni karmāṇi samanveṣamāṇo mahāvīryārambhaprāpto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6268: prabhāve ca yatra pūrvavihāre śatasahasraguṇaṃ samākhyātaṃ tatrāsmin koṭisamākhyātaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:6276: vistaranirdeśaḥ punastadyathādaśabhūmike 'rciṣmatī bhūminirdeśe bodhipakṣyā dharmāstasyāṃ bhūmau jñānārcibhūtāḥ samyagdharmadeśanā prajñāvabhāsakarakālokānām
T06bsa034_u:6280: iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvake 'dhiprajñavihāre [yā] daśa viśuddhāśayasamatāḥ pratilabdhāḥ tāsāmadhimātrātvāt paripūrṇatvāt dvitīyamadhiprajñavihāraṃ praviśati /
T06bsa034_u:6287: bhūyo jñānavaiśeṣikatāṃ prārthayamānaḥ catvāryasatyāni daśabhirākārairyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:6291: pratyupannaduḥkhātmakatāṃ hetu[ta]ścānāgataduḥkhaprabhāvatāṃ hetukṣayāt [tat]kṣayānutpāda[na]tāṃ tatprahāṇopāyaniṣevaṇatāṃ cārabhya yathā deśyate
T06bsa034_u:6293: sa evaṃ satyakuśalaḥ sarvañca saṃskāragataṃ prajñayā samyag vidūṣayati /
T06bsa034_u:6301: yāni ca sattvānugrāhakāni laukikāni lipiśāstramudrāgaṇanādīni yathāsūtrameva śilpakarmaṃsthānāni tāni sarvāṇyābhinirharati sattvakaruṇa[ta]yā
T06bsa034_u:6307: ityayaṃ teṣāṃ sattvānugrāhakānāṃ śilpakarmasthānānāṃ samāsārtho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6310: tadyathā tadeva svarṇakuśalena karmakāreṇa musāragalva-mṛṣṭaṃ pratyarpitamatulyatayā 'saṃhāryaṃ bhavati tadanyaiḥ suvarṇaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6311: evamayaṃ bodhisattvo 'saṃhāryo bhavati sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ tadanyabhūmisthitaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6312: tadyathā candrasūryanakṣatrāṇāmābhā asaṃhāryā ca bhavati sarva vātamaṇḍalaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6314: evamevāsya bodhisattvasya sā prajñā asaṃhāryā bhavati sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6324: vistaranirdeśataḥ punastadyathā daśabhūmike sudurjayāyāṃ bhūmau sattveṣu niścayajñānaṃ sudurjayam /
T06bsa034_u:6329: iha bodhisattvena pūrvameva satyapratisaṃyukte adhiprajñavihāre daśa dharmasamatāḥ pratilabdhaḥ (Dutt 235) bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6335: ca tasyaiva kleśaduḥkhasaṃkleśa-visaṃyogād viviktasamatayā vikalpitasya jñeyasvabhāvasya
T06bsa034_u:6338: so 'sminvihāre sthitaḥ sattveṣu saṃvṛddhakaruṇo bodhau tīvracchandābhilāṣajātaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6339: lokānāṃ saṃbhavañca vibhavañca sarvākārayā pratītyasamutpāda-samyagvyavacāraṇatayā vyavacārayati prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:6342: sa evaṃ paramārthakuśalaḥ sattvasāpekṣaḥ yoniśaḥ pratividhyati kleśasaṃyogāt /
T06bsa034_u:6343: pratyayasāmagryācca saṃskṛtaṃ prakṛtidurbalamātmātmīyavirahitamanekadoṣaduṣṭaṃ pravartate na vinā kleśasaṃyogapratyayasāmagrīm /
T06bsa034_u:6344: tena mayā kleśasaṃyogapratyayasāmagrīṃ ca vikalīkartavyā cātmarakṣārtham /
T06bsa034_u:6345: na ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ vyupaśamayitavyaṃ sattvānugrahārtham /
T06bsa034_u:6346: tasyaivaṃ jñānakārūṇyānugatasyāsmin vihāre 'saṅgajñānābhimukho nāma prajñāpāramitāvihāraḥ abhisaṃmukhī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6348: sa ca vihāro yā tīkṣṇā saptamyāṃ bhūmau prāyogikacaryāparyantagatā bodhisattvakṣāntiḥ tayānulomikyā kṣāntyā saṃgṛhīto veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6358: tadyathā tadeva suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa vaidūryamaṇiratnamuṣṭaṃ pratyarpitamasaṃhāryaṃ
T06bsa034_u:6359: bhavati tadanyaiḥ sarvajātarūpaiḥ evamasya bodhisattvasya tāni kuśalamūlāni viśuddhatarāṇi
T06bsa034_u:6361: tadyathā candraprabhā sattvāśrayāṃśca prahalādayatyanācchedyaprabhā ca bhavati catasṛbhirvātamaṇḍalikābhiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6362: evamasya bodhisattvasya sā prajñābhā sarvasattvakleśaparidāhañca praśamayati /
T06bsa034_u:6375: tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ sābhisaṃskāraḥ sābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6376: iha bodhisattvenānantare 'dhiprajñavihāre daśopāyena prajñayā cābhinirhṛtāḥ sarvasattvāsādhāraṇā laukikāḥ sarvalokāsādhāraṇāśca mārgāntarārambhaviśeṣāḥ pratilabdhā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6385: cānābhoganirnimittākalpāvikalpanatayā 'pramāṇabuddhiviṣaya-samutthānaṃ paśyan nirantaraṃ niścchidraṃ prayujyate sarveryāpatha-cāravihāramanasikāreṣu
T06bsa034_u:6387: tasya cittakṣaṇe daśapāramitāḥ pramukhāḥ sarve bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ paripūryante viśeṣeṇa /
T06bsa034_u:6392: āsmin punaḥ saptame vihāre sarvabuddhadharmasamutthāpanatayā bodhaṅgāni paripūryante
T06bsa034_u:6394: tathā hi sa bodhisattvo 'sya vihārasyānantaramaṣṭamaṃ viśuddhaṃ vihāraṃ praviśati /
T06bsa034_u:6399: tasmādasmin vihāre sarve rāgādipramukhāḥ kleśāḥ prahīyante /
T06bsa034_u:6400: sa ca na saṃkleśo na niḥkleśo veditavyaḥ asamudācārād buddhajñānābhilāṣācca /
T06bsa034_u:6402: sa yāni tathāgatavivarṇitāni karmāṇi pūrvavat tasya pañcamavihārābhinihṛtāni laukikāni
T06bsa034_u:6403: śilpajñānānīha paripūryante ācāryasammataśca bhavati trisāhasramahāsāhasre sthāpayitvā
T06bsa034_u:6406: sarve ca dhyānādayo bodhipakṣyā dharmā āmukhī bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6411: sa tathā prayuktaḥ suniścitaviṣayasamādhipramukhāni daśa samādhiśatasahasrāṇyabhinirharati bodhisattvasamādhīnām /
T06bsa034_u:6413: sa evaṃ sarvakleśaviviktena durvijñeyena sarvavikalpapracārāpagatena kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā viharati /
T06bsa034_u:6417: tu ṣaṭṣu buddhadharmādhyālambanatayā ṣaṣṭhe ca vihāre bodhisattvo nirodhaṃ samāpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:6420: yad bhūtakoṭivihāreṇa ca viharati na ca nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti /
T06bsa034_u:6421: sa tamevopāyajñānābhinihāramadhipatiṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvāsādhāraṇāṃ bodhisattvacaryāñcarati laukikapratibhāsāñcātanmayīṃ ca yathāsūtrameva /
T06bsa034_u:6425: tīrthikavyāvartanatāṃ paracittānuvartanatāṃ mahājanakāyānuvartanatāṃ cārabhya śeṣaṃ pūrvavat /
T06bsa034_u:6427: tadyathā tadeva suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa sarvamaṇiratnamṛṣṭuṃ pratyarpitamatyarthaṃ bhrājate /
T06bsa034_u:6430: tadyathā sūryābhā jambūdvīpe yadbhūyasā snehaśca pariśoṣayati /
T06bsa034_u:6431: asaṃhāryā ca bhavati sa ca tadanyaprabhābhiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6432: evamasya bodhisattvasya prajñābhā sattvānāṃ sarvakleśaviṣāṇi ca śoṣayati /
T06bsa034_u:6447: tatra katamo bodhisattvānām anābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6448: iha bodhisattvena prathame 'nantare vihāre daśākāraṃ sarvadharmaparamārthāvatārajñānaṃ pratilabdhaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6449: triṣu adhveṣu yathāyogam ādyanutpannatāmajanmatāmalakṣaṇatām ārabhya tadanyahetubhāvāsambhavāvināśatāñcārabhya
T06bsa034_u:6452: tadajñānamithyābhiniveśahetukāñca tasminvidyamāne vastuni nirabhilāpye ādau madhye
T06bsa034_u:6456: ihasthaścānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu paramāṃ bodhisattvakṣāntiṃ suviśuddhāṃ labhate /
T06bsa034_u:6458: catasṛbhiḥ paryeṣaṇābhirayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ sarvadhamān paryeṣya yadā caturbhireva yathābhūtaparijñānaiḥ parijānāti /
T06bsa034_u:6459: tadā sarvamithyāvikalpābhiniveśeṣvapanīteṣu sarvadharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭe ca dharme sarvasaṃlkeśānutpattyanukūlatāṃ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:6460: samparāye ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ niravaśeṣato 'nutpatiṃ paśyati teṣāmeva pūrvamithyāvikalpābhiniveśahetusamutpannānāṃ dharmāṇām /
T06bsa034_u:6461: tāḥ punaḥ catasraḥ paryeṣaṇā yathāpūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭāstattvārthapaṭale /
T06bsa034_u:6462: catvāri ca yathābhūtaparijñānāni tānyadhimukticaryāvihāramupādāya yāvatsābhoganirnirmittādvihārān na suviśuddhāni bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6464: tasmāt sa bodhisattvaḥ anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣānti-pratilabdha ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:6465: sa tasyāḥ kṣānterlābhād gambhīraṃ bodhisattvavihāramanuprāpto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6466: tasya ye pūrvake nirnimitte vihāre catvāro 'pakṣālāste prahīṇā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6468: uttari ca viśuddhavihāre autsukyaṃ prahīṇaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6473: tasya ca tasmin gambhīre vihāre 'bhiratasya tasmin dharmamukhasrotasi tathāgata-saṃcodanā-samādāpanā-abhinirhāramukha-jñānābhijñā-karmopasaṃhāro 'prameyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6474: tathā saṃcoditasya cāpramāṇakāyavibhaktijñānābhinirhāro daśavaśitā-prāptiśca yathāsūtrameva vistareṇa veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6479: sarvopapattisaṃvartanīyeṣu ca karmasu sarvopapattyāyataneṣu cāsya kāmakāmopapattitā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6482: yad yadeva vastu yathādhimucyate tattathaiva bhavati nānyathā /
T06bsa034_u:6483: yañca jñeyaṃ jñātukāmo bhavati tadapi jānīte yathāvat /
T06bsa034_u:6486: evaṃ vaśitāprāptasya bodhisattvasyātaḥ pareṇa vaśitāprāptakṛto 'nuśaṃso vistareṇa yathāsūtrameva veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6487: audārikañca buddhadarśanaṃ vihāya satatasamitamavirahito bhavati buddhadarśanena /
T06bsa034_u:6503: yaiśca dharmajñānābhisaṃskāraiḥ pareṣāṃ dharmaḥ sarvākāro bodhisattvena deśayitavyo
T06bsa034_u:6504: yacca dharmākhyānakṛtyaṃ tatsarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tatredaṃ dharmasamākhyānakṛtyam /
T06bsa034_u:6505: gahanopavicāreṣu ye ca saṃkliśyante viśudhyante ca /
T06bsa034_u:6506: yena ca saṃkliśyante yena ca viśudhyante /
T06bsa034_u:6512: evañca dharma-deśanākuśalasya deśanākṛtyakuśalasya ca yat sarvākāramahādharma-bhāṇakatvam aprameyadhāraṇīprāptasya sarvasvarāṅgavibhaktikuśalasyākṣayapratibhānasya
T06bsa034_u:6516: yatra yeṣu ca dharma deśayataḥ yāvadbhirmukhaiḥ yayā sattva-vijñāpana santoṣaṇa-kṛtyasaṃniyojana-śaktyā samanvāgatasya /
T06bsa034_u:6524: sarvasattvānāṃ hitasukhāśayapariśuddhyā bodhisattvapratisaṃvinmatyā dharmasamākhyānādhikāratvāt sā bhūmiḥ sādhumatītyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:6527: iha bodhisattvasya pratisaṃvid-vihāre sarvākārapariśuddhe dharmarājatvārhasya dharmābhiṣekasamāsannasya
T06bsa034_u:6531: aprameya-vimokṣa-dhāraṇī abhijñā pratilambhataśca tadādhipateya mahāsmṛtijñā nābhinirhāranirvacanavyavasthānataśca
T06bsa034_u:6536: nāmantikāt dharmamedhabhūmyāmatyudārāṃ duḥsahāḥ tadanyaiḥ sarvasattvaiḥ saddharmaṃvṛṣṭi sampratīcchati /
T06bsa034_u:6537: mahāmedhabhūtaśca svayamanabhisambuddhabodhi-abhisambuddhabodhiścāprameyānāṃ sattvānāṃ saddharma-vṛṣṭayā nirapamayā kleśarajāṃsi praśamayati
T06bsa034_u:6538: vicitrāṇi ca kuśalamulaśasyāni virohayati vivardhayatī pācayatī tasyāṃ bhūmāvavasthitaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6541: na ca yānyuttarottareṣu vihāreṣvaṅgāni nirniṣṭāni tāni pūrvakeṣu vihāreṣu sarveṇa sarvaṃ na saṃvidyante /
T06bsa034_u:6542: api tu mṛdutvān na saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti /
T06bsa034_u:6544: ekaikaścātra vihāro 'nekairmahākalpakoṭīśatasahasraistato vā prabhūtataraiḥ pratilabhyate niṣpadyate ca /
T06bsa034_u:6545: te tu sarve vihārāstribhirmahākalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ samudāgacchanti mahākalpāsaṃkhyeyenādhimukticaryā-vihāraṃ samatikramya pramuditavihāro labhyate
T06bsa034_u:6547: dvitīyena mahākalpāsaṃkhyeyena pramuditavihāraṃ yāvatsābhogaṃ nirnimittaṃ vihāramatikramyānābhogaṃ nirnimittaṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6549: tathā hi sa śuddhāśayo bodhisattvo niyataṃ vyāyacchate /
T06bsa034_u:6550: tṛtīyena mahākalpāsaṃkhyeyenānābhogañca nirnimittaṃ pratisaṃvidvihārañca samatikramya paramaṃ bodhisattvavihāraṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6552: yo 'pi mahākalpaḥ so 'pi rātrindivasamāsārdhamāsagaṇanāyogena kālāprameyatvādasaṃkhyeya ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:6553: yāpi (Dutt 243) teṣāmeva mahākalpānāṃ gaṇanāyogena sarvagaṇanā samatikrāntā saṃkhyā so 'pyasaṃkhyeyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6556: yastvadhimātrādhimātreṇa vīryārambheṇa prayujyate tataḥ kaścidantarakalpān prabhūtān vyāvartayati kaścit yāvanmahākalpān /
T06bsa034_u:6559: tatra triṣu vihāreṣu kleśāvaraṇapakṣyadauṣṭhulyasya prahāṇaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:6562: pakṣyasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ dauṣṭhulyasya prahāṇaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:6565: tacca tathāgataṃ vihāramanupraviśataḥ jñeyāvaraṇapakṣyamapi dauṣṭhulyaṃ trividhaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:6568: phalgugatasyānābhoge nirnimitte sāragatasya tathāgate vihāre prahāṇaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6569: sarvāvaraṇaviśuddhijñānatā ca teṣu triṣu vihāreṣu tasya kleśa-jñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇasya tadanye vihārā yathānukramaṃ saṃbhārabhūtā bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6570: eṣu trayodaśasu vihāreṣu samāsata ekādaśavidhā viśuddhirveditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:6578: daśame tattvajñānābhinirhāraviśuddhiḥ ekādaśe tadarthasamyak parasamākhyānāya pratirsavidviśuddhiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6586: tataścordhvaṃ triṣu bodhisattvavihāreṣu pariśuddhacaryā saṃgṛhīteṣu bhāvanāphalaniṣpattiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6588: śrāvakavihāre sādharmyeṇa caiṣāṃ dvādaśānāṃ bodhisattvavihārāṇāmanukramo veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6591: yathā tasya nyāmāvakrāntivihāraḥ tathāsya tṛtīyo vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6592: yathā tasyāvetyaprasādalābhinaḥ āryakāntādhiśīlavihāra uttari āsravakṣayāya tathāsya caturtho vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6593: yathā tasyādhiśīlaṃ niśrityādhicittaśikṣānirhāravihāraḥ tathāsya pañcamo vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6594: yathā tasya yathā pratilabdhasatyajñānādhipraśikṣāvihāraḥ tathāsya ṣaṣṭha saptamāṣṭamā vihārā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:6595: yathā tasya suvicārita jñeyasyānimittasamādhiprayogavihāraḥ tathāsyanavamo vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6596: yathā tasya pariniṣpanno nirnimitto vihāraḥ tathāsya daśamo vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6597: yathā tasya vyutthitasya vimuktyāyatanavihāraḥ tathāsyaikādaśo vihāraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6598: yathā tasya sarvākāro 'rhatvavihāraḥ tathāsya dvādaśo vihāro veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6604: samāsato bodhisattvānāṃ pañcavidhā upapattiḥ sarvatraṃ sarvavihāreṣu ca sarveṣāñca bodhisattvānāmanavadyā parvasattvahitasukhāya /
T06bsa034_u:6607: iha bodhisattvo durbhikṣeṣu kṛcchreṣu mahākāntāreṣu kāleṣu praṇidhāya sattvānāmalpakṛcchreṇa yātrānimittaṃ mahāmatsyādiyoniṣūpapadyate /
T06bsa034_u:6609: vyādhibahuleṣu ca sattveṣu praṇidhāya siddhavidyādhara-mahāvaidyātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti teṣāṃ vyādhīnāṃ praśamāya /
T06bsa034_u:6610: bhṛśa-paracakropadraveṣu ca sattveṣu balavān bhūmipatirbhavati dharmeṇa śamenopāyakauśalyena
T06bsa034_u:6613: daṇḍabandhanacitrapīḍāpravṛtteṣu ca prajānāṃ rājasu teṣāmeva sattvopadravāṇāṃ prahāṇāya tadrūpeṣu rājakuleṣūpapadyate /
T06bsa034_u:6615: ye ca sattvā mithyādṛṣṭayaśca pāpakāriṇaśca kasmiṃściddevāyatane 'dhimuktāḥ teṣāmanukampayā mithyādṛṣṭiduściritaprahāṇāya tasmindevāyatane upapadyate
T06bsa034_u:6616: praṇidhānavaśitābalābhyāñca iyamupapattiranukampā-pūrvikā aprameyā veditavyā vistaranirdeśatastāsu tāsu vicitrāsu yoniṣu tiryagyonyupapanneṣu sattveṣu samāsa-nirdeśastvayamāśayaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6618: iha bodhisattvaḥ praṇidhāya vā vaśitāprāptito vā vicitreṣu tiryagyonyupapanneṣu sattveṣu
T06bsa034_u:6619: devanāgayakṣāsurādiṣu cānyonyadrugdha viruddheṣu tathā mithyādṛṣṭikeṣu brāhmaṇeṣu
T06bsa034_u:6621: ājīveṣu tadabhirateṣu tathākāmeṣvatyarthādhyavasiteṣu kāmādhimukteṣu [sattveṣu] teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sabhā[gatā]yāmupapadyate prāmukhyena tasya doṣasya vinivartanārtham /
T06bsa034_u:6622: sa pramukho bhūtvā yatte sattvāḥ samudācaranti tadasā na samudācaranti /
T06bsa034_u:6623: yatte na samudācaranti kuśalaṃ tadasau samudācarati /
T06bsa034_u:6625: te tayā [ca] dharmadeśanayā [tayā] ca visabhāgasamudācāratayā tebhyo doṣebhyastenopāyakauśalyena vinivartante /
T06bsa034_u:6629: tena ca vipākena yathoktaṃ svaparārthapaṭale karma karoti /
T06bsa034_u:6632: yā bodhisattvasya prathamaṃ pramuditavihāramupādāya yāvaddaśamādvihārādupapattirvarṇitā sā 'syādhipattyopapattirityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:6633: jambūdvīpeśvaratvamupādāya yāvanmaheśvaratvādakaniṣṭhānatikramya sarvopapattyāyatanapraviṣṭaṃ yatra paramavihāraprāptā eva bodhisattvā upapadyante
T06bsa034_u:6636: yasyāmupapattau paripūrṇabodhisambhārī bodhisattvaḥ purohitakule vā rājakule vā upapadyānuttarāñca samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
T06bsa034_u:6639: ye kecid bodhisattvā atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu śubhāsu bhadrāsu kalyāṇāsu upapattiṣūpapannā upapatsyante upapadyante ca sarve te āsveva pañcasu /
T06bsa034_u:6640: nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ sthāpayitvā bālabhūmyupapattīḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6641: tathā hi vijñairbodhisattvaiḥ upapattaya etāḥ pañcābhipretāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6647: tatra sarvāsu vihāragatāsu bodhisattvacaryāsu bodhisattvānāṃ samāsataḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ samyaktvaparigraho veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6654: prathama eva cittotpāde bodhisattvena sarvaḥ sattvadhātuḥ kalatrabhāvena parigṛhītaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6655: eṣāṃ mayā yathāśakti yathābalaṃ sarvākārahitasukhopasaṃhāraḥ karaṇīya iti /
T06bsa034_u:6659: sa ca tasminparigrahe parigrahānurūpayā kriyayā bodhisattvānurūpayā pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:6670: kālena ca kālaṃ vaiśeṣikeṇa lābhena priyavāditayā copavatsayati na caiṣu dāsadāsīsaṃjñāṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:6672: rājyajane punā rājabhūto bodhisattvaḥ adaṇḍenāśastreṇa rājyaṃ kārayati /
T06bsa034_u:6683: sa dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ samyak pariṣadaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
T06bsa034_u:6687: sarvasmiṃśca parigrahe samacitto bhavati na pakṣapatitaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6688: na ca teṣāmantike dharmamātsaryaṃ karoti na cācāryamuṣṭim /
T06bsa034_u:6690: kuśalakāmatayā tu svayaṃ kurvatāṃ na nivārayati teṣāmeva-puṇyasambhāropacayanimittam kālaṃ ca prāpya svayamevateṣāmupasthānaparicaryākartā bhavati
T06bsa034_u:6695: gambhīraṃ cārthapadaṃ prajñayā pratividhya kālena kālaṃ saṃprakāśayati /
T06bsa034_u:6697: ātmanaścāntikāt teṣāmarthe āmiṣahetoradhikena vyāpāreṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6700: vyādhitāṃścaitāṃ vimanaskaṃ vā sarvathā nābhyupekṣate vyādhipraśamāya daurmanasyāpagamāya /
T06bsa034_u:6702: kālena ca kālaṃ teṣāṃ khedamanupraviśya yuktarūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
T06bsa034_u:6705: taiśca saha tulyavṛttasamācāro bhavatyadhiko vā [na] nyūnaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6715: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sarvaṃ kālaṃ pariṣadupādānaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:6718: tatra ye mṛduke paripāke vyavasthitāḥ sattvāste bodhisattvasya dīrghakālikamupādānamityucyante cireṇa kālena viśuiddhibhavyatayā /
T06bsa034_u:6720: ye punarmadhye paripāke vyavasthitāste 'dīrghakālikamupādānamityucyante na cireṇa viśuddhibhavyatayā /
T06bsa034_u:6721: ye punaḥ sattvā adhimātre paripāke vyavasthitāste bodhisattvasya caramamupādānamityucyante tasminneva janmani viśuddhibhavyatayā /
T06bsa034_u:6723: yena parigraheṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvāḥ sattvān parigṛhītavantaḥ parigrahīṣyanti parigṛhṇanti vā /
T06bsa034_u:6727: vyatikramavyavasthiteṣu sattveṣu yudi vā bādhanaṃ yadi vā 'dhyupekṣaṇā bodhisattvasya
T06bsa034_u:6728: saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ kaṭukena ca prayogeṇa sattve samudācāraḥ svasya cāśayasya
T06bsa034_u:6730: alpake ca deyadharme saṃvidyamāne bahūnāṃ yācakānāṃ sammukhībhāvo yācanāya saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6731: ekātmakasya cāsya bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyeṣu vicitreṣūtpanneṣu sahāyībhāvayācanā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6734: mūḍhaśaṭhakhaṭhuṃkeṣu sattveṣu dharmasya deśanā vādhyupekṣaṇā vā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6735: saṃsāre ca nityakālaṃ doṣadarśanaṃ saṃsārāparityāgaśca saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6737: aviśuddhe cādhyāṣaye parairagrasya parama-priyasya vastuno yācanā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ
T06bsa034_u:6738: nānādhibhinnamatānāṃ nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃjñaptikā adhyupekṣaṇā vā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6739: ātyantikaścāpramādaḥ karaṇīyaḥ kleśāśca sarveṇa sarvaṃ na prahātavya iti saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6740: evaṃ saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptena bodhisattve kvacidgurulāghavaṃ lakṣayitvā tathaiva prayoktavyam kvacitpudgalapravicayaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6748: evaṃ samyak pratipakṣakuśalo bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptisammukhībhāve 'pi na viṣīdati samyakcātmānaṃ pariharati /
T06bsa034_u:6749: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne parigrahapaṭalaṃ dvitīyam /
T06bsa034_u:6752: eṣu yathāvarṇiteṣu trayodaśasu vihāreṣvanugatāḥ sapta bhūmayo veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6769: tāthāgatasya punarvihārasya bhūmeśca paścānnirdeśo bhaviṣyati buddhadharmapratiṣṭhā paṭale /
T06bsa034_u:6770: tatra bodhisattvaḥ adhimukticaryābhūmeḥ śuddhādhyāśayabhūmimanupraviśan katham apāyānsamatikrāmati /
T06bsa034_u:6771: iha bodhisattvo laukikaṃ pariśuddhaṃ dhyānaṃ niśrityādhimukticaryābhūmau susambhṛtabodhi
T06bsa034_u:6773: sa bhāvanānvayāt tadrūpaṃ sattveṣvanukampāśayaṃ karuṇāśayaṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6775: yadi me eṣveva sannivasato 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudāgacchati tathāpyahamutsahāmīti sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpanayanahetoḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6778: tasya tathā paribhāvitaṃ tallaukikaṃ pariśuddhaṃ dhyānam /
T06bsa034_u:6780: acireṇa tasya prahāṇādāśrayo 'sya bodhisattvasya parivartate pāpakasyāpāyikasya karmaṇo 'tyantamakaraṇatāyai apāyāgamanatāyai (Dutt 254) ca
T06bsa034_u:6784: ye ca te daśadharmā vihārapaṭale nirdiṣṭā /
T06bsa034_u:6785: śraddhādayo vihārapariśodhanāḥ ta ihāpi bhūmiviśodhanā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6789: eṣāṃ daśānāṃ bhūmiviśodhanānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vipakṣabhūtā dharmāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6792: sarveṇa sarvamanārambhacittotpādanā bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāsamādānam ayaṃ śraddhāvipakṣo dharmaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6810: śāstari kāṃkṣā vimatirvicikitsā tathāgatapūjopa sthānatāyāḥ vipakṣaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6827: dhṛtibalādhānaprāptaśca samyak prayogādaparihīyamānaḥ kuśalaiśca dharmairvivardhamānaḥ pratipattipūjayā lābhasatkārapūjayā ca tathāgatapūjopasthānaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:6830: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne tṛtīyaṃ bhūmipaṭalam /
T06bsa034_u:6833: adhimukticaryābhūmimupādāya sarvāsu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu bodhisattvānāṃ samāsataścatasraścaryā veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6837: upāyakauśalyapāramitā ca praṇidhānapāramitā ca balapāramitā ca jñānapāramitā ca /
T06bsa034_u:6858: dānādayo dharmāḥ parameṇa kālena samudāgatāḥ paramayā svabhāvaviśuddhyā viśuddhāḥ paramañca phalamanuprayacchanti /
T06bsa034_u:6863: tatra mātsaryaṃ duścaritaṃ sattveṣu vairotpīḍanatā kausīdyaṃ vikṣepo mandamomuhatā ca /
T06bsa034_u:6865: eṣāṃ [ṣaṇṇāṃ] dharmāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ṣaṭ pāramitā yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6869: ihādita eva bhoganirapekṣo bodhisattvaḥ tyaktvā āgārikān kāmān śīlasamādānaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:6872: samādānataśca kṣāntitaśca viśuddhiśīlo niścalena nirantareṇa kuśalapakṣaprayogeṇa prayujyate /
T06bsa034_u:6874: sa tathā samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ jñeyaṃ jānāti dṛśyaṃ paśyati /
T06bsa034_u:6877: iha bodhisattvasya dṛṣṭe dharme etān dānādīn kuśalāndharmān samādāya vartamānasya tannidānamāyatyāṃ bāhyataśca bhogasampatpratilambho bhavati dānakṛtaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:6882: sahajā cakuśalamūlaprayoge akhedatā paravyatikramasahiṣṇutā ca paropatāpapriyatā /
T06bsa034_u:6886: sahajā ca mandarajaskasya svacittavaśitā cittakarmaṇyatā sarvārtheṣu kṣiprābhijñatāyai /
T06bsa034_u:6890: iyaṃ pañcamī sampat itīdaṃ phalavipākakṛtamanyadanukramavyavasthānaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:6891: tatra catasṛbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ [saha]sambhāreṇa svabhāvena parivāreṇa rakṣayā ca paripūrṇā bodhisattvānāmadhiśīlaṃ śikṣā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:6902: etāni ca catvāri kṛtyāni bodhisattvāḥ ābhiścatasṛbhiścaryābhiryathākramaṃ kurvantyanutiṣṭhanti /
T06bsa034_u:6904: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne caturthaṃ caryāpaṭalam /
T06bsa034_u:6907: tatra tathāgatavihāramārabhya tāthāgatīñca niṣṭhāgamanabhūmiṃ bhagavatāṃ catvāriṃśaduttaramāveṇikaṃ buddhadharmaśataṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6909: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni trīṇyarakṣāṇi mahāṃkaruṇā
T06bsa034_u:6914: adhasthātpādatalayoścakre jāte sahasrāre sanābhike sanemike sarvākāraparipūrṇe /
T06bsa034_u:6927: ekaikamasya romakūpe jātaṃ nīlaṃ kuṇḍalakajātaṃ pradakṣiṇāvartam /
T06bsa034_u:6930: ślakṣṇatvāt tvace rajo malasya kāye nāvatiṣṭhate /
T06bsa034_u:6943: prabhūtatvāj jihvāyāḥ mukhājjihavāṃ nirṇāmya sarvamukhamaṇḍalamavacchādayati yāvantakaṃ kleśaparyantam /
T06bsa034_u:6951: ūrṇā cāsya bhrūvormadhye jātā śvetā śaṃkhanibhā pradakṣiṇāvartā /
T06bsa034_u:6969: dve pārśve dve kakṣe dvau stanauabhisamasya ṣaḍanuvyañjane bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6971: ityetyāni adhaḥ kāyagatāni grīvāyāma ūrdhvaṃ sthāpayitvā ṣaṣṭiranuvyañjanāni bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:6983: ityetāni grīvāyāḥ ūrdhvaṃ kāye viṃśatiranuvyañjanāni bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6984: pūrvakāni ca ṣaṣṭiḥ paścimakāni ca viṃśatirekadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya aśītiranuvyañjanāni bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:6985: ityetāni lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāni [bhadrāṇi] śuddhāśayabhūmipraviṣṭo bodhisattvo vipākataḥ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:6988: hīnaistu taiḥ pūrvamapi bodhisattvabhūtaḥ samanvāgato bhavati śuddhādhyāśayabhūmimupādāya /
T06bsa034_u:6989: sarvaścāviśeṣeṇa bodhisambhāraḥ sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanānāṃ nirvartako bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:7001: apyeva te tasya pāpakasya karmaṇo vipakṣabhūtasya vicitrasya yatprātipakṣikaṃ vicitraṃ
T06bsa034_u:7002: kuśalaṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjananirvartakaṃ karma tasyedaṃ vicitraphalānuśaṃsaṃ śrutvā tasya
T06bsa034_u:7007: mātāpitrorupasthānena vicitreṇa vicitrayā ca sattvopadravārakṣayā āgamana-gamanādiparispandamupādāya cakrāṅkapādatāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:7011: yaiśca tribhiḥ karmabhiretāni trīṇi mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni nirdiṣṭāni taireva sarvaiḥ samastairāyatapādapārṣṇitvaṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:7012: tatra trayāṇāmapi lakṣaṇānāṃ saṃniśrayatvāt caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhirgurūn saṃgṛhya jālapāṇipādatāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:7014: kuśaladharmāsaṃtuṣṭyā uttarottarān kuśalāndharmānvardha yitvā ucchaṅgacaraṇatāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:7015: yathāvaddharmānudgṛhya paryavāpya pareṣāṃ ca deśayitvā dautyañca samyak pareṣāṃ kṛtvā aiṇeyajaṅghatāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:7017: tatrānavanataḥ glāneṣu ca glānopasthānaṃ kṛtvā bhaiṣajyañca dattvā vyādhyanavanatocchrayaṇān mātrāśī ca kāmeṣvanavanataḥ anavanatakāyatāṃ pratilabhate
T06bsa034_u:7018: parairnirvāsitān sattvān dharmeṇa samena saṃhṛtya hrīmānapatrāpī vastrapradaśca koṣagatavastiguhyatāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:7019: kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ saṃvṛtātmā pratigraha-bhojane ca mātrajñaḥ glāneṣu bhaiṣajyapradaḥ viṣame karmaṇi pratigraha-paribhogavaiṣamye cāpravṛttatvāt (Dutt 262)
T06bsa034_u:7021: yenaiva ca karmaṇā utsaṅgacaraṇatāṃ pratilabhate tenaivordhvaṅgaromatām /
T06bsa034_u:7022: svayaṃ kuśalamīmāṃsakaḥ paṇḍitavijña-sevī sūkṣmārthacintakaḥ gurūṇāṃ sthānaśodhakaḥ
T06bsa034_u:7026: yenaiva ca karmaṇā ekaikaromatoktā tenaiva sūkṣmaślakṣṇatvacatā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:7027: prabhūtenotsadena viśadenānnapānena mahājanakāyaṃ saṃtarpayitvā saptotsadakāyatāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:7030: ahitāñca sattvānā nivārayitā tāḍitā hitāhite ca sanniyojayitā siṃhapūrvārdhakāyatāṃ pratilabhate siṃhavatsattvārtheṣu parākramaśīlatvāt /
T06bsa034_u:7031: anenaiva ca karmaṇā susaṃvṛttaskandhatā citāntarāṃśatā ca veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:7032: yenaiva ca karmaṇā dīrghāṅgulitvaṃ pratilabhate tenaiva bṛhadṛjugātratāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:7033: mitrabhedakarīṃ piśunāṃ vācaṃ prahāya bhinnānāñca sattvānāṃ sāmagrīṃ kṛtvā catvāriṃśad dantatāṃ samāviraladantatāñca pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:7034: kāmāvacarīṃ maitrīṃ bhāvayitvā dharmārthacintakaḥ suśukladantatāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:7035: arthimyaḥ sattvebhyo yathābhipretaṃ dhanaṃ samyagvisṛjya siṃhahanutāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:7036: svasutavat-sattvānsaṃrakṣya śrāddhaścānukampakaśca bhaiṣajyapradaśca [prasannaśca] rasarasāgratāṃ pratilabhate dharmarasānupradānāddharmarasāsvādanāt pranaṣṭarasaviśodhanācca /
T06bsa034_u:7037: pañca śikṣāpadāni prāṇātipātaviratyādīni svayañca samādāya saṃrakṣya parāṃśca teṣveva
T06bsa034_u:7040: satyavāditayā priyavāditayā kāladharmavāditayā ca brahmasvaratāṃ pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:7041: kṛtsnaṃ jaganmaitreṇa cetasā 'nukampya mātṛvatpitṛvadabhinīlanetratāṃ gopakṣmanetratāñca pratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:7042: guṇavatāṃ tu bhūtasya varṇasya hartāṃ varṇavādī bhruvormadhye ūrṇāṃ pratilabhate śvetāṃ śaṃkhanibhāṃ pradakṣiṇāvartām /
T06bsa034_u:7043: (Dutt 263) sarveṣu ca dvātriṃśatsu mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇeṣvaviśeṣeṇa śīlaṃ kāraṇaṃ pratilambhāya veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:7045: na hi śīlavipanno bodhisattvo manuṣyatvameva tāvadāsādayet kutaḥ punarmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam /
T06bsa034_u:7046: tatroṣṇīṣaśiraskatā anava lokitamūrdhatā caikaṃ mahāpuruṣakṣaṇaṃ veditavye tadvyatirekeṇānupalambhāt /
T06bsa034_u:7050: nipuṇakāritayā cakracaraṇatā ucchaṅgacaraṇatā jālapāṇipādatā sūkṣmatvacatā citāntarāṃśatā susaṃvṛttaskandhatā vṛhadṛjugātratā prabhūtatanujihvatā ca nirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:7051: nityakāritayā dīrghāṅga litvaṃ āyatapādapārṣṇitā anavanatakāyatā nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalatā aviraladantatā ca nirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:7055: prāmodyaprītiprabhāsvareṇa cittena kuśalasamācārād vyāma-prabhatā ca kāñcanasannibhatvacatā śukladantatā ūrṇā ca śvetā nirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:7057: bodhāya kuśalamūlapariṇamanādūrdhvāṅga-romatā catvāriṃśatsamadantatā rasarasāgratā uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā ca nirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:7058: kuśale atṛptālīnaprayogāt siṃhapūrvārdhakāyatā siṃhahanutā ca nirvartaṃte /
T06bsa034_u:7059: sattveṣu hitacittatayā samadarśanāt samadantatā abhinīlanetratā gopakṣmamā ca nirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:7061: evamanayā caturākārayā sukṛtakarmāntatayā bodhisattvānāmeṣāṃ dvātriṃśatāṃ-mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇānāṃ pratilambho viśuddhiśca bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:7066: veditavyā tāthāgatyāṃ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmau suviśuddhataiṣāṃ niruttaratā ca veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:7067: tatra rūpitvādeṣāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ hīnamadhyottamaiśca sattvaiḥ sūpalakṣyatvāt satsu sarveṣveva buddhadharmeṣu mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇeṣvetānyeva mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni vyavasthāpitāni /
T06bsa034_u:7069: tatra samāsataḥ sarvasattveṣu puṇyasadṛśena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasyaikaiko romakūpo nirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:7073: tataḥ śataguṇena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasyaikaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:7076: yāvānūrṇā-praviṣṭaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ tataḥ śatasahasraguṇena puṇyaskandhena uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā anavalokitamūrdhatā ca nirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:7078: tataḥ koṭīśatasahasraguṇena puṇyaskandhena tathāgatasya lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāsaṃgṛhīto 'nyo dharmaśaṃkhyo nāma nirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:7079: yena tathāgata ākāṃkṣamāṇaḥ anantāparyantān lokadhātūn svareṇa vijñāpayati /
T06bsa034_u:7082: teṣāṃ punarlakṣaṇānuvyañjananirvartakānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmaṇāṃ samāsatastribhiḥ kāraṇeprameyatā veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:7085: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne pañcamaṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanapaṭalam /
T06bsa034_u:7093: savāsanānāṃ sarvakleśapakṣyāṇāṃ dauṣṭhulyānāmāśrayān niravaśeṣato 'tyantaparamaḥ sve cātmabhāve yathākāmādānasthānacyutivaśavartitā sarvākārā āśrayaśuddhistyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7095: nirvāṇe pariṇāme saṃprakhyāne ca sarvālambaneṣu yā vaśavartitā /
T06bsa034_u:7100: pūrvavatsarvāvidyāpakṣyadauṣṭhulyāpagamātsarvatra ca jñeye jñānasyānāvaraṇāt jñānavaśavartitā sarvākārā jñānaviśuddhirityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7105: ityetāni daśa tathāgatabalāni yuthā daśabalasūtre nirdeśato vistareṇa veditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:7106: [tatra] yatkiñcidanena bhāṣitaṃ lapitamudāhṛtaṃ sarvaṃ tattathā avitatheti tasmāttathāgata ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7107: tatra phalasya śubhāśabhasya yo bhūtapravṛttaḥ aviṣamo hetuḥ tadasya sthānaṃ pratiṣṭhā niśrayo 'bhinirvartakaṃ ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7111: eṣāñca sarvajñānādīnāṃ padānāṃ pūrvavadvyākaraṇaṃ veditavyaṃ tadyathā paramabodhipaṭale /
T06bsa034_u:7118: svayamadhigamya pareṣāmapyanukampayā vistareṇa prakāśanād brāhmacakraṃ pravartayatītyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7120: tathāgatasyaitadadhivacanaṃ yaduta brahmā ityapi śāntaḥ śītībhūta ityapi /
T06bsa034_u:7122: evaṃ pāraṃparyeṇa brahmā preritaṃ sarvasattvanikāye bhramati /
T06bsa034_u:7128: teṣām uttānā vivṛtā prajñaptā prakāśitā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:7131: tasya cābhyupāyasya sarvajanyatāyo [yaḥ] kaścidākāṃkṣati devabhūto vā [manuṣyabhūto vā] sarveṇa tena mamaivāntikāllabhya eṣo 'bhyupāya iti /
T06bsa034_u:7134: sarva[ku]vaidyapratijñā pratikṣepaṇavat svayaṃ ca niyataṃ vyādhipraśamanapratijñānavatpariṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ naditaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T06bsa034_u:7136: yāni naiva kṛtāni na niruddhāni nāpi karoti api tu kariṣyatyāyatyāṃ /
T06bsa034_u:7138: yāni punaḥ karmāṇi naiva kṛtāni na niruddhānyapi tu kartumeva praṇihito vyavasitaḥ tāni pratyutpannānītyucyante /
T06bsa034_u:7139: tāni punaḥprakārabhedena trīṇi kāyakarma vākkarma manaskarma /
T06bsa034_u:7144: yacca sattvasaṃkhyātamasattvasaṃkhyātaṃ vā vastvādhiṣṭhāya kriyante tatteṣāṃ vastu ityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7148: tadetadabhisamasya sarvakālaṃ sarvaprakāraṃ sarvāvasthāprayogaṃ sarvadeśaṃ sarvādhiṣṭhānaṃ sarvanidānaṃ sarvādīnavānuśaṃsañca sarvākāraṃ tathāgatānāṃ karmajñānaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:7152: dhyānavimokṣaiḥ karmaṇyacetasaścetovaśiprāptasya yathepsitasyārthasya samṛddhaye yā tasya tadanurūpasya samādheḥ samāpadyanatā tā samādhisamāpattirityucyate
T06bsa034_u:7155: yathā samāhite citte sarvo brahmalokaudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭo babhūva /
T06bsa034_u:7158: evaṃ hi tathāgato yaṃ yamevārthaṃ prasādhayitukāmo lokasādhāraṇaṃ [asādhāraṇaṃ vā] sa tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadya laghuladhveva prasādhayati
T06bsa034_u:7159: tatradhyānavimokṣābhyāṃ cittavaśitayā ca cittādhīna-sarvepsitārthasamṛddhiḥ etāvacca sarvadhyāyīnāṃ karaṇīyam /
T06bsa034_u:7161: taccaitad dhyāyikaraṇīyaṃ [sarvākāraṃ] tathāgatānāṃ tasmād dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattaya evocyante /
T06bsa034_u:7168: teṣāmeva ca dhyānādīnāṃ vicitrāṇāmabhinirhṛtānāṃ nāmasaṃketena anurūpeṇa yathāyogaṃ vyavasthitirvyavasthānāmityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7169: eṣāmeva ca dhyānādīnāṃ pratilabdhānāmuttari yā bhāvanā-paripūrirnikāmalābhitā 'kṛcchreṇānavarakalābhitā saiṣāṃ viśuddhirityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7170: tatra yathā caiṣāmaprāptiryathā ca prāptiḥ teṣu ca yā ca hīnatā yā ca praṇītatā yaccaiṣāṃ nāma yā cotkarṣaparyantatā tat sarvaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:7172: yathā paripākasamudāgamataḥ śraddhādīnāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātratā indriya-parāparatetyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7173: paraśraddhāpūrvā dharmavicāraṇā-pūrvā ca mṛdumadhyādhimātrā ruciḥ pratyavagamaḥ nānādhimuktikatetyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7175: śrāvakapratyekabuddha-tathāgatagotrāṇāṃ rāgādicaritaprabhedanayena ca yāvadaśīti sattvacaritasahasrāṇi nānādhātukatetyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7176: teṣāmevāvatāra-mukhānurūpā pratipat tadyathā rāgacaritānāmaśubhā vistareṇa tadyathā śrāvakabhūmau sarvatragāminī pratipadityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7182: vicitreṣu sattvanikāyeṣu tadyathā pūrveṣu dakṣiṇeṣu uttareṣu paścimeṣu nānā nāmasaṃketavyavasthānabhinneṣu
T06bsa034_u:7196: āhvānāya saṃketaḥ kṣatriyādayo varṇā mātāpitaraṃ bhojanapānavidhiḥ sampattivipattiḥ āryurvaicitryañca /
T06bsa034_u:7197: tathā hi loke etānyaṣṭau vyavahārapadāni upaniśritya ṣaṭ caritāni pareṣāmātmano vyapadiśanto vyapadiśanti /
T06bsa034_u:7200: brāhmaṇo vaiśyaḥ śūdro 'hamayaṃ vā ayaṃ me pitā 'sya va /
T06bsa034_u:7203: manthān vā apūpān vā odānakulmāṣān vā pare vā /
T06bsa034_u:7204: evaṃ rūpe 'haṃ vyasane sampadi vā varte 'yaṃ vā /
T06bsa034_u:7205: evaṃrūpe 'haṃ vayasi vyavasthito nave vā madhye vā vṛddhe vā /
T06bsa034_u:7222: tadyathā kṛṣṇasyakutapasya nirbhāsaḥ andhakāratamisrāyā vā rātryāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7224: ye punardvābhyāmākārābhyāṃ jyotiḥ parāyaṇāsteṣāmayamevaṃrūpo manomayo 'ntarābhavo nirvartate /
T06bsa034_u:7225: tadyathā jyotsnayā rātryā vārāṇaseyakasya vā sampannasya vastrasya /
T06bsa034_u:7231: sa samutthānayā śīlavipattyā kāyavāṅma noduścaritena samanvāgatā ityucyante /
T06bsa034_u:7233: sarvāpavādikayā tanmatavipakṣāvasthitāryapavādikayā ca mithyādṛṣṭayaḥ āryāṇāmapavādakā ityucyante /
T06bsa034_u:7245: adharmacaryā viṣamacaryā ca tayā tatra yānaṃ bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:7250: iti yena copapadyante upapannāśca yadupabhuñjate tadupabhogācca punaryadanyat svayaṃkṛtaṃ duḥkhāntaramabhinirvartayanti tadetadābhiḥ saṃjñābhiḥ paridīpitam /
T06bsa034_u:7255: sarvāsravāṇāmaśeṣānuśayaprahāṇādyattat prātipakṣikamanāsravaṃ cittamanāśravā prajñāparamādhiprajñasaṃgṛhītā āsravāṇāṃ kṣayādanāsravā cetovimuktiḥ prajñāvimuktirityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7256: tāṃ punaścetovimuktiṃ [prajñāvimukti] tasminneva carame bhave pratyātmaṃ ṣaṣṭhābhijñayā
T06bsa034_u:7259: tasmād dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya (Dutt 271)
T06bsa034_u:7261: kṣīṇāṃ me jātirityevamādīnāṃ padānāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:7273: ityebhiḥ saptabhirākāraiḥ samāsato daśa tathāgatabalāni veditavyāni /
T06bsa034_u:7278: sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ na tu śraddhābalaṃ vā tadanyadvā balamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7292: iyameṣāṃ samatā vihāraviśeṣastu tathāgatānāmanyonyaṃ bhavedanyena balavihāreṇa anyastathāgatastadvahulavihārī bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:7294: eṣāṃ daśānāṃ balānāṃ tathāgataḥ kena kiṃ karmaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:7295: sthānāsthānajñānabalena tathāgataḥ hetuñca hetutaḥ phalañca phalato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:7298: karmasvakatājñānabalena tathāgataḥ svayaṃkṛta-phalopabhogatāñca karmaṇāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:7302: indriyaparāparajñānabalena tathāgataḥ sattvānāmindriyamṛdumadhyādhimātratāñca vibhajya yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:7307: nānādhātujñānabalena tathāgato hīnamadhyepraṇotadhātukatāśca vibhajya yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:7308: yathendriyān yathāṣayān yathānuśayāṃśca sattvāṃsteṣu teṣvavatāramukheṣvavavādakriyayā samyagyathāyogaṃ saṃniyojayati /
T06bsa034_u:7309: tatra yathā tathāgatāḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ teṣu teṣvavatāramukheṣvavavādamanuprayacchanti tathāśrāvakabhūmau sarveṇa sarvaṃ nirantaramākhyātamuttānaṃ vivṛtaṃ prajñaptaṃ prakāśitam /
T06bsa034_u:7310: kathañca punastathāgatā bodhisattvamādikarmikaṃ tatprathamakarmikaṃ samādhisambhāraparigrahe 'vasthitañcittasthitikāmaṃ cittasthitaye 'vavadanti
T06bsa034_u:7311: iha tathāgato bodhisattvāsataṃ samādhisambhāragurukamādikarmikaṃ tatprathamakarmikaṃ tatprathamataḥ evamavavadati /
T06bsa034_u:7312: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra praviviktaśayanāsanagata ekākī advitīyo yatte mātāpitṛbhyāṃ nāma vyavasthāpitamācāryopādhyāyābhyāṃ vā tadeva nāmādhyātmaṃ manasikuru /
T06bsa034_u:7313: evañca punarmanasikuru-asti me [sa] kaścitṣaḍāyatanavinirmukto dharmaḥ svabhāvena pariniṣpannaḥ adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā ubhayamantareṇa vā vidyate /
T06bsa034_u:7315: saṃjñā prajñaptiḥ upacāraḥ pravartate sa tvamevaṃ yoniśo manasikurvaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ nopalapsyase /
T06bsa034_u:7318: yadā ca te kulaputra tasmin svanāmni āgantukasaṃjñā utpānna bhavati pratilabdhā sa tvaṃ yā te cakṣuṣi cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñā cakṣuḥ-prajñaptistāmadhyātmaṃ yoniśomanasikuru /
T06bsa034_u:7325: tatra yaccakṣuṣi nāma saṃjñā prajñaptistattāvanna cakṣuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7326: yadapi tadvastu yatra cakṣuḥsaṃjñā tadapi svabhāvato na cakṣuḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7328: na hi tatra cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñāṃ cakṣuḥprajñaptiṃ vinā kasyacit cakṣurbuddhiḥ pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:7330: yena nāmnā 'bhilapyate na tatra punastadapekṣā cakṣurityevaṃ buddhiḥ pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:7331: nānyatra prakṛtyaivāśruto 'parikalpita-nāmakānāmapi tasmin vastuni cakṣuriti buddhiḥ pravartate /
T06bsa034_u:7332: na ca punaḥ pravartamānā upalabhyate tasmādidamapi cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñā cakṣuḥprajñaptiḥ āgantuke dharme saṃjñā āgantukī /
T06bsa034_u:7337: evaṃ [te] svātmani yā saṃjñā [avasthā] tasyā vibhavāya prayogamārgaḥ samyak parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati /
T06bsa034_u:7338: vistareṇa yāvatsarvadharmeṣu yā saṃjñā tasyā vibhavāya prayogamārgaḥ samyak parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati /
T06bsa034_u:7339: sa tvamevaṃ sarvajñeya-suvicāritayā buddhyā evaṃ te sarvadharmasaṃjñāsvāgantukasaṃjñayā
T06bsa034_u:7343: sa tvaṃ sacedaśubhāṃ manasikaroṣi enaṃ manasikāraṃ mā riñciṣyasi /
T06bsa034_u:7344: sa cenmaitrī midaṃpratyayatā pratītyasamutpādaṃ dhātuprabhedamānāpānasmṛtiṃ prathamaṃ
T06bsa034_u:7347: evaṃ te 'yaṃ bodhisattva manaskāro 'nupūrveṇa yāvadanuttarāyai samyaksambodhaye niryāsyatīti /
T06bsa034_u:7353: śrāvako 'pi cānena manaskāreṇa prayujyamānaḥ kṣiprābhijñataraḥ syād dharmābhisamayāya yadi śaknuyādetaṃ manasikāraṃ yathāvatprativeddhum /
T06bsa034_u:7354: sarvatrāgaminī pratipat jñānabalena tathāgataḥ sarvaduḥkha-nairyāṇikīmanairyāṇikīṃ ca pratipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:7356: pūrve nivāsānusmṛtijñānabalena tathāgataḥ pūrvānte itivṛttakāṃśca jātakāṃśca smṛtvā cittasaṃvegāya cittaprasādāya vineyānāṃ deśayati /
T06bsa034_u:7360: āsravakṣayajñānabalena tathāgataḥ sve ca vimokṣe niṣkāṃkṣo bhavati nirvicikitsaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7364: sahābhisaṃbodhādanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhestathāgataḥ sarvāṇyeva daśa balāni sakṛtpratilabhate /
T06bsa034_u:7366: abhisaṃbuddhamātra eva tathāgato dharmāṇāṃ samyageva hetuphalavyavasthānaṃ sthānāsthānajñāgabalena vyavalokayati /
T06bsa034_u:7367: vyavalokya kāmadhātāveva sabhāge dhātāviṣṭaphala-viśeṣārthikānāṃ karmasvakatā-jñānabalenākuśalakarmaparivarjanāṃ kuśalakarmasamudācāratāñca vyapadiśati /
T06bsa034_u:7376: pratipadaṃ vyapadiśati sarvakleśaprahāṇāya pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānabalena cyutyupapattijñānabalena ca /
T06bsa034_u:7377: tata evaṃ samyak prayuktaḥ śamathopastabdho aprahīṇakleśasamudācārayogākṛte kṛtābhimānināmabhimānaṃ tyājayati āsravakṣayajñānabalena /
T06bsa034_u:7380: iha tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksambodhibhisaṃbudhya tatprathamataḥ sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ sammukhīkṛtya pratītyasamutpanneṣu dharmeṣu paramaṃ dharmasthitijñānaṃ vyavacārayati /
T06bsa034_u:7381: tacca dharmasthitijñānaṃ niḥśritya karmasvakatājñānabalena gṛhipakṣaṃ vyavalokayati yena yena karmaṇā vicitreṇa teṣāṃ gṛhipakṣāśritānāṃ samudāgamo 'bhūdbhaviṣyati vidyate [ca] /
T06bsa034_u:7383: kimastyasmin kaścid pravrajitapakṣe duḥkhānniḥsṛto duḥkhān niḥsaraṇāya ca mārgasya deśayitā /
T06bsa034_u:7385: sa nāstīti avagamya nisrāṇamaśaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ lokamavekṣya mahākaruṇāmupādāya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati /
T06bsa034_u:7387: santi sattvā loke jātā [loke] vṛddhā mṛdvindriyā api madhyendriyā api tīkṣṇendriyā apīti /
T06bsa034_u:7389: tataḥ pūrvavatsarvānukramo nānādhimuktyādikānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ balānāṃ veditavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7392: pūrvaṃ tāvattathāgato 'bhisaṃbudhyamātra eva sthānāsthānajñānabalena pratītyasamutpannaṃ dharmadhātuṃ vicārayati /
T06bsa034_u:7393: tataḥ karmasvakajñānabalena yeṣu pratītatyasamutpanneṣu dharmeṣu sattvasaṃjñātaṃ sattvadhātuṃ vicārayati /
T06bsa034_u:7394: amī sattvā evaṃ rūpasya svayaṃkṛtasya karmaṇa evaṃ rūpaṃ phalaṃ pratyanubhavantīti /
T06bsa034_u:7395: dharmadhātuṃ [sattvadhātuṃ] ca yathāvadvyavacārayitvā dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalena tāneva sattvān duḥkhavimokṣāya samyak tribhiḥ prātihāryairavavadati /
T06bsa034_u:7396: avavadan pūrvaṃvadananukrameṇāvaśiṣṭairvalairindriyādīni jñātvā mārge cāvatārayitvā tān sattvān duḥkhādvimocayati /
T06bsa034_u:7399: tatra sthānāsthānajñānavalasya karmasvakajñānabalasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7400: yatkuśalākuśalasya karmaṇa iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ nirvartate idaṃ sthānāsthānajñānabalāt /
T06bsa034_u:7401: yatpunarya eva kuśalākuśalaṃ karma karoti sa eva tadiṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ pratyanubhavati /
T06bsa034_u:7403: yattāvadya eva dhyānavimokṣādīnāṃ samāpattyā tasyaiva te bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:7432: prakṛtisthaṃ bījaṃ pūrvābhyāsasamutthitaṃ bījaṃ viśodhyaṃ bījam /
T06bsa034_u:7443: yatpunaḥ pravibhajya vyavahārapadānugataṃ pūrvavat ṣaḍvidhaṃ caritaṃ prajānāti /
T06bsa034_u:7455: tatra catvāryetāni sthānāni tathāgataiḥ pariṣadi pratijñātavyāni bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:7460: vimokṣakāmānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ duḥkhasamatikramāya nairyāṇiko mārgaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7462: tasyaiva ca mārgasya prāptivibandhabhūtā ye āntarāyikā dharmāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7465: ataḥ pratijñāviguṇāṃ dvayoḥ pūrvayoḥ sthānayoḥ kāyavāṅmanaśceṣṭāṃ pratijñāviguṇāṃ
T06bsa034_u:7466: ca dvayoḥ paścimayoḥ sthānayoḥ pūrvāparavirodhatāmayuktipatitāñcāpareṣāṃ divyadṛśāṃ
T06bsa034_u:7468: nimittabhūtāmasamanupaśyan yenaitāni sthānāni viśārado 'līnacitto nirāśaṅko nirbhīḥ pratijānāti /
T06bsa034_u:7469: etāvacca śāstrā pratijñātavyam yaduta paripūrṇā svahitapratipattiḥ parahitapratipattiśca /
T06bsa034_u:7470: tatra pūrvakābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ sthānābhyāṃ paripūrṇā svahitapratipattiḥ pratijñātā bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:7477: yo vā me bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakāṇāñca nairyāṇiko mārgo deśita iti vistaraḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7481: dīrgharātraṃ tathāgata evaṃ kāmaḥ kaccinmayā sudeśite dharme vineyāḥ pratipattau yathāvadavatiṣṭeranniti /
T06bsa034_u:7482: tasya ca dīrgharātraṃ tatkāmasya dharmasvāmino gaṇaparikarṣakasya tasyāḥ prārthitāyāḥ sampattibhyāmasaṃkleśasribhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ samāsataḥ prabhāvyate /
T06bsa034_u:7489: tṛtīyā punaḥ pariṣadyāsyāṃ tadekatyāḥ samyak pratipadyante tadekatyā mithyā pratipadyante /
T06bsa034_u:7492: etattathāgatasya tribhirarakṣyaiḥ paridīpitam yadapi tadarthato 'pi kiñcidavyākṛtaṃ kukṛtamātrakaṃ bhavati kadācitkarhicitsmṛtipramoṣāt /
T06bsa034_u:7498: api tu niṣṭhuraṃ pratipadyate nāsya teṣvanurakṣā utpadyate /
T06bsa034_u:7499: mā haiva me śrāvakāḥ saṃvāsānvayādapariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥ-samudācāratāṃ viditvā tena vastunā 'nāttamanaskā anabhirāddhyāścodayiṣyanti /
T06bsa034_u:7502: tatra tathāgatānāṃ mahākaruṇā sarvākārā yathā pūrvanirdiṣṭā pūjāsevāpramāṇapaṭale veditavyā /
T06bsa034_u:7504: tatra tathāgatasyānuṣṭeyaṃ yacca bhavati [yatra ca bhavati] yathā ca bhavati yadā ca bhavati tatra tasya tathā tadā samyaganuṣṭhānādiyaṃ tathāgatasyāsammoṣadharmatetyucyate
T06bsa034_u:7505: iti yā ca tatra tathāgatasya sarvakṛtyeṣu sarvadeśeṣu sarvakṛtyopāyeṣu sarvakāleṣu smṛtyasaṃpramoṣatā sadopasthitasmṛtitā /
T06bsa034_u:7507: tatra yā tathāgatasya spandite vā prekṣite vā kathite vā vihāre vā kleśasadbhāvasadṛśaṃ ceṣṭā 'samudācāra-pracāratā /
T06bsa034_u:7509: arhatāṃ punaḥ prahīṇakleśānāmapi kleśasadbhāvasadṛśī ceṣṭā spandita-prekṣita-kathita-vihṛteṣu bhavatyeva /
T06bsa034_u:7517: tatra yacca sarvākāraṃ jñānaṃ yacca varajñānaṃ tadaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya sarvākāravarajñānamityucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7519: tatra lakṣaṇānuvyañjanānyanena bodhisattvabhūtena carame bhave supariśuddhāni pratilabdhāni bhavanti /
T06bsa034_u:7520: yadā tu bodhimaṇḍe niṣīdati suparipūrṇa-bodhisaṃbhāramārgo bodhisattvaḥ paścime bhave
T06bsa034_u:7522: nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate śaikṣyabhūtasya bodhisattvasya vajropamasamādhi-saṃgṛhītam /
T06bsa034_u:7523: tasyānantaraṃ dvitīye kṣaṇe pariśiṣṭānāṃ daśabalādīnāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ sarvākāra-varajñāna-paryavasānānāṃ suviśuddhatāṃ niruttaratāṃ sakṛtpratilabhate
T06bsa034_u:7524: teṣāñca lābhāt sarvasmin jñeye 'saktamanāvaraṇaṃ suviśuddhaṃ nirmalaṃ jñānaṃ pravartate ābhogamātra-pratibaddham /
T06bsa034_u:7528: sāragatasya ca jñeyāvaraṇapakṣyasya dauṣṭhulyasya niravaśeṣaṃ prahāṇādasyāśrayaḥ parivṛtto bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:7530: anyāḥ sarvāḥ paramavihārāvasānā bodhisattvānāmāśrayaparivṛttayaḥ sottarā eva veditavyāḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7531: tatra niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya ca bodhisattvasya [tathāgatasya ca kathaṃ jñānaviśeṣo 'vagantavyo jñānāntaram /
T06bsa034_u:7532: iha niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya] pelavapaṭāntaritaṃ yathācakṣuṣmato rūpadarśanam /
T06bsa034_u:7533: evaṃ tasya sarvasmin jñeye jñānaṃ veditavyam /
T06bsa034_u:7536: tadyathā sarvākāraraṃga-paripūrṇaṃ citrakarma paścimayā suviśuddhayā raṃgalekhayā 'pariśodhitam /
T06bsa034_u:7542: tadyathā cakṣuṣmata ārādrūpadarśanam evaṃ evaṃ bodhisattvasya pūrvavat yathā āsanne evaṃ tathāgatasya pūrvavat /
T06bsa034_u:7543: yathā mṛdutaimirikasya rūpadarśanam evaṃ bodhisattvasya pūrvavat yathā suviśuddha-cakṣuṣaḥ evaṃ tathāgatasya pūrvavat /
T06bsa034_u:7544: yathā garbhagatasyātmabhāva evaṃ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmisthito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7546: yathārhataḥ svapnāntaragatasya cittapracārastathā niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya draṣṭavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7547: yathā tasyaiva prativibuddhasya cittapracāra evaṃ tathāgatasya draṣṭavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7548: tadyathā pradīpasyāviśuddhasya svabhāvaḥ tathā niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya jñānasvabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7549: yathā suviśuddhasya pradīpasya svabhāvaḥ evaṃ tathāgatasya jñānasvabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7551: evamabhisaṃbuddho bodhistathāgato daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetre sarvabuddhakāryaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:7558: ādita eva cittaprasādakārakamahāpuruṣa[bhāva]saṃpratyayajananā prathamaṃ tathā[gata]kṛtyaṃ tacca lakṣaṇānuvyañjanaiḥ sampādayati /
T06bsa034_u:7562: yattathāgato daśabhirtāthāgatabalaiḥ sampādayati tathā hi tathāgato daśabhiḥ pūrvanirdiṣṭairvalaiḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvārthasampādanaṃ prati samartho bhavati /
T06bsa034_u:7563: ye cainaṃ tathāgatabalānyārabhya praśnaṃ pṛcchanti yathā yāni tathāgatena jñātāni dṛṣṭāni viditāni vijñātāni tathā tāni tathāgatasteṣāṃ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākaroti /
T06bsa034_u:7565: yattathāgato vaiśāradyaiḥ sampādayati tathāgatājñāyāṃ sthiteṣvasyiteṣu ca vineyeṣvasaṃkliṣṭacittatā pañcamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
T06bsa034_u:7566: yattathāgataḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ sampādayati yathāvādi tathākāritā ṣaṣṭhaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
T06bsa034_u:7567: yattathāgataḥ arakṣyaiḥ sampādayati buddhacakṣuṣā rātrindivaṃ sarvalokavyavalokanā saptamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
T06bsa034_u:7570: yattathāgato 'sammoṣadharmatayā sampādayati tathāgatasyācāravihārasya yathāvadanuvartanā adhitiṣṭhanā navamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
T06bsa034_u:7571: yattathāgato vāsanāsamuddhātena sampādayati ye dharmā anarthopasaṃhitā ye ca naivārthopasaṃhitānānārthopasaṃhitāstānabhinirvarjya
T06bsa034_u:7572: ye ca dharmā arthopasaṃhitāsteṣāṃ samākhyānaṃ vivaraṇā uttānīkarme daśamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
T06bsa034_u:7573: yattathāgataḥ sarvākāravarajñānena sampādayati evaṃ hi tathāgato 'nenāveṇikena catvāriṃśaduttareṇa buddhadharmaśatena daśatathāgata kṛtyāni kurvan sarvabuddhakāryaṃ karoti /
T06bsa034_u:7574: vistaravibhāgataḥ punarasyaiva buddhakāryasya na sukarāsaṃkhyāṃ kartuṃ yāvatkalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrairapi /
T06bsa034_u:7575: ayaṃ sa tathāgato vihārastathāgatī bhūmiḥ pratiṣṭhetyucyate /
T06bsa034_u:7577: etāmāśrityaitāṃ pratiṣṭhāya yasyāḥ spṛhayamāṇarūpā bodhisattvā bodhisattvaśikṣāsu
T06bsa034_u:7578: śikṣante adhigamyāpi ca tāṃ pratiṣṭhāmetāmevāśrityaitāṃ pratiṣṭhāya sarvasattvānāṃ
T06bsa034_u:7582: sarve caite buddhadharmā atyarthaṃ parārthakriyānukūlāḥ parārthakriyāprabhāvitāśca tathāgatānām /
T06bsa034_u:7585: santi ca te buddhadharmā ye sarveṇa sarvaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddheṣu nopalabhyante /
T06bsa034_u:7588: tathāgatasya tu sarve copalabhyante sarvākāraparipūrṇāścātikrāntatarāśca praṇītatarāśca /
T06bsa034_u:7593: sarvabodhisattva-śikṣāmārgasya śikṣāmārgaphalasya ca tarvākārasya nirdeśāya adhiṣṭhānabhūtam sā khalviyaṃ bodhisattvabhūmirbodhisattvapiṭakamātṛketyapyucyate
T06bsa034_u:7597: yaḥ kaścit sadevamānuṣā[surā]llokāddevabhūto vā [manuṣyabhūto vā] śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo
T06bsa034_u:7599: bhāvanākāreṇa vā prayokṣyate pareṣāṃ vā vistareṇa prakāśayiṣyatyantato lekhayitvā
T06bsa034_u:7601: tasya samāsato yāvān puṇyaskandho bhagavatā sarvabodhisattvapiṭake saṃgṛhītasya sūtrāntasya
T06bsa034_u:7602: śravaṇādikarmaṇa ākhyāta uttāno vivṛtaḥ prajñaptaḥ prakāśitaḥ tāvānasya puṇyaskandhaḥ pratyāśaṃsitavyaḥ /
T06bsa034_u:7604: tathā hyasyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sarvasya bodhisattvapiṭakasyoddeśanirdeśamukhāni saṃgṛhītānyākhyātāni /
T06bsa034_u:7605: yāvaccāsyāṃ [bodhisattva]bhūmau yo dharmavinayo vistareṇa prakāśitaḥ sa bahulamuddeśasvādhyāya-dharmānudharmapratipattitaḥ
T06bsa034_u:7606: sthāsyati pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāñca gamiṣyati na tāvatsaddharmapratirūpakāḥ pracurā
T06bsa034_u:7608: yataśca punaḥ saddharmapratirūpakāḥ pracurā bhaviṣyanti tataścāyaṃ saddharmo bhūtārthopasaṃhito tasya tadantardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T06bsa034_u:7609: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne ṣaṣṭhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpaṭalam /
T06bsa034_u:7612: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāntathāgato hyavadat /
T06bsa034_u:7613: teṣāñca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
